sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 °C for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus.
targetString: ብSARS-CoV-2 ንኣልትራቫዮሌት ጨረራትን ናይ 30 ደቓይቕ በ 56 ዲግሪ ሴንቲ ግሬድ ናይ ሙቐት መጠን ከምዝዳኸም ጸብጻብ ተገይሩ እዩ፡፡ 75% ኢታኖል ፣ ክሎሪን-ዝሓዙ ፀረ-ተሃዋስያን መድሓኒታት ፣ ፒራክቲክ አሲድ ፣ ክሎሮፎርን ካልኦት ናይ ስብሒ ፈሰስትን፣ ግን chlorhexidine ዝኾኑ ፣ ነቲ ቫይረስ ከዳኽሙ ይኽእሉ እዮም፡፡
en-mt: By SARS-CoV-2, there have been reports of 30-minute uvvs of ultraviolet rains and a 30-minute 56°C (56°C) temperature. 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing antimicrobial drugs, pyractic alcohol, chloroform and other fat liquids, but chlorhexidine, which are chlorhexidine, can weaken the virus.

sourceString: The entire human population generally lacks immunity to SARS-CoV-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus.
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ንSARS-CoV-2 ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ትሑት ብምዃኑ ንሓደሽቲ ቫይረሳት ተቓላዕቲ ይገብሮም።
en-mt: Humans are less susceptible to new viruses because they have low resistance to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ኣብዚ ሐዚ እዋን፡ን SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ዝህሉ ናይ ሰውነት ናይ ምክልኻል መልሲ ኣወሃባ ዝተገበረ ዝርዝር ጽንዓት ኣይተገበረን።
en-mt: Currently, there is no detailed study of SARS-CoV-2 prevention responses.

sourceString: Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other CoVs, especially SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. ​(Fig.4).4).
targetString: ብምዃኑ ድማ ነቶም ካልኦት CoVs ብፍላይ ዳማ ናይ SARS-CoVን MERS-CoVን ሕሉፍ መጽናዕቲ ጥራሕ ኢና ክንውከስ ንኽእል(Fig. (Fig.4).4)
en-mt: As a result, we can only refer to the past studies of the other CoVs, especially the dam of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. (Fig.4.4)

sourceString: In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptor (TLR), NOD-like receptor (NLR), and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR).
targetString: ብጠቕላላ እቲ ቫይረስ ነቲ ተሸካማይ ድሕሪ ምዉራሩ ፈለማ pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) C-type lectin-like receptors፣ Toll-like receptor (TLR)፣ NOD-like receptor (NLR)፣ and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR) ሓዊስካ በቲ ናይ ተሸካማይ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ሕማም መከላኸሊ ስርዓት ዝልለ እዩ።
en-mt: In total, after the virus invades the carrier, initial pattern recognition receptors (PRRs), C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptors (TLR), NOD-like receptors (NLR), RIG and I-like receptor (RLR) are identified by the carrier's natural immune system.

sourceString: Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type I interferons (IFNs) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ መንገድታት ብምጥቃም እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ኢንፍላማቶሪ ፋክተርስ ምፍናው፣ ዴንድራይቲክ ዋህዮታት ምምዕባል ከምኡውን ታይፕ I ኢንተርፌሮንስ (IFNs) ብምፍራይ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምስፍሕፋሕ ንኽቕንስ ይሕግዝ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣንቲጅን ድማ ብማክሮፌጅ ይወሓጥ።
en-mt: Using a variety of ways, the virus's detonation of flumatory factors, dendreatic cells, and type I interferons (IFNs) help reduce the spread of the virus, while the virus's antidote is swallowed by macrophage.

sourceString: However, the N protein of SARS-CoV can help the virus escape from the immune responses.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV N ፕሮቲን እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ሕማም መከላኸሊ ስርዓት ንኸምልጥ ዝሕግዞ እዩ።
en-mt: Sars-CoV N proteins are used to help the virus escape the immune system's disease.

sourceString: Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ቀረባ እዋን፣ እቲ ዝተላመደ ናይ ሕማም መከላኸሊ ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምውጋእ ምስቶም ካልኦት ብምዃን ስርሑ ክጅምር እዩ።
en-mt: Soon, the developed immune system will begin work with others to fight the virus.

sourceString: T lymphocytes including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells play an important role in the defense.
targetString: ከም CD4+ን CD8+ን ዝመሳሰሉ T ሊምፎሳይት ኣብ እቲ ናይ ምክልኻል ስራሕ ዓቢ ታራ ይፃወቱ እዮም።
en-mt: T lymphocystems such as CD4+and CD8+play a big tara in the protective work.

sourceString: CD4+ T cells stimulate B cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and CD8+ T cells directly kill virus-infected cells.
targetString: CD4 + T cell በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተትሓዙ ኣንቲቦዲ ንምምንጫው ናይ B cells የነቃቕሑ። ከምኡውን CD8 + T cell ብቐጥታ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተትሓዙ ዋህዮታት ይቐትሉ።
en-mt: CD4 + T cell wakes up B cells to generate infected antibody, and CD8 + T cell kill cells directly infected.

sourceString: T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells.
targetString: ቲ ሄልፐር ዋህዮታት(T helper cells) ጸረ ረኽሲ ዝኾነ ሳይቶክይነስ(cytokines) ነቶም ዝከላኸሉ ዋህዮታት ንምሕጋዝ ዘፍሪ እዩ።
en-mt: T helper cells produce anti-infection cytokines to help the immune cells.

sourceString: However, CoV can inhibit T cell functions by inducing apoptosis of T cells.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ CoV ን ናይ ቲ-ዋህዮታት( T cell ) ኣስራርሓታት ኣፖፕቶሲስ(apoptosis) ብምትእትታው ከጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: However, CoV can infect T cell employers by introducing apoptosis.

sourceString: The humoral immunity including complements such as C3a and C5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ንምዕጋት ከም C3a፣ C5aን ኣንቲቦዲታትን ዝመሳሰሉ ሂዩመራል መከላኸሊ ሕማም ኣድለይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Human immunosubstants such as C3A, C5A and anti-virus are necessary to prevent the virus.

sourceString: For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized MERS-CoV.
targetString: ንኣብነት ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሕሙማት ዝተወስዱ ኣንቲቦዲታት ንMERS-CoV ኣዳኺሞሞ እዮም።
en-mt: For example, antibiotics taken from rescued patients have weakened MES-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death.
targetString: ብ ኻሊእ ወገን፡ ካብ እቲ ስርዓት መከላኸሊ ሰብነትና ዝገብሮ ካብ ዓቐን ንላዕሊ ዝኾነ ግብረ መልሲ ዝተልዓለ ብዙሕ መጠን ዘለዎ ናጻ ራዲካላት ኣብ ሳንቡእ ኣብ ካልኦት ኣካላት ሰብነትን ከቢድ ጉድኣት ከስዕቡ ዘኸእሉ ብምዃኖም ኣብ እቲ ዝገደደ ኩነታት ድማ ካብ ሓደ ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ ኣካላት ጉድኣት ብምስዓብ ናብ ሞት እውን ከብቅዑ ዝኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: On the other hand, large amounts of free radicals, triggered by excessive response from the body's protective system, can cause serious damage to the lungs and other organs of the body, and in the worst cases, more than one organ can cause damage and lead to death.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ፡ ብ ጉጅለ ዝጀመረ ምስ ምዃኑ፡ ኣብ ሕዱር ናይ ጥዕና ጸገም ዘለዎም ኣረጋውያንን ጥኑሳትን ብዝበለጸ ጽልዋ ከሕድር ይኽእል።
en-mt: When SARS-CoV-2 infections start with a group, it can have a greater impact on the elderly and pregnant women with chronic health problems.

sourceString: It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others.
targetString: ኣብ እቶም ናብ ብዙሓት ቫይረሳት ዝተጋለጹን ናይ ሰብነቶም ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ዝተዳኸሙን ሰባት ካብ ካልኦት ዝለዓለ ብ ረኽሲ ናይ ምጥቃዕ ተኸእሎኦም ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: Infection is more common in people who have been exposed to multiple viruses and whose immune systems have been weakened by infections than others.

sourceString: The estimated mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in Wuhan.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ መጫጭሒ እዋን ብማእኸላይ 1-14 ማዓልትታት እንትኸዉን ኣብቶም ኣብ ዉሃን ዝተረኽቡ ናይ መጀምርታ 425 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ከምዝተፀንዐ ድማ ብኣብዝሓ 3-7 ማዕልትታት እዩ ዝፀንሕ።
en-mt: he average sars-CoV-2 operation lasts 1-14 days and lasts a majority of 3-7 days in the first 425 cases of the outbreak in Wuhan.

sourceString: However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና ኣብ 1,099 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ዝተገብረ መፅናዕቲ ናይ ኢንኩቤሽን እዋን ብማእኸላይ 3 ማዓልቲ እንትኸዉን ካብ 0 ክሳብ 24 ማዓልትታት ድማ ክፀንሕ ከም ዝኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: However, a study of 1,099 cases of the epidemic found that the incubation period could last an average of 3 days and 0 to 24 days.

sourceString: A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases.
targetString: ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተገለፀ ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን ኣብ 8,866 ህዝቢ ዝተገብረ መፅናዕቲ ናይ መጫጭሒ እዋን 4.8 (3.0-7.2) ማዕልትታት ምዃኑ ገሊፁ።
en-mt: As noted above, a recent survey of 8,866 people revealed that the 4.8 (3.0-7.2) population is a 4.8 (3.0-7.2) population.

sourceString: It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others.
targetString: ን ናይ ሕክምና ሰበ ስልጣን ነቲ ናይ ምውሻብ እዋን ምስ እቲ ኣዝዩ ትኽክለኛ ዝኾነ ናይ መጫጭሒ እዋን ክስተኻኸል ብምግባር ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሕሙማት ነቲ ሕማም ናብ ካልኦት ከየመሓላልፉ ክግብሩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Medical authorities should adjust the reception period with the most accurate access period and ensure that patients who show no symptoms are not transmitted the disease to others.

sourceString: As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days.
targetString: ከም ልሙድ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ን14 ማዓልትታት ክዉሸቡ ይግበር።
en-mt: People who are infected with the virus should be quarantined for 14 days.

sourceString: Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days?
targetString: እቲ ናይ ውሸባ ጊዜ ናብ 24 መዓልቲታት ክናዋሕ ኣለዎ ዶ?
en-mt: Do you have to extend the lockdown period to 24 days?

sourceString: Fever is often the major and initial symptom of COVID-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ፈላማይን ኣገዳሲን ምልክት ረስኒ ኮይኑ በይኑ ወይድማ ከም ደረቕ ሳዓል፣ ትንፋስ ምሕፃር፣ ናይ ጭዋዳ ቃንዛ፣ ርእሲ ምዝዋር፣ ሕማም ርእሲ፣ ናይ ጎሮር ቃንዛ፣ ራይኖርያ፣ ናይ ደረት ቃንዛ፣ ተቕማጥ፣ ዕዉልዉል ምባልን ተምላስን ዝመሳሰሉ ካልኦት ምልክታት ሒዙ ክመፅእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: COVID-19 is the first and most important symptom of fever and can come with other symptoms, such as dry coughs, shortness of breath, muscle pain, headaches, throat pain, rhynoria, chest pain, vomiting, coughing and vomiting.

sourceString: Some patients experienced dyspnea and/or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease.
targetString: ገለ ሕሙማት በቲ ሕማም ምስተትሓዙ ድሕሪ ሓደ ስሙን ናይ dyspnea ን / ወይ hypoxemia ምልክታት ኣርእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: Some patients have symptoms of dyspnea and/or hypoxemia after being infected.

sourceString: In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy.
targetString: ኣብ ከበድቲ ኩነታት፡ ሕሙማት ክቢድ ናይ መተንፈሲ ጸገም ፡ ሴፕቲክ ሾክ( septic shock)፡ ሜታቦሊክ ኣሲዶሲስ(metabolic acidosis)ን ኮኣጉሎፓቲ(coagulopathy) ብቕልጡፍ የማዕብሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In severe cases, patients develop severe respiratory problems: septic shock, metabolic acidosis and coagulopathy.

sourceString: Patients with fever and/or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis.
targetString: ረስኒ ወይድማ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምልክታትን ሃንደበታዊ ረስኒን ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ነቲ ሕማም ዝገልፅ ናይ ሳምባ ራጂ ዉፅኢት ዋላ ተዘይሃለወ ቅልጡፍ ዲያግኖሲስ ንምርካብ ነቲ ቫይረስ ክምርመሩ ይግባእ እዩ።
en-mt: Patients with a fever or respiratory symptoms and a sudden fever should be tested for the virus for immediate diagnosis, even if there are no symptoms of the disease.

sourceString: A demographic study in late December of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ ወርሒ ዲሴምበር 2019 ዝተገበረ ሓደ ናይ ስነ ሕዝቢ ምርምር ከምዘርእዮ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ምልክታት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ናይ ረስኒ 98% ፣ ናይ ደረቅ ስዓል 76% ፣ ናይ ድርቀት 55% ፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ተቅማጥ 3% ፣ ካብ ጠቕላላ ሕሙማት 8% ዝኾኑ ድማ ናይ መተንፈሲ ድጋፍ ዝደልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: At the end of December 2019, a population study found that symptoms were 98% of the total fever, dry cough of 76%, droughts of 55% and epilegy 3%, and 8% of all patients needed respiratory support.

sourceString: Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual.
targetString: ኣብ ክልተ ናይ ቀረባ እዋን መፅናዕትታት ናይ ስድራ እኩብን ካሊእ ካብ ሓደ ምልክት ዘይብሉ ሰብ ዝተላገቡ ናይ ሰባት እኩብን ተመሳሳሊ ዉፅኢት ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: In two recent studies, similar results were found in a family group and another group of people infected with an unmarked person.

sourceString: Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that MERS-CoV patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms.
targetString: ብተነፃፃሪ፣ ኣብ 2012 ዝተገብረ ናይ ስነ-ህዝቢ መፅናዕቲ ናይ MERS-CoV ሕሙማት ዋና ምልክታት ረስኒ (98%)፣ ደረቕ ሰዓልን (47%) ሕፅረት ምትንፋስን (55%) ምዃኖም ገሊፁ።
en-mt: Comparatively, a 2012 ethos of MERS-CoV patients identified the main symptoms of fever (98%), dry coughing (47%), and shortness of breath (55%).

sourceString: However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than COVID-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of MERS than of COVID-19.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና ካብ COVID-19 ንላዕሊ 80% ዝኾኑ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ ዘድልዮም እዮም። ብጣዕሚ ሓደገኛ ብምዃኑ ድማ ካብ ምስ COVID-19 ምስ MERS ይመሳሰል።
en-mt: However, 80% of COVID-19 needs respiratory assistance, and it is very dangerous compared to COVID-19.

sourceString: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with MERS patients.
targetString: ተቕማጥ (26%) ፡ ዝቖሰለ ጉሮሮ( 21%) ኣብ ናይ MERS ሕሙማት እውን ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: A stroke (26%), a wounded throat (21%) was also seen in MERS patients.

sourceString: In SARS patients, it has been demonstrated that fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), dyspnea (40%-42%), diarrhea (20-25%), and sore throat (13-25%) were the major symptoms and ventilation support was required for approximately 14%-20% of the patients.
targetString: ረስኒ (99%-100%)፣ ደረቕ ሰዓል (29%-75%)፣ ሕፅረት ምስትንፋስ (40%-42%)፣ ተቕማጥን (20-25%) ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛን (13-25%) ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ዋናዋና ምልክታት ኮይኖም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ ድማ ንኣስታት 14%-20% ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ኣድላዪ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), shortness of breath (40%-42%), vomiting (20–25%), throat pain (13-25%) of SARS patients are the main symptoms, and respiratory assistance has been found to be necessary for about 14%-20% of patients.

sourceString: By February 14, the mortality of COVID-19 was 2% when the confirmed cases reached 66,576 globally.
targetString: ክሳብ ፌብሩዋሪ 14፡ ብ ብርኪ ዓለም እቲ ኣጠቓላሊ ጉዳያት ለበዳ 66:576 እንክበጽሕ እንከሎ፡ ናይ COVID-19 ሞት ሓደጋ 2% ነይሩ።
en-mt: As of February 14, the global pandemic total was 66,576, with the risk of COVID-19 death at 2%.

sourceString: Comparably, the mortality of SARS by November 2002 was 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases.
targetString: ብተነጻጻሪ፣ ኣብ ኖቨምበር 2002 ናይ SARS ናይ ሞት መጠን ካብ 8,096 ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት 10% ኾይኑ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In comparison, SARS death rates in November 2002 were found to be 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases.

sourceString: For MERS, based on a demographic study in June 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases.
targetString: MERS ብዝምልከት፡ ኣብ ጁን 2012 ዝተገበረ ናይ ሰነ-ህዝቢ(demographic ) ጽንዓት መሰረት፡ ብ 2,494 ዝኾኑ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ናይ ሞት መጠን 37% እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: As for MERS, the june-population (demographic) endurance of June 2012 was 37% of confirmed cases of 2,494 confirmed cases.

sourceString: An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 R0 ክሳብ 6.47 ምስ 5.71-7.23 95% confidence interval (CI) እንትበፅሕ ናይ SARS-CoV R0 ግና ካብ 2 ክሳብ 4 ጥራሕ ምዃኑ ቅድም ክብል ዝወፀ መፅናዕቲ ይሕብር።
en-mt: A previous study suggests that SARS-CoV-2 R0 reaches 6.47 with 5.71-7.23 95% confidence period (CI), while SARS-CoV R0 is only 2 to 4.

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: ብመንጽር ዘርእዩዎ ምልክታት፡ሞትን R0 ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ MERS-CoV ን SARA-CoV ዝተገበረ ንጽጽር ኣብ Table1.1 ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A comparison of the symptoms of death r0 between SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV for SARA-CoV is presented on Table1.1.

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: ምስ MERS-CoVን SARS-CoVን ተነፃፂሩ SARS-CoV-2 ዝለዓለ ናይ ምልባዕ ክእለት እንትህልዎ ዝተሓተ ድማ ቀታልነት ከምዘለዎ እቲ ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተገልፀ ኣሃዝ ይሕብር።
en-mt: Compared to MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 has the highest promotional capabilities and is less lethal, according to the figures above.

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ካብ MERS-CoVን SARS-CoVን ንላዕሊ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ምቁፅፃር ከቢድ እዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, controlling the spread of SARS-CoV-2 is more difficult than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: ናይ ጉጅለ ተበግሶታት ለበዳ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ስድራ ቤት ወይድማ ካብ ተመሳሳሊ ምትእኽኻባት ወይድማ ኣብ ከም ናይ መጓዓዚያ መርከብ ዝበሉ ተሽከርከርከርቲ እዩ ዘጋጥም።
en-mt: Pandemics occur in the same household or in similar gatherings or in vehicles such as a cruise ship.

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: ሕሙማት ብኣብዝሓ ናይ ጉዕዞ ታሪኽ ዘለዎም፣ ኣብ ዉሃን ወይድማ ኣብ ካልኦት ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታታት ዝነብሩ፣ ምስ ዝተጠቕዐ ወይከዓ ምስ ሕማም ዘይጀመሮም ሰባት ኣብ ዝሓለፉ ክልተ ሰሙናት ርክብ ዝነበሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Patients have a history of traveling, live in Wuhan or other affected areas, have had contact with people who have been affected or have not started sick in the past two weeks.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ሕሙማት ምልክት ከየርኣዩ ንነዊሕ እዋን ክጸንሑ ስለዝኽእሉን ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ድማ ን ካልእይ ግዘ እቲ ቫይረስ ክስከሙ ስለዝኽእሉን ናይ ውሸባ እዋን ክነውሕ ከምዝግባእ የረድኡ።
en-mt: However, since patients can stay without symptoms for a long time and those who have recovered may carry the virus for another period, it is recommended that the quarantine period be extended.

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: ኣብ እቲ ናይ መጀመሪያ ደርጃ፡ ሕሙማት ዝተሓተ ወይድማ ልሙድ ናይ ፐሪፈራል ጻዓዱ ናይ ደም ዋህዮታት(ብተለይ ልይሞፎሳይት) ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In the first class, patients have lower or more common peripheral white blood cells (specificly lepromocytes).

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ን ኣብነት፣ ልይምፎፐኒያ ምስ ጻዕዳ ናይ ደም ዋህዮ ቁጽሪ < 4×109/L ን ልይሞፎሳይት ቁጽሪ ሓዊሱ < 1×109/L፣ ምስኡ ድማ መጠኑ ልዕል ዝበለ ናይ ኣስፓራቴት ኣሚኖትራንስፈሬዝ ደረጃታትን ቬሪሚያን ኣብ 1,099 ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ተረኺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: For example, lemphopenia with white blood cell number < 4×109/L and lymphocyte number < 1×109/L, along with a high level of asparagus amanitransference levels and veremia found in 1,099 cases of COVID-19.

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: መብዛሕቲኦም ሕሙማት ኣብ ደሞም ናይ C-ሪኣክቲቭ ፕሮቲንን ኢራይትሮሳይት ሰድመንቴሽንን መጠን ክብ ከምዝበለን ኣብ ዝተወሰኑ ሕሙማት ድማ ናይ ፀሊም ከብዲን ናይ ጭዋዳ ኤንዛይማት ከምኡውን ናይ ማዮግሎቢን መጠን ኣብ ደሞም ሓፍ ከምዝበለ ይግለፅ።
en-mt: Most patients have elevated Levels of C-reactive proteins and iratrocytes in their blood, and in certain patients, black abdominal and muscle enzymes and mayoglobin levels have risen in their blood.

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: ከቢድ ጉዳያት ኣብ ዘለዎም ሕሙማት፡ ናይ D-dimer መጠን፡ ኣብ ደም ዝርከብ ናይ ፊብሪን(fibrin) ፍርያት፡ ወሲኹ እዩ፡ ናይ ልይሞፎሳይት(lymphocyte) ቁጽሪ ድማ ኣዝዩ ቀኒሱ እዩ።
en-mt: In patients with serious cases, D-dimer levels increased the production of fibrin in the blood, and the number of lymphocyte (lymphocyte) decreased significantly.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ደረት ራድዮግራፊ ዝረኣዩ ዘይልሙዳት ምልክታት ኣብ መብዛሕቲኡ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ይርከቡ እዮም፣ ኣብ ሳንባ ብዝረኣዩ ኽልተ መዳይ ዝረኣዩ ዝተጣበቑ ጽላሎታት(patchy shadows) ወይድማ ናይ መሬት ብርጭቆ ብርሃን ምኽልካል(ground glass opacity) ዝኣምሰሉ ምልክታት ዝግለጽ እዩ።
en-mt: Unusual symptoms in chest radiography are found in most cases of COVID-19 patients, such as patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in two areas seen in the lungs.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: ብኣብዝሓ ሕሙማት ናብ ዘይንቡር ኒሞኒያ፣ ሃንደበታዊ ጉድኣት ሳምባን ኣክዩት ሪስፓራይቶሪ ዲስትረስ ሲንድሮምን (ARDS) ይቃልዑ።
en-mt: In most patients, they are exposed to abnormal pneumonia, sudden damage to samba and acute reparations syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: ARDS ካብ ቁፅፅር ወፃእ ዝኾነ ነድሪ፣ ናይ ፈሳሲ ምእካብ ከምኡውን ቀፃሊ ዝኾነ ፋይብሮሲስ ብምፍጣር ናይ ኣየር ምቅይያር ፀገም ዘምፅእ እዩ።
en-mt: ARDS cause air change problems by creating out-of-control inflammation, fluid collection and continuous fibrosis.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: type-Iን type-IIን ኒሞሳይት ብኣግባቡ ምስራሕ እንተዘይክኢሎም መጠን ሰርፋክታንት ስለዝቕንስ ናይ ሳምባ ደጋዊ ወጥሪ ንኽውስኽ ብምግባር እቲ ሳምባ ናይ ምስፋሕ ዓቕሙ ቀኒሱ ንኽዕፆ ይገብር።
en-mt: If type I and Type II are unable to function properly, it reduces the amount of serfectant and increases the samba's back strain, causing the lungs to be closed.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: ስለዚ እቲ ዝኸፍአ ናይ ሳንቡእ ራጂ ዉፅኢት እንትንረክብ ብኣብዝሓ ምስ ዝኸፍአ ናይ ሕማም ደረጃ ዝተተኣሳሰረ እዩ።
en-mt: As a result, the most severe symptoms of the lung disease are linked to an increased level of disease.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 18, 2020 እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ COVID-19 ናይ ሕማም ምርመራ ምስ ናይ ካልኦት ናይ ቫይረስ ሕማማትን ARDSን ምስ ናይ SARSን MERSን ምልክታት ብተመሳሳሊ፤ ናይ ሳምባ ምቺ ህውከት፣ ናይ hyaline membraneን ካብ እቲ ሕማም ኣብ ዝሞተ ሰብ ድማ ናይ multinucleated syncytial cellsን ኣብ ሳምባ ውሽጢ ምፍጣርን ዝኣመሰሉ ምልክታት ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, the first COVID-19 diagnosis was similar to other viral diseases and ARDS symptoms of SARS and MERS, symptoms such as pneumonia, hyaline membrane and multinucleated syncytial cells in the deceased person.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: ብ ሪቨርስ-ትራንስክሪፕቴዝ-ፖሊሜሬዝ(reverse-transcriptase polymerase) ን ሳርስ(SARS-CoV-2 RNA) ምፍላይ ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ዝግበር ምርመራ ከም ዋና ሮቕሓ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ውዒሉ ነይሩ።
en-mt: The separation of SARS-CoV-2 RNA by Rivers-Transcriptase polymerase was used as a main stretcher for COVID-19 testing.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና ናይ ሓሶት-ኣሉታዊ መጠን ሓፍ ዝበለ ብምዃኑ እቲ ለበዳ ከጋድዶ ስለዝኽእል ኣብ ቻይና ካብ 13 ፌብሩዋሪ፣ 2020 ንዳሓር ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት ብምጥቃም ዲያግኖስ ምግባር ተጀሚሩ (ኣብ RT-PCR ጥራሕ ኣይድረኽን) ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, due to the high rate of false negatives, the pandemic could worsen, and from 13 February 2020, clinical signs have been used in China (not limited to RT-PCR).

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ SARS ምርመራ እውን ተመሳሳሊ ኩነታት ኣጋጢሙ ነይሩ።
en-mt: A similar situation occurred in SARS diagnosis.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: ስለዚ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ታሪኽ፣ ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት፣ ላብራቶሪ ምርመራታትን ናይ ራጂ ዉፅኢትን ብጠቕላላ ኣብ ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነ ዲያግኖሲስ ንምብፃሕ ኣገደስቲ እዮም።
en-mt: herefore, the history of the disease, clinical symptoms, laboratory tests and raji results are essential for total effective diagnosis.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 14:2020፡ ናይ ፌንግ ጃንግ ጉጅለ SARS-CoV-2 ንምፍላይ ዝጠቅም ኣብ CRISPR-ዝተመስረተ ናይ SHERLOCK ቴክኒክ ዝምልከት ናይ ኣጠቓቕማ ፕሮቶኮል ዕላዊ ገይሮም እዮም፡ እዚ ድማ፡ ሲንተቲክ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 RNA ክፋላት ንምፍላይ ዘኽእል ብ 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 ቅዳሓት ብ ማይክሮሊትር ኣታዊ) ብዝኾነ መጠን ዲፕሲቲክ(dipstick) ብምጥቃም ትሕቲ ሓደ ሰዓት ተወሳኺ መሳርሒ ምጥቃም ከይኣድለየ ንምፍላይ ዘኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Jang group officially activated a CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique for separating SARS-CoV-2, allowing synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA components to be separated by 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies by microlitre income) using any amount of dipstick, allowing for less than an hour to distinguish between using an extra device without needing to use it.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: እቲ ሓዱሽ ቴክኒክ ተዓጻጻፊ ብዝኾነ መልክዑ ናይ ተኣፋፍነትን ምቹውነትን ለውጢ ዘምጽእ ከምዝኾን ተስፋ ኣሎ።
en-mt: It is hoped that the new technology will bring about a change in flexibility and flexibility.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: ኣብ ኖቭል CoV ናይ ተሞክሮ ሕፅረት ብምህላዉ፣ ሓኻይም ንCOVID-19 ሕሙማት ሓፈሻዊ ሓገዝ ጥራሕ ክህቡ ከምዝኽእሉ ይፍለጥ። ብጎናጎኒ ድማ ከም SARS-CoVን MERS-CoVን ዝመሳሰሉ ዓይነታት CoVs ከምኡዉን ንካልኦት ናይ ቫይረስ ሕማማት ንጥቀመሎም ፈውሲታት ተጠቒምካ ፈተነ ይካየድ ኣሎ።(Table ​(Table2).2).
en-mt: Due to a lack of experience in Novel CoV, doctors are known to only provide general assistance to COVID-19 patients, and trials are being conducted using types of COVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, as well as treatments for other viral diseases (Table2.2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: እዞም ሕክምናታት ኣንቲ ቫይራል መድሓኒት፣ ኢሚኖሳፕረሰንት፣ ስቴሮይድ፣ ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሕሙማት ዝተወስደ ፕላዝማ፣ ናይ ቻይና ሕክምና ከምኡውን ስነልቦናዊ ሓገዝ ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: hese treatments include antiviral drugs, eminospressant, steroids, plasma from rescued patients, Chinese medicine and psychological assistance.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሕሙማት ዝተወስደ ፕላዝማ እዉን ከም ፈውሲ ክንጥቀመሉ ከምእንኽእል ሓሳብ ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Plasma taken from saved patients is suggested to be used as a treatment.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: ናይ መድሓኒት ኩባንያታት ኣንቲ ቦዲን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ክትባትን ን ምምዕባል ይጽዕሩ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Pharmaceutical companies are trying to develop the vaccine and the virus vaccine.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብዋናነት ሳምባ ዘጥቅዕ ኮይኑ ብዝተወሰነ መጠን ድማ ከም ናይ ማዓንጣ ትራክት ስርዓትን ኩላሊትን ዝመሳሰሉ ካልኦት ACE2 ዘለዎም ኣካላት የጥቅዕ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is a major lung attack and, to a certain extent, affects other ace2 organs, such as the mating tract system and kidneys.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ናይ መተንፈሲ ጸገማትን ውድቀትን ን ሕሙማት እቶም ዓበይቲ ሓደጋታትን ሞት ዘስዕቡ ዋና መበገሲታት እዮም።
en-mt: However, respiratory problems and failure are the main causes of death for patients and the major risks.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: ስለዚ ድማ፡ ናይ መተንፈሲ ሓገዝ ነቶም ምልክታት ኣብ ምቕናስ ን ህይወት ኣብ ምድሓንን ኣዝዩ ወሳኒ እንትኾን፡ ኣጠቓላሊ ኦክስጅን፡ ከም ፍልልያት ክብደት እቲ ሕማም ድማ ልዑል-ፍሰት ኦክስጅን(high-flow oxygen)፡ ነንኢንቫሲቭ ቨንቲሌሽን(noninvasive ventilation) ን ኢንቫሲቭ መካኒካዊ ቬንቲሌሽን ( invasive mechanical ventilation) ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, respiratory assistance is crucial in reducing and saving the symptoms, and general oxygen as differences in severity of the disease includes high-flow oxygen for noninvasive ventilation and mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ምትንፋስ ፀገም ምልክታት ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ብ ኤክስትራኮርፖሪያል መምብሬን ኦክስጅን (ECMO)፣ ከቢድ ናይ ልቢ ወይድማ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ፀገም ንዘለዎም ሕሙማት ንጥቀመሉ ዝተሓደሰ ካርዲዮፐልመናሪ ባይፓስ ቴክኒክ ዝሕገዙ እዮም።
en-mt: Patients with symptoms of severe respiratory problems are assisted by an extracorporational oxygen lamp (ECMO), a new cardiopulmany bypass technique for patients with severe heart or respiratory problems.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ናይ ኤሌክትሮላይት ሚዛን ምሕላው፣ ኻልኣዊ ሕማምን ሴፕቲክ ሾክን ምክልኻልን ወሰንቲ ክፍሊ ኣካላት ምሕላው ንናይ SARS-CoV-2 ሕሙማት ወሳኒ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, maintaining electrolyt balance, secondary disease and septic shock and preventing peripheral organs is crucial for SARS-CoV-2 patients.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: እዚ ናይ cytokine storm ናይ SARSን MERSን ሕሙማት ካብ መጠን ንላዕሊ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ምላሽ እንትህቡ ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm occurs when SARS and MERS patients react to an over-immune response.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ዓይነት systemic inflammatory response (ስርዓታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ ግብረ መልሲ) ኮይኑ ብፈነወ ከም TNFα፣ IL-1β፣ IL-2፣ IL-6፣ IFNα፣ IFNβ፣ IFNγን MCP-1ን ዝመሳሰሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ሳይቶካይናት ዝመፅእ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm is a type of systemic inflammatory response (systemic infection response) that is broadcasted by various cytokines such as TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNβ, IFNβ, IFNβ, IFN and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: እዞም ሳይቶካይናት ናይ መከላኸሊ ሕማም ዋህዮታት ፍሪ ራዲካልስ ንከፍርዩ ብምግባር ARDSን ብዙሓት ናይ ዉሽጣዊ ኣካል ፀገምን ከምፅእ ይገብር።
en-mt: hese cytocains cause ARDS and many internal body problems by reducing the immune response to free radicals.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: ኢሙኖሰፕረሽን(Immunosuppression) ን ሳይቶካይን(cytokine ) ጸፍዒታት ብተለይ ን ከበድቲ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: Immunosuppression and cytokine are especially useful for treating serious patients.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: anti-IL6 ሞኖክሎናል ኣንቲቦዲ ዝኾነ ቶኪሊዙማብ ከምኡውን ኮርቲኮስተሮይድ ብምጥቃም ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ንምፍዋስ ተኻኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: Anti-IL6 has been used to treat cytokine storms using monoclonal antibody, tokilyzumab, and corticosteroids.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: ንሳይቶክሲን ስቶርም ካልኦት ናይ ሕማም መከላኸሊ እርምጃታት ብ ዋህዮ-ተኮር ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ምላሽ ሞዱለሽን የካትቱ ፣ ናይ IFN-γ ፣ IL-1ን TNFን መአገዲ፤ ናይ ጄ.ኪ. blinatumomab፤ ናይ ሳይቶኪን ምልክት ሲግናሊንግ 4ን ናይ HDAC ኢንሂቢተርስን ዘካትት እዩ።
en-mt: For Cytoxin Storm, other disease prevention measures include cell-focused immune response modules; IFN-γ; IL-1 and TNF restrictions; J.K. blinatumomab; cytokine signal signaling signaling 4 and HDAC inhibitors.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: ስቴርዮድስ(Steroids)፡ ከም ኢሙኖሰፕረሳንት(immunosuppressants)፡ ኣብ ናይ SARS ሕክምና ናይ ረኽሲ ጉድኣት ክብደት ንምቕናስ ብስፍሓት ኣብጥቕሚ ዝውዕሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Steroids are widely used as immunosuppressants in SARS treatments to reduce the severity of infection damage.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ልዑል መጠን ስቴሮይድስ(steroids ) ምውሳድ ኣብ ናት SARSን COVID-19 ሕሙማት ንዘሎ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ጉድኣት ጠቐምቲ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: However, taking high doses of steroids is not beneficial for severe lung damage in NAT SARS and COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: ከም ኣቫስኩላር ኦስቲዮኔክሮሲስ ዝበሉ ሓደገኛ ናይ ጎናዊ ጉድኣት ብምኽታል ናይ እቲ ሕማም ትምቢት ዝቕይሩ እዮም።
en-mt: dangerous side effects, such as avascular osteoporosis, change the disease's life by following dangerous side effects.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ናይ ኮርቲኮስተሮይድስ ሓጸርቲ ኮርስታት ኣብ ካብ ትሑት እስካብ ማእኸላይ ናይ መድሓኒታት መጠን ን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንክውዕሉ ዝምከር እዩ።
en-mt: However, corticosteroids short courses in severe COVID-19 patients are recommended for use in low to moderate doses.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: እዚ ኣብ ዝተፃሓፈሉ እዋን ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነ ኣንቲ ቫይራል መድሓኒት ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: No effective antiviral drug was found at the time of writing.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ናይ nucleotide analog ዝተስትኻኸለ ምርመራ ንሓደ ኣሜሪካዊ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙም ውጽኢታዊ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: However, a nucleotide analog test has been shown to be effective for a U.S. COVID-19 patient.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: ሬምደሲቪር(Remdesivir) መጅመሪያ ብ ጊሊድ(Gilead) ን ኢቦላ ን ማርልበርግ ቫይረሳትን ዝተፈጠረ ሕማም ንምሕካም ተባሂሉ ዝተፈጠረ ናይ ኖቨል ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓኒት እዩ።
en-mt: Remdesivir is a novel antivirus drug created to treat disease caused by Gilead and Ebola and Marlberg viruses.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: ጸኒሑ፡ሬምደሲቨር(remdesivir) ን MERS ን SARS ቫይረሳት ሓዊሱ ናይ ካልኦት ነጸላ ገመድ ዝኾኑ ናይ RNA ቫይረሳት ንምጥፋእ ከምዝኽእል ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Later, remdesivir showed that MERS and SARS viruses can be used to destroy RNA viruses that are isolated.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: ኣብዚኦም ተደሪኽና፡ ጊሊያድ(Gilead) ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተጠቕዑ ውልቀሰባት ዝግበሩ ጽምዲ ሙከራታት ንምግባር ዘኽእል ውህድ ናብ ቻይና ዝለኣኸ እንትኾን፡ እቶም ውጽኢታት ድማ ብ ዓብዩ ትጽቢት ዝግበረሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Inspired by this, Gilead has sent a merger to China for experimental trials of individuals affected by SARS-CoV-2, and the results are expected to be great.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ baricitinb፣ interferon-α፣ lopinavir/ritonavirን ribavirinን ንሃንደበታዊ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ፀገም ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ከም ፈውሲ ከገልግሉ ከምዝኽእሉ ተነጊሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir and ribavirin have been told they can serve as a cure for patients with sudden respiratory problems.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር ብሓንሳብ ምጥቃም ተቕማጥ፣ ዕዉልዉል ምባል፣ ተምላስ፣ ጉድኣት ፀላም ከብዲን ካልኦት ሓደጋታትን ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: he use of lopinavir/ritonavir together can lead to vomiting, success, vomiting, damage to the liver and other accidents.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: ናይ እዞም ሕክምናታት ምስ ካልኦት መድሓኒታት ጠሚርካ ኣብ ሕሙማት ምጥቃም ብ ጥንቃቐ ክተሓዝ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: he use of these treatments in patients along with other medications should be handled carefully.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሕሙማት ዝተወስደ ፕላዝማን ኣንቲቦዲ ምፍራይን
en-mt: Plasma and antibody production from rescued patients

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: ካብ ተላባዒ ሕማም ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ደም ተወሲዱ ንካልኦት ዘይዳሓኑ ሕሙማት ከም መድሓኒት፣ ገና ንዘይተጠቕዑ ሰባት ድማ ከም መከላኸሊ ምጥቃም ነዊሕ ታሪኽ ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: It has a long history of using blood transfusions as a medicine for other patients who have not yet been saved, and as a protection for those who have not yet been affected.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: ብርግፅ፣ ካብ ሕማም ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ኣብ ደሞም ነቲ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ዘኽእል ዝለዓለ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ መጠን ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Of course, people who survive the disease have the highest levels of antioxidants in their blood to prevent the disease.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: ጸረ ባዕዳውያን ( Antibodies) ብ ናይ B ልይምፎሳይት( B lymphocytes) ዝፈሪ ኢሙኖግሎቢን(immunoglobulin (Ig)) እንትኸውን፡ ሕማም ኣምጻእቲ ተህዋስያንን ካልኦት ን ሰብነትና ባዕዲ ዝኾኑ ነገራት ኣብ ምጥቃዕ፡ ኣብቶም ተሃዋስያን ዝርከቡ ብሕታዊ ሞሎኲላት ብ ምፍላይ ዘምክን ድማ እዩ።
en-mt: Antibodies are immunoglobulin (Ig), produced by B lymphocytes, and it is used to separate private molecules in the organisms in the attack of importers and other substances that are foreign to the body.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: ካብ እዚ ብምብጋስ ካብ COVID-19 ካብ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ናይ ፕላዝማ ደም ብምውሳድ ን 10 ብኽፉእ ዝሓመሙ ሕሙማን ተዋሂቡ እዩ።
en-mt: As a result, 10 patients who have recovered from COVID-19 have been given blood transfusions.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: ምልክታቶም ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ክመሓየሽ ክኢሉ እዩ፡ ዝቐነሰ ረኽሲን ዝተሓተ ኣብ ደም ውሽጢ ዝርከብ ናይ ቫረስ መጠን(viral loads ) ን ዝተመሓየሸ ናይ ኦክስጅን ምውህሃድ ኣብ ደምን ዝተዓጀቡ እዮም።
en-mt: heir symptoms were improved within 24 hours, with reduced infections and improved oxygen concentrations in the blood.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና ቅድሚ ምዕባለ መድሓኒት ብዓቢ ደረጃ ምጥቃም ከምዝከኣል ዝገልፅ መብራህርህን መረጋገፅን ክህልዉ ይግባእ።
en-mt: However, there should be a light and a proof that a drug can be used at a high level before development.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ካብ ናይ ሕክምና ተፅዕኖ አንጻር ምስ ፕላዝማ ዝተዛመዱ ሕድሕድ ጉድኣታት ጥንቅቐ ክግበረሎም ይግባእ።
en-mt: In addition, there should be caution about each plasma-related damage in the context of medical impact.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: ንኣብነት ኣንቲቦዲታት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ስርዓት ብምንቕቓሕ ናይ cytokine release syndrome (ሳይቶካይን ሰደድ ሲንድሮም) ዝበሃል ሓደገኛ ሕማም ከኸትል ይኽእል።
en-mt: For example, antioxidants can cause cytokine release syndrome, a dangerous disease called cytokine release syndrome.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: ኣብ ደም ዉሽጢ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ጻዕቒ ብኣብዝሓ ዉሑድ እዩ። ነቶም ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዝርከቡ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ድማ ናይ ፕላዝማ ጠለብ ዓብዪ እዩ።
en-mt: The blood pressure of the antibodies is very small, and the demand for plasma to treat seriously ill patients is enormous.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ብቅልጡፍ ፍሉይ ዝኾነ ኣንቲቦዲ ምፍራይ ይኸብድ እዩ።
en-mt: It is difficult to produce an anti-epidemiology quickly to prevent the spread of the pandemic.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ናይ B ዋህዮታት ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ብምወሳድ ዉፅኢታዊ ኣንቲቦዲታት ኢንኮድ ዝገብሩ ጀነቲካዊ ኮዳት ወይ ድማ ዋና ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ፕሮቲን ንምጥፋእ ዝሰርሑ ዉፅኢታዊ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምድላይ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: herefore, it is important to look for genetic codes that make effective anticods by taking B cells from survivors or effective antioxidants that work to destroy the virus's protein.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: እዚ ብምግባር ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ ፍርያት ክብ ክነብሎ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: y doing so, we can increase the antioxidants.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ዓመታት ኣብ ቻይና TCM ዝተፈላለዩ ሕማምት ንምሕካም ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ይርከብ።
en-mt: For thousands of years, TCM has been used in China to treat a variety of diseases.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር እቲ ዉፅኢት ብናይ ሕማም ዲያግኖሲስ ተመስሪቱ ኣብ ናይ TCM ስነሓሳብ ዝተደረኸ ናይ ምቅይያር ቀመር ተጠቒሙ ኣብ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ክፍልታት ጥምረት ዝተመስረተ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the results were based on disease diagnostics and used a conversion formula driven in TCM theory and based on the combination of different classes.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: ን ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ክፋላት ነጺልካ ኣውጺእኻ ንምፍላይ ኣጽጋሚ ብምዃኑ፡መብዛሕቲኦም እቶም ንቑሓት ክፋላት ኣይተፈለጡን ወይድማ ብግልጺ ኣይፍለጡን።
en-mt: It is difficult to isolate such parts, and most of the active parts are unknown or not clearly known.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ሐዚ እዋን፡ ን COVID-19 ዝግበር ሕክምና ስሉጥ ዘይምኻኑን ሓደ ዝተፈለየ ሕክምና ዘይምህላዉን፡ TCM ን ቀሊልን ማእኸላይን ምልክታትን ካብ ከበድቲ ኩነታት ዝሓወዩ ተሓከምቲ ንምሕካም ካብቶም ዋና መማረጺታት እናኾነ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Currently, the lack of effective treatment for COVID-19 and the lack of a single treatment is one of the main options for treating patients who have recovered from serious conditions.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: ንኣብነት ሹ ፌንግ ጂ ዱ ከምኡውን ሊያን ሁዋ ኪንግ ዌን ዝተብሃሉ ካፕሱላት ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕክምና ኣድማዕቲ ከምዝኾኑ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: For example, it has been reported that shu Feng Ji Du and Leah Hua King Wen are effective in covid-19 treatment.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ሕክምና፡ ብዙሓት ኣብ 87% ሕሙማትን ናይ TCM ሕክምና ዝተጠቐማ፡ ኣብ ጋንግሱ(63.7%)፡ ኒንግሲያ(50%)፡ ኣብ ሁናን(50%) ሓዊሱ ብዙሓት ግዝኣታት ልዑል ናይ ምድሓን ቁጽሪ ዘመዝገባ ኣለዋ፥ ነገር ግን እታ ናይ TCM ሕክምና ኣብ 30% ሕሙማት COVID-19 ጥራሕ ዝተጠቐመት ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት እቲ ዝተሓተ ናይ ምድሓን ቁጽሪ(13%) ኑይሩዋ።
en-mt: In the treatment of COVID-19 patients, many in 87% of patients and used TCM treatments in Gangsu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and many states have recorded high survival numbers in Hunan (50%), but the Hubei province, which has only used TCM treatment in 30% of COVID-19 patients, has the lowest survival number (13%)

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ እዚ ማለት ኣዝዩ ትኽክለኛ ዘይኮነ ንጽጽር እዩ ምኽኒያቱም ካልኦት ከም ክብደትን ቁጽሪን ናይ ሕሙማት ኣብ እቲ ገምጋም ኣይተኻተቱን።
en-mt: However, this is a very inaccurate comparison because others, such as weight and number of patients, are not included in the assessment.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 18:2020፡ ቦሊ ጃንግን መሳርሕቱን ናይ ምዕራባውያን መድሓኒት(WM) በይኑ ዝግበር ሕክምና ምስ ናይ WM ን TCM ብሓባር ዝግበር ሕክምና ብምውድዳር መጽናዕቲ ኣቕሪቦም ነይሮም።
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, Bolly Jang and his colleagues conducted a study comparing Western medicine alone treatments with WM and TCM combined treatments.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: ምስ ጉጅለ WM ጥራሕ ተነፃፂሩ ኣብ ጉጅለ WM+TCM ዝርከቡ ሕሙማት ረስኒ ሰውነት ናብ ንቡር ንክምለስ፣ ምልክታት ንክጠፍኡን ካብ ሕክምና ንምዉፃእን ሓፂር እዋን ጥራሕ እዩ ዝደሊ።
en-mt: Compared only to the WM+TCM group, fever patients in the WM+TCM group only want the body to return to normal, lose symptoms and get out of treatment for a short period of time.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: ብዝገርም ኹነታት ፣ ኣብ WM + TCM ጉጅለ ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ምብኣስ(ካብ ቀሊል ናብ ከቢድ) ካብ WM ጥራሕ ዘለዎ ጉጅለ ዝነኣሰ እንትኸውን(7.4% ብኣንጻር 46.2%)ን ኣብ WM + TCM ጉጅለ ውሽጢ ዝነበረ ናይ ሞት መጠን ካብ WM ጥራሕ ዘለዎም ጉጅለ ዝተሓተ ነይሩ (8.8% ብኣንጻር 39%)።
en-mt: Surprisingly, in the WM + TCM group, the incidence of symptoms (from mild to severe) was smaller than the WM-only group (7.4% against 46.2%) and the death rate within the WM + TCM group was lower than the WM-only group (8.8% compared to 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: ናይ TCM ዉፅኢታዉነትን ድሕንነትን ንምርግጋፅ ብደምቢ ዝተቆፃፀረ ፈተነ ብዝዓበየ መንገዲን ኣብ ብዙሓት ማእኸላትን ክካየድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: In order to ensure the effectiveness and safety of TCM, a blood-controlled test must be carried out in a larger way and in many centers.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: ብዝተኽኣለ መጠን እቶም ናይ TCM ሕክምናታት ተግባራዊ መንገድታት ኣብ ምውሳንን ስሉጥ ብዝኾነ መልክዑ ክፋላቶም ኣብ ምውዳድ ተግባር ኣዝዩ ስምዒት ዝስሕብ እዩ።
en-mt: As much as possible, tcm treatments are very attractive in determining the practical ways to do so.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: ብCOVID-19 ዝተጠርጠሩን ዝተረጋገፁን ሕሙማት ናይ እቲ ሕማም ተላጋቢነትን ሓደገኛነትን ተኸቲሉ ከቢድ ፍርሒ ይስመዖም። ኣብ ምዉሻብ ዝርከቡ ሰባት ድማ ትህኺት፣ ብሕታዉነትን ሕርቃንን ይስመዖም።
en-mt: Patients who have been suspected and confirmed with COVID-19 feel a severe fear of the disease following its infectiousness and danger, and people who are in isolation feel tired, private and angry.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ፡ ከም ረስኒ፡ ሃይፕሲያ(hypoxia)ን ምስዓልን ዝኣምሰሉ ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ምልክታትን ካልኦት ዘይተሓሰቡ ጽልዋታት ከም ብ ካርቲኮስትሮይድ ዝፍጠሩ ናይ ምድቃስ ጸገም( insomnia) ናብ ጭንቅትን ናይ ኣዕምሮ ዘይምርግጋዕን ክወስዱ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition, symptoms of the infection, such as hypoxia fever and coughing, and other unintended effects, such as carticosteroid sleep disorder (insomnia), can lead to anxiety and brain insomnia.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: ናይ SARS ለበዳ ኣብ መጀመርታ ደረጃ እንተሎ ከም ቀዋሚ ዲፕረሽን፣ ጭንቀት፣ ናይ ሽበራ መጥቃዕቲ፣ ሳይኮሞተር ኤክሳይትመንት፣ ሳይኮቲክ ምልክታት፣ ዲሊሪየም ከምኡዉን ዓርሰ ቅትለት ዝመሳሰሉ ናይ ኣእምሮ ሕማማት ተመዝጊቦም እዮም።
en-mt: When the SARS pandemic is in its early stages, mental illnesses such as permanent depression, depression, terrorist attacks, psychoactive symptoms, diurium and suicide were recorded.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: ከም ኣካል ን ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ዝግበር ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ግብረ መልሲ፣ ግደን ክግበር ዘለዎ ናይ ርክብ ጽንዓትን ክትትልን ውሸባን፣ ሰባት ብዛዕባ እቲ ምምሕልላፍ፣ ውሸባን ኣብ ቤተሰቦም ኣዕርኽቶምን ዝህሉ ምግላልን ብምሕሳብ ኣዝዮም ክጭነቑን ናይ ጥፍኣት ስምዒት ክስመዖምን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: As part of the public health response to the COVID-19 pandemic, people can be very anxious and devastated by the spread of the coronavirus, quarantine and the isolation in their family and friends.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: ስለዚ ንCOVID-19 ሕሙማት፣ ተጠርጠርትን ምስኦም ርክብ ዘለዎም ሰባትን ከምኡውን ነቲ ሓፈሻዊ ህዝቢ ናይ ስነልቦናዊ ሓገዝ ክወሃቦም ይግባእ።
en-mt: herefore, psychological assistance should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspects and people associated with them, as well as to the general public.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሰነ-ኣእምሮኣዊ ድጋፍ ካብ ብዙሕ ሞያታት ዝተዋጽኡ ናይ ኣእምሮ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታት ጉጅለታት ምጥያሽ፣ ብዛዕባ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳን ናይ ሕክምና መደባት፣ ምስ ሰባት ቅሩብ ርክብ ካብ ምግባር ዓርስኻ ኣብ ምዕቃብ ኣጠቓቕማ ሞያዊ እሌክትሮኒክስ መሳርሕታትን መተግበሪታትን ዝምልከት ግልጺ ዝኾነ ስሩዓትን ትኽክለኛታትን ምምሕያሻት ዘለውዎ ርክብ ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: he june-mental support includes the appointment of mental health professionals from many professions, clear regular and accurate improvements in the use of electronic devices and apps, such as sars-CoV-2 pandemics and treatment programs, and limited contact with people.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: ካብ ተሸከምቲ እንስሳትን ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማትን ናብ ጥዕናኦም ዝተሓለወ ሰባት ዝተዘርገሐ ናይ መተሓላለፊ ሰንሰለት ንምብታኽ ዉፅኢታዊ ክትባት ኣድላይ እዩ። እዚ ክትባት ድማ ምስ ኣንቲቫይራል መድሓኒት ብሓባር ብምዃን እቲ ለበዳ ንምቁፅፃር ይሰርሕ።
en-mt: Effective vaccines are needed to break the chain of transmission from animal carriers and affected patients to people who are healthy, which works in conjunction with antibiotic medicines to control the spread of the pandemic.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: ናይ ነዊሕ እዋንን ፅቡቕ ዓቕሚ ዘለዎን ከምኡውን ዘዳኽም ኣንቲቦዲን ንSARS-CoV ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ክብ ዘብልን ኣብ S ፕሮቲን ዝተደረኸ ክትባት ንምስራሕ ፃዕሪ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Efforts are underway to develop a vaccine based on S protein that is long-term and well-maintained and weakening antibiotics for S-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: ንSARS ዝኾኑ ካብ ዝተዳኸሙ ቫይረሳት ዝተሰርሑ ክትባታት ኣብ እንስሳት ፈተነ ተኻይዱሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: Antibiotics made from weakened viruses have been tested in animals.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና እዞም ናይ ክትባት ሕፁያት ኣብ ዓበይቲ ሰባት ዘለዎም ናይ ኢን ቪቮ ዉፅኢታዉነት ከምኡውን ቀታሊ-ፈተና ሞዴላትን ካብ እንስሳ ዝመፁ ቫይረሳት ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሙ ቅድሚ ክሊኒካዊ መፅናዕቲ ምጅማሩ ዝዉሰን ይኸዉን።
en-mt: However, the effectiveness of these vaccines in adults, as well as killer test models and protection against animal-based viruses, are determined before clinical studies begin.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ቅድሚ 17 ዓመታት SARS ድሕሪ ምጥፋኡ ክሳብ ሕዚ ሓድሽ ጉዳይ ለበዳ ስለዘይተመዝገበ እዩ።
en-mt: That's because a new case of plague has not yet been reported, after the SARS disappeared 17 years ago.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.

en-mt: The benefits of steroids are described above, with stereos immunosuppressant commonly used as a treatment-related treatment to reduce the severity of infection damage in infections.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: ምውሳድ ልዑል መጠን ኮርቲኮስተሮይድስ(corticosteroids) ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ይትግበር ብምንባሩ፣ መብዛሕቲኦም ካብ እቲ ሕማም ዝተረፉ ሰባት ብ ኣቫስኩላር ኦስቲዮኔክሮሲስ(avascular osteonecrosis) ዝበሃል ሕማም ብምጥቃዖም፣ ናይ ዕድመ ልክዕ ናይ ኣካል ጉድኣትን ድኹም ናይ ሂይወት ኰነታትን ኣጋጢሙዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Because high levels of corticosteroids are applied to severe SARS patients; most survivors of the disease have suffered from avascular osteonecrosis; age-correct physical injuries and poor life.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ፡ ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ስቲርዮድስ ብ ትሑት መጠን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: herefore, styropods should be used in COVID-19 patients at low levels if necessary.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: ናይ ኣዕምሮ ጸቕጢ፡ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተገለፀ ኣብ እዋን ለበዳ COVID-19 ሰባት ንበይኖም እንትውሸቡን ናይ ቐረባ ዘመድን ሕሙማትን ክሞቱ እንትርእዩን ብዙሓት ሕሙማት ብናይ ኣዕምሮ ጸቕጢ እናተሳቐዩ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: As noted above, during the COVID-19 pandemic, people are left alone and close relatives and patients die.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: ነዞም ሕሙማት ካብ ጭንቀት ወጺኦም ናብ ንቡር ሂወቶም ንምምላስ፡ ሰነ-ኣዕምሮኣዊ ምኽሪን ናይ ነዊሕ ጊዜ ድጋፍ ምሃብ ከምዝግባእ ርዱእ እዩ።
en-mt: Of course, there is a need to provide long-term advice and psychological support to these patients to get rid of anxiety and return to normal life.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: በመሰረት ዝተኻየዱ ናይ ሰነ-ህዝቢ ጽንዓታት፡ COVID-19 ካብ SARS ዝተፈለየ ናይ ኢፒዲሚዮሎጂካል(epidemiological) መርኣያታት ኣለውዎ።
en-mt: On the basis of june-population COVID-19 tests, epidemiological samples are different from SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ምርባሕ ብተወሳኺ ልክዕ ከም ሳዓል ዘምፁ ካልኦት CoVs ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ብምርባሕ ኣብ እቲ ናይ ፈላማይ ደረጃ ቀሊል ዝበሃል ወይድማ ምንም ዓይነት ምልክት ዘይከርእዩ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition to sars-CoV-2 in the lower respiratory region, other CoVs, such as coughing, can infect the upper respiratory body and see no symptoms in the first stage.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: ስለዚህ፡ እቶም ኣብ ናይ መጀመሪያ ድረጃ ወይድማ ናይ ምፍልፋል ደረጃ ዝርከቡ በቲ ረኽሲ ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማት፡ኣብ ዕለታዊ ምንቅስቓሳት ብዙሕ መጠን ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ናይ ምፍራይ ተኸእሎ ዘለዎም ብምዃኖም ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምቁጽጻር ዓብዪ ጸገም ዘስዕቡ እዮም።
en-mt: herefore, patients in the early stages of infection or separation have difficulty controlling the spread of the virus in daily activities.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ናይ SARS-CoV ምምሕልላፍ ሕሙማት ብጽኑዕ ካብ ዝሓመሙ ዝለዓለ እንትኾን ኣብ መጀመርታ ብርኪ ካብ ዘለው ሕሙማት ኣዝዩ ዝነኣሰ እዩ።
en-mt: However, SARS-CoV transmission is much smaller than those who are seriously ill.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ድማ ልዕሊ ለበዳ SARS ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ብጣዕሚ ሓደገኛ ምዃኑ ይግለፅ።
en-mt: heREFORE, THE SARS pandemic is at greater risk than the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ብምዕፃውን እቲ ህዝቢ ክዉሸብ ብምግባርን ለበዳ SARS-CoV-2 ንምቕናስ ኣብ ቻይና ዝተፈላለዩ ፃዕርታት ኣብ ምክያድ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Wuhan and its surroundings are undergoing a number of efforts in China to reduce the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic by closing the country and keeping the population hidden.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: ዋላእኳ እዞም ተግባራት ነቲ ቁጠባን ካልኦት ዘርፍታት ናይ እታ ሃገር ዝጎድኡ እንተኾኑ ናይ ሓደሽቲ ሕሙማት ቁፅሪ ይቕንስ ኣሎ እዚ ድማ እቲ ለበዳ ይቕንስ ምህላዉ ዘመላኽት እዩ።
en-mt: Although these practices are damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new cases is declining, indicating that the pandemic is declining.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ማርች ከምዘቋርፅን ዉሑድ ቁፅሪ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ድማ ን 3-4 ኣዋርሕ ከምዝፀንሑን ይግመት።
en-mt: he pandemic is expected to end in March and a few cases will last for 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ገለ ሰብ ሞያ ክንድዚ ኣወንታዊ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: However, some professionals are not so positive.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter, et al., ካብ SARS ዝበኣሰ ዝመስል COVID-19 ኣብ 2020 ኣየብቅዕን ኢሉ ይግምት።
en-mt: Paul Hunter, et al., estimates that COVID-19, which appears to be worse than SARS, will not end by 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini, et al., ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ዉፅኢት ንምግማት ዘኽእል ሞዴል ብምስራሕ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ ዓለም ክልተ ሲሶ ህዝቢ ከጥቅዕ ከምዝኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Ira Longini, et al., said SARS-CoV-2 could hit two-thirds of the world's population by developing a model to estimate the outcome of the outbreak.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: ከም ጸብጻብ ሓደ ናይ ካናዳ ጉጅለ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ክልቲኡ ማለት እውን ኣብ ቅድሚ 2 ሰሙን ካብ ሆስፒታል ሓዊዮም ዝወጽኡ ሕሙማት ሚድ-ተርቢኔትን ኣብ ናይ ጉሮሮ መሕጸቢ ፋሳሲን እቲ ቫይረስ ክርከብ ክኢሉ እዩ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ሐዚ ሓዱሽ ዝተረኸበ ቫይረስ ሳይክላዊ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ክኸውን ክምዝኽእል ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: According to a Canadian group, SARS-CoV-2 has been able to detect the virus in both mid-turbine patients who have been hospitalized 2 weeks ago and in a throat bath, showing that the newly detected psychiatron can become influenza.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ኣና ቐነሱ ኣብ ዝመጹሉ፡ ኣብ ቻይና ተስፋ ዝህቡ ምልክታት ኣጋጢሞም እዮም፡ እዚ ድማ እዞም ኣብ እዚ ሐዚ እዋን ዘለዉ ስትራቴጂታት እናሰርሑ ክኾኑ ከምዝኽእሉ ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: However, there have been promising signs in China as new cases have slowed, showing that the current strategies may be working.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: ኢቦላ ኣስታት ሓደ ሚልዮን ጉዳያት ለበዳ ከምዘኸትልን ፍርቂ ሚሊዮን ሞት ከምዘምፅን ተተምቢዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Ebola is estimated to have caused about a million cases of plague and half a million deaths.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ጽኑዕ ውሸባን ዓርሰ ተነጽሎን፡ እቲ ሕማም ኣብ ቁጽጽር ክውዕል ክኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: However, there is a strict quarantine and isolation that the disease can be controlled.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoV፡ SARS-CoV-2 እውን ኣብ ረኽሲ ናይ ምሳዓብን ሞት ናይ ምስዓብን ተኽእሎኡ ዝተሓተ ክኸውን እንከሎ ኣብ ከይዲ ምስ ደቂ ሰባት ብሓባር ዝነብር፡ ትሑት ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Like SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 may be a virus with a lower risk of following infections and following death, while it can be a low risk of developing low-risk diseases that co-exist with humans.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ምስ SARSን MERS ዘለዎ ንጽጽር ኣብ ታሕቲ ዘሎ (Fig. ​(Fig.55) ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The comparison of the COVID-19 pandemic with SARS and MERS is below (Fig. (Fig.55) It is near.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብ ምስዓልን ምህንጣስን ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፋይ እንትኾን፡ ምስ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተበከሉ ናውቲታት ዝግበር ቀጠተዊ ዝኾነ ምንኽኻእ እውን ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is highly contagional and can also be transmitted directly with infected materials.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሰገራ እዉን ብምርካቡ ካብ ሰገራ-ናብ-ኣፍ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዓቕሚ ክህልዎ ክመዝኽእል ይሕበር።
en-mt: It is important to keep in mind that the virus can spread from the mouth to the mouth.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: ኣብ 138 ጉዳያት ዝተገበረ ናይ ቀረባ እዋን ጽንዓት ከምዝጸብጸቦ፡ 41% ጉዳያት ብ ኖሶኮሚያል(nosocomial) ረኽሲታት ዝተፈጠሩ ከምዝኾኑን ካብዚኦም ድማ 40 ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ ሓዊሱ እቶም 17 ሕሙማት ካልኦት ሕማማት ዘልዉዎም እዮም።
en-mt: Recent resilience in 138 cases reported that 41% of cases were caused by nosocomial infections, including 40 health care providers, 17 patients with other diseases.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ደቂ-ሰባት ንምሕላው ብፍላይ ድማ ን ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ፡ ማሕበራዊ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ ናይ ቤተሰብ ኣባላት፡ መሳርሕቲን ዋላ ኣብ እቲ ዘይምልከቶም ምስ ሕሙማት ንኽከእ ዘለዎም ሰባት እውን እንትኾነ ንምሕላው ዓብዪ ጥንቃቐ ክግበር ኣለዎ።
en-mt: herefore, great care should be taken to protect people, especially healthcare providers, social workers, family members, co-workers and even those who may not be able to care for patients.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ሓደጋ ኣብ ምቕንስ እቲ ከም ናይ መጀመሪያ መሰመር ምክልኻል ኣብ ጥቅሚ ክውዕል ዝኽእል ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ፡ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ይኹን ናይ N95 ናይ መተንፈሲ ማስክታት( series # 1860s) ዝበሃሉ ማስክታት ምግባር እንትኸውን፡ እዚኦም ድማ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ንምቁጽጻር ዝሕግዙ እዮም።
en-mt: In order to reduce the risk of infection, wear face masks, surgical masks or N95 respiratory masks (series # 1860s), which can be used as the first line of defense, to help control the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: ናይ መጥባሕቲ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክታት ካብ በቲ ረኽሲ ዝተጠቕዐ ሰብ ዝወጽኡ ፈሰስቲ ንጣባት ኣብ ኣየር ከይጎዓዙን ኣብ ናይ ነገራት ገጽ ተጣቢቖም ናብ ካልኦት ሰባት ንከይመሓላለፉ ዝከላኸሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Surgical face masks are designed to prevent leaks from an infected person from traveling through the air and clinging to objects surfaces and transmitting them to others.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና 10 to 80 nm ዝኾኑ ኣናእሽተይ ቫይሮናት ንምክልኻል ዘኽእል N95 (series # 1860s) ማስክ ጥራሕ እዩ። ካብዞም ኣናእሽተይ ቫይሮናት 5% ጥራሕ ነቲ ማስክ ጥሒሶም ክኣተዉ ይኽእሉ። መጠን ክልቲኦም SARS-CoV-2ን SARS-CoVን ከባቢ 85 nm እዩ።
en-mt: However, only the N95 (series # 1860s) mask is the only way to prevent smaller varons, 10 to 80 nm, and only 5% of these smaller varons can enter the mask.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: ባእታትት እስካብ ሓሙሽተ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክታት ዘሊቖም ናይ ምእታው ተኽእሎ ዘለዎም ብምዃኑ፡ ምስ ሕሙማት ቀጥታዊ ርክብ ዘለዎም ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ከይኮነ N95 (series # 1860s) ማስኪታት ክገብሩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Since people with up to five surgical masks are more likely to wear masks, health care providers who are directly in contact with patients must wear masks than N95 (Series # 1860s).

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: ካብ ማስክ ሓሊፉ ናይ ጥዕና ባዓል ሞያታት ንዕዖም ዝምጥን ንፁል ጋዎን ብምኽዳን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምምሕልላፍ ምቕናስ የድሊ።
en-mt: In addition to wearing a mask, health professionals need to reduce the spread of the virus by wearing clean clothing.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: ቫይረሳት ን ሓደ ሰብ ብዓይኒ እዉን ከጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Viruses can affect a person's eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 22፣ 2020 ሓደ ሓኪም ዋላ እኳ N95 ማስክ ተጠቒሙ እንተነበረ ብSARS-CoV-2 ተጠቒዑ። እቲ ቫይረስ ብኢንፍላማቶሪ ኣዒንቲ ኣቢሉ ከምዝኣተወ ይግመት።
en-mt: On January 22, 2020, a doctor used N95 masks to be infected with SARS-CoV-2, which is believed to have entered through the eyes.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: ሕሙም ክሕክሙ ከለዉ ናይ ጥዕና ባዓል ሞያታት ብርሃን ዘእቱ ናይ ገፅ መሸፈኒ ወይድማ መነፀር ክጥቀሙ ይግባእ።
en-mt: A patient should wear a face mask or face covering when treating.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: ኣብ ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታታት ንዝነብሩ ህዝቢታት ኢድና ብሳሙና ካብ ዝተለመደ ጊዜ ንላዕሊ ምሕፃብ፣ ኣብ ገዛ ምዉሻብን ምስ ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ዘለና ርክብ ምቕናስ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: It is important to wash your hands with soap more than usual for people living in affected areas, stay at home and reduce contact with affected people.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: ሰባት ካብ ሕሙም ሰለስተ እግሪ ዝኣክል ክርሕቑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: People should stay three feet away from a patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: እዞም ተግባራት ኢንፌክሽን ናይ ምፍጣር ሓደጋ ንምቕናስን እቲ ሕማም ንከይላበድ ንምክልኻልን ዝጠቕሙ ዉፅኢታዊ መንገድታት እዮም።
en-mt: hese actions are effective ways to reduce the risk of infection and prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: ዋላኳ SARS-CoV-2 ንወድሰብ ሓድሽ ቫይረስ እንተኾነ ኣብ 7 ጥሪ 2020 ከምዝተገለፀ ኣብ 2003 ብዘጋጠመ ናይ SARS ለበዳ መሰረት ብምግባር እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ SARS-CoV ዘለዎ ተመሳሳልነት ንቻይና ዓቢ መጠንቀቕታ ክኸዉን ኔሩዎ።
en-mt: ALTHOUGH SARS-CoV-2 is a new virus for humans, it should have been a major warning to China about its similarities to SARS-CoV, which was announced on January 7, 2020, based on the SARS pandemic in 2003.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ እስካብ ጃኑዋሪ 19 2020 ናይ ዉሃን ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ማእኽል ዳይሬክተር ነቶም ዜጋታት እቲ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ትሑት ተዛማትነት ከምዘለዎን ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ድማ ውሱን ተፋራይነት ከምዘለዎን፡ ንምቁጽጻሩ ድማ ኣጸጋሚ ከምዘይኸውን ሓቢሮም ከረጋግኡዎም ኣይከኣሉን ነይሮም።
en-mt: However, as of January 19, 2020, the Director of Wuhan's Disease Control Center could not have told citizens that the novel virus was low in relatively convulsiveness and limited human-to-human release and that it would not be difficult to control it.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: እዚ መልእኽቲ ኣብ እቲ ህዝቢ ዝነበረ ፍርሒ ክቕንስ ጌርዎ እዩ ብፍላይ ድማ እታ መላእ ሃገር ነቲ ናይ Spring Festival (ፅድያ ባዓል) እንትዳሎ እቲ ሕማም ገና ኣብ ዉሃን እንተሎ ንምቁፅፃር ዘኽእል ዝነበረ ወሳኒ ጊዜ ሓሊፉ እዩ።
en-mt: his message has reduced public fears, especially as the whole country prepares for the Spring Festival, a crucial time to control the disease while the whole country is preparing for the Spring Festival.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ዝርከብ ናይ ሕማም ቁፅፅር ኤጀንሲ እዚ ከቢድ ትምህርቲ ቀሲሙ ንቀፃሊ ኣገዳሲ ምምሕያሻት ከምፅእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: China's Disease Control Agency says this rigorous education can lead to significant improvements.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: ንኣብነት፡ እዞም ኤጀንሲታት(1) ናይ ህዝባዊ መግለጺታት ኣብ ዝህብሉ ሰዓት ብዛዕባ ዝጥቀሙዎም ሕድሕድ ቃላት ክጥንቀቑ ኣለዎም ምኽኒያቱም ናይ ዜጋታት ኣመለኻኽታን ውሳነታትን ክቕይር ዝኽእል ብምዃኑ፡ (2) ስሩዕ ናይ ዶክተራት ወይድማ ናይ ሰበ ስልጣናት መግለጺ ካብ ምጽባይ፡ ተኣፍፍነት ን ተዋሃድነትን ዘለዎም ዘይተለመዱ ናይ ክሊኒክ ሓበሬታት (3) እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ናይ መጀመሪ ደረጃ እናሃለው ዝግባእ ናይ ምክልኻል ስራሕ ምስራሕ ነቲ ህዝቢ ንምርግጋዕ ካብ ምፍታን (4) ናይ ህዝቢ ብዛዕባ እቲ ለበዳ ዘለዎ ንቕሓትን ግንዛበን ንምዕባይ፡ ንጹር ዝኾኑን ሽቶኦም ዝፍለጡን ኣካይዳታት ብምኽታል፡ ናይ እቲ ማሕበረሰብ ምርመራን መልሲ ወሃቢ ስርዓት ስሩዕ ብ ዝኾነ መንገዲ ምምሕያሽ።
en-mt: For example, these agencies (1) should be careful about each other's words used when making public statements, because they can change citizens' attitudes and decisions; (2) unusual clinical information from waiting for regular doctors or authorities statements; (3) to do preventive work that should be performed in the early stages of the pandemic; and (4) to increase public awareness and awareness of the pandemic. Improving the community's investigation and response system in a regular manner.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: እቲ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተብሃለ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ዝተበገሰ ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 እዩ ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: he SARS-CoV-2 novel coronavirus covid-19 pandemic began in December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: እዚ ፅሑፍ ኣብ ዝፀሓፈሉ እዋን ክልተ ኣዋርሕ ኣብዘይመልአ ጊዜ ኣብ መላእ ቻይናን ናብ ልዕሊ 50 ሃገራትን ተላቢዑ እዩ።
en-mt: Less than two months after the article was written, it has spread throughout China and more than 50 countries.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ ብምዃኑን እቶም ምልክታቱ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ COVID-19ን ኣብ SARS እውን ተመሳሰልቲ ብምዃኖም፡ ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ልክዕ ከም ናይ SARS ዓይነት ስምዒት ዝፈጠረ እዩ።
en-mt: ecause the virus is similar to SARS-CoV and its symptoms are similar to COVID-19 and SARS, the COVID-19 pandemic has created a SARS-like feeling.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ኣብ ሞንጎ COVID-19ን SARSን ነቲ ሕማምን ለበዳን ንምቁጽጻር ዘኽእሉ ኣገደስቲ ኣፍላላይ ይርኣዩ እዮም።
en-mt: However, there is an important link between COVID-19 and SARS to control the disease and the pandemic.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 ካብ መንእሰይ ንላዕሊ ንዓበይቲ፣ ካብ ደቂ ኣንስቲዮ ንላዕሊ ድማ ንደቂ ተባዕቲዮ ዘጥቅዕ እዩ። ናይ እቲ ሕማም ሓደገኛነትን ናይ ሞት መጠንን እዉን ካብ መናእሰይ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ይገድድ።
en-mt: COVID-19 affects adults more than young people and more men than women, and the risk and death rate are higher than in adults.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS ምስ COVID-19 እንትነፃፀር ናይ ሞት መጠኑ (10.91% ኣንጻር 1.44%) ዝለዓለ እዩ።
en-mt: SARS has a higher mortality rate (10.91% versus 1.44%) compared to COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ዋላኳ ምልክት ኣየርእዩ ነቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎም ፡ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ግን ኣዝዮም ኣብ ዝሓሙሉ ጊዜ እዩ እዚ ክኸውን ዝኽእል እዚ ድማ፡ ን COVID-19 ምቁጽጻር ካብ SARS ኣዝዩ ዝኸበደ ንክኸውን ይገብሮ።
en-mt: COVID-19 patients have no symptoms, but SARS patients are more likely to spread the virus, which can happen when they are very sick, which makes controlling COVID-19 much harder than sars.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: እዚ ድማ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ SARS-CoV ብዝሰፍሐ መጠን ንምንታይ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ዘረድእ እዩ።
en-mt: This explains why SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to the greater extent than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እቲ ስሩዕ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዝኽነ RNA ኣብ ገለ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ኣሉታዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Regular SARS-CoV-2 RNA can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: ብኻልእ ወገን ድማ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ን ኻልኣይ ግዘ እቲ ቫይረስ ክርከቦም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, patients who have recovered may be infected for a second time with the virus.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: እዞም ርካቦታት ብቕጽበት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ዝውሰኹ እዮም።
en-mt: hese findings increase the spread of the virus immediately.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: እቶም ዝተገብሩ ቅልጡፋት ናይ CoVID-19 ምርመራታት ብምውሳድ ብዙሓት ወሰንቲ ሽግራት ከምዚ ዝስዕብ ፍታሕ ይጽበዩ ኣለው።
en-mt: With the rapid progress of COVID-19 tests, many key problems are waiting for the following solutions:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካበይ ዝመጸ እዩ?
en-mt: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: ዋላኳ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን ክልተ ናይ መንካዕ SARS-መሰል CoVs 96% ናይ ጀነቲክ ሆሞሎጎ ዝተረኸቡ እንተኾኑ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ መንካዓት ኢልና ምውሳን ኣይንክእልን።
en-mt: Although 96% of genetic homologos have been found between SARS-CoV-2 and two infected SARS-like coVs, SARS-CoV-2 cannot be decided from bats.
