sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: ነቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ዋና ተሸካሚኡ፡ ማለት እውን ካብ መንካዕ ናብ ሰባት ከም ማእኸላይ መማሓላለፋይ ዝኾነ እንስሳ እንታይ እዩ?
en-mt: What is the average way to communicate the virus from its main carrier, i.e., from bats to humans?

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: ናይ #1ን 2ን መልሲ እንተይፈለጥና እቲ ሕማም ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ክንዓግቶ ኣይንኽእልን በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ እቲ ለበዳ ካሊእ ጊዜ ተመሊሱ ክመፅእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: If we do not know the answers to #1ን 2, we will not be able to fully prevent the disease, so the pandemic may return again.

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: ናይ ሞለኪል ሞዴሊንግን ባዮኬሚካል ኣሴይን SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ACE2 ከምዝጣመር ዋላ እንተገለፀ እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ዝርከቡ ዋህዮታት ከመይ ጌሩ ኣቲዩ ፓቶሎጂካል ለዉጥታት የምፅእ?
en-mt: Even though molecular modeling and biochemical aceine SARS-CoV-2 are linked to ACE2, how does the virus enter respiratory cells and bring pathologic changes?

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ACE2-EXPRESSING ወህዮታት እውን ዝሓዘ ድዩ?
en-mt: DOES THE VIRUS ALSO CONTAIN ACE2-EXPRESSING CELLS?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: ነዞም ሕቶታት ዝወሃብ ግልጺ ዝኾነ መልሲ ኣብዘይተውሃበሉ፡ ቅልጡፍን ምርመራን ስሉጥን ሕክምናን ምግባር ኣይንኽእልን።
en-mt: We are unable to provide immediate diagnosis and treatment without clear answers to these questions.

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ክሳብ መዓስ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል?
en-mt: How long will the pandemic last?

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ኣብ ዝላገበሉ እዋን እቲ ቫይረስ ከመይ ጌሩ ጀነቲካዊ ምዕባለታት የርኢ?
en-mt: How do you show the genetic developments of the virus when it is spread from person to person?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: ዓለምለኸዊ ለበዳ ክኽዉን ዶ ይኾን፣ ከም SARS ይጠፍእ ወይድማ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ሓልሓሊፉ ዝኽሰት ይኸዉን?
en-mt: Is it going to be a global pandemic, will it disappear like SARS or will it be caused by the flu?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: ኣገዳሲ ዋላ እንተኾነ ነዞም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዘለዉን ካልኦት ሕቶታትን ንምምላስ ዘድልዩ መፅናዕቲ ንምክያድ ግዜ ከድሊ እዩ።
en-mt: It is important to take time to answer the above and other questions.

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ዝሓቶ ዝኾነ ይኹን ወጻኢ ወጺኡ፡ ነዚ ለበዳ ብ ዝተኽኣለ መጠን ኣብ ዝሓጸረ ጊዜ ጠጠው ኣቢልናዮ ናብ ልሙድ ሂወትና ክንምለስ ካብ ምግባር ካልእ ኣማራጺ የብልናን።
en-mt: However, we have no choice but to stop the pandemic as soon as possible and get back to our normal lives.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: ናይ ደቂ ሰባት ኮሮናቫይረስ ዙኖቲካዊ መበቆል
en-mt: he origins of the coronavirus

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ንዝቑጸሩ ዓመታት ብምኽንያት ሚዩቴሽንን ምልማድን ንወድሰብ ሓዊሱ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረሳትን(CoVs) መጸግዒታቶምን ዝግመት ለውጢ ኣምጽዮም እዮም።
en-mt: For thousands of years, mutations and adaptations have led to changes in the coronavirus and their covs.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: ቕድሚ 2003 ክልተ ናይ ሰባት CoVs (HCoVs) ከም ሰዓል ዘበለ ማእኸላይ ሕማም ከምዘስዕቡ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Prior to 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause any mild illness.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: ናይ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም (SARS) ለበዳን ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ (MERS) ለበዳን ናይ HCoV ረኽሲ ክንደየናይ ንህይወት ኣስጋኢ ከምዝኾነ ከርእዩና ክኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) pandemic and the Middle East Respiratory System (MERS) pandemic have shown us how life-threatening HCoV infections are.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብኣቆጻጽራ ኣውሮፓ ኣብ መፈጸምታ 2019 ኣብ ማእኸላይ ቻይና ብምርካቡ CoVታት ኣብ ኣተኩሮኣትዮም ነይሮም። CoVs ልዑል ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለት ዋላ’ኳ እንተለዎ ካብ SARS-CoV ግን ዝተሓተ ናይ ሕማም ተኽእሎ የርእይ።
en-mt: CoVs were focused on the arrival of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019, with CoVs having higher transmission capacity, but showing less risk of disease than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: HCoV ረኽሲ ዙኖሲስ እንትኸውን ናይ HCoVs ዙኖቲክ መበቆል ምርዳእ ድማ ብዝግባእ ዝጠቕመና እዩ።
en-mt: HCoV is a zoonosis infection and an understanding of the origin of HCoVs.

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም HcoVታት ካብ ለዃኺቶታት ዝመጹ ኮይኖም ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ድማ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: Most HcoVs come from infections and do not cause the disease.

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: እቶም መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ናይ HCoVs እውን ፍሉጣት እዮም።
en-mt: HCoVs' intermediary accommodations are also well-known.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: ናይ እንስሳ ፍልፍል ምፍላጥ ናይቲ ሕማም ምክልኻል ኣብ ምርካብ ዓብዪ እጃም ይጻወት።
en-mt: Understanding animal diversity plays an important role in preventing the spread of the disease.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: ናይ CoV ቫይረስ ተጠቃዕቲ ምስ እንስሳት ዝነብሮም ርክብ ምጽናዕን ምምርማርን ዝሓሸ መረዳእታ ምምሕልላፍ ነቲ ሕማም ንምርካብ ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: Studying and testing the relationships of cov virus participants to animals, providing better information, helps to find the disease.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኣብዚ ምርምር ኣብቶም ሸውዓተ HCoVs ዘለና ፍልጠት ብመሰረት ናይ ረኸበ ታሪኽን ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ኩነትን ነጠቓልል።
en-mt: In this research, we include knowledge in the seven HCoVs based on the history of discovery and the condition of transmission from animals to humans.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: ብቐንዲ ድማ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነታት HCoVs ብመንጽር ዝግመት ለውጢ ቫይረስን ናይ ጀኖም ጥምረትን ዘለዎም ምምስሳልን ምፍልላይን ንጠቅስ።
en-mt: First and foremost, let's mention the similarities and divisions of different types of HCoVs, predictive virus mutations and genome combinations.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: አዚ ግዜኣዊ CoV ሕማም 2019 (COVID-19) ለበዳ ኣብ እዚ ሓሳብ እዚ ምይይጥ ተገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: he 2019 Temporary CoV Disease (COVID-19) pandemic has been discussed in this context.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ንዕውት ካብ መሕደሪ ናብ መሐደሪ ምስግጋርን ናይ እዚ ቫይረስ ዕብየት ኣብ እቲ ናይ ሕማም ከቢድነት ብዛዕባ ዘስዕቦ ጽልዋ እውን ትኹረት ተዋሂቡዎም እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, attention has been paid to the successful transition from accommodation to accommodation and the impact of the spread of the virus on the severity of the disease.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: ኮሮና ቫይረስ(CoVs) ምስ Coronaviridae(ኮሮናቫይሬድ) ዝበሃል ዓሌት ይምደብ። Coronaviridae ድማ enveloped(ዝተዓሸጉ)፣ positive-sensed(ፖዘቲቭ ሴንስድ)፣ single-stranded(ነጸላ ቅርንጫፍ ዘለዎም) ዝበሃሉ ናይ RNA ቫይረስ ጉጅለታት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: CoVs are classified with a strain called Coronaviridae, and Coronaviridae includes RNA virus groups called enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: እዞም ቫይረሳት ካብ 26 ክሳብ 32 ኪሎ ቤዝ ዝኸውን ዓብዪ ጂኖም ዝሕዙን ብዓይኒ ዘይረኣዩ ትሃዋስያን ኮይኖም ብምኽንያት ኣብ ትሕቲ ኤሌክትሮን ማይክሮስኮብ ዘርእዩዎ ዘውዲ መሰል ቕርጺ “CoVs” ብምባል ይጽውዑ።
en-mt: hese viruses contain a large genome of between 26 and 32 kilos and are called "coVs" because of their crown rights under an electron microscopy.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: ብ መንጽር ኣካላዊ ቅርጺ፣ CoVs ተመሳሳሊ ስርዓት ኣወዳድባ ዝውንኑ ዘይተኸፋፈሉ ጀኖማት ኣለዉዎም።
en-mt: In the physical form, CoVs have the same system of equations.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: ብግምት ክልተ ሰለስታዊ ናይ እዚ ጄኖም ክልተ ዓበይቲ ተደራረብቲ ክፍቲ ተነበብቲ ፍሬማት (ORF1a ን ORF1b ን) ኣለውዎም፣ እዚኦም ድማ ናብ pp1a ን pp1ab ን ሪፕሊኬዝ ፖሊፕሮቲናት ዝትርጎሙ እዮም።
en-mt: About two thirds of the genomes have two large overlapping frame readers (ORF1a and ORF1b) that translate into pp1a and pp1ab and replicase polyprotems.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: እቶም ፖሊፕሮቲናት nsp1~16 ዝበሃል በዓል 16 ዘይተዋቐሩ ፕሮቲናት ከምርቱ ይግበሩ።
en-mt: He proteins are made up of nsp1-16, which is made up of 16 unprocessed proteins.

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: እቲ ዝተረፈ ክፋል ናይ እቲ ጄኖም፣ spike (S)፣envelope (E)፣membrane (M)ን nucleoprotein (N) ሓዊሱ ነቶም ቅርጻዊ ፕሮቲናት ORF ዝወስድ እዩ።
en-mt: he rest of the genome, spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N) burn the orf proteins.

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ዓሌታዊ-መሰረት ዘለዎም መበቆል ፕሮቲናት እውን ብዝተፈላለዩ ናይ CoVs ዓሌታት ሓበሬታት ዝተመልኡ እዮም።
en-mt: Many racially-based origin proteins are also filled with different CoVs species data.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ፕሮቲን መስርዕ ኣፈላላይ ብምምርኳስ CoVs ኣብ ኣርባዕተ (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoVን delta-CoVን) ይኽፈሉ። ካብዚኣቶም beta-CoV መብዛሕትኦም HCoVs ዝሕዝ ኮይኑ ኣርብዕተ ክፍልታት (A, B, C and D) ኣልዎም።
en-mt: Depending on the protein sequence, CoVs are divided into four (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV, and delta-CoV), of which beta-CoV consists mostly of HCoVs and has four divisions (A, B, C and D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: ፓይሎጀኒክ መረዳእታ ለዃኺቶታትን ኣንጭዋታትን ናይ መብዛሕትኦም ኣልፋ-CoVs ን ቤታ -CoVs ን ጂን ምንጪታት እዮም፣ ኣዕዋፍ ድማ ናይ ጋማ-CoVs ን ደልታ-CoVs ዋና መሕደሪታት እየን።
en-mt: Pilotic data for wolves and mice are the sources of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs and genes, while birds are the main hosts of gamma-covs and delta-covs.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ዓመታት፣ CoVs ናይ ዓሌታት ገደባት ጥሒሱ ሓሊፉ እዩ ሓደሓዲኦም ድማ ከበድቲ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ኮይኖም መጺኦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: For thousands of years, CoVs have violated race limits, and some of them have become more serious human diseases.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ፣ ሸውዓተ ናይ ደቂ ሰባት CoVs (HCoVs) ተፈሊጦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: O date, seven Human CoVs have been identified.

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: ካብኣቶም ድማ HCoV-229E ን HCoV-NL63 ን alpha-CoVs እዮም።
en-mt: Among them are HCoV-229E for HCoV-NL63 and alpha-CoVs.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: እቶም ካልኦት ሓሙሽተ ቤታ-CoVs በዓል HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1፣ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም (SARS-CoV)፣ ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ (MERS-CoV) ከምኡውን SARS-CoV-2 የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: The other five beta-CoVs festival include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1; severe emergency systemic respiratory syndrome (SARS-CoV), Middle Eastern respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: HCoV-229E፣ HCoV-OC43፣ HCoV-HKU1 ከምኡ'ውን HCoV-NL63 መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም ሰዓል ከምኡ'ውን/ወይድማ ተቕማጥን ዝኣምሰሉ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ሕማም የኸትሉ።
en-mt: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 often cause mild symptoms such as coughing and/or convulsing.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: ምስ SARS-CoV፣ MERS-CoV ከምኡውን ምስቲ ሓድሽ ዝተረኸበ SARS-CoV-2 ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣዝዩ ልዑል ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ዓቕሚ ኣለዎ፣ ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ረኽሲ ብምስዓብ መብዛሕትኦም ሰባት ድማ ናይ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ከምኡውን ካብ ሳንባ ወጻኢ ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ናይ ምርኣይ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Compared with SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly discovered SARS-CoV-2, it has a very high ability to follow, followed by severe lower respiratory infections, and most people are more likely to experience severe respiratory dystrial syndrome (ARDS) and symptoms outside the lungs.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: B814 ዝበሃል እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ HCoV-229E ዘርኢ ኣብ መፋርቕ 1960 ካብ ናይ ሰዓል ሕሙም ንፋጥ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: B814, the first HCoV-229E seed, was discovered in mid-1960 from a cough patient's fat.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: ካብኡ ንዳሓር ኣብቶም ክልተ ዓርሰ ውሱንነት ምልክታት ዘስዕቡ ቫይረሳት HCoV-229Eን HCoV-OC43ን ብዝተገብረ ዓሙቕ መፅናዕቲ ብዙሕ ግንዛበ ክእከብ ተኻኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: Since then, a lot of understanding has been gathered in a closer study of HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 viruses that cause symptoms.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: ቅድሚ ለበዳ SARS ምፍጣሩ ብ HCoVs ዝመፅእ ሕማም ጎዳኢ ከምዘይኮነ ይእመን ኔሩ።
en-mt: Efore the SARS pandemic, HCoVs were believed to be harmful.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: እቲ ኣብ ታሪክ ዝኸፍእ ናይ SARS ለበዳ ኣብ 2003 ተኸሲቱ። በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ ልዕሊ 8,000 ሰባት ተጠቒዖም፤ ካብኦም ድማ 10% ሞየቶም።
en-mt: The worst SARS outbreak in history was blamed in 2003, resulting in more than 8,000 people being affected, 10% of whom died.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: ድሕሪ ዓሰርተ ዓመታት፣ ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድረም (MERS) ጎንፊ ኣብ ዓረብ ፔኒንሱላ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ለበዳ ብምስዓብ፡ ናብ ዝተረፈ ዓለም ድማ ሓሓሊፉ ተዛሚቱ እዩ።
en-mt: A decade later, the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) pandemic followed a continuing outbreak at the Arab Peninsula and spread to the rest of the world.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: ኣብ 2019 ዝትርኣየ HCoV (2019-nCoV) SARS-CoV-2 ብምባል ዝተሰየመ ናይዚ ሕጂ ዘሎ ናይ ኮሮና 2019(COVID-19) ሕማም ክሳብ መጋቢት 3, 2020 ናይ ልዕሊ 3,120 ሰባት ሂወት ዝወሰደን ልዕሊ 91,000 ሰባት ዘጥቀዐ ዝኾነ ሕማም መልዓሊ እዩ።
en-mt: HCoV (2019-nCoV) sars-CoV-2, the current Corona 2019 (COVID-19) disease, which has taken more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people by March 3, 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ደወል ተደዊሉ’ሎ ዓለም ድማ ን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ሕማም ክትዳሎ ኣሎዋ።
en-mt: he world needs to prepare for the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: ኩሎም ሸውዓት ዓይነታት HCoVs ካብ ከም ሎዃኺቶ፣ ኣንጭዋን ካልኦት አንስሳት ዘቤት ዝመጹ እዮም።
en-mt: All seven types of HCoVs come from animals such as wolves, monkeys and other domestic animals.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ መረጋገጺ መስመራት ናይ ኩሎም HCoVs ዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ኣመጻጽኣ ካብ ለዃኺቶ ምዃኑ ዘርእዩ እዮም፣ እቶም ቫይረሳት ድማ ብኣግባቡ ዝተላመዱን ሕማም ዘየስዕቡ ኮይኖም ግን ሰፊሕ ጀነቲካዊ ፍልልይ ዘርእዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Many confirmation lines show that the predictive change of all HCoVs is from the virus, which are well adapted and do not cause disease, but show wide genetic differences.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ዓብዪ ሕክምናውን፣ ስነፍልጠታዊን/ሳይንሳዊን፣ ማሕበራዊን፣ ከምኡ'ውን ሞራላዊን ማሕለኻታት ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ዓለምን ኣምጺኡ እዩ።
en-mt: he COVID-19 pandemic has brought significant medical, scientific and scientific, social, and moral promises in China and the world.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: ናይ HCoVs ዙኖቲክ መበቆላት ንምክትታል ናይ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ታሪክ፣ ዘንቀሳቕሶ ዘሎ ሓይሊን ናይ ዓሌታት ገደብ ምኽንያታት ምርዳእ የድሊ።
en-mt: In order to trace the zonotic origins of HCoVs, it is necessary to understand the natural history, the power it is moving and the causes of race limits.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ነቶም መሕደሪ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝኾኑ፡ኣብ መንጎ ዝርከቡን ኣባዛሕቲ ዝኾኑ መሕደሪ(ታት) ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዝኾኑ እንስሳት ንምርካብ ኣብ ዝግበር ኣለሻ ክመርሕን ከሳልጥን እውን ዝኽእል እዩ፣ ፣ ን ቀጸልቲ ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ብምምሕልላፍ ከጋጥሙ ዝኽእሉ ጎንፊታት/ለበዳታት ኣብ ምክልኻል ድማ ጠቐምቲ ኣንፈታት ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: This can also guide and guide the search for sarS-CoV-2 animals, which are virus dwellings, and have useful resources in preventing further outbreaks/outbreaks that may occur by transmitting them from animals to humans.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ክለሳ ናይ HCoVs እንስሳዊ መበቆል፣ ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ዝህሉ ምምሕልላፍን ሕማም ናይ ምምጻእ ዓቕምን ዝድህስስ ርኢቶ ክነቕርብ ኢና።
en-mt: In this review, we will provide a look at the animal origins of HCoVs, the transmission of interscial races and the ability to cause disease.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: ብፍላይ፣ ብዛዕባ እቶም ናይ HCoV ዓሌታዊ ቫይረሳት ፍልይ ብዝበለ መልክዑ ኣብቲ ልሙድ መሕደሪኦም ሕማም ዘየስዕቡ ምዃኖምን ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ኣብ ዝህሉ ምምሕልላፍ ግን ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ከምዝኾኑ ትኹረት እንህበሉን ንመያየጠሉን እዩ።
en-mt: In particular, we focus on and discuss the racial viruses of HCoV, which do not cause disease in their usual dwellings, but also cause disease in transmission between strains.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: ከይዲ ናይ HCoV ዝግመታዊ ኣመጻጽኣ ከይዲ ዝምልከት፡ማለት እውን መብዛሕቲኡ ግዜ ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ምቕናስ ምስ ወሰኽ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ከምዝመጽእ እውን ንድህስስ ኢና።
en-mt: In the case of HCoV, we also note that reducing the risk of hCoV is often associated with an increase in the risk of transmission.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: ናይዚ ቀጻሊ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ውጽኢት እውን ኣብዚ ሓሳብ እዚ ምይይጥ ተገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: he results of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 pandemic have also been discussed.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: ናይ እንስሳት CoVs ካብ መወዳእታ 1930 ጀሚሮም ፍሉጣት እዮም።
en-mt: Animal covs have been popular since the late 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: ቅድሚ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ዓይነት HCoV-229E ዝኾነ B814 ካብ ሰዓል ዝሓመመ ሰብ ንፋጥ ምርካቡ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ኮሮና ቫይረሳት ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ዝተለኽፉ እንስሳት ከም ታኪን፣ ኣንጭዋ፣ ላሕሚ፣ ድሙን ከልብን ተረኺቦም ኔሮም'ዮም።
en-mt: efore the first type of HCoV-229E, B814 was detected, a variety of coronaviruses had been detected from a variety of animals, such as takin, mouse, laminate, cats and dogs.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: ኣብዘን ዝሓለፉ ዓሰርተታት ዓመታት፣ ሸውዓተ HCoVs ተፈሊጦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: In recent decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: ሓጺር መጠቓለሊ ታሪኽ ኣመጻጽኣ HCoV ብቕደም ሰዓብ (ሰንጠረዥ 1) ሓባሪን መሃሪን ይኸውን።
en-mt: A brief history of hCoV will be co-hosted and instructive (Table 1).

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ HCoV-229E ዘርኢ ኣብ 1966 ካብ ናይ ላዕለዋይ ኣካል መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ዝተወሰደ እዩ፣ ድሕሪኡ ግን ተላሚዱ ኣብ ናይ ሳንባ ዋህዮ መስመራት WI-38 ክዓቢ ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: he first HCoV-229E seed was taken from upper respiratory people in 1966, but has since been adapted to grow wi-38 in lung cell lines.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: እቶም ብ HCoV-229E ዝተለኸፉ ሕሙማት ኣብቶም ካብ 10~20% ዝኾኑ ጉዳያት ለበዳ፡ ን ሕማም ርእሲ ፣ ምህንጣስ፣ ናይ ሕማም ስምዒትን ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛን፣ ረስኒን ሰዓልን ዘጠቓልሉ ልሙዳት ናይ ሰዓል ምልክታት ዘርእዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Patients infected with HCoV-229E showed common cough symptoms in cases of 10-20% of epidemiological diseases, strokes, nausea, sore throats, fever and coughing.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: ኣብ 1967፣ HCoV-OC43 ካብ ናይ ኦርጋን ካልቸr ተረኺቡ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ኣንጭዋ ሓጎል ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: In 1967, HCoV-OC43 was discovered from organ calcere and then found in an ant's brain.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ዝርአ ረኽሲ ናይ HCoV-OC43 ምስ HCoV-229E ተመሳሳሊ ዝኾነ ምልክታት ሕማም ኣለዎም። እዚኦም ድማ ካብ ካልኦት ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽስታት ዘስዕቡ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ኤን ራይኖቫይረስ ዝመሳስሉ ቫይረሳት ዝተፈለየ ናይ ሕማም ምልክት የብሎምን።
en-mt: Clinically visible infections of HCoV-OC43 have symptoms similar to HCoV-229E, which have no symptoms unlike other respiratory infections, viruses such as influenza N. rhinovirus.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: HCoV-229E ን HCoV-OC43 ን ብዓለም ለኸ ተሰራጭዮም፣ ኣብዚ ናይ ሓገይ ወቕቲ ኣብ ደጉዓዊ ነባሪ ኣር ኣብ ዘሎሉ ብሰፊሑ ክስፋሕፍሑ ይረኣዩ።
en-mt: HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 have been widely distributed worldwide, and they are widely available this summer.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ፣ ናይ እዞም ክልተ ቫይረሳት መጫጭሒ ግዘ ትሕቲ ሓደ ሰሙን እዩ፣ ቀጺሉ ድማ ዳርጋ ናይ 2-ሰሙን ሕማም ይስዕብ።
en-mt: Generally, the duration of these two viruses is less than a week, followed by about 2 weeks.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: ኣብ ፍቓደኛታት ውልቀሰባት ዝተገብረ ምርምር፡ ብ HCoV-229E ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ቅልል ዝበለ ናይ ሰዓል ምልክታት ከምዝነበሮም የረድእ።
en-mt: Research on willing individuals found that people with HCoV-229E had mild symptoms.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: ካብቶም ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ትሑት ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት እቶም ዉሑዳት ጥራሕ ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ኣጋጢሙዎም።
en-mt: Only a small number of patients with low immunity experienced severe lower respiratory infections.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS፣ “ዘይልሙድ ኒሞንያ” ተባሂሉ እውን ዝፍለጥ፣ ናይ መጀመርያ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ታሪኽ ዓለምለኸዊ ለበዳ ከም ዝፈጠረ ብኣግባቡ ዝተመዝገበ HCoV-እዩ ጠንቁ ድማ SARS-CoV ከምዝኾነን፣ ሳልሳይ HCoV ድማ ከምዝተፈለጠ ይግለጽ።
en-mt: SARS, also known as "uncommon pneumonia," is the first hCoV-recorded cause of a global pandemic in human history, and sars-CoV is the cause of the third HCoV.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ SARS ጉዳይ ለበዳ ኣብ መወዳእታ 2002 ኣብ ጋንግዶንግ ናይ ቻይና ኣውራጃ እዩ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The first case of sars outbreaks was seen in Gangdong, China's province, in late 2002.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: ለበዳ SARS ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራትን ኣህጉራትን ብምዝማት ናይ 8,096 ሰባት ጉዳያት ለበዳ ዝተሓበረ እንተኸውን 774 ድማ ንሞት ተቓሊዖም እዮም።
en-mt: he SARS pandemic has spread to many countries and continents, with 8,096 cases reported and 774 deaths.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: እቶም ብልዑል መንገዲ ዘመሓላልፉ ገዲፍካ ሕድሕድ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንኣስታት ክልተ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ክዳርግ ይኽእል። እዚ ድማ ካብ 4 እስካብ 7 ማዓልቲ ዝኸዉን ናይ ኢንኩቤሽን እዋን የድልዮ እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ መጠን ድማ ኣብ 10ይ መዓልቲ ይፍጠር።
en-mt: Each case of the pandemic can lead to about two new cases of the pandemic, which requires an incubation period of 4 to 7 days, and the highest viral rate is created on the 10th day.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: ብSARS-CoV ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ናይ ጨዋዳ ቓንዛ፣ ሕማም ርእሲ፣ ረስኒ፣ ድኻምን ቑሪን፣ ሕጽረት ኣየር፣ ሰዓልን ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማምን ምልክታት የርእዩ።
en-mt: People affected by SARS-CoV show signs of salty pain, headaches, fever, fatigue and colds, lack of air, cough and respiratory illness.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: ሊምፎፒንያ፣ ዝተዛበዐ ናይ ጉበት ስራሕ ምርመራታት፣ ልዑል ናይ ክሬቲን ካይኔዝ ልሙዳት ናይ SARS ኣብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዘርእዮም ዘይልሙዳት ተርእዮታት እዮም።
en-mt: Lymphopinia, distorted liver function tests, high creatin cainetz are common SARS phenomena that are common in laboratory.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: ዲፊዩዝ ናይ ኣሊቪዮላር ጉድኣት፣ ናይ ኢፒቴልያል ዋህዮ ምብርባርን ናይ ማክሮፌጃት ምብዛሕን ኣብ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ዝተረኣዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Defiuces were observed in sarsms of aliviolar damage, epithelial cell fractures and macrophics proliferation in SARS patients.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: ዳርጋ 20-30% ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ጽኑዕ ክንክንን ሜካኒካዊ ventilation(ምጽራይ ኣየር) ዝሓቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Nearly 20-30% of patients request intensive care and mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: ካብ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ብተወሳኺ ከም ማዓንጣ፣ ፀላም ከብድን ኩላሊትን ዝመሳሰሉ ክፍለኣካላት እዉን ከቢድ ሕማም እንተጋጥም ክጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ እዮም። ኣብ ከምዚ ዓይነት ኩነታት ብዝሒ ሳይቶካይን ስለዝህሉ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ትሑት ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ዝኸፍአ ፀግም ከምፅእ ይኽእል።
en-mt: In addition to lower respiratory systems, parts such as the stomach, liver and kidneys can also be affected in the event of a serious illness, and in such cases, the number of cytocans can cause more problems in patients with low immunity.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ መጀመርያ ካብ ግዋንግዡ ናብ ሆንግኮንግ ዝተጎዓዘ ሕሙም ብመጥባሕቲ ካብ ሳንባ ብዝተወሰደ ባየፕሲ ዝተፈለየ እዩ።
en-mt: he virus is first detected by a patient who traveled from Guangzhou to Hong Kong with a baptised from the lungs.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: ድሕሪኡ፣ ብዙሓት ጻዕሪታት ንናይ HCoV መጽናዕቲ ክውዑል ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: After that, many efforts have been made to apply for HCoV studies.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ኣብ መወዳእታ 2004 ካብ 7-ወርሒ ዝዕድሚኣ ኔዘርላንዳዊት ህጻን ተወሲዱ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 was taken from a 7-month-old Dutch baby in late 2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: መጀመርያ ኣብ ህጻናት፣ ሽማግለታትን ኣብ ብናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማም ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማትን ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ዝተዳኸመ ሰባትን እዩ ብብዝሒ ዝርአ ኾይኑ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: Initially, it was found to be in children, the elderly, and respiratory patients and people with weakened immune systems.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: ናይ ኮሪዛ፣ ኮንጃክቲቫይቲስ፣ ረስኒን ብሮንኮላይትስን ምልክታት ኣብ ብ HCoV-NL63 ዝምዕብሉ ሕማማት ልሙዳት እዮም።
en-mt: Symptoms of corriza, conjakivitis, fever and bronkolaitis are common in diseases developed by HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: ካልኦት ዓርሶም ዝኸኣሉ መጽናዕቲታት ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ ካብ 8-ወርሒ ዝዕድሚኡ ብኒሞንያ ዝተጠቐዐ ህጻን ካብ ናይ ኣንቻ ስዋብ ናሙና ዝተወሰደ ተመሳሳሊ ቫይረስ ክረኽቡ ምኽኣሎም ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Other studies have revealed that an 8-month-old pneumonia-infected baby in the Netherlands has been able to detect a similar virus taken from an antcha swab sample.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: ዋላኳ ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ ዝተፈልጠ እንተኾነ ብዓለም ደረጃ ተስፋሕፊሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Although it is known in the Netherlands, it is widespread worldwide.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ክሳብ 4.7% ዝኾኑ ልሙዳት ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት ዘስዐበ እዩ፣ ዋና ኣጋጣሚታቱ ድማ ኣብ ክረምቲ መጀመርያ፣ ኣብ ጽድያን ሓጋይን እዮም ዝፍጠሩ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 causes up to 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, with its main opportunities occurring in the early summer; in spring and summer.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ምስ ክሩፕ(croup) ዝበሃል ምዕጋት ነድሪ ላንቃ ይተሓሓዝ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is associated with croup, a preventable inflammation of the lansing.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: ኣብ እቲ ዓመት HCoV-HKU1 ኣብ ወዲ 71 ዓመት ዝኮነ ብምኽንያት ኒሞንያንያን ብሮንካይተስን ናብ ሕክምና ዝኣተወ ሰብኣይ ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: That year, HCoV-HKU1 was discovered in Hong Kong by a man who was 71 because of pneumonia and brohnkaites.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: HCoV-HKU1 ካብ ናይ ማሕበረሰብ ኒሞንያን ብሮንካይተስን ብተወሳኺ ምስ ኣክዩት ኣዝማ ጥምረት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: HCoV-HKU1 also has a coalition with Akyut Azm in addition to the community pneumonia and bronnkaites.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: ምስ HCoV-NL63፣ HCoV-229E፣ ከምኡውን HCoV-OC43 ብተመሳሳሊ፣ HCoV-HKU1 ቀለልቲ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ሕማማት ብምስዓብ፣ እውን ኣብ ዓለም ሙሉእ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Similarly with HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E, and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 has been seen worldwide.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: እዞም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ከባቢ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ምስሰባት ብጽቡቕ ተላሚዶም እዮም ከቢድ ሕማም ንምስዓብ ሚችዌት ናይ ምግባር ክእለቶም ድማ ትሑት እዩ፣ ብዘይተፈለጡ ምኽንያታት ሓደጋታታት ኣጋጢሞም ዋላ እንተኾኑ ብዙሓት ዓይነታት HCoV-NL63፣ ኣብ ቀረባ ግዘ ኣብ ቻይና ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ሕማም ኣስዒቦም እዮም።
en-mt: hese four local HCoVs are well-adapted to humans and have low ability to cause severe disease, and although there have been accidents for unknown reasons, many types of HCoV-NL63 have recently caused severe lower respiratory disease in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: ብጠቕላላ HCoVs ናይ ምትሕልላፍን ኣብ ሰብነትና ኣቲዩ ናይ ምንባርን ዓቕሙ ክብ እንተብል ጉድኣት ናይምብፃሕ ክእለቱ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: Generally, HCoVs reduce their ability to transmit and live in our bodies.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS-CoV ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ኣብ 2012 ኣብ ሳዑዲ ዓረብያ ከቢድ ናይ ሳምባ ምቺን ናይ ኩላሊት ሕማም ኣብ ዝሓዞም ወዲ 60 ዓመት ሕሙም ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: MERS-CoV was first discovered in 2012 by a 60-year-old patient with severe samba mchin kidney disease in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ብቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ካብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ዝመጹ እዮም፣ ካብ ደገ ዝኣተዉ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ምስ ሓሓሊፉ ዘጋጠሙ ቀረባ ርክባት ዝግበሩ ናይ ካልኣይ ደረጃ ምልባዓት ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሃገራትን ቱኒዝያን ጸብጻብ ተገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Most of the confirmed cases of the pandemic come from the Middle East, and outbreak cases have been reported from various European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: ኣብ 2015 ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ብ186 ዝተረጋገጸ ኩነት ካልኣይ ደረጃ ለበዳ ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: In 2015, a second phase of the outbreak was recorded in South Korea with 186 confirmed cases.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: ናይ MERS ክሊካላዊ ምልክታት ናይ SARS እዮም፣ ብእንዳገደደ ዝኸይድ ከቢድ ኒሞንያ የስዕቡ።
en-mt: MERS are the climacin symptoms of SARS, causing severe pneumonia that goes away.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: ካብ SARS ፍልይ ብዝበለ መንገዲ፡ ብዙሕሓት ብMERS ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማት ሃንደበታዊ ናይ ኩላሊት ሕማም የጋጥሞም። እዚ ፀባዩ ድማ ካብ ካልኦት ብHCoV- ዝመፁ ሕማማት ፍሉይ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS experience sudden kidney disease, which makes it different from other HIV-related diseases.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: ልዕሊ 30% ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ከም ተቕማጥን ንዓቐብ ምባልን ዝበሉ ናይ ከስዐ መዓንጣ ምልክታት ዝቐርቡ እዮም።
en-mt: More than 30% of patients have symptoms such as coughing and sneering.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: ካብ ፌብሩዋሪ 14, 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ልዕሊ 2500 ኣብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ልዑል ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 34.4% ኣረእዮም እዮም፣ ን MERS-CoV ኣብ ሰባት ካብ ዝፈለጡ ኣዝዮም ክፉኣት ቫይረሳት ክኾኑ ጌርዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Since February 14, 2020, more than 2500 experimental cases of epidemiology have shown a high mortality comparative rate of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV the most evil viruses known to humans.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 ማእኸል፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ብዝተተሓሓዘ ኒሞንያ ዝሓመሙ ሕሙማት ኣብ ውሃን፣ ሁቤይ ኣውራጃ ቻይና ተራእዮም።
en-mt: In December 2019, pneumonia-related SARS-CoV-2 infections were seen in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: ዉድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነዚ ብSARS-CoV-2 ዝመፅእ ቀፃሊ ዝኾነ ናይ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ጎንፊ ፣ ናይ ዓለምለኸ ህዝቢ ጥዕና ናብ ሓደጋ ዝዳርግ ብምባል ሽሙ ድማ COVID-19 ብምባል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has declared covid-19 a permanent lower respiratory infection caused by SARS-CoV-2, threatening global public health.

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 3 2020 ብዓለም ደረጃ 90,053 ዝኾኑ ናይዚ ሕማም ኩነታትን 3.4% ሞትን ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: As of March 3, 2020, the world's 90,053 conditions and 3.4% of deaths were recorded.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ ሁበይ በዚ ሕማም ጥራይ ዝተከስተ መጠን ሞት 4.2% ክኸውን ከሎ፣ ካብኣ ወጻኢ ግን 1.2% እዩ።
en-mt: Specificly, the death rate in Hubi alone is 4.2% but 1.2% outside of it.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ከም SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV ብረስኒ፣ ሰዓልን ሕጽረት ትንፋስን ዝግለጽ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ የስዕብ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infections such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which is defined by fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: ተቕማጥ ኣብ ገለ ሕሙማት ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: He has been seen in some patients.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ኒሞንያ ካብቶም ከበድቲ ምልክታቱ ሓደ እዩ ብቕልጡፍ ድማ ናብ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትነፋስ ዲስተረስ ሲንድረም ክዓቢ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Pneumonia is one of its most severe symptoms and can quickly grow into severe system dystrus syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: ዋላ'ኳ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን SARS-CoV-2 ብናይ ልዑል ኒኩሎታይድ ሲኬንስ ሆሞሎጂ 82% ተመሳሰልቲ እዮም፣ ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ፓይሎጀኒክ ጨንፈራት እዮም ግን ዝቕመጡ።
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are 82% identical in high-nickelotide sickens homology, they are settled in different paelogic branches.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV እንትነጻጸር ዝነኣሰ ናይ ሕማም ምምጻእን ዝለዓለ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has a smaller incidence and higher transmission of disease compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ሪፖርት ተገይሮም እዮም ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ንዘሎ ፈጣን ስርጭት ኣስተዋጽኦ ይገብሩ ይኾኑ እዮም።
en-mt: People infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported who show no symptoms and are believed to contribute to rapid spread around the world.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ እቶም ካልኦት ሽዱሽተ ናይ HCoVs ቫይረሳት ምንጽጻር ብልዑል ተገዳስነት ዝርኣዩ ተመሳሳልነትን ፍልልይን የርእዩ።
en-mt: Comparisons of SARS-CoV-2 to the other six HCoVs viruses show similarities and differences that are seen with great interest.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ እቲ ናይ መራብሒ ግዘን ናይ HCoV ሕማም ከይዲን ኣዝዮም ተመሳሰልቲ እዮም።
en-mt: First of all, the incidence of HCoV is very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: ነዚ ብዝምልከት፣ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ ካልኦት ሽድሽተ HCoVs ሓፈሻዊ መገዲ እዩ ዝኸተል።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 follows the general way of six Other HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ከቢድነት ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV ን እቶም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝውሰዱ HCoVs (ንኣብነት፣ HCoV-229E፣ HCoV-OC43፣ HCoV-HKU1 ን HCoV-NL63 ) ዝርከብ እዩ።
en-mt: Second, severe symptoms of COVID-19 are present among SARS-CoV and the four community-taken HCoVs (e.g. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ፣ ዘይንጹር፣ ቀሊል ምልክት ወይ ምንም ምልክት ዘይምርኣይ እውን ሓዊሱ፣ ኣብቶም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ዘለዉ ባህርያታት የርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: ON THE OTHER HAND, SARS-COV-2 INFECTIONS OFTEN INCLUDE A LACK OF OBVIOUS, MILD SYMPTOMS OR ANY SYMPTOMS, AND SHOW CHARACTERISTICS IN HCOVS TAKEN FROM THE COMMUNITY.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ፣ ዋላ እቲ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ትሑት እንተኾነ፣ ከም ናይ SARS-CoV ረኽሲ ግዳያት ንእሽተይ ክፋል ካብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ግዳያት ክረአ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, even if the comparative rate is low, cases such as SARS-CoV infections can be seen in a small proportion of cases of serious COVID-19.

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምምሕልላፍ ዘገርሙ ናይ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰድ HCoVs ን SARS-CoV ን ባህርያዊ ምምስሳላተ እውን ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: Hird, sars-CoV-2 transmission also shows remarkable community hCoVs and SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሓላላፍነት ክንዲ እቶም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ልዑል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, SARS-CoV-2 transmission is higher than HCoVs taken from the community.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: ብኻልእ መዳይ ድማ፣ ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoVን MERS-CoVን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዓቕሙ ከምዝቕንስ ገና ኣይተፈልጠን።
en-mt: On the other hand, it is not yet known whether SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV will reduce the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from person to person.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ከም ካልኦት HCoV፣ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ናይ ቀልቀል ናሙናታት ውሽጢ ክርከቡ ይኽእሉ ፡፡
en-mt: Finally, SARS-CoV-2, like other HCoVs, can be found in incest samples.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ቀልቀል ናብ ኣፍ ምምሕልላፍ፣ ከም ናይ SARS-Co V፣ ብውሑዱ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓደሓደ ኩነታት፣ ወሳኒ ግደ ኣሎዎዶ የብሉን ዝብል ኣብ ቀጻሊ ብዝግበሩ ምርምራት ክበርህ ትጽቢት ዝግበረሉ'ዩ።
en-mt: IT IS EXPECTED THAT SARS-CoV-2 transmission from mouth to mouth, such as SARS-Co V, does not play a crucial role in at least one case.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ወቕትታት ዓመት SARS-CoV-2 ዘርእዮ ለውጢ ካብ ብ HCoVs ዝተጠቕዑ ሕብረተ ሰብ ክርከብ ትጽቢት ይግበር።
en-mt: He expects the changes in SARS-CoV-2 during the various years of the year from hCoV-affected communities.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነግን ባህርታት SARS-CoV-2፣ ከም ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዓቕሙ፣ ሓደገኛነቱን ቀጻልነት ዝርግሐኡ ኣብ ሰባት ድሕሪ ምሕላፉን ሓዊስካ፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይዚ ቀጻሊ ለበዳ COVID-19 ናይ መወዳእታ ዕጫ ጽልዋ ክህልዎም'ዩ።
en-mt: However, SARS-CoV-2, such as its transmission capacity, risks and sustainability, will have a final impact on the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: እቶም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝርከቡ HCoVs ቀሊል ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ዘርእዩ እንትኾኑ ምስ ደቂ ሰባት ድማ ብዝግባእ ዝተለማመዱ እዮም።
en-mt: Four HCoVs from the community show mild symptoms and are well-rehearsed with humans.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: ብኻልእ ኣጠማምታ ክርአ ኸሎ፣ ደቂ ሰባት ምስዞም ኣርባዕተ HCoVs ጽቡቕ ጌሮም ተላሚዶም ክኾኑ ከምዝኽእሉ ሓቂ ክኸውን ይኽእል'ዩ።
en-mt: In other words, it may be true that humans have adapted well to these four HCoVs.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: ብካልእ ኣበሃህላ፣ ክልቲኦም ካብ እቶም ጥንቲ ዝተራእዩ ናይ HCoV ለበዳታት ብህይወት ዝተረፉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In other words, both of them may have survived the oldest HCoV outbreaks.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: ኣብ ወዲ ሰብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘምፅኡ HCoVs ከምኡ'ውን ብምኽንያት HCoV ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘማዕበሉ ሰባት ተወጊዶም'ዮም።
en-mt: HCoVs that cause serious human diseases and those who develop the most serious diseases due to HCoV have been removed.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: እዚ ንክኾን፣ HCoVs ናይ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ደረትቲ ረቛሒታት ንምምካት ዘኽእል ምእካብ ናይ ዝተለምዱ ለውጥታት (adaptive mutations) ብዝፈቅድ መንገዲ ኣብ ደቂሰባት ብእኹል መጠን ክራብሑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In order for this to happen, HCoVs must be developed in humans in a way that allows for the collection of adaptive mutations, which can meet sanctuary criteria.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት እዚ፣ እዚ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ብዝቐጸለ ቁጽሪ ከምኡድማ ብዙሓት ሰባት እንዳለኸፈ ብዝኸደ ቁጽሪ፣ ምስ ሰባት መሉእ ንሙሉእ ናይ ምልማድ ዕድሉ ሰፈሕ እዩ።
en-mt: As a result, as the ongoing sars-CoV-2 pandemic continues and as many people spread, there is a greater chance of getting fully adapted to people.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: ብግቡእ እንተድኣ ተላሚዱ፣ ብውሸባ ወይ ብካልኦት ናይ ረኽሲ መቆጻጸሪ ስጉምትታት ምግታእ ኸቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: If it is properly implemented, it can be difficult to control infections or other infection control measures.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: ንብዙሕ ዓመታት እቶም ኣርባዕተ ኣብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝርከቡ CoVs ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት እናተዘዋወሩ ንጥዕናኦም ዝተሓለወ ሰባት ብምጥቃዕ ሰዓል የምጽኡ እዮም።
en-mt: For many years, the quaint communities of CoVs have been roaming in humans, causing coughing by attacking health-protected people.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: እዞም ቫይረሳት ናይ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ኣየድልዮምን።
en-mt: These viruses do not require animal dwellings.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: ብንጽጽር፣ ልዑል ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ዘለዎም SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoVን ምስ ሰባት ብኣግባቡ ኣይተላመዱን ኣብ መንጎ ሰባት ዘለዎም ምትሕልላፋት እውን ቀጻልነት ክህልዎ ኣይኽእልን እዩ።
en-mt: By comparison, SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which have a high risk of developing diseases, are not properly adapted to humans and their transmissions between humans cannot be sustained.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: ኣብ እንስሳዊ መዕቖቢታቶም ብምጽናሕን ብምብዛሕን፣ ቀጺሎም ድማ ሓደ ወይ ካብኡ ንላዕሊ መንጎኛን መባዛሕቲን መሕደሪታት ብምጥቃም ናብ ብቐሊሉ ተጠቃዕቲ ግዳያት ዝኾኑ ደቂ ሰባት ናይ ምፍሳስ ዕድል ድማ ክጽበዩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: by staying and multiplying in their animal shelters, and then using one or more intermediaries and intermediaries, they should look forward to the opportunity to spill into easily vulnerable human beings.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ SARS-CoV/MERS-CoVን ምስ እቶም ካልኦት ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ተመሳሳሊ ባህርያታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has similar characteristics to SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the other four community-taken HCoVs.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: እንተነኣሰ ንግዜኡ፣ ከምቲኦም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝርከቡ HCoVs፣ ብሉዕል መጠን ዝመሓላለፍ እዩ።
en-mt: At least for a while, it's spreading as much as HCoVs from the community.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና፣ ብ ሕማም ኣምጸኣይነቱ፣ ካብ ኣብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝተረኽበ HCoVs ዝበኣሰን ካብ SARS-CoV ወይ MERS-CoV ድማ ዝሓሸን እዩ።
en-mt: However, it is worse than HCoVs found in the community and better than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: ሙሉእ ንሙሉእ ናብ ሰባት ክላመድ ድዩ ወይስ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰባት ብዘይ መዐቖቢ ወይ መንጎኛ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ክዘዋወር ይኽእል ድማ ዝብል ገና ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: It is not yet known whether it will be fully adapted to humans or whether it can be transported within humans without shelter or intermediary.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: ቅድሚ ናይ HCoVs እንስሳዊ መበቆላት ምግላጽና፣ ናይቶም ብዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ዝማዕበሉ፣ ባህርያውያን፣ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዑ (reservoir)፣ ሞንጎኛታትን አጋደድቲ መዕቆብቲ ትርጉማትን ጠባያትን ምግላጽ ይጠቅም።
en-mt: efore explaining the animal origins of HCoVs, it is useful to describe the interpretations and behaviors of those who have evolved dramaticly, characteristics, reservoirs, intermediaries and shelters.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: ሓደ እንስሳ ከም ብዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ዝማዕበለ (evolutionary) ናይ HcoV መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል፣ ብደረጃ ኣሰራርዓ ኒዩክሎታይ (nucleotide sequence) ልዑል መበቆላዊ ምምስሳል ዘለዎ ብቐረባ ዝዛመዶ ቅዱም ወለዶ/ኣበው ምስዘዕቁብ እዩ።
en-mt: An animal acts as an evolutionary dwelling place for HcoV when it observes a previous generation with a high nucleotide sequence of origins.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: እዚ ካብ ዘርኢ ዝውረስ ቫይረስ መብዛሕቲኡ ግዜ ኣብ መሕደሪኡ ብጽቡቕ ኩነት ዝተላመደን ሕማም ዘየስዕብን እዩ።
en-mt: he virus is often well-developed in its native place and does not cause disease.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ፣ ሓደ በቲ ቫይረስ ዘይጥቃዕ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ብቐጻልነትን ንነዊሕ ግዘን ናይ HcoV መጸግዒ ኮይኑ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Similarly, a shelter that is not infected with the virus can remain a safe and secure HcoV refuge for a long time.

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: ኣብ ክልቲኦም ጉዳያት፣ እዞም መሕደሪታት እዚኦም ብተፈጥሮ ዝልከፉ ኮይኖም ናይ HCoV ወይ ናይ ዘርኣዊ ቫይረስ ተፈጥሮኣዊ መሕደሪ እዮም።
en-mt: In both cases, these accommodations are naturally infected and are natural dwellings of HCoV or sperm virus.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: ብምንጽጻር ክርአ ኸሎ፣ እቲ HCoV ቀቅድሚ ንደቂ ሰባት ምጥቃዕ ምጅማሩ ወይድማ ኣብቲ ከባቢ ከጥቅዓሉ ዝጀመረ እዋን ንመጀመርያ ግዘ እንተድኣ ንሓደ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ኣጥቂዑ፣ ምስዚ ሓድሽ መዕቆቢ ብጽቡቕ ስለዘይተላመደ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ሕማም የስዕብ እዩ።
en-mt: In comparison, if the HCoV attacks a mediator for the first time before it begins attacking humans or attacking the area, it usually causes disease because it is not well adapted to the new shelter.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: እቲ ማእኸላይ ተሸካማይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝኾነ እንስሳ ከም ምንጪ ረኽሲ ናይ ወድሰብ ኮይኑ የገልግል ብተወሳኺ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ንሓፂር እዋን ኣብ ዉሽጢ እቲ ተሸካሚ/መዕቆቢ ክራባሕ ብምፍቃድ ደሓር ድማ ናብ ሰባት ኣማሓላሊፉ መጠን ዝልከፉ ሰባት ከምዝዓቢ ብምግባር ናይቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምጥቃዕ ዓቕሙ ንኽጎልሕ ዓቢ እጃም ይፃወት።
en-mt: he animal, the central bearer of the virus, acts as a source of infection in the human body and also plays an important role in increasing the spread of the virus by allowing the virus to live within the carrier for a short period of time and then increasing the amount of infected people.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: ሓደ HCoV ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ተመሓላላፍነቱ ክቕጽል እንተዘይክኢሉ፣ ናይ ምልካፍ ዓቕሙ ኣብ ሞት ዝመወዳእታኡ ኩነት ክበጽሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: If an HCoV is unable to continue its transmission within the intermediary, its infective capacity may reach a final state of death.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ ድማ፣ HCoVs ምስቲ መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ክላመድ ይኽእል፣ ዋላ'ውን ነዊሕ ግዘ መጽንሒ ክገብሮም ይኽእል።
en-mt: HCoVs, on the other hand, can adapt to the intermediary, even for a long time.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: ኣብዚ ጉዳይ እዚ፣ እቲ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ባህርያዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይልከፍ መዕቆቢ (reservoir host) ይኸውን።
en-mt: In this case, the mediator may be a natural reservoir host that is not infected.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: ናይ ሕማም ዝርገሐ፣ ጠንቂ፣ ናይ ሓደጋ ረቛሒታት እኩብ ሓበሬታ (epidemiological data) ንድሕሪት ተመሊሱ ከምዝሕብሮ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ SARS ሕሙም (index case) ምስ ናይ መዘናግዒ እንስታታት ናይ ርክብ ታሪኽ ከምዝነበሮ ገሊጽዎ'ዩ።
en-mt: Epidemiological data indicates that the first SARS patient had a history of contact with recreational women.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: ተኸታተልቲ ናይ ኣብ ህዝቢ ዘሎ መጠን ቫይረስ (seroprevalence) ምርመራታት ከምዘርእዩዎ፣ ናይ እንስሳት ነጋዴታት ምስ እቲ ሓፈሻዊ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ልዑል ናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV IgG ተሸከምቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Seroprevalence tests show that animal traffickers are high anti-SARS-CoV IgG carryers compared to the overall population.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ እንስሳት ብህይወቶም ዝሽየጥሉ ዕዳጋታት ዝነበሩ ዝተሸፈኑ ዝባዳት (ፓጉማ ላርቫታ)ን ራኩን ኣኻልብን ዳርጋ ምስ SARS-CoV ሓደ ዝኾኑ SARS-CoV ዝመስሉ ቫይረሳት ከምዝሸከሙ ንመጀመርያ ጊዜ ተለልዮም።
en-mt: For the first time, it was revealed that covered pandas (pguma larvata) and rats and animals carried SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost the same as SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: ነዚ ሓቂ'ዚ ብተዘዋዋሪ መንገዲ ዘረጋግጽ ጭብጢ ድማ፣ ኣብተን ዕዳጋታት ዝነበሩ ኩሎም ዝባዳት ድሕሪ ምቕታሎም ዝኾነ ተወሳኺ ሕማም SARS ክርአ ዘይምኽኣሉ'ዩ።
en-mt: he indirect evidence of this fact is that no further SARS can be detected after all the infected people in the markets have been killed.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ዝተሸፈኑ ናይ በረኻ ወይ ናይ ሕርሻ ዝባዳት ብዘይ ናይ ብሂወት ዘለዉ ናይ እንሰሳት ዕዳጋ ምቅላዕ ብሰፊሑ ን SARS-CoV ኔጌቲቭ እዮም ኔሮም፣ እዚ ድማ ዝተሸፈኑ ዝባዳት ከም መንጎኛ መባዛሕቲ መሕደሪታት እምበር ከም ማእኸላይ መዕቖብቲ SARS-CoV ከምዘይኮኑ የርኢ።
en-mt: However, covered desert or agricultural wastes were widely negotiable to SARS-CoV without the exposure of living animal markets, showing that covered nests were not as a medium-sized sars-CoV shelter, but as a medium-sized SARS-CoV shelter.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: ብግልጺ፣ ካብ 80% ናይ እዞም ዝተፈላለዩ ኣብ ናይ ግዋንግዙ ዕዳጋ ዘለዉ እንስሳት ጸረ-SARS-CoV ኣንቲቦዲታት ስለዘለዎም፣ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ኣናእሽተይ መጥወብቲ ከም መንጎኛ መራብሕቲ መሕደርቲ ናይ SARS-CoV ናይ ምዃን ተኽእሎታት ከምዘሎ ኣብ ግምት ክኣቱ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Frankly, since 80% of these different animals on the Gwangzhou market have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, it should be taken into account that there is a possibility that small-scale small-scale breeds of different species may be sarS-CoV providers.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኩሎም እዚኦም እቶም ናይ መወዳእታ ናይ SARS-CoV መሕደሪ ይመስሉ።
en-mt: All of these seem to be the latest SARS-CoV accommodation.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: ን ናይ SARS-CoV ተፈጥሮኣዊ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ንምርካብ ኣብ ዝግበሩ ተኸታተልቲ ኣለሻታት፣ ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ናይ ፈረስ ጫማ ለዃዂቶታት ዝርከብ፣ SARS-ዝዛመዱ ርሂኖሎፈስ ለዃዂቶታት CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3) ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ፣ ቀረባ ዝምድና ዘለዎ ናይ ለዃዂቶ CoV ገሊጾም እዮም።
en-mt: In a series of search for sars-CoV natural animal accommodation, sarsm-Rhinologus, which is located in Chinese horse shoes, describes SARSR-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3).

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: እዞም ለዃኺቶታት ንናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV ኣንቲቦዲታትን ናይ ጄኖም ተኸታታሊ SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 ፖዚቲቭ እዮም።
en-mt: These infections are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence SARSR-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: እዚን ካልኦት ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ምስ SARS-CoV 88-92% ዝመሳሰል ናይ ኒክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ኣካላዊ ተመሳሳሊነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: hese and other neclotides have a physical similarity to SARS-CoV 88-92%.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: እዞም መጽናዕቲታት ለዃኺቶታት ኣብ ምምጻእ ዝርከቡ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ባእታት ከሕድሩ ከምዝኽእሉ ዘርኢ ሓድሽ ሓሳብ መሰረት ኣንቢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: hese studies have laid the foundation for a new idea that can cause disease in humans.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ብዙሓት SARS ዝመስሉ CoVs (SL-CoVs) ካብ ለኻኺቶታት ተለልዮም ክርከቡ ኺኢሎም እዮም፣ እንተኾነ ግን ካብዚእቶም ብዘይካ ሓደ WIV1 ዝተባህለ እንተዘይኮይኑ ካልእ ብህይወቱ ፈሊኻ ክውሰድ ዝተኻለ የለን።
en-mt: In addition, many SARS-like CoVs have been isolated from infections, but none of them can be taken alive except one named WIV1.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ናይ ደቂ ሰብ ኣንጂዮቴንሲን ቀያሪ ኤንዛይም 2 (ACE2) ናይ SARS-CoV ተቐባሊ ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እዩ።
en-mt: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known as the SARS-CoV receptor.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: ካብ ናይ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ ሰገራ ናሙና ዝተወስደ WIV1፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ፣ ዝባድን ወዲሰብን ACE2 ከም ናይ ዋህዮ መእተዊ ተቐበልቲ ከምዝጥቀም ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: WIV1, taken from a sample of infected cells, has been shown to use ACE2 as cell entry receptors.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: ብዝገርም መንገዲ፣ ካብ SARS ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ዝተረኽበ ደም (ሴራ) ን WIV1 ከጥፍእዎ ክኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Surprisingly, blood from SARS-recovered patients was able to destroy WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: ክሳብ እዚ እዋን፣ WIV1 እቲ ኣዚዩ ዝቐረበ ዝምድና ዘለዎ ናይ ለኻኺቶ SARS-CoV ኣበው ክውክል ከሎ፣ 95% ናይ ኒዩክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: O date, WIV1 represents the closest associated SARS-CoV father, with 95% of the neclotide similarities.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ እዞም ክልተ ቫይረሳት ልዑል ምምስሳል ዋላ እንተሃለወ፣ WIV1 ናይ SARS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወላዲ ቫይረስ ከምዘይኮነ ብሓፈሽኡ ይእመን ከምኡ ድማ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወለዶ/ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዓ መሕደርቲ ኣይኮናን።
en-mt: Despite significant similarities between these two viruses, IT is generally believed that WIV1 is not the primary parent of the SARS-CoV virus, nor is it generally believed that SARS-CoV vaccines are not the first-generation/direct carriers of the disease.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: ናይ ወለዶታት ዘገምታዊ ለውጢ ዝምድናታት (Phylogenetic) ትንተና ን MERS-CoV ምስ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU4 ን ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU5 ጉጅለ ይምድቦ።
en-mt: Generational Slow Changes Relationships (Phylogenetic) analysis assigns MERS-CoV to the Senter CoV-HKU4 group.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU4ን MERS-CoVን ናብ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ዝኣትወሉ፣ dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) ዝበሃል ሓደ ዓይነት መቐበሊ (receptor) ይጥቀሙ።
en-mt: CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV use the same receptor called dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4).

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: ናይ MERS-CoV ናይ RNA-dependent RNA polymerase ኣሰራርዓ ምስ ኣብ ኣፍሪካን ኣውሮፓን ዝርከቡ ናይ ለኻኺቶ beta-CoVs ዘሎ ናይ ወለዶታት ዘገምታዊ ለውጢ ዝምድናታት (phylogenetic) ምምስሳል ኣለዎም።
en-mt: he MERS-CoV RNA dependent RNA polymerase system is similar to phylogenetic changes in generational beta-CoVs in Africa and Europe.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ ኣብ ናይ በረኻ ለዃኺቶታት ዋላ ሓደ MERS-CoV ብህይወት ክርከብ ኣይከኣለን።
en-mt: So far, no MERS-CoV has been found alive in the desert.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MERS-CoV ን እቲ ናይ ቀረባ ዘመዱ ዝኾነ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU25 ን 87% ጥራይ ናይ ኒክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: MerS-CoV and only 87% of nicklotides are similar to those of a close relative.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ስለዚ፣ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ MERS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወለዶ/ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዓ መሕደርቲ ክኾና ይኽእላ እየን።
en-mt: As a result, mers-CoV's first-generation patients can be directly affected by the disease.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: በቲ ካልእ ወገን፣ ኣብ ማእኸላዊ ምብራቕ ዝተኻየዱ መጽናዕቲታት፣ ናይ ኣዕራብ/ሶማል ኣግማል (dromedary camels) ልክዕ ከምቶም መበቆሎም ካብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ሓያለ ናይ ኣፍሪካ ሃገራት ዝርከቡ ኣግማል፣ ን MERS-CoV ብፉሉይ ዘምክኑ ኣንቲቦዲታት ከምዝተረኽቦም (ሴሮፖዚቲቭ ከምዝኾኑ) ኣርእዮሞ እዮም።
en-mt: On the other hand, studies in the Middle East have shown that Western/Somali camels, like camels originally from the Middle East, have been found to be cerobolic antibodies for MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ምስ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ዝተረኸበ ቫይረስ ሓደ ዓይነት ዝኾነ ሂወታዊ MERS-CoV ካብ ናይ ኣዕራብ/ሶማል ኣግማል ኣፍንጫ ንምርመራ ዝተወስዱ ቫይረስ (nasal swabs) ተለልዩ ክርከብ ተኻኢሉ ክኸውን ከሎ፤ እዚ ድማ ኣግማል ከም ናይ MERS-CoV ሓቀኛ በቲ ቫይረስ ዘይጥቅዑ መሕደርቲ ኮይኖም ከምዘገልግሉ ዘመልክት'ዩ።
en-mt: Any type of live MERS-CoV with the human virus has been detected from nasal swabs taken from the Arab/Somali nostrils, indicating that camels serve as mers-CoV real non-virus dwellings.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ ንፈተነ ብ MERS-CoV ዝተለኸፉ ኣግማል ብሓፈሻ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ምስ ጽዑቕ ናይ ቫይረስ ስርጭት ከምዝተረኣየ ምግላጽ እውን ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: It is also important to note that in the case of mers-CoV-infected camels, generally mild symptoms with intensive viral transmission have been observed.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: ብግልጺ፣ ዝተለኸፉ ኣግማል ነቲ ቫይረስ ብ ናይ መተንፈሲ መንገዲ ጥራሕ ዘይኮነስ ብካብ መቐመጫ-ናብ-ኣፍ መንገዲ እውን የመሓላልፍዎ እዮም፣ እዚ ድማ ለኻኺቶታት ነዚ ቫይረስ ዘላባዓሉ ዋና መገደን እዩ።
en-mt: Clearly, infected camels not only transmit the virus through respiratory routes, but also from seat to mouth, which is the main way for infected people to spread the virus.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፣ ብዙሓት ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ MERS ሕሙማት ቅድሚ ስሚዒታት ሕማም ምኽሳቱ ምስ ኣግማል ናይ ምንኽካእ ታሪኽ ዘይብሎም ብምዃኑ፣ ሕዚ'ውን ሕቶታት ይሃልዉ ድኣምበር፣ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ምምሕልላፋት ውይድማ ን MERS-CoV ዝሽከሙ ዘይተፈልጡ ናይ እንስታታት ዓሌት ዘለውዎ ዘይተፈልጠ ናይ ምምሕልልፋ መስመር ክህሉ ይኽእል እዩ ዝብል ከም ክውንነታዊ ዝኾነ ውሁብ ምኽንያት ይውሰድ።
en-mt: However, since many confirmed MERS patients do not have a history of contact with camels before feeling sick, there are still questions, and there may be an unknown line of transmission from person to person, or an unknown line of livestock carrying MERS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ካብ ራይኖለፈስ ኣፊንስ ለኻኺቶታት ዝተወሰደ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV RaTG13 96.2% ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has a leukulato coV RaTG13 96.2% niculothide similarity to that taken from rhineophilus affines.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: ከምቲ ኣብ ናይ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV ዘሎ ኩነታት፣ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ከምኡ'ውን RaTG13 ዘሎ ናይ ኣሰራርዓ ፍልልይ ስፍሓት (sequence divergence) ብጣዕሚ ገፊሕ ብምዃኑ ናይ ወላዲን-ውሉድን ዝምድና ኣለዎም ክትብል ዘኽእል ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is so widespread that it is not possible to say that parent-child relationships are very widespread.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: እዚ ማለት፣ ኣብ መጻኢ ዳርጋ ሓደ ዓይነት ዝኾኑ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs እንተዘይተረኺቦም፣ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይልከፋ መሕደርቲ ዘይክኾና ይኽእላ እየን።
en-mt: his means that if almost the same coVs are not detected in the future, SARS-CoV-2 vaccines may not be directly infected.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: እቶም ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ሞንጎኛ መዕቆብቲ እንስታታት ምናልባት ካብቶም ኣብ ሁናን ዝርከብ ናይ ጅምላ ዕዳጋ ዝተሸጡን ዝተሓርዱን ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌት እንስሳታት ዘገዳም ክኾኑ ኣለዎም፤ ብዙሓት ካብቶም ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ምስዚ ዕዳጋ ዝተኣሳስሩ እዮም፣ እዚ ድማ ካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ ዝተመሓላለፈሉ ኣጋጣሚ ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ዘመልክት'ዩ።
en-mt: he SARS-CoV-2 intermediary shelters must be from a variety of wildlife that were sold and slaughtered at the Hunan mass market, and many of the first COVID-19 patients were linked to the market, indicating that it could be an opportunity for transmission from animal to human.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣብ ቀረባ ግዘ ዝተገበሩ ኣብ ሜታጂኖሚካዊ ኣሰራርዓ (beta-CoVs) ዝተመርኮሱ መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእይዎ፣ ሓደ ጽንተት ዘንጸላልዎ ዘሎ ማንጎሊንስ [pangolins (Manis javanica)] ዝበሃል ጉጅለ ንኣሽቶ መጥበውቲ እንስታታት ን ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝዛመድ ኣበው beta-CoVs ከጸግዕ ይኽእል'ዩ።
en-mt: A number of recent studies based on meta-CoVs have shown that a group called mangolins (Manis javanica) can infect small mammals and beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: እዞም ሓደሽቲ ናይ ፓንጎሊን CoV ጂኖማት ምስ SARS-CoV-2 85-92% ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: These new pangolin CoV genomes have similarities to SARS-CoV-2, 85-92% of neculotide patterns.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: ነገር ግን፣ ንሳቶም'ውን ብደረጃ ናይ ኑክሊዮታይድ ኣሰራርዓ 90% ምምሳል (identity) ብምርኣይ ምስ RaTG13 ብማዕረ ናይ ቀረባ ዝምድና ኣለዎም።
en-mt: However, they also have a close relationship with RaTG13, looking at 90% of the nucleotide patterns.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: ንሳቶም ኣብቲ ናይ ወለዶታት ሓረግ (phylogenetic tree) ናብ ክልተ ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝመስሉ ንኡሳን-ሓረጋት ወለዶ ዝጉጀሉ ክኾኑ ከለዉ፣ ሓደ ካብእቶም ድማ 97.4% ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ብምርኣይ፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝያዳ ተመሳሳሊ ሪሰፕተር ባይንዲንግ ዶሜይን [receptor binding domain (RBD)] ኣለዎ።
en-mt: They are divided into two sars-CoV-2-like sub-phrases in the genealogy of the phylogenetic tree, one of which has 97.4% of the amino acid equations, with a more similar receptor binding domain to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: ኣብ ክቱር ንጽጽር፣ ዋላ ልዑል ዲግሪ ናይ ጄኖም ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት(sequence homology) ይሃልዎም፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ን RaTG13 ን RBD ታት ፍልልዮም እናገፍሐ ዝኸዱ እዮም።
en-mt: In extreme comparisons, they have even high degrees of genome patterns of similarities; SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 and RBDs are widening.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ኣቐዲሙ ኣብ ዝሓመሙ ፓንጎሊናት ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ እውን ካብ ናይ ሳንቡእ ናሙና viral contig ምርካቡ ጸብጺቡ እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሳሳልነት ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: Earlier studies on sick pangolinees also reported the discovery of a viral contig from a lung sample, a similarity to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: እዚ መጽናዕቲ ዝተፈላለዩ መተኣኻኸቢ መንገድታን ኣመራርፃን ብምጥቃም ክፋል ናይ'ቲ ጀኖም ሲክወንስ ፈጢሩ። እዚ ድማ 86.3% ናይቲ ሙሉእ ቁመት ናይቲ ቫይረስ ጀኖም ይዉንን።
en-mt: Using a variety of connective paths and leads, the study created part of the syndrome genome, which makes up 86.3% of the full height of the virus genome.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ፓንጎሊን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መንጎኛ ናይ እንስሳ መዕቖቢ ናይ ምዃን ዕድል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Pangolin has the chance to become an intermediary of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ኣብ'ዚ ሕዚ እዋን ብምኽንያት ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን ፓንጎሊን ምስ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዙ ቤታ-CoVs ዘሎ ናይ ኣሰራርዓ/ሲክወንስ ፍልልይ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ብቐጥታ ካብ ፓንጎሊን ከምዝመጸ ዝነግር መረዳእታ የለን።
en-mt: However, due to the current difference between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV-2 comes directly from pangolin.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ሞንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን RaTG13 ዘሎ ርሕቐት ካብ ኣብ ሞንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን ምስ ናይ ፓንጎሊን SARS-CoV-2-ዝመሳሰል beta-CoVsን ይሓጽር።
en-mt: It also shortens the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 than between SARS-CoV-2 and beta-CoVs similar to pangolin SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ለኻኺቶን ፓንጎሊናትን ካልኦት መጥበውቲን ኢቮልሽናዊ መገዱ ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: he evocative effects of SARS-CoV-2 in the infected pancreas and other mammals are not yet known.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ሲክወንስ ተመሳሳልነት ድማ ኣብ RBD ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን ፓንግልዮንን ዝተረኸበ ኮይኑ፣ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ ቤታ-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 ን RaTG13 ን ድማ ልዑል ናይ መላእ ጄኖም ኣሰራርዓ/ሲክወንስ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: The highest syqueens similarity was found in RBD between SARS-CoV-2 and Panglyon, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 and high all-genome pattern/siquiens similarities.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ፓንጎሊ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ beta-CoVs RBD ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ዘሎ ልዑል ምምስሳል፣ብ selectivity-mediated (ተመሪጹ-ዝመሓላለፍ) convergent evolution (እናጸበበ ዝኸድ ዝግመታዊ ለውጢ) ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: High similarities in pangoly SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs RBD and SARS-CoV-2 are caused by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ፓንግሊዮን ምስ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ beta-CoV ን RaTG13 ን ኣብ ሳልሳይ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ዓሌት recombination(ጀነቲካዊ ምድቓል) ንክካየድ ካለእ ሓሳብ የድሊ እዩ።
en-mt: There is a need for other ideas to beta-CoV-related beta-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 n in the third wildlife species recombination.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: ከም ናይ ግምታዊ ለውጢ(evolution) ዝገንሕ ሓይሊ፣ ምድቓል ናይ ቤታ-CoVs ተስፋሕፊሑ።
en-mt: Like a hypothetical force of evolution; the spread of beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቀጥታዊ ዙኖቲካዊ መበቆል ገና ኣይተፈልጠን።
en-mt: The direct zonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 is still unknown.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: ካብቲ ልዑል ናይ ሕምም ናይ ምሳዓብ ክእለት ዘለዎ HcoVs ብተወሳኺ፣ ናይ HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 ን HCoV-HKU1 ን ዙኖቲክ መበቆሎም መጽናዕቲ ተገይርሎም እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to hcoVs with high patient lunchability, HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 and Zonotic origins were studied.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: ፋይሎጀኒቲካዊ መረዳእታ HCoV-NL63 ን HCoV-229E ን ካብ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs መጽዮም ከምዝኾኑ የርኢ፣ ናይ HCoV-OC43 ን HCoV-HKU1 ን ድማ ካብ ኣናጹ እዮም መጽዮም።
en-mt: Filogenic data show that HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E came from lepros covs, while HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 came from the herds.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካዊ- ሰለስተ ዝሕብሩ ለኻኺቶ ዝተረኽበ ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) ዝተባህለ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV ምስ HCoV-NL63 ምምስሳል ከምዘለዎ ይሕበር።
en-mt: ArCoV.2 , an appalachian Ridge CoV found in North American - three-colored cov, is said to be similar to HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: ብኻልእ ወገን፣ HCoV-229E ምስ ካልእ Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008 ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ፣ ኣብ ጋና ዝተረኸበ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV ጀነቲካዊ ምትሕሓዝ ዝነበሮ እዩ፣ ኣግማል ድማ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ክኾና ይኽእላ እየን ዝብል ጥርጣረ ኣሎ።
en-mt: HCoV-229E, known as Another Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, was genetically linked to lexical CoV found in Ghana, and it is suspected that camels could be intermediaries.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: ንንጹር መግለጺ፣ ናይ HCoVs ናይ እንስሳ መበቆሉ ክሳብ ሕዚ ዘሎ ፍልጠት ኣብ ስእሊ 1ን ሰንጠረዥ 2 ይርክብ።
en-mt: For a specific explanation, the origin of HCoVs is found in Figure 1 and Table 2.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: ፋይሎጀነቲክ ትንተና ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ብዛዕባ ዘሎ ናይ HCoVs ናይ ምምሕልላፍ መረዳእታታት ኣብ ታሪክ ከምዘሎ ይሕብር።
en-mt: A filogenetic analysis suggests that there is a history of intergeneresal transmission of HCoVs.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: HCoV-OC43 ካብ እንስሳ ዘቤት ሓሊፉ ንወድሰብ ከጥቅዕ ምስጀመረ ኣብ 1890 ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ለበዳ ተኸሲቱ።
en-mt: In 1890, when HCoV-OC43 began to attack humans, a respiratory infection was reported.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: ታሪኽ ናይ ኣብ ሞንጎ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት እንስሳ ናይ HCoV-229E ምምሕልላፍ ንጹር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: The history of the transmission of HCoV-229E between different animal species is unclear.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: ናይ ሎዃኺቶ alpha-CoVs ምስ HCoV-229E ዝለዓለ ምምስሳል ሃሊዎም ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Lococtom alpha-CoVs have been found to be more similar to HCoV-229E.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎኦም alpaca alpha-CoV ኣሎ።
en-mt: Among them is alpaca alpha-CoV.
