sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ብቐጥታ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ናብ ሰባት ከምዝትሓላለፍ መረዳእታት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: It is believed that the virus spreads directly from the infected to the people.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: ቅድሚ ኣልፓካስ፣ ሰባት ምስ ለኻኺቶ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ናይ ስነ ምህዳር ሰፈር ምትንኽኻፍ ነይርዎም።
en-mt: Efore the alpacas, people had to touch the same ecosystem when they infected them.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: ኣብ ክንድኡ፣ ሰባት ምስ ኣልፔካታት ቀረባ ርክብ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Instead, people are closely related to the alpecas.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ ምስ HCoV-229E-ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ለኻኺቶ alpha-CoVs ኣብ ለኻኺቶ ፍሉያትን ሕማም ዘየስዕቡን እዮም፣ ይኹን ደኣምበር alpaca alpha-CoV ኣብ ዝተለኸፉ እንስሳት ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ሕማም ለበዳ የስዕብ እዩ።
en-mt: Second, HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoVs are specific and do not cause disease in the infected animals, but alpaca alpha-CoV causes an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ alpaca alpha-CoV ኣብ ኣራዊት እንስሳት ኣይተረኸበን።
en-mt: Alpha-CoV has not been found in wildlife.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ድማ፣ ኣልፔካታት ነዚ ምስ HCoV-229E-ዝተተሓሓዘ alpha-CoV ካብ ደቂ ሰባት ሓሊፍዎም ክኸውን እውን ይኽእል እዩ ዝብል ሓሳብ ክንጸግ ኣይክእልን።
en-mt: herefore, it is unlikely that the alpecatas may have passed away from humans with HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: ብሓቂ፣ ለዃኺቶታት ናይ ሰባት ሕማም መምጽኢ ቫይረሳት ቀጥተኛ ምንጪታት እዮም ከም ራቢስ ቫይረስ፣ ኢቦላ ቫይረስ፣ ኒፋ ቫይረስን ሄንድራ ቫይረስን ሓዊስካ።
en-mt: In fact, infectious diseases are direct sources of human diseases such as rabies virus, Ebola virus, nifa virus and hendra virus.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: በዚ ድማ ለዃኺቶታት HCoV-229E ብቐጥታ ናብ ሰባት ከመሓላልፋ ምኽኣለን ዘገርም ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: It's no surprise that HCoV-229E can be transmitted directly to humans.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ዋላ'ኳ ናይ ለኻኺቶ alpha-CoVs ናይ HCoV-229E ምጸገዕቲ እንተኾኑ ከም ኣልፓካስን ናይ ዓረብ ገመልን ዝኣመሰሉ እንስሳት MERS-CoV ከመሓላልፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Although leprosy alpha-CoVs are hCoV-229E, animals such as alpacas and Arab camels can transmit MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: MERS-CoV ከም ብሉጽ ኣብነት ናይ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምምሕልላፍ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ናብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ከምኡ'ውን ካብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ናብ ሰባት ክውሰድ ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: MERS-CoV can be taken as an excellent example of inter-ethnic transmission from lechito to dromedar camels and from dromedare camels to humans.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: ናይ MERS-CoV መበቆላዊ ኣመጻጽኣ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ምዃኑ ካብ ፋልማይ ዝተለለየሉ ግዘ ኣትሒዙ ዝፍለጥ ኮይኑ፣ እዚ ከኣ ድሒሮም ዝተረኽቡ መረዳእታታት እናተጠናኸረ መጽዩ።
en-mt: he origin of MERS-CoV has been known since the first time it was detected, which has been reinforced by later evidence.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: ለኻኺቶታት ን ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ዝግበር ናይ ጀነቲካዊ ባእታታት ልውውጥን፣ ምምሕልላፍትን፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ቫይረሳት ዓሌታት ሒዞም ከምዝርከቡ ግልጺ እዩ።

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: ለኻኺቶ ናይ'ዚ ቫይረስ ቀንዲ መመሓላለፊ ዝኾነሉ ምኽንያት ነዊሕ ዕድመ፣ ጽዑቕ መንበሪ፣ ምቅርራብን ናይ ምብራር ዓቕምን ስለዘለዎ እዩ።

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ እንስሳታት ናብ ሰባት ምምሕልላፍ መገድታት ኣብ ቐጻሊ ምርምራት ክትንተኑ ትጽቢት ይግበር።

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: መጀመርያ፣ ለኻኺቶ ምስ ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝመስል ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝዛመድ ቫይረስን መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ከገልግል ይኽእል እዩ።

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ ፓንጎሊን ዝተብሃለ እንስሳ ካብቶም ናይቲ ቫይረስ ዓቕሚ ዘጉልሑ ናይ ማእኸላይ ቫይረስ ተሸከምቲ እንሳታት ሓደ ብምዃኑ ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝመስል ቫይረስ ተረኺብዎ።
en-mt: In addition, pangolin was found to be one of the medium-virus carry animals that highlighted the capacity of the virus, which mimics SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ሰባት ስጋ ኣብ ዝሓርድሉን ዝበልዕሉን ግዘ እዩ ዝሓልፎም።
en-mt: he virus spreads to people who eat and eat meat.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ዘቤታውያን እንስሳት ሓዊስካ ብዙሓት መጥወብቲ እንስሳት ን SARS-CoV-2 ተቓላዕቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተጠቐሰ፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምትሕውዋስን(recombination) ምልማድን ኣብ ሳልሳይ ዓሌት ዝተፈጠረ ክኸውን ይኽእል፣ ማለት ምስ ክልኢቶም ለኻኺቶን ፓንጎሊንን ርክብ እንተነይርዎ።
en-mt: Third, as mentioned above, SARS-CoV-2 interactions and recombination may have been caused by a third strain, namely, if they had contact with the two leprosy and pangolin.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መበቆል እንስሳ ምድላይ ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣብ መስርሕ ይርከብ።
en-mt: The search for the origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still underway.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: ካብ እዞም ዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነታት ናይ እንስሳ መዕቖቢ፣ CoVs ናብ ካልእ ዓሌት ንከይሰግር ንምግዳብ ሰለስተ ዓበይቲ ሜላታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are three major methods to prevent CoVs from migrating from these different types of animal shelters to another species.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: ቅድሚ ኹሉ፣ ኣብ RNA ምርባሕ(replication) ዘለዎም ልዑል ናይ ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutation) ንጽጽራዊ መጠን።
en-mt: First of all, the relative amount of high genetic mutations (mutation) in RNA reproduction.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: ምስ ካልኦት ንጽል ገመድ ዘለዎም(single stranded) RNA ቫይረሳት ክወዳደር ከሎ፣ ናይ CoVs ምልዋወጥ መጠን(mutation rate) ካብ ማእኸላይ ክሳብ ዝለዓለ ከምዝኾነ ይሕሰብ። ኣብ ሳይት 2 ብኣቨሬጅ ኣብ ዓመት ~10-4 ናይ ምትካእ ፍጥነት ኣለዎ፣ ነዚ ድማ CoV ምስ'ቲ ሓድሽ ተሸካማይ ዘለዎ ምልምማድ ይዉስኖ።
en-mt: Compared to other single stranded RNA viruses, coVs exchange rates are thought to be medium to high. On Site 2, Average has the rate of replacing ~10-4 per year, which CoV determines with its adaption with the new carry.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: CoVs proof-reading exoribonuclease ኣለዎም። ናይዚ ምጥፋእ ድማ ዝለዓለ ምልማድን ምቅይያርን ዋላ'ውን ሞት የስዕብ።
en-mt: CoVs have proof-reading exoribonuclease, and this loss leads to greater adaptability and change, even death.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: እቲ ረምዲስቪር(Remdesivir) ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ኣናሎግ ንኢክዞራይቦኒዩክሊዝን (exoribonuclease) ናይ RNA ጽግዕተኛ RNA ፖሊመሬዝን(RNA-dependent RNA polymerase) ደው ብምባል ምርባሕ CoVs ይከላኸል።
en-mt: The neculotide anabolic anabolic, called Remdesivir, prevents covs reproduction by stopping IRA-dependent RNA polymerase.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: ካብ'ቶም ኣብ ክሊንካዊ መጽናዕቲ ዘለዉ ጸረ SARS-CoV-2 መድሃኒታት፣ እቲ ዝለዓለ ተስፋ ዘለዎ Remdesivir እዩ።
en-mt: Of the anti-SARS-CoV-2 drugs in clinical studies, remdesivir is the most promising.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: እንተኾነ እውን፣ ናይ CoVs መጥነ ምልውዋጥ(mutation rate) ልዕሊ ናይ መሕደሪታቶም ብሚልዮናት ይበልጹ።
en-mt: Even so, the exchange rate of CoVs exceeds their accommodations by millions.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ምስ መጸገዕቲ ዘይምልማድ ኣብዝህሉ ግዘ፣ CoVs ልዑል መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ይህልዎም።
en-mt: In addition, in the absence of uncertainty, coVs have a high rate of exchange.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: ምስ ልዑል መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ዘለዎ SARS-CoV ምስዝወዳደር፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ትሑት እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ልዑል ምስ ሰባት ናይ ምልማድ ዓቅሚ ከመዘለዎ የርኢ።
en-mt: Compared to a high-rate SARS-CoV, the SARS-CoV-2 ratio is low, showing that it has a high ability to communicate with humans.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: ምናልባት ናብ ሰባት ካብ ምስ ሰባት ምቅርራብ ዘለዎም እንስሳት ቀዲሙ ተመሓላሊፉ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: It may be transmitted to humans more than humans.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoV-2፣ እዚ እንኮላይ ን MERS-CoV እውን ይምልከት። MERS-CoV ምስ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ብጽቡቕ ዝተላመደ እዩ።
en-mt: Like SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: ብዓይኒ ስነ ሓሳብ ብምራእ፣ እቲ ናይ ጀነቲክስ ኣፈላላይ ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝስራሕ ክታበት ወይ ድማ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ዘይዉጽኢታዊ ኣይገብሮን።
en-mt: From a theoretical point of view, the genetic variant does not make sars-CoV-2 vaccines or anti-virus drugs ineffective.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ እቲ ኣብ CoVs ዘሎ ዓብዪ ናይ RNA ጄኖም፣ ኣብ ንጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutations)ንጀነቲካዊ ምድቓል(recombination) ዝግበሩ ናይ ጄኖም ምምሕያሻት ተወሳኺ ተለጣጢነት ብምስዓብ፣ በዚ ድማ ዕድል ናይ ካብ ዓሌት ናብ ዓሌት ዝግበር ሓባራዊ ለውጢ(evolution) ይውስኽ፣ ኩነታት ኣብ ዝጥዕሙሉ እቲ ሓድሽ CoVs ንኽምዕብል ድማ ይጥዕሞ።
en-mt: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs; by following additional flexibility in genetic modifications to genetic modifications, thus increasing the chances of racial-to-race collective change; and benefiting from the development of the new CoVs when conditions are tasted.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ 3’ ጫፍ ናይቲ ጄኖም ዝተቐመጡ ብዙሓት ፈለምቲ ናይ ንባብ ሳንዱቕ(reading frames)ን ስራሕ ፕሮቲንን ዝድግፍዎ ሓቂ እዩ።
en-mt: This is a fact that many pioneers who sit at the end of the 3' genome support reading frames and protein work.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: ሳልሳይ ድማ ኣብ እዋን ምርባሕ RNA፣ CoVs ሃንደበታውን ብብዝሕን ቅርጾምን ቦትኦምን ይቕይሩ።
en-mt: hirdly, during the breeding of RNA, CoVs suddenly change their shape and position.

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: ኣብ'ቲ መተሓዋወሲ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል መዕቖቢ እንስሳ፣ ኣብ እዋን CoV RNA ትራንስክሪፕሽን ናይ ስትራንድ ምቅይያር ብተደጋጋሚ ይፍጠር እዩ።
en-mt: In the zoo, a change in the strand occurs repeatedly during cov RNA transcription.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: ብጣዕሚ ዝመሳሰሉ ሙሉእ ቁመትን ሳብጀኖሚክን ዝኾኑ RNA ተጣሚሮም ሓድሽ CoVs ይፈጥሩ።
en-mt: RNA of the same height and depth are combined to create new covs.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: ኣብ HCoV-HKU1ን HCoV-OC43ን ከምኡ'ዉን ኣብ ከም ለኻኺቶ SL-CoV and ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU9 ዝኣመሰሉ ንእንስሳ ዘጥቅዑ CoVs ቫይረሳት ናይ ተፈጥራዊ ሪኮምብኔሽን ፋይሎጀነቲክስ መረዳእታ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: Data on natural reconnaissance phylogenetics has been found in HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43 and in animal-affected CoV viruses such as SL-CoV and Leekito CoV-HKU9.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ መዕቖብን ቫይረስን ዘሎ ርክብ ምስ ተመሓላለፍነት ክነጻጸር ከሎ
en-mt: he relationship between the virus and the virus compared to the transmission

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ ናይ'ቶም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተጠቐሱ ሰለስተ ናይ ቫይረስ ረቛሒታት፣ እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ ናይ መሕደሪኡ ተቐበልቲ ዘለዎ ርክብ ንመንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነቱ ዝውስን ዓቢ ረቛሒ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the three factors mentioned above, the virus's relationship with its hostel receptors is a major factor that determines its racial transmission.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV ጥምረት ከም ኣብነት ምዉሳድ ይከኣል እዩ። እዚ ድማ ኣብ እዋን መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነት ኣወንታዊ ምርጫ ከምዝካየድ የረድእ።
en-mt: The SARS-CoV coalition can be taken as an example, which explains that positive choices are made during inter-racial transmission.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ሰባትን ዝባድን SARS-CoVsዝተገበረ ንጽጽር , SARS-CoV ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ መሕደሪታት ብቐሊሉ ከምዝለማመድ ኣርእዩ፣ ብፍላይ ናይ RBD ናይ S ፕሮቲን ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ (mutations) ብምጥቃም።
en-mt: Comparisons between humans and bedding SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoVs showed that they are easily practiced in different hostels, specifically using RBD S protein genetic mutations.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ፣ ኣብ ናይ CoV S ፕሮቲን ዘሎ RBD ምስ እቲ ዋህዮኣዊ ተቐባሊ ይራኸብ እዩ፣ በቲ ናይ እቲ መሕደሪኡ ኣንቲቦዲ ምላሽ ድማ እዩ ዝምረጽ።
en-mt: Generally, the RBD in the CoV S protein interacts with the cell receptor and is chosen by the host's antibody response.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: ኣብ SARS-CoV፣ RBD ኣብ መበል 318 ክሳብ 510 ኣሚኖኣሲድ ኣብ S1 ፍራግመንት እዩ ዝርከብ፣ ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ን ተሓባበርቲ ተቐበልቱን ብምጥባቕ ድማ ንምእታው ቫይረስ ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: In SARS-CoV, RBD is located in the S1 fragment at the 318th to 510th aminoacide, and it helps in viral entry by connecting to people's ACE2 and its co-receptors.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: እቲ ናይ SARS-CoV ዝኾነ RBD፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ፣ ዝባድ፣ ኣንጭዋን ራኩንን ከልቢን ዘጠቓልል ዝተፈላለዩ እንስሳት ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ናይ ምፍላጥ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎ፣ እዚ ድማ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምምሕልላፍ ዘፍቅድ እዩ።
en-mt: he RBD of SARS-CoV has the potential to detect ACE2 receptors of a variety of animals, including leprosy, bugs, rats and dog, which allows inter-racial transmission.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ብርግጽ ኣብ'ቲ RBD ናይ ካብ ሰባትን ዝባድን ዝተወስዱ ቫይረሳትን፣ 6 ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ጽራር(residue) ፍልልያት ጥራሕ ከምዘለዎ ተራእዩ፣ እቶም 4 ድማ ምስ ናይ ACE2 ተቐባሊ ዘራኽብ ሰፈር እዮም ዝርከቡ።
en-mt: Of course, in the RBD of viruses taken from humans and plants; 6 residue differences have been observed, and 4 are located in a camp that connects to the ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ናይ ዝባድ SARS-CoV K479N ን S487T ን ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutations) ኣብ RBD ኣለዎ፣ እዞም ስፓይክ ፕሮቲናት ምስ ናይ ሰብ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ናይ ምትእትታው ዓቕሙ ልዑል ክገብሮ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The Bad SARS-CoV K479N and S487T have genetic mutations in RBD, which can make these spike proteins highly susceptible to implants with human ACE2 receptors.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: ብካልእ ኣበሃህላ፣ እዞም ክልተ ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ተተካእቲ ናይ'ቲ ቫይረስ ምስ ሰባት ዘለዎ ተለማማድነት ወሰንቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: On the other hand, these two amino acid replacements may be crucial for the virus's effectiveness with humans.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoVs-2 ምስ SARS-CoV ሓደ ዓይነት ናይ ዋህዮ ተቐባሊ ከምዘለዎም ትኹረት ክወሃቦ ይግባእ።
en-mt: It should be noted that SARS-CoVs-2 have the same cell receptor as SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: ኣብ S1 ዩኒት ናይ S ፕሮቲን ናይ 30% ፍልልይ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን SARS-CoV ን ዘሎ፣ S ፕሮቲኑ ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ናይ ምትሕሓዝ ዓቕሙ ከምዝልውጦ የርኢ።
en-mt: A 30% difference in S1 units of S protein between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV shows that S protein exchanges its ability to interact with people's ACE2.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: ኣብ cryo-EM ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ኣብ ሰባት ዝርከብ ACE2ን ናይ SARS-CoV S ፕሮቲን ዘለዎ ጥምረት ብ10 ክሳብ 20 ዕጽፊ ይልዕል።
en-mt: A study in cryo-EM found that a combination of ace2 and SARS-CoV S protein in humans was 10 to 20 times higher.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ንኽመሓላለፍ ካልእ ተወሳኺ ተቐባሊ ዘድሊ ምዃኑ እዉን ክነረጋግጽ ይግባእ።
en-mt: It is necessary to ensure that additional receptors are required to transmit SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: ብዘገርም ኩነታት፣ HCoV-NL63 ብዝተፈለየ ናይ S ክፋል ምስ ACE2 እውን ይተሓሓዝ እዩ።
en-mt: Surprisingly, HCoV-NL63, separately, s part is also associated with ACE2.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ HCoV ተቐበልቲ ኣለዉ ከም ኣሚኖፔፕቲዴዝ ኤን ን HCoV-229E ከምኡ ድማ 9-O-acetylated sialic acid ን HCoV-OC43።
en-mt: There are many HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptides N and HCoV-229E and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ እንስሳት ናብ ደቂ ሰባት ዝሓልፉ CoVs ዕዉት ምልማድ ክህልዎም ይኽእል።
en-mt: CoVs that pass from different animals to humans can be successful.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ዋህዮ ተቐበልቲ ብተወሳኺ፣ ካልኦት ናይ መዕቖቢ ጽግዕተኝነትን እገዳን ረቛሒታትንውጽኢታውነት ናይ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነት ናይ HcoVs ይጸልውዎ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition to cell receptors, other safety, restrictions and restrictions affect the effectiveness of inter-racial transmission of HcoVs.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን ተፈጥሮኣዊ መዕቖቢታት ናይ HCoVs ከም ለኻኺቶታት፣ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማልን ኣናጹን ዘሎ ናይ መዕቖቢ ፕሮቲን ፍልልያት፣ ንመንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምትሕልላፍ ዕንቅፋት ክኾኖ ይኽእል እዩ።

en-mt: CoVs are organisms that do not cause disease or cause mild symptoms that live in the area of the camel and the camel.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: ሓያል ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ እንተዘየለ ብቕልጡፍ ይራብሑ::
en-mt: If there is no strong immune system, they grow rapidly.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ግን ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ንምንታይ ኣልዉን ኣብ ሰባት ድማ ንምንታይ ከቢድ ረኽሲ ይፈጥር ኣሎን ንዝብሉ ምስጢራት መፍቲሒኦም ኣብ'ዚ ይርከብ።
en-mt: here are secrets to why people who are infected and why they cause serious infections.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: ጠንቂ መነገሲ ናይ'ዞም ከበድቲ ምልክታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ብሰንኪ ናይ ስርዓተ-ምክልኻል ሕማም ልዕሊ ዓቐን ምንቕቓሕን ዝስዕብ ናይ ሳይቶካይን ማዕበል እዩ፣ በዚ ድማ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ጥንኩር ኣብ ዝኾኑሉ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣት ከቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: he cause of these severe symptoms is usually caused by the immune system's overaction and cytocaic waves, which can be severe when immunity is strong.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: ብተጸራሪ ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ተሸከምቲ እቲ ቫይረስ፣ እቲ ናይ ኣካለ-ምክልኻል ግብረመልሲ ካብ'ቲ ምርባሕ ናይ CoV ዝተነጸለ እዩ።
en-mt: For carriers of the virus that do not show any symptoms, the immune response is isolated from the coV infection.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ወገን ምስ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ከምዝንጸል ምግባር ኣብ ናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV-2 ሕክምና ጠቐምቲ ጽልዋታት ከሕድር ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In the same way, it can have beneficial effects on anti-SARS-CoV-2 treatment.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኢንተርፌሮን(interferon) ግብረመልሲ ብፍላይ ኣብ ለኻኺቶ ጥንኩር እዩ።
en-mt: his interferon response is particularly strong in the case of the infected.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ተነኣሰ ኣብ ፈለማ ደረጃ ዝርከቡ ወድሰብ ዘጥቅዑ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽስታት ታይፕ ኢንተርፌሮን ምሃብ ጠቓሚ ይኸዉን።
en-mt: herefore, it is beneficial to provide type interferons with SARS-CoV-2 infections in the early stages of the human race.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ NLRP3 ናይ ነድሪ ምላሽ ምንቕቓሕ ኣብ ለኻኺቶታት ኣይሰርሕን።
en-mt: In addition, NLRP3 does not work in response.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት MCC950 ብምጥቃም ንNLRP3 ዝስዕብ ነድሪ ምዕጋት ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕክምና ጠቓሚ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: As a result, the use of MCC950 can be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣመጻጽኣ፣ SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoV ን ዝተለዓሉሉ ሓፈሻዊ ኣካይዳ ዝተኸተለ እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 violence follows the general behavior of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን ናይ ለኻኺቶ beta-CoV ምስ ናይ SARS-CoV ኒዩክሎታይድ ናይ 95% ምምስሳል፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ድማ ናይ 96% ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: It is also a 95% analogy to SARS-CoV neclotide and 96% similar to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: ኣብ'ቲ ዕዳጋ ዝነበሩ እንስሳት ምስ SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ ቫይረስ ሒዞም ዝተረኸቡ ዋላ'ኳ እንተኾኑ፡ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ማእከላይ ቀጥተኛ መምሓላለፊ ግን ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: Animals on the market were found with the same virus as SARS-CoV, but sars-CoV-2's central direct pass has not yet been detected.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ብዝገርም መንገዲ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሳሳሊ(homologous) ኮይኖም ተረኺቦም፣ እዚ ድማ ፓንጎሊናት ከም መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ኮይኖም ከገልግሉ ከምዝኽእሉ ወይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ንናይ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ መወዳእታ ክፋል ናይ ጂን ፍራግመንትታት ኣስተዋጽኦ ይገብር እዩ ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: Pangolin beta-CoVs were surprisingly found to be homologous to SARS-CoV-2, meaning that pangolins could act as intermediaries or that pangolin beta-CoVs contribute to the final part of the sars-CoV-2 gene fragments.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: ዘይተመለሱ ሕቶታት ዋላ እንተሃለዉ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ብኣጋጣሚ ይኹን ኮነ ተባሂሉ ብሰብ ከምዝተሰርሐ ዘርእይ መረጋገጺ የለን።
en-mt: Although there are unanswered questions, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoVs ተፈላጥነቶም ምስ'ዚ ሕዚ ዝርአ ዘሎ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ዳግማይ ክምለስ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: CoVs have been re-identified with the current SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ለኻኺቶን ካልኦት እንስሳታትን CoVs ዝተኻየደ መጽዕናቲ፣ ኣገዳስነት ናይ ዙኖቲክ መበቆላትን ናይ እንስሳት መዕቖቢነትን ናይ HCoVs ኣብ ልዕሊ ናብ ሰብ ዘለዎ ተመሓላላፍነት ክንርዳእ ጌርና እዩ።
en-mt: In the study of leprosy and other animals, we have understood the importance of zoonotic origins and animal shelters for HCoVs' transmission over humans.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን SARS-CoV-2 መበቆሎም ካብ ለኻኺቶ ከምዝኾነን ናብ ሰባት ድማ ብካልእ መንጎኛ መዕቖቢ ኣቢሎም ከምዝመሓላለፉን መረዳእታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are traced from the infected and are transmitted to humans through another intermediary shelter.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: ምንጪ ናይ SARS-CoV ረኽሲ ካብ ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን ዝባዳትን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዘጋጥም ርክብ ምዃኑ ካብ ፈለጥና፣ ጥሉል ዕዳጋታት(wet markets) ምዕጻውን ዝባዳት ምቕታልን ናይ SARS ለበዳ ብብቕዓት ክዛዝሞ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: If we know that the source of SARS-CoV infection is a market interaction between people and people, wet markets can effectively end the SARS pandemic.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ምኽንያት ከምኡ'ውን ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተተሓሓዙ ዝተፈላለዩ ሊኒዬጃት ናይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ስለዝተረኽቡ፣ ፓንጎሊናት ዙኖቲክ ምምሕልላፋት ንምክልኻል ካብ ዕዳጋ ክውገዱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: For the same reason, as well as the discovery of various lingolin beta-CoVs associated with SARS-CoV-2, pangolins must be removed from the market to prevent zonotic transmission.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ፓንግሊናትን ካልኦት መጥወብትን ናብ ሰባት ይመሓለለፍ ድዩን ብኸመይ ይመሓላለፍን ንዝብሉ ሕቶታት ኣብ መጻኢ ብምርመራታት ክጻረዩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: However, questions about whether SARS-CoV-2 can be transmitted to humans from pancreas and other species must be investigated in the future.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ፣ MERS-CoV ኣብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ንነዊሕ ግዘ ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Mers-CoV, on the other hand, has been in the dromedar for a long time.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: እዞም ኣግማል ከም መጓዕዝያን ናይ ስጋ፣ ጸባ፣ ሌዘርን ናይ ቆርበት ፍርያማትን ምንጪታት ንሰባት የገልግሉ።
en-mt: These camels serve people as transport and sources of meat, milk, lasers and skin products.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: ኣብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕን ኣፍሪካን ብሰፊሑ ኣስፋሕፊሖም እዮም።
en-mt: It is widespread in the Middle East and Africa.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ስለዚ ድማ MERS ንምቁጽጸር ተባሂሉ ኩሎም ኣግማል ከተጥፍኦም ኣይከኣልን እዩ፣ ልክዕ ከም'ቲ ኣብ ቻይና ናይ SARS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ምስፍሕፋሕ ደው ንምባል ኣብ ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ዕዳጋ ዝተኻየደ ማለትዩ።
en-mt: herefore, it is not possible to eradicate all camels for mers to control them, just as in the wild animal market in China to stop the spread of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: ነዚ ናይ MERS ተደጋጋሚ ለበዳታት ደው ንምባል፣ ኣንጻር ናይ ኣግማል MERS-CoV ብቑዕ ክትባት ንምምዕባል፣ ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ረኽሲ ቁጽጽር ስጉምቲታት ብምሕዋስ ሓፈሻዊ ኣቀራርባ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: A holistic approach is necessary to end these repeated MERS outbreaks, to develop a viable vaccine against camel MERS-CoV, by joining other infection control measures.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: ነዞም ቫይረሳት ክነወግዶም ስለዘይከኣልና፣ ለበዳ ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ሓደሽቲ genotypes(ተመሳሳሊ ጀነቲካዊ ቅርጺ ዝውንኑ ድቀቕቲ ህይውታውያን) ክመጹ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Ecause we cannot prevent these viruses, new genotypes (embryos of similar genetic structures) may emerge that could cause an epidemic.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ዙኖቲክ CoVs ኣብ ሞንጎ እንስሳት ዘገዳም ይዘዋወሩ እዮም ።
en-mt: A variety of zoonotic covs roam between wild animals.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: ብፍሉይ ድማ ናብ ሰባት ክመሓላለፉ ዝኽእሉ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ብዙሓት እዮም።
en-mt: In especially, there are many covs that can be transmitted to humans.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: እዞም ናይ እንስሳት CoVs ኣብ ቐጻሊ ተራቢሖምን ማዕቢሎምን ዝዓበየ ናይ ምልባድ ዓቕሚ ዘለዎን ንደቂሰብ ሓደገኛ ዝኾኑን CoVs ክፍጠሩ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: hese animal covs can be produced in the continued and developing covs that have the greatest potential for infection and are dangerous to humans.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን እንስሳትን ዘሎ ርክብ ንምቕናስ ኣብ ገለ ናይ ቻይና ቦታታት ዘሎ ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ምብላዕ ባህሊ ክእገድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: In order to reduce the relationship between humans and animals, the culture of wild animal consumption in some Chinese places should be banned.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: ናይ SARS, MERSን COVID-19ን ጸገም ንምግታእ፣ ዝሓሸ ድልውነትን ግብረመልስን ክህሉ ይግባእ።
en-mt: In order to prevent the spread of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, there must be better willingness and response.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: ብሓቂ፣ ብዙሓት ቫይረሳት ኣብ እዛ ፕላኔት ንኣዝዩ ነዊሕ ግዘ ዝነበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Many viruses have existed on this planet for a long time.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: ናይ ምፍሳስ ዕድል ክሳብ ዝርከብ ኣብ ናይ ባዕሎም ተፈጥሮኣዊ መቐመጢ ይጸንሑ።
en-mt: hey stay in their own natural place until there is a chance of melting.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: ለኻኺቶታት ነቲ ቫይረስ ከመሓላልፍዎ ዘኽእልዎም ባህሪያት ዋላ እንተሃለወን፣ ሰባት ምስ ለኻኺቶ ኮነ ካልኦት ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ዘለዎም ርክብ ንኽጎድል ኣፍልጦኦም ክብ ምባል ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: Despite the characteristics that can spread the virus, it is important for people to be aware of the risk of losing contact with infected people and other wild animals.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: ንቐጻሊ ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ሕማም ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዕድል ንምቕናስን ናይ መጻኢ ለበዳታት ንምውጋድን፣ ኣብ ኣጥበውቲ እንስሳት ጥቡቕ ቁጽጽር ክግበር ይግባእ።
en-mt: In order to reduce the chances of continuing transmission of disease from animals to humans and to eliminate future pandemics, close controls must be exercised on animal animals.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: ከም መደምደምታ፣ ካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ ዝሓልፍ ሕማም ንምክልኻል እቲ ውጽኢታዊ መንገዲ ካብ መዕቖቢ ሓደገኛ ቫይረስ ዝኾኑ እንስሳት ዝነብርሉ ስነ ምህዳር ምርሓቕ እዩ።
en-mt: In conclusion, the most effective way to prevent disease from animal to human is to avoid the environment in which animals live in a dangerous virus.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ኣመጻጽኣ SARS-CoV-2 ሕንቅልሕንቅሊተይ ዛጊድ እውን ዘይተፈልጡ ዛዕባታት ይርከቡ።
en-mt: here are also unknown cases of SARS-CoV-2 sleep.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ ለዃኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዓሌታዊ መበቆል ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ናብ ፓንጎሊን ዘመሓላልፉ እንተኾይኖም፣ ኣብ ከመይ ዝበሉ ኩነታት እዩ ለዃኺቶታትን ፓንጎሊንን ተመሳሳሊ ኢኮሎጂያዊ ኒች ዝውንኑ ኢልካ ምርኣይ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: First of all, if SARS-CoV-2 variants transmit the racially origin virus to pangolin, it is important to consider under what circumstances, such as pangolins and pangolins, may have the same ecological niche.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: ካልኣይ ነገር እዚ ሕማም ናብ ሰብ ንክሓልፍ ለኻኺቶ ዓቢ እጃም ብምህላዉ፣ ደቂሰባት ምስቲ እንስሳ ዘለዎም ርክብ ክዉሰን ይግባእ።
en-mt: Secondly, since the disease has played a major role in transmitting the disease to humans, humans need to deal with the animal.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ሳልሳይ መጥበዊ እንስሳ ከም ትኽክለኛ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ እንተኾይኑ፣ ምስ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ሰባት፣ ለኻኺቶታትን ፓንጎሊንን ሓዊሱ ከመይ ከምዝተኣታቶ ክጻረ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Hird, if a third mammal is a proper intermediary shelter, it must fight against how it is introduced to people of different races, infected species and pangolins.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ዘቤታውያን እንስሳት ሓዊስካ ብዙሓት መጥወብቲ እንስሳት ን SARS-CoV-2 ተቓላዕቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም፣ ናይ ቀረባ ክትትልን ናይ ፈተነኣዊ ረኽስታት ክካየዱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Finally, many mammals, such as domestic animals, may be at least vulnerable to SARS-CoV-2, with close monitoring and testing.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: ዋላ ኣብ ለኻኺቶ፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮነ ካልእ መጥበዊ እንስሳ እንተኾነ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ወይ ድማ ወለዱ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ኣብ ናይ ተፈጥራዊ መጸግዒ ከም ዝርከብ ይእመን።
en-mt: Even if it is in pangolin or other mammals, SARS-CoV-2 or its parents are believed to be in a natural shelter.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: ኣብዚ ጉዳይ ዝግበር ቀጻሊ ምርመራ፣ ኣብ ናይ እንስሳት SARS-CoV-2 መንገድታት ናይ ግምታዊ ለውጢ(evolutionary) ከመይ ምዃኑ ከጻርይ ኣለዎ፣ ስለምንታይ እዚ ጉዳይ'ዚ ኣብ ሰባት ናይ COVID-19 ምክልኻልን ምቁጽጻርን ዓቕሚ ዓቢ ጽልዋ ስለዘለዎ።
en-mt: Ongoing investigation into this issue must determine how hypothetical change (evolutionary) is in the way of animals SARS-CoV-2, why this issue has a significant impact on people's ability to prevent and control COVID-19.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ‘’ዝተጠርጠረ ጉዳይ ለበዳ’’ ከምኡዉን ‘’ዝተረጋገፀ ጉዳይ ለበዳ’’ ምርመራ ሮቑሓ በብጊዜኡ ክመሓየሽ ይግባእ።
en-mt: COVID-19 'suspected case of epidemic' and 'confirmed case of epidemic' should be improved on time.

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 6 2020፣ ጉጅለና ዘሐተሞ ጽሑፍ ናይ ኮሮና ኖቭል 2019 (2019-nCoV) ኢንፌክሽን ንምምርምርን ንምምኻርን ቕልጡፍ መምርሒን ተመኩሮታትን ብምቕራብ ብ ብርኪ ዓለም ነዚ ለበዳ ንምውጋእ ንጡፍ ምስክር ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: On February 6, 2020, our team published an article that provides rapid guidance and experiences to investigate and advise the Coronavirus Novel 2019-nCoV infection.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ግና ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019(ኮቪድ-19) ሓድሽ ሕማም እዩ። መጽናዕትታትን ኣብ ባይቶ ዘሎ ክምናዊ ተመክሮታት ንኣፍልጦና በብቁሩብ እናስፍሖ ይመጽእ ኣሎ። ስለዚ ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናን ስትራተጂታት ቀጻሊ እናተመሓየሹ ክመጹ’ዮም።
en-mt: But coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, with studies and house-to-house experiences gradually expanding our knowledge, so screening and treatment strategies will continue to improve.'

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: ኣብዚ ደብዳበ፡ ኣብ መምርሒና ዘሎ ሓደ ርእይቶ ግብረመልሲ ብምሃብ፡ በቲ ናይ ቻይና ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ዝወጸ ሓድሽ ናይ ሕክምናን ክትትልን ምርሒታት COVID-19 (ሻውዓይ ሕታም) ዝተቐየደ ን”ጥርጡራት”ን ”ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማትን” ምርመራ ዝምልከት ሓደሽቲ መምርሒታት ኣውጺና።
en-mt: In response to one of the recommendations in this letter, we issued new guidelines for new medical and monitoring guidelines issued by the Chinese People's Health Committee on COVID-19 (seventh edition) testing for "suspected" and "confirmed patients."

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ኣብዚ እዋን ብሕማም ኮሮና 2019(ኮቪድ-19) ዝፍለጥ ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019(2019-nCoV) ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2019 ክዝርጋሕ ጀሚሩ፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ከኣ ከቢድ ኣኪዩት ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2(SARS-CoV-2) ይበሃል።
en-mt: The new coronavirus 2019 (2019-nCoV), now known as corona virus 2019(COVID-19), began to spread in December 2019, and the virus is called the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 11 2020፣ ወድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) COVID-19 ዓለምለኸ ለበዳ ከምዝኾነ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2መልከፍቲ ክንዕወት እንተኮይና ብቅልጡፍ ዝርከብ ናይ ምኽሪ መምርሒ ኣዳሊና ብ06 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ኣብ ናይ ውትድርና ሕክምና መጽናዕቲ ብመርበብ ኢንተርነት ዘርጊሕናዮ ኣለና።
en-mt: If we are to win against SARS-CoV-2 infections, we have prepared a quickly available advice guide and published it online in a medical study on February 6, 2020.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: ካብ ዝሕተም ብዙሕ ኣተኩሮ ስሒቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A lot of attention has been drawn from the publication.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር COVID-19 ሓድሽ ሕማም ምዃኑ ኣብ ግምት ብምእታው፣ ንቕሓትናን ፍልጠትናን ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ መጽናዕታዊ ርኽበታትን ተሞክሮ ክሊኒካዊ ልምምዳትን ብምምርኳዝ በብቁሩብ ይዓቢ ኣሎ፣ ስለዚ እቲ ናይ ምምርማርን ምሕካምን ስትራቴጂ ብቐጻሊ ይሕደስ ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, given that COVID-19 is a new disease, our vigilance and knowledge are gradually growing based on ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience, so the diagnosis and treating strategy is constantly being updated.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ብሃገራዊ ኮሚሽን ጥዕና ቻይና ናይ COVID-19 ምርመራን ሕክምናን መምርሒ ካብ 16 ጥሪ 2020 ክሳብ 3 መጋቢት 2020 ገለ ትሕዝቶታቱ ቀይሩ ብሓፈሻ ሸውዓተ ሕታማት (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) ኣሕቲሙ ኣሎ።
en-mt: For example, the National Commission of Health of China has changed its COVID-19 testing and treatment guidelines from 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020 and has published seven issues (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/).

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: ሐዚ መምርሒና ካብ Zhou et al. ርኢቶ ተቐቢሉ ኣሎ፣ ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ተሞክሮኦም መሰረት ዝገበረ ቀሊል እማመ ድማ ኣተኣታትዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Now our guide has received a view from Zhou et al. and they have introduced a simple recommendation based on their clinical experience.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ስርሖም ንመምርሒና ሓድሽ መረዳእታ ዝወሰኸ እንትኾን ብ ብርኪ ዓለም ድማ ዋጋ ዘለዎ መነጻጸሪ ሰሪሑ እዩ።
en-mt: heir work has added a new understanding of our guidance and has made a valuable comparison worldwide.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: ምስጋናና እናገለጽና ነዚ ኣገዳሲ ስርሖም ንድግፎ።
en-mt: We would like to express our gratitude and support this important work.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር በቲ ሓድሽ ናይ COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) ምርመራን ሕክምናን መመርሒን ሓደሽቲ መፅናዕትታን መሰረት እቲ ስርሖም ምምሕያሽ ዘድልዮ እዩ።
en-mt: However, their work needs to be improved based on the new COVID-19 trial version of testing, treatment instruction and new research.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: ብመሰረት እቲ ሻውዓይ ሕትመት (3 መጋቢት 2020)፣ ነቶም ተጠርጢሮም ዘለዉ ናይ ኬዛት ድሌታት ንምርጋግጽ ሓደ ኣቕሓ መልክዕ ናይ ስነ-ሕማም ለበዳ ታሪኽን ክልተ ኣቑሑት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ መርኣያታት ብምሕዋስ ርዱእ ዝኾነ መጽናዕቲ ንምስራሕ፣ ወይ ሰለስተ ኣቑሑት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ መረዳእታ እንድሕር ንጹር ስነ-ሕማም ለበዳዊ ታሪኽ ዘየለ።
en-mt: According to the seventh publication (3 March 2020), to verify the needs of the suspected cases, to make a definitive study by mixing one item, a form of epidemiological history and two items of clinical samples, or three items of clinical data, there is no clear history of epidemiological history.

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: ስነ-ለበዳዊ ታሪኽ፥ (1)ናይ ጉዕዞ ታሪኽ፡ ተቀማጢ ከተማ ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ተቀማጢ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 14 መዓልታት ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ናይ COVID-19 መልከፍቲ ዝተመዝገሎም ቦታታት፡ (2) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት(ብኑክለዪክ ኣሲድ መርመራ ዝተረጋገጸ)፡ (3) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ ረስኒ ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት ምስትንፋስ ዘለዎ ተቀማጢ ከተማ ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ወይ ተቀማጢ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 14 መዓልታት ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ናይ COVID-19 መልከፍቲ ዝተመዝገሎም ቦታታት፡ (4) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ ጉጅለ ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማት(≥ 2 ኣብ ውሽጢ 2 ሰሙን ረስኒን/ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት ምስትንፋስ ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ጸበብቲ ባታታት ከም ገዛ፡ ቤት-ጽሕፈት ወይ ክፍሊ ቤት-ትምህርትታት…ወዘተ)
en-mt: Epidemiological history: (1) Travel history of resident Wuhan and its surroundings: places where COVID-19 cases were recorded before symptoms in the past 14 days (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 sick people (confirmed by nuclear acid testing) (3) A resident of Wuhan and its surroundings or residents with a history of contact with fever or other respiratory symptoms, places where COVID-19 cases have been recorded in the past 14 days before symptoms (4) a history of contact with a group of confirmed patients (≥ 2 within 2 Patients with fever week/or other respiratory symptoms, especially in cramped batting, such as a home, office, or school department... etc.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት፣ (1) ረስኒን ወይ ምልክታት ምስትንፋስን፣ (2) ምስ ምስሊ ባህሪ ረኽሲ COVID-19፣ (3) ቁጽሪ ድምር ጻዓዱ ዋህዮታት ደም ንቡር፣ ጎዲሉ፣ ወይ ዝጎደለ ቁጽሪ ሊምፈሳይት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያናይ መልከፍቲ ደረጃ።
en-mt: Clinical symptoms, (1) fever or respiratory symptoms, (2) with an image of the COVID-19 infection, (3) the number of blood cells that have normalized, decreased, or decreased number of lymphatribes in the first stage of infection.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: በዞም ዝስዕቡ ፓቶጀኒክ ወይ ሴሮሎጂክ መርመራታት ጥርጡራት ብመርመራ ምርግጋጽ፥ (1) real-time PCR test positive ንሳርስ-ኮቭ-2: (2) viral whole genome sequencing ምስቶም ዝተፈልጡ ኮሮናቫይረሳት high homogeneity ምስዘርኢ፥ (3)ናይ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 specific IgM antibodyን IgG antibodyን positive ምስዝመጽእ፡ ወይ ድማ SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody ካብ ኔጌቲቭ ናብ ፐዘቲቭ ምስዝልወጥ፡ ወይ ኣብ ናይ መገገሚ ክፍለ ግዜ ካብቲ ኣኪዩት ክፍለ ግዜ ብ≥4 ግዜ ምስዝዛይድ።
en-mt: Confirming suspects with the following pathogenic or serologic tests: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2 (2) viral wholeome sequencing with the identified coronaviruses: (3) SARS-SRS-2 Cov-2 specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody are positive or SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody is converted from negevive to peripheral or increased by ≥4 times during the treatment period.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Real-time PCR for nucleic acid ሳምፕላት ናይ ስርዓተ-ምስትንፋስን ደምን ኣብቲ ካልኣይን(18 ጥሪ 2020) ሳልሳይን(22 ጥሪ 2020) ሕታማት ወጽዮም።
en-mt: Real-time PCR for nucleic acid sampling was released in the second and third (January 18, 2020) issues.

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: ምልላይ ጠንቂ ሕማም ናይ ደም መርኣያ ኣብቲ ራብዓይን (27 ጥሪ 2020) ሓሙሻይን (8 ለካቲት 2020) ሕትመታት ተጠቓሊሉ ኔሩ፣ ብድሕሪ እዚ እቲ ሴሮሎጂካዊ ጭብጢ ናብቲ ሻውዓይ ሕታም ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: He was included in the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) issues, after which the sylogological theme was added to the seventh issue.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: እዘን ለውጥታት ኣብ ስሉጥ ናይ ኑክለይክ ኣሲድ ዲተክሽን ኪት ንምርካብ ጻዕርታት ተመራመርቲ ዝተመርኮሰ’ዩ። ብተወሳኺ ዝበለጸ ናይ ደምን ስርዓተ-ትንፋስን ሳምፕላት ኣብ ምርካብን ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢታት ጸረ-ነፍሳት ናብ ዝተረጋገጸ መምዘኒታት ንምእታው ኣብ ምድጋፍን ይምርኮስ።
en-mt: These changes are based on researchers' efforts to find a smooth nucleic acid detection kit, and it also depends on finding the best blood and respiratory sampling and supporting the introduction of positive antibiotics into proven criteria.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: ምስ እዚ ጎኒ ን ጎኒ፣ ኣብ እቶም ዘይልሙድ ምልክታት ዘለዎምን ምንም ምልክት ኣብ ዘየርእዩን ሰባት ትኹረት ምግባር ከምዘድልየና ዘዘኻኽሩ መረዳእታት ብዙሓት መረዳእታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: On the other side, there are many indications that we need to pay attention to people who have unusual symptoms and do not show any symptoms.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ስለዚ ናይ Zhou et al. flow chart ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ሰባት “ኣብ ትሑት ሓደጋ ኣለዉ” ዝብል ክመሓየሽ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Therefore, people without symptoms of the Zhou et al. flow chart should be updated to say they are "at low risk."

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: እዚ ምእራም መንገዲ ተወሳኺ ግብራውን መጽናዕታውን ምርግጋጽ ከድልዮ’ዩ።
en-mt: his process requires further practical and research.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: ንምጥቕላል ዝኣክል፣ ንፁር ዝኾነ መረዳእታ ንኽንረክብን መንበብትና ስልኪ ደዊሎም ርኢቶኦም ክህቡናን ተስፋ ንገብር።
en-mt: We hope that our readers will be able to get a clear understanding and give us their opinion.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: ኣብ "ዝተጠርጠረ ጉዳይ ለበዳ" ን "ዝተረጋገፀ ጉዳይ ለበዳ" ን ብ ምርመራ ኣብ ምፍላይ፣ ናይ እቲ ዝነብሩሉ ዓዲ ሓዱሽ መምርሒ ክትጥቀሙ ንላበው።
en-mt: In order to identify a "suspected pandemic case" and a "confirmed pandemic case," we recommend using new guidelines for the country in which you live.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: ጉጅለና እውን ሓገዝ ንምሃብ ጊዜኡ ሓልዩ ነቲ መምርሒ ክሕድስ እዩ።
en-mt: Our team will also take the time to provide guidance.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: ባንግላዲሽ ኣብ መዓልቲ እቲ ዝለዓለ ዝበሃል ሓሙሽተ ብኮቪድ-19 ሰባት ከምዝሞቱ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Bangladesh says five people have died from COVID-19 a day.

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: ትማሊ፣ ባንግላዲሽ ኣብ እቲ መዓልቲ ብምኽንያት ኮቪድ-19 ሓሙሽተ ሰባት ከምዝሞቱ ኣረጋጊጻ።
en-mt: Bangladesh confirmed that five people had died from COVID-19 that day.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: እዚ በዚ ቫይረስ ምኽንያት ንመዓልቲ ዝለዓለ ቁጽሪ ሞት እዩ።
en-mt: his is the highest number of deaths per day due to the virus.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: ክሳብ ትማሊ ጥራሕ፣ ካብ'ቶም ዝተለኽፉ 114 ንጡፋት ኬዛትን 33 ዝሃወዩን ኣብ ገዝኦም ዝጸንሑ ዘለዉ ኬዛትን ከምዘለዉ ናይ ባንግላዲሽ ትካል ናይ ኢፒደሞሎጂ፣ ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽርን መጽናዕቲን (IEDCR) ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: As of yesterday alone, of the 114 infected cases, 33 have recovered and remain at home, according to Bangladesh's Institute for Epidemology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR).

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ ዝተመዝገበ ቁጽሪ ሞት ድማ 17 እዩ።
en-mt: The overall death toll was 17.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ኦንላይን ዜና መግለጺ፣ ናይ IEDCR ዳይሬክተር፣ Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora፣ እቶም ዝሞቱ ኣርባዕተ ደቂ ተባዕትዮን ሓንቲ ኣንስተይትን ዝሓዘ እዩ ኢላ።
en-mt: In an online news release, IEDCR director Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora said the dead were comprised of four men and a woman.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: ብመሰረት Dr Meerjady ዝበለቶ፣ ክልተ ካብ'ቶም ግዳያት ናይ'ቲ ለበዳ ዝኾኑ ዕድሚኦም ልዕሊ 60፣ ክልተ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ 51 ን 60 ን፣ ሓደ ድማ 41-50 ዓመቱ እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: According to Dr Meerjady, two of the victims were over the age of 60, two between the ages of 51 and 60 and one between the ages of 41 and 50.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: ክልተ ካብ'ቶም ግዳያት ካብ ዳካ ዝመጹ እዮም ድማ ኢላ።
en-mt: Wo of the victims came from Dhaka, she said.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ንኮቪድ-19 ዓለምለኻዊ ለበዳ ክብል ኣብ መጋቢት 11 ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 11, the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል በዓል ስልጣን ን ኣናዶሉ ኤጀንሲ፣ ዞባዊ ናይ ዜና ፈነወ ጣብያ፣ ኣብ ዝሃቦ ቃል፣ ካብ'ቶም ዝሞቱ እቲ ሓደ ናይ ቤንጋሊ ጸረ ግዕዝይና ኮሚሽን ዳይሬከክተር፣ ጃላል ሳይፉር ራህማን ከምዝነበረን ኣብ ናይ ኩዌት ሜትሪ ሆስፒታል ክትትል ክግበረሉ ከምዝጸንሐን ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Hospital officials told the Anadolu Agency, a regional news channel, that one of the dead was the director of the Bengal Anti-Corruption Commission, Jalal Saifur Rahman, and was being monitored at Kuwait's meter hospital.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: ብቀዳም፣ ኣብ ናይ ኦንላይን ቪድዮ ኣዋጅ፣ ባንግላዲሽ ናይ መንገዲ ትራንስፖርትን ናይ ቢንቶታትን ምኒስተር ኦባይዱል ቋደር፣ ህዝባዊ መጎዓዓዝያ ክሳብ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ቀዳም፣ ካብ እቲ መጀምርያ ዝተተለሞ ንዝነውሕ ግዘ ከምዝዕጾ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: In an online video announcement, Bangladesh's Minister of Road Transport and Binots, Obadul Changder, said public transport would be closed for longer than originally scheduled.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ህዝባዊ መጎዓዓዝያ ምዕጻው ብቀዳም መጋቢት 26 እዩ ተጀሚሩ ፣ ሚያዝያ 4 ክውዳእ ድማ እዩ ትጽቢት ዘሎ።
en-mt: he public transport shutdown began on March 26 and is expected to end on April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: ናይ መሰረታዊ ኣቑሑት -- ናይ ሕክምና፣ ነዳዲን መግቢን --መጎዓዓዝያ ሕዚ እውን ፍቑድ እዩ።
en-mt: Basic supplies - medical, oil and food - are still allowed.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ኣብ ባንግላዲሽ ዝተመዝገበ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣጋጣሚ ኣብ መጋቢት 8 ፣ ኣብ ካብ ጣልያን ዝተመለሱ ክልተ ሰባትን ናይ ሓዲኦም ድማ በዓልቲ ቤትን እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: he first COVID-19 cases recorded in Bangladesh were on March 8, when two people returned from Italy and one was a wife.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 19 ጀሚሩ፣ እዞም ሰለስተ ሰባት ሓውዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: As of March 19, all three people have recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: ቁጽሪ ብSARS-CoV-2 ዝተለኽፉ ብ ዓለምለኻዊ ደረጃ ካብ ሓደ ሚልዮን ሓሊፉ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he number of cases of SARS-CoV-2 has surpassed one million worldwide.

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: ብሓሙስ፣ ናይ Johns Hopkins University ሓበሬታ ከምዘርእዮ፣ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ኮሮናቫይረስ ረኽሲ ዝተታሓዙ ሓፈሻዊ ቁጽሪ ግዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ካብ ሓደ ሚልዮን ሓሊፉ ኣሎ።
en-mt: On Thursday, the total number of cases of SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections worldwide surpassed one million.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: ምስ እቲ ብኮሮናቫይረስ ዝመጽእ ሕማም፣ ኮቪድ -19 ዝተተሓሓዙ ቁጽሪ ምዉታን ድማ ብውሕዱ 52 ኣሽሓት ይበጽሕ።
en-mt: he number of people infected with COVID-19 has reached at least 52,000.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: እዚ እምነ ምዕራፍ ማላዊ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተረጋገጸ ረኽሲ ኣብ ዝሓበረትሉን፣ ኣብ ዛምቢያ ድማ ናይ መጀመርያ ብኮሮናቫይረስ ምኽንያት ሞት ዝተመዝገበሉን መዓልቲ እዩ መጽዩ።
en-mt: his chapter comes on the day that Malawi has recorded its first confirmed coronavirus infection and the first confirmed case of coronavirus in Zambia.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: ሰሜን ኮርያ፣ ካብ ሓሙስ ጀሚራ፣ ካብ ኮሮናቫይረስ ነጻ ካብ ዘለዋ ውሑዳት ሃገራት ሓንቲ ከምዝኾነት ሓቢራ።
en-mt: As of Thursday, North Korea was one of the few countries to be free from coronavirus.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: ክሳብ ትማሊ፣ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም 1,051,635 ዝተረጋገጹ ኬዛት ለበዳ ዝጸብጸበ እንትኾን፣ 79,332 ኬዛት ብ ዕስራን ኣርባዕተን ሰዓታት ን 10 a.m. ናይ ማእኸላይ ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሰዓት (0800 UTC) ቀዲሞም ኣብ ሚያዝያ 4 ዝተመዝገቡ እዮም።
en-mt: As of yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases of epidemiology; 79,332 cases were recorded in April 4 ahead of the 10 a.m. central European clock (0800 UTC).

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ፣ እንተንኢሱ 5,900 ሞት ሓዊሱ ፣ ልዕሊ 244 ሽሕ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ተመዝጊቦም እዮም።
en-mt: In the United States, at least 5,900 deaths have been reported; more than 244 thousand coronavirus cases have been reported.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS ዜና ከምዝሓበሮ፣ ናይ Johns Hopkins University ዳታ ከምዝበሎ፣ ልዕሊ 1,000 ዝኾኑ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ሞታት ብ ሮቡዕ ብኮሮናቫይረስ ተመዝጊቦም ኣዮም።
en-mt: ACCORDING TO CBS NEWS, ACCORDING TO JOHNS HOPKINS UNIVERSITY DATA, MORE THAN 1,000 U.S. DEATH CASES WERE REGISTERED WITH CORONAVIRUS ON WEDNESDAY.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም፣ እዚ ሕማም ንከይጋፋሕ ሃገራት ጥንኩራት ገደባት ኣዊጀን ይርከባ።
en-mt: Around the world, countries have imposed restrictions on the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: ብዕለተ ሓሙስ፣ Sergei Sobyanin፣ ናይ ሞስኮ ከንቲባ፣ ነቲ ናይ እታ ከተማ ምዕጻው ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ኣናዊሖሞ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, moscow's mayor, extended the closure of the city until May 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: ብሃገራዊ ደረጃ፣ ፕረዚዳንት Vladimir Putin ሩስያውያን ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 30 ናብ ስራሕ ከይከዱ ክፍሊቶም ምቕባል ክቕጽሉ ከምዝኾኑ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin has said That Russians will continue to receive payments without going to work until April 30.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: ፓርላማ መንግስቲ ፖርችጋል ብ215 ናይ ስምምዕ ድምጺ፣ ዓሰርተ ድምጸ ተኣቅቦ ሓደ ተቓውሞን ሃገራዊ ኣውጅ ህጹጽ ጊዜ ብ15 መዓልታት ከናውሕ ወሲኑ።
en-mt: Portugal's parliament voted unanimously to extend the national emergency by 15 days with 215 votes, ten absors and one against.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: ሳዑዲ ዓረብያ ናይ ቅዱሳት ቦታታቶም መካን መዲናን ሙሉእ መዓልቲ ብግዘ ናብ ገዛኻ እቶ ዝብል ትእዛዝ ኣናዊሖምዎ፣ ኣቀድም ኣቢሉ እዚ ትእዛዝ ካብ 3 ድ.ቀ. ክሳብ 6 ቅ.ቀ. እዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Saudi Arabia extended the command to enter your home throughout the day, from 3 p.m. to 6 B.C.E.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: ታይላንድ ካብ 10 ድ.ቀ. ክሳብ 4 ቅ.ቀ. ብግዘ ናብ ገዛኻ ምእታው ክተጽድቕ ወጢና ኣላ።
en-mt: Thailand has vowed to approve entry into your home from 10 p.m. to 4 B.C.E.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: ናይ ኦሃዮ ኣመሓዳሪ፣ Mike DeWine፣ እታ ግዝኣት ናይ ኣብ ገዛኹም ጽንሑ ኣዋጃ ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ከምዘናወሐቶ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine has said the state has extended its stay at home state until May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ፡ ድኳናት ኣብ ሓደ እዋን ክግዛእ ዝኽእል ብዝሒ ናይ ሽቓቅ ሶፍት ኣጉዲሎሞ።
en-mt: In Australia, it has reduced the amount of retail software that stores can buy at the same time.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: ኣብ ሰንበትን ቀዳምን ምሸታት፡ ናይ ኣውስትራሊያ ናይ መደብራት ሰንሰለት ዎልዎርትስ ን ኮልስን ኣብ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ኣብ ሕድሕድ ልውውጣት ሓደ ውይድማ ከለት ፓኬት ክብላ ኣንቢረናኦ ዝነበራ እገዳታት ትሕት ክብል ገይረን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: On Sunday and Saturday nights, Australian chain Woolworths and Coles lowered restrictions on the exchange of a packet of paper.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ብሰኑይ’ውን ALDI ሓደ ባኮ ጥራይ ዝብል ዕገዳ ኣተኣታትዩ።
en-mt: On Monday, the ALDI introduced a one-bucket ban.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: እዞም ወሰናት እዚኦም ኣብ መውጽኢታት ን ኣብ ፌስቡክን ክም መልእኽቲታት ተጠቒዖም እዮም።
en-mt: hese restrictions are used on facebook and media.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: ብሰንኪ COVID-19 ዝትላዕለ ነብሰ-ውሸባ ከድሊ እዩ ብዝብል ስግኣት ፡ ልዕሊ መጠን ዕድጊ ክካየድ ከምዝጸንሐ ይሕበር።
en-mt: Due to COVID-19, self-isolation is required.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: ኣብ ሓሙስ፡ ዎልዎርትስ ናብ ገዛ ኣብዝለኣኽ ናይ ሽንትቤት ወረቐት መሸጣ ብሕድሕድ ትእዛዝ ሓደ ፓኬት ንክኾን ወሰን ገይራ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Woolworths set the goal of selling a packet of urine paper sent home by a single order.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: እዞም ለውጥታት ብድሕሪ’ቲ ዝጸንሐ ብዉልዎርዝስን ኮልስን ብ4ን 5ን ማርች ዘውጽእዎ ‘ልዕሊ ኣርባእተ ባኮ ብሓንሳብ ምግዛእ ክልኩል’ ዝብል ዕገዳ እዩ መጽዩ።
en-mt: hese changes come after the "ban on buying more than four buckets together" by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: ኮልስ፡ ኣብቲ ብ ማርች 8 ዘቕረቦ መግለጺ፡ ዕገዳ ናይ ዝያዳ ኣርባዕተ ባኮ ዕድጊ ኣብ ቦትኡ ከሎ፥”ብዙሓት ድኳናት ሸቀጦም ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ሰዓት ናይ ምብጻሕ ከም ዝውዳእ ዘሎ” ይሕብር። ነዚ ጠለብ ድማ “ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” ኢሉ ክገልጾ ከሎ፡ ALDI ከኣ ”ዘይተጸበናዮ” ኢሉ ኣብ ፌስቡክ ብሰሉስ ፖስት ገይርዎ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Coles said in a March 8 statement that the ban on more than four bucket purchases was in place: "Many stores are selling their goods and are ending in an hour of delivery," describing this demand as "unprecedented," while ALDI posted on Facebook on Tuesday that it was "unexpected."

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: ሓደ ወኪል ዉልዎርዝስ ከምዝበሎ፡ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ዕዳጋታት ልዑል ወሰኽ ኣርእየን።
en-mt: A Woolworths representative said markets had seen a sharp rise in the past week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: ኣብ ካንበራ ዝርከብ ናይ ኮስትኮ መደብር ካብቲ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣትሒዙ እቲ ዝፍቀድ መጠን ክልተ ፓኬት ገይሮም።
en-mt: Costco's store in Canberra has made the most possible two packets since last week.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: ነቲ ሕጽረት ብዝበለጸ ንምብዳህ፣ ኮልስ ዓበይቲ ፓኬጃት ካብ ኣቕረብቲ ብምእዛዝ፣ናይ ምብጻሓት ድግግም ወሲኹ፣ ዉልዎርዝስ ድማ ተወሳኺ ቀረብ ኣዚዙ፣ALDI ድማ ነቲ ዝተወጠነ ናይ ረቡዕ ስፒሻል ቀረብ ኣቐዲሙ ከምዝርከብ ገይሩ።
en-mt: o better address the shortage, Coles ordered large packages from suppliers, increased visits and Woolworths ordered more supplies, and ALDI made wednesday's special offer available in advance.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: ራስል ዚመርማን፣ ናይ Australian Retailers Association (ኣውስትራሊያ ናይ ሸቃጦ ማሕበር) ዋና ጸሓፊ፣ ሸቃጦ ናይ ሸቐጥ ቀረብ መጠን ልዕል ከብሉዎ ፈቲኖም፣ እንተኾነ ግን ብ ናይ እቲ ከባቢያዊ ባይቶ ኣብ ናይ ኣቑሑ መብጻሕቲ መኻይን ዝተነበረ ናይ ግዜ/ሰዓት ክልከላታት ከቢድ ገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman, secretary-general of the Australian Consumers Association, tried to raise the supply rate for consumers, but imposed time/hour restrictions on goods delivery by the Local Assembly made it harder.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: ድኳናት ጠለብ ከማልኡ መታን ናይ ፍርያታት ዋጋ ክውስኽ ይጽበዮ።
en-mt: It is expected that the price of products will increase.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: ብሰሉስ፡ ALDI ብሰንኪ ቅልጡፍ ዕደላ ቀረብ ገለ ድኳናት እቲ ናይ ረቡዕ ፍሉይ ዕዳግኦም ከሰላስሉ ዘይምኽኣሎም ገሊጹ።
en-mt: On Tuesday, ALDI said that due to the rapid supply of some shops, they were unable to pay for Wednesday's specialty.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ News.com.au ሪፖርት፣ ዶ/ር ጋሪይ ሞርቲመር፣ ኣብ ኩዊንስ ላንድ ቴክኖሎጂ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ምችርቻር በዓል ሞያ ክምዝበሉዎ፣ እቶም መድብራት ኩል ግዜ ምሸት መድብሮም እናመልኡ እዮም።
en-mt: According to the News.com.au report, Dr. Gary Mortimer, a mentor at the Queensland Land University of Technology, said the stations are filling out their schedules every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ሶፍት ብበዝሒ ዝርከብ ከምዝኾነ፣ ኣብ መሸጣ ኣዝዩ ትሑት ብዝሒ ክህሉ ዝገብር፣ ከምኡ እውን፣ ኩሉ ምስተሸጠ፣ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ናይ መሸጢ ቦታ ጥራሖም ከምዝገብር፣ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ሕጽረት ስምዒት ከምዘጋድዶ ኣመልኪቱ።
en-mt: It is important to note that the availability of toilet software is very low in sales, and that when everything is sold, it makes a lot of empty space, which exacerbates the feeling of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: "ክም ምልከታ ኮልስን ዎልዎርትስን፣ ኣብ እቲ ሼልፍ ብዙሕ ዓቁሑ ምሃለዉ፣ ክም ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐትን ከም ሳኒታይዘርን ዝበሉ ምህርቲታት ክዕደጉን ብበዝሒ ዝርከቡን እንተደኣ ኾይኖም ፣ ምናልባት ነቲ ድንጋጸ ምቕናስ ይከኣል ይኸውን" ኢሉ ራሰል ዚመርማን ካብ ABC News ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: "In the eyes of Coles and Woolworths, if there is a lot of money on the shelf, such as toilet paper and more schools such as sanitizer, it may be possible to reduce the risk," Russell Zimmerman of ABC News said.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: ሪሳይክል ዝተገበረ ናይ ሽንትቤት ወረቐት መፍረዪ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሓሙስ ምህርቲ ክውድኡ ክምዝኽእሉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: He said the school's recycling paper could be completed on Thursday.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቀት ክሊነክስ ዘዳሉ ኪምበርሊ-ክላርክን ሶርበንት ተዳሉ ሶላሪስ ወእቐትን ቀረብ ንምሕላው ብምባል 24/7 ይሰርሑ ከምዘለዉ ኣብ News.com.au ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Kimberly-Clark and Sorbent, who produces clinic paper, said in a News.com.au that solaris are working 24/7 to keep the supply.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com ዝተብሃለ ናይ ሪል እስቴት ድህረ ገጽ፣ ገለ ሸየጥቲ ብ ሰንኪ ዝተናውሑ ናይ መዓልቲ ሸቃሎ ባዓላት ን ናይ ሰሙን መጨረሻ ምስ ምዃኑ ወሑዳት ጨረታታት እንትካየዱ ከለው ኣብ ሜይልቦርን ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ጨረታ ዝተሳተፉ ናይ መጅመሪያ ተጫረትቲ ናጻ ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐት ሂቦም። ክብል ጽብጺቡ።
en-mt: Domain.com, a real estate website, reports that some sellers have given free urinary paper to participants who participated in the Mailborne auction, with a few auctions taking place at the weekend' end.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: NT News ዝተባህለ ኣብ ዳርዊን ዝሕተም መዓልታዊ ጋዜጣ፡ ኣብ ናይ ሓሙስ ሕታሙ ተቆሪጹ ከም ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ከገልገል ዝኽእል ሸሞንተ ገጻት ዝሓዘ ክፋል ኣሕቲሙ።
en-mt: NT News, a Darwin daily newspaper, published an eight-page section that could be used as a toilet paper that was cut off in its Thursday edition.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ ማርች 3 ናይ ABC ኣውስትራሊያ ጸብጻብ ፣እቶም መደብራታ መጀምሪያ ኣብ ዕድጊት ኣቑሑት ናይ መጠን ወሰናት ናይ ምግባር መድብ ከምዝየብሎም ብምሕባር ነቲ እገዳ ንምፍጻም ምዝሕሓል የርእዩ ነይሮም።
en-mt: According to ABC Australia's March 3 report, the programs showed a slowing in enforcing the ban, saying they did not have a set set of restrictions on the purchase of goods.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: ራስል ዚመርመን ን ማስክታት፣ ናይ ንጽህና ፈሳሲ፣ ዝነቐጹ ኣቑሑት፣ ኤድ መሕጸብን ሑሩጭን ሓውስካ፣ ካልኦት ምህርትታት እውን ኣብ ልዑል ጠለብ ከምዝርከቡ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmermen said masks, clean-up fluids, dried goods, Ed washes and hustle, and other products are also in high demand.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: በተመሳሳሊ፣ካብ ኣውስትራሊያ ወጻኢ ፣ ኣብ ሰንበት ምሸት ናይ እንግሊዝ ኦንላይን ሱፐር ማርኬት ኦካዶ ኣብ ናይ ኣንድሬይስ ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐት ዕድጊት ናይ 12 ሮል ፓኬት ወሰን ክገብር ተራእዩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Similarly, outside Australia, on Sunday night, British online supermarket Ocado was seen making a 12-roll packet boundary in the Andreis toilet paper purchase.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ኢሉ ኣዊጅዎ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization has declared COVID-19 a pandemic.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: ብረቡዕ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ነዚ ለብዒ COVID-19- ኮሮናቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 ዘስዕቦ ሕማም- ለበዳ ምዃኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the COVID-19-coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 epidemic a pandemic.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: ምንም እኳ "ለበዳ" ዝብል ቃል እቲ ሕማም ክንደየናይ ከምዝተላበደ እምበር ክንደየናይ ሓደገኛ ከምዝኾነ ዝውክል እንተዘይኮነ፡ WHO መንግስታት ናብ ተግባር ክኣትዉ ከምዘለዎም ኣቐሚጡ።
en-mt: Although the term "pandemic" does not refer to how dangerous the disease is, whose governments should act.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: “ኩለን ሃገራት መንገዲ ናይዚ ለበዳ ዋላ ሕጂ’ውን ክልውጥኦ ይኽእላ እየን።”
en-mt: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic."

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: ናይ WHO ዋና ዳይሬክተር፣ Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus፣ ሃገራት መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ ንህዝበን ኣብ ምልላይ፣ ምምርማር፣ ምንጻል፣ ምክትታልን ምጉዕዓዝን እንተጌረን” ኢሉ።
en-mt: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, director-general of the WHO, said: "If countries respond to their people, identify, investigate, isolate, monitor and travel."

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: “እዚ ዘሰቅቕ መጠነ ዝርግሐን ጽኑዕነትን ከምኡ’ውን ኣሻቓሊ መጠን ሸለልትነት ብዙሕ የተሓሳስበና ኣሎ።”
en-mt: "We are deeply concerned about this terrible scale of uncertainty and resilience and the increasing level of neglect."

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: ብ መሰረት ዶ/ር ቶም ፍሬይደን፡ ኣብ ሕሉፍ እዋን ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ማእኸል ቁጽጽርን ምክልኽልን ሕማም ዳይሬክተር ዝነበሩ፡ እቲ ለበዳ "ዘይተሓሰበ" ክብሉ ኣቐሚጦሞ።
en-mt: According to Dr. Tom Freyden, former director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Control, the pandemic was described as "unintended."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ CNN ናይ ፈብሩዋሪ ሕታም፣ ''ካብ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ወጻኢ፣ ካብ መልዓሊኡ እስካብ ዓለምለኻዊ ዝርጋሐኡ ኣሰሩ ዝተጸንዐ ናይ መተንፈሲ ቫይረስ የለን።" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: According to cnn's February issue, he said: 'Outside the flu, there is no respiratory virus that has been studied from its rise to its global spread."

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: ገብረየሱስ “ ከምዚ ዝመሰለ ብኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተላዕለ ለበዳ ተራዕዩ ኣይፈልጥን” ክብል ተመሳሳሊ ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: He said: "There has never been a coronavirus pandemic like this.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ''ቅድሚ ሐዚ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ እዋን ኣብ ቁጽጽር ክውዕል ዝኽእል ለበዳ ርኢና ኣይንፈልጥን' ኢሉ ድማ ቀጸለ
en-mt: 'We've never seen an outbreak before that could be controlled at the same time,' he continued.

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: እቲ ሓድሽ ቅዋም ነቲ ናይ ጥሪ ናይ WHO ናይ ላብዕ ውሳኔ ተኸቲሉ፣ ነዚ ዓለምለኸ ትኹረት ዘድልዮ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ህጹጽ ኣዋን ክብል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: He followed the WHO's january decision and declared it a public health emergency that needs international attention.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ብሄራዊ ናይ ሕማም ኣለርጂን ረኽሲን ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ኣንቶኒ ፋውሲ "ናይ መጨረሻ መስመር፣ ኣዝዮ እናገደደ ክኸይድ እዩ" ኢሎም።
en-mt: Dr. Anthony Fauci, Director of the U.S. National Allergy and Infections, said: "The last line will get worse."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: ብሓሙስ ኣሶስየትድ ፕርስ ኣብ ዓለም ብውሕዱ 126,000ሕሙማት ኮቪድ-19 ከምኡ’ውን 4,600ሰባት ከም ዝሞቱ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On Thursday, The Associated Press reported that at least 126,000 covid-19 patients and 4,600 people died in the world.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: እዚ ኣብ 2019-20 ዝተኸስተ ለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ከም መቀጸልታ ናይ 2019 ለበዳዊ ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ( COVID-19) ኮይኑ፡ብ ስቪር ኣኲት ረስፒራቶሪ ሲንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2(ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2) ዝተባህለ ቫይረስ ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: This 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic is a continuation of the 2019 coronavirus pandemic (COVID-19), a virus called Sars-Cov-2.

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ዲሰምበር 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን፣ ቻይና ተፈሊጡ፣ ፌብሩዋሪ 30 2020 ደማ ህጹጽ ዓለምለኽዊ ሓደጋ ተባሂሉ ተኣዊጁ፣ ክም ለበዳ ድማ ኣብ ማርች 11 ፣2020 ኣፍልጦ ተዋሂቡዋ።
en-mt: he pandemic was declared a global emergency in Wuhan on December 30, 2020 and was declared a global emergency on March 11, 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: ካብ 10 ኤፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣስታት 1.61 ሚልዮን ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ኣብ 210 ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ተመዝጊቦም ይርከቡ። 97,000 ከኣ ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, some 1.61 million COVID-19 patients have been registered in 210 countries and territories, and 97,000 have died.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: ከባቢ 364000 ዝኾኑ ሰባት ሓውዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሞት ደረጃ ኣብ ቻይና 4%፣ ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ ድማ ካብ 13.04% ኣብ ኣልጀሪያ ክሳብ .08% ኣብ ኒውዚላንድ ከምዝኸውን ተገሚቱ ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The death rate was estimated to be 4% in China and from 13.04% globally in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: እቶም ዝተለመዱ ምልክታት ረስኒ፡ ሰዓል ን ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕጽረት ዘጠቓለሉ እዮም።
