en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሕልኽላኻት ከም እኒ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ከምኡ እውን ከቢድ ናይ ምትንፋስ ጸቕጢ ምልክት ዘጠቓለሉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: It can include symptoms such as a stroke and severe respiratory stress symptoms.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ካብ እዋን ተጋላጽነት ስጋብ ምልክታት ምርኣይ ዘሎ ጊዜ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲታት ክኾንከሎ፡ ይኹን ደኣምበር ካብ ክለተ እስካብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲታት ክዛይድ ይኽ እል እዩ።
en-mt: he time period for showing symptoms is five days, but it can be longer than two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ ዝተፈልጠ ክታበት ወይ’ውን ውሱን ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒት የለን።
en-mt: To date, there is no known vaccine or limited anti-virus drug.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: መጀመርያ ዝወሃብ ምልክታውን ደገፋውን ሕክምና እዩ።ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ኣፍካ ሸፊንካ ምስዓል፡ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀትካ ምሕላው፡ ንዝተጠርጠሩ ሕሙማት ድማ ፈሊኻ ምክትታል ገለ ኣብነታት ከም ቅድመ-ሕክምና ክግበሩ ዝኽእሉ ጥንቃቄታት`ዮም።
en-mt: he first step is to wash your hands, cover your mouth, maintain social distancing, and isolate patients who are suspected of taking precautions such as pre-treatment.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ሰበ ስልጣን ግብረመልሲ በዚ ዝስዕብ መንገዲ ሂቦም ናይ ጉዕዞ ክልከላታት፣ ውሸባ፣ እዋን እቶእቶ፣ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ምክልኻል መጉዳእቲ፣ ከምኡ ውን ምዕጻው ትካል ብምፍጻም መልሲ ሂቦም እዮም።
en-mt: Authorities around the world have responded in the following ways: Travel restrictions, quarantines, entry times, workplace injuries protection, and company closures.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ብዙሓት ዓለምለኻዊ ማሕበራዊን ቁጠባዊን ምፍርራስ ንኽምርሑ ዝገበረ እንትኾን፣ ናይ ስፖርታዊ ጸወታታት፣ ሃይማኖታዊ ጉዳያት፣ ፖለቲካዊን ባህላዊን ምድላዋት ፣ጊዜ ምምሕልላፍ ውይድማ ስረዛን ምስ ናይ ድንጋጸ ዕድጊት ዓቑሑት ተተሓሒዙ ናይ ቀረባት ሕጽረት እውን ኣጋጢሙ እዩ።
en-mt: he pandemic has led to many global social and economic collapses, with sporting games, religious affairs, political and cultural preparations, time transfers and cancellations associated with the purchase of goods of compassion.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: ትምህርትታትን ትካላት ላዕለዋይ ትምህርትን ብሃገር ደረጃ ወይ’ውን ብዞባዊ ደረጃ ኣብ 193 ሃገራት ተዓጽየን። እዚ ከኣ ንኣስታት 99.4 ምኢታዊት ናይ ዓለም ተመሃሮ ዝጸሉ’ዩ።
en-mt: Education and higher education institutions have been closed at a national level or even a regional level in 193 countries, affecting about 99.4 percent of the world's students.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: ብ መንገዲ ናይ ኢንተርኔት መርበብ ኣቢሉ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጋገየ ሓበሬታ ተዘርጊሑ እዩ፡ ናብ ናይ ቻይና ህዝቢታትን፡ ናብ ካልኦት ናይ ምብራቕን ደቡብ ምብራቕ ኤሽያ ዝኾኑ ሰባትን ዝመስሉን ናብ ካብ ብቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዐ ቦታ ዝመጹ ሰባት ዘቕነዐ ናይ ዜኖፎቢያን ምግላላልን ኣጋጣሚታት ነይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus has spread through the Internet, and there have been opportunities for xenophobic and isolation to Chinese populations and other people in Eastern and Southeast Asia who seem to have come from affected areas.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ውሑድ ጉዕዞን ናይ ከበድቲ ኢንዱስትሪታት ምዕጻዉን፣ ኣብ ብኽለት ኣየር ን ናይ ካርቦን ልቀትን ቀኒሱ እዩ።
en-mt: Due to limited travel and the closure of heavy industries, air pollution and carbon emissions have decreased.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን፣ ቻይና(ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ዋና ኸተማ) ዝርከቡ ናይ ጥዕና ሰብ ስልጣናት፣ ድሕሪ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 31 2019 መልዓሊኦም ዘይፍለጡ ናይ ኒሞኒያ ጉጅለ ግዳያት ጸብጻብ ምቕራቦም፣ ኣብ መጀመሪያ ወርሒ ጃኑዋሪ 2020 ምርመራ ምክያድ ተጅሚሩ።
en-mt: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of the Hubey Province); after reporting cases of a nimonia group unknown to their counterparts in December 31, 2019; an investigation began in early January 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: መብዛሕቲኦም ጉዳያት ምስ ሁዋናን ናይ ባሕሪ ምግቢ ጅምላ መሸጢ ዕዳጋ ርክብ ዝነበሮም እዮም በዚድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳት ዝተበገስ ክምዝኸውን ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: Most of the cases have been linked to Juana and seafood wholesale market, so it is believed that the virus was caused by animals.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ነዚ ለበዳ ዘምጽኦ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተባህለ ሓድሽ ቫይረስ ኮይኑ ምስ ኣብ መንካዕ ዝርከቡ ኮሮናቫይረሳት፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮሮናቫይረሳትን ሳርስ-ኮቭን ዝመሳሰል’ዩ። እቲ መጀመርታ ምልክታት ዘርኣየ ሰብ ብ1ዲሰምበር 2019 ከምዝሓመመ ድሒሩ ተፈሊጡ። እዚ ሰብ ከኣ ምስቶም ብድሕሪኡ ዝተረኽቡ ናይ ዕዳጋ ዓሳን ካልእን ጉጅለ ርኡይ ርክብ ከምዘይብሉ’ዩ ዝፍለጥ።
en-mt: The outbreak is a new virus called SARS-CoV-2, similar to the infected coronaviruses, pangolins, coronaviruses, and SARS-CoVs in bats, which later became diagnosed with the first symptoms on 1 December 2019, and is known to have no visible connection to the subsequent fish and other marketing groups.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: ክልተ ሲሶ ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ብታሕሳስ 2019 ዝተረኽቡ ጉጅለ ሕሙማት ምስቲ ቦታ ዕዳጋ ርክብ ነይርዎም።
en-mt: Wo-thirds of the first group of patients found in December 2019 were in contact with the shopping site.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 13 2020፣ ሓደ ምንጩ ዘይተፈለጠ ጸብጻብ ከምዝሓበሮ ናብ ኖቨምበር 17 2019 ብምምላስ፣ ኣብ ሓደ ወዲ 55 ዓመት ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ነባሪ ዘጋጠመ ጉዳይ እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ክኾን ከምዝኽእል ጥቆማ ሂቡ። ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 26 2020 ዝተገበረ ናይ WHO ጸብጻብ ክምዝሕበሮ፣ ኣብ ቻይና ዝርከቡ ሓደሸቲ ጉዳያት እናቐነሱ ኣብ ዝኸዱሉ፣ ኣብ ጣላያን፣ ኢራን ን ደቡብ ኮሪያን ሃንደበት ብምውሳኹ፣ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ዘጋጥሙ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ንመጀመሪያ ካብቶም ኣብ ቻይና ውሽጢ ዝረኣዩ በሊጾም ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: On March 13, 2020, an unknown source said that an unknown report returned to November 17, 2019, suggesting that a permanent case in a 55-year-old hubby province could have been the beginning of the outbreak. A WHO report on February 26, 2020 showed that new cases in China had declined, with the sudden increase in it in Italia, Iran and South Korea; and new cases outside China were the first to appear inside China.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: በተላይ ኣብ መንጎ እቶም ቀሊል ምልክት ዘርኣዩ ተተሓሒዙ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ቁጽሪ ዘለዎ ናይ ጉዳያት ኣትሒትካ ጸብጻብ ምግባር ክህሉ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, there may be a large number of reports of cases involving those who show mild symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: ብ ፌብሩዋሪ 26 ኣብ መንእሰያት ዝወሓደ ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ተራእዩ፡ 19ን ትሕቲኡን ዝዕድሚኦም 2.4% ናይ ዓለም ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ነይሮም። Herd immunity ክምዕብል እንተኾይኑ፡ 60% ህዝቢ ብሪተይን በቲ ቫይረስ ክልከፉ ከምዘለዎም ናይ ብሪተይን ቀንዲ ኣማኻሪ ሳይንስ ፓትሪክ ቫላንስ ይትንትን።
en-mt: In February 26, fewer patients were seen in young people, 2.4% of the world's population aged 19 and under. If Herd immunity was to develop, 60% of Brittany's population would have to be infected, according to Patrick Valance, Brittany's lead science adviser.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: ግዳይ ክበሃል ከሎ ቁጽሪ ናይቶም COVID-19 ዝተመርመሩን፡ ውጽኢት መርመርኦም ከኣ በቲ መሰረት ዝተዳለወ ፕሮቶኮል ሕማም ከምዘለዎም ምስዝረጋገጽ’ዩ።
en-mt: he number of people tested for COVID-19 and their results confirmed that they had a disease according to the protocol.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: ኣብ 23 ማርች፡ ልዕሊ 3% ህዝቦም ዝመርመሩ ወላሓደ ሃገር ኣይነበርን። ብዙሓት ሃገራት ከም በኣል ጥልያን፡ ነዘርላንድስ፡ ስፓኛን ስዊዘርላንድን ውሑድ ምልክታት ንዘለዎም ከይምርምሩ ወግዓዊ ፖሊሲታት ነይርወን።
en-mt: On 23 March, no country tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries, such as Baal, Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland, had official policies not to check for those with fewer symptoms.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ክሳብ 23 ጃኑዋሪ ኣስታት 86% ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መልከፍቲ ብመርመራ ከምዘይተረኽበን እዞም ዘይተመዝገቡ መልከፍቲ ከኣ ኣብ 79% ናይ እቶም ዝተረኽበሎም ሰባት ከም መበገሲ ናይ እዚ ለብዒ ከምዝነበረ ብ16 ማርች ዝተዘርግሐ መጽናዕቲ ይሕብር።
en-mt: A study released on March 16 found that 86% of COVID-19 cases had not been tested in China as of January 23, and these unregistered cases were the cause of the outbreak in 79% of cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: ብ30 ማርች ዝተሓትመ ጸብጻብ ብዘርእዮ ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን ካብቲ ዝተሓበረ መጠን ከም ዝዛይድ ተገምጊሙ።
en-mt: A report published on March 30 found that the number of cases in Italy is higher than reported.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ፈለማ ናይ COVID-19መሰረታዊ ቁጽሪ ምርባሕ(R0) ኣመልኪቱ ዝነበሩ ግምታት 1.4 እስካብ 2.4 እዮም ነይሮም።
en-mt: The initial estimates on the basic number of COVID-19 breeding (R0) were 1.4 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: ብ ናይ US ማእኸል ቁጽጽር ሕማምን ምክልኻልን ዝተሓተመ ጽንዓት ምናልባት 5.7 ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ እሉ መደምደምታ ገይሩ።
en-mt: The endurance published by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it was probably 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: ብዙሓት COVID-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ይሓውዩ’ዮም።
en-mt: Many people with COVID-19 have recovered.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: ኣብቶም ዘይኮኑ፡ ካብ ናይ ምልክታት ምዕባለ ጀምሩ እስካብ ሞት ዘሎ ጊዜ ካብ 6 ክሳብ 41 መዓልቲታት ኮይኑ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዝተለመደ ግን 14 መዓልቲታት እዩ።
en-mt: In non-patients, the period from symptom development to death is 6 to 41 days, but the most common is 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 10 2020 ጅሚሩ፣ክባቢ 97,000 ዝኾኑ ሞታት ብሰንኪ COVID-19 እዮም ኣጋጢሞም።
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, around 97,000 deaths have been caused by COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ካብ ፈብሩዋሪ 5 ጀሚሩ ክባቢ 80% ዝኾኑ ሞታት ኣብቶም ካብ 60 ዓመት ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ እንትኾን እቶም 75% ድማ ን ናይ ልቢ ሕማማትን ናይ ሽኮሪያን ሓዊሱ ካልኦት ዝጸንሐ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ዘለዎም እዮም። እቶም ዕላው ዝተገበሩ ናይ ብ COVID-19 ለበዳ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ማለት እቶም ብ ኦፊሳላዊ ፕሮቶኮላት ዝተረጋገጹ COVID ዝተረኸቦም ዝሞቱ ሰባት ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: In China, as of February 5, about 80% of deaths have been attributed to people over the age of 60, 75% to heart diseases and diabetes, and others with long-term health conditions.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: ሓቀኛ ቁጽሪ ሞት ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ነቶም ከይተመርመሩ ኣብ ገዛ፡ ኣብ ክንክን ቦታታት...ወዘተ. ዝሞቱ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ስለዘይኮነንዝያዳ ክኽውን ተኽእሎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: True death toll from COVID-19 in care settings at home without being tested.. Ad. It is possible that they are dead because they are not considered.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን ዝተረኽበ ሓበሬታ ከምዝረኽቦ፡ ኣብቲ ግዜ ለበዳ ዝነበረ ቁጽሪ ዝያዳ ሞት ነቲ ወግዓዊ ናይ ኮቪድ ቁጽሪ ሞት ብ4-5x ይበልጾ።
en-mt: According to data in Italy, the number of deaths during the pandemic is 4-5x.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: ናይ U.S. ማእኽል ምቁጽጽር ሕማምን ምክልኻልን( CDC) ቃል ኣቐባሊ "እቲ ናይ ሞት ትምበያ ኣትሒትና ገሚትናዮ ኢና" ክብሉ ኣሚኖም፡ እዚ ድማ፡ ብ ናይ U.S. ናይ ትሕተ ግምት ቁጽሪታት ክም ናይ 2009 H1N1 ዝበሉ ናይ ስዋይን ፍሉ ለበዳታት ዝተውሃቦም ትሕተ ግምት ዝጠናኸር ኣገላልጻ እዩ። እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ዝተረጋገጥጸ ጉዳይ ኣብ ዉሃን ጃኑዋሪ 9 2020 እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) admitted that "we underestimated the mortality forecast," a statement reinforced by U.S. subconsistence figures for the 2009 H1N1 swine flu outbreaks.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: ካብ ሜይን ላንድ ቻይና ወጻኢ ዝተመዝገበ ናይ መጀምሪያ ሞት፡ኣብ ፊሊፒንስ ፈብሩዋሪ 1 እዩ ኣጋጢሙ፡ ካብ ኤሽያ ወጻኢ እቲ ናይ መጀመሪያ ሞት ድማ ፈብሩዋሪ 14 ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ዘጋጠመ እዩ።
en-mt: he first recorded deaths outside Main Land, China, took place in the Philippines on February 1, and the first outside Asia occurred in France on February 14.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 28፣ ካብ ቻይና ሜይን ላንድ ወጻኢ፣ ኣብ ኢራን፣ ደቡብ ኮሪያን ጣልያንን ኣብ ሐሕድሕደን ካብ ደርዝን ንላዕሊ ሞት ኣመዝጊበን።
en-mt: On February 28, outside China's Main Land, Iran, South Korea and Italy recorded more deaths than each other.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ብ ማርች 13 ልዕሊ ኣርብዓ ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ካብ ኩለን ኣህጉራት ብዠይካ ኣንታርቲካ ቅትለት/ሞት ሓቢረን። መጠነ-ሞት ብዙሕ መለክዒታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: On March 13, more than forty countries and territories from all continents reported homicides/deaths from all continents.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽሪታት ብክልላትን ብጊዜን ዝፈላለዩ እንትኾኑ፣ ብዝግበሩ ናይ ምርመራታት መጠን፣ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ስርዓታት ጽርየት፣ ናይ ሕክምና ኣማራጺታት፣ ካብ እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ለበዳ ኣትሒዙ ዘሎ ግዜ፣ ከምኡውን ከም ዕድመ፣ ጾታን ኣጠቓላሊ ጥዕናን ዝኣምሳሉ ናይ ህዝቢ መግለጺታት ዝጽለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: hese numbers vary by regions and times, and are influenced by the amount of tests carried out, the cleanup of health care systems, treatment options, the time since the start of the pandemic, and public statements such as age, gender and general health.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ መጠነ-ዝምድና ሞትን ሕማምን 6.0%(97,039/1,617,204) ምዃኑ ናይ 10 ኤፕሪል 2020 Johns Hopkins University (ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርስቲ) ስታቲስቲክስ የርኢ።
en-mt: The global ratio of death and disease is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) statistics from Johns Hopkins University (John Hopkins University) on April 10, 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: እቲ ቁጽሪ ብ ክልላት ይፍላለ እዩ።
en-mt: The number varies in the regions.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና መጠነ-ዝምድና ምዉታንን ሕሙማትን ካብ 17.3%(ነቶም ካብ ዕለት 1-10 ጥሪ 2020 ምልክታት ንዘርኣዩ)ናብ 0.7%(ድሕሪ ዕለት 1 የካቲት 2020 ምልክታት ንዘርኣዩ)ጎዲሉ። ካልኦት ዓቐናት ከም ናይ ሕሙማት መጠን ሞት፡ማለት መጠነ ሞት ናይቶም ዝሓመሙ ብሚእታዊት ዘርኢ ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ዝተበከሉ መጠነ ሞት፡ማለት መጠነ ሞት ናይቶም ብመርመራ ዝተፈልጡን ዘይተመርመሩን ዝተለኽፉ ብሚእታዊት ዘርኢ’ውን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: In China, the ratio of dead and patient relationships has decreased from 17.3% (for those who show symptoms from 1-10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those who show symptoms after 1 February 2020), and other measures, such as the death rate of the sick, the mortality rate of those infected by the sperm, and the percentage of those infected by diagnosis.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዞም እስታትስቲክሳት ኣብ ጊዜ ዝተወሰኑ ኣይኮኑን፣ ናይ ህዝቢታት ብዝሓት ብመንጽር ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ጉዳያት ዝድረኹ እዮም።
en-mt: hese statistics are not limited to time, and many people are affected by cases of infection.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: ብዙሓት ምሁራት ኣብ ዝተወሰነ በዝሒ ህዝቢ፣ ነዞም ቁጽሪታት ንምስራሕ ሙከራ ገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: A number of students have attempted to use these numbers.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: ናይ ኦክስፎርድ ዩኒቨርሲቲ( University of Oxford) ናይ ኣብ መርዳእታ ዝተደረኸ ሕክምና ማእኸል( Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine) ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ናይ ረኽሲ ሞት ናይ ምስዓብ መጠን ኣብ መንጎ 0.1% ን 0.39% እዩ ክብል ግምቱ ኣቐሚጡ።
en-mt: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the epidemic's infection mortality rate is between 0.1% and 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ሬንጅ እዚ ላዕለዋይ ግምት ምስ ውጽኢታት እቲ ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተኻየደ ሃንደበታዊ ናይ COVID-19 ምርመራታት ን ኣብ CFR ምርመራ ምግባር ዘለዎ ጽልዋ ዘጽንዕ ናይ እስታቲክሳዊ ጽንዓት ሓቢሮም ዝኸዱ እዮም።
en-mt: he top estimate of this range goes in conjunction with the results of a statistical study that studies the impact of sudden COVID-19 tests in Germany and the impact of CFR testing.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: WHO እዚ ለበዳ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቑጽጽር ክውዕል ይኽእል እዩ ኢሉ ኣቐሚጡ እዩ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has said the pandemic can be controlled.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: እቲ ዝጠንከረ እዋን ናይ’ዚ ለበዳ ከምኡ’ውን ክሳብ መዓስ ክቅጽል’ዩ ኣይተፈልጠን። ካብ ቦታ ናብ ቦታ’ውን ይፈላለ።
en-mt: The strongest period of the pandemic and how long it will continue is unknown, and it varies from place to place.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University (ማሲየጅ ቦኒ ካብ ፐን ስቴት ዩኒቨርስቲ) “ብዘይ ዝኾነ ቁጽጽር ዋላ እንተኾነ፡ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ጥርዚ ዝርግሐ ድሕሪ ምብጽሖም ዝልከፉ ሰባት ምስ ሰኣኑ ክጎድሉ ይጅምሩ” ኢሉ።
en-mt: Maciej Boni of Penn State University (Massiej Boni of Penn State University) said: "Despite no control, people who are infected begin to decline after the spread of infectious diseases reaches the end of January."

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ኣብዚ ሒዚ ሰዓት እዚ መዓስ ክኽውን ከምዝኽእል ዘርኢ ትኽክለኛ ትንበያ ምሃብ ኣይከኣልን።
en-mt: However, it is not possible to predict when it will happen at this time.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: ናይ መንግስቲ ቻይና ነባር ናይ ሕክምና ኣማኻሪ ጆንግ ናንሻን እንድሕር ደኣ ኩለን ሃገራት ብመሰረት ነዚ ለበዳ ቫይረስ ጠጠው ንምባል ብዛዕባ ክውሰዱ ዝግበኦም ስጉምቲታት ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ምኽሪ ንምስዓብ እንድሕር ተለዓዒለን "ስጋብ ሰነ ክጠፍእ ይኽእል እዩ" ኢሎም ክርክር ኣልዒሎም።
en-mt: China's government's longtime medical adviser, Jong Nanshan, has raised arguments that "meat could disappear by June" if all countries follow WHO advice on measures to end the pandemic.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: አብ ማርች 17፣ ናይ ለንደን ቤት ትምህርቲ ጥዕና አዳም ኩቻርስኪ &amp፤ ትሮፒካዊ መድሓኒት ከም ዘመልከቶ SARS-CoV-2 “ ንሓደ ወይከዓ ንክልተ ዓመት ዝአክል ከዘዋወር ወይከዓ ክሰራጨው ይኽእል እዩ ኢሉ”።
en-mt: On March 17, the Adam Kucharsky &, London School of Health, said SARS-CoV-2 "could spread for a year or two."

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: ብመሰረት ብ ኔይል ፈርጉሰን ዝተመርሐ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ኢምፐሪያል ኮሌጅ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቕ ን ካልኦት ስጉምቲታትን “እስካብ ከታበት ዝርከብ(ኣብ ውሽጢ 18 ኣዋርሕ ውይድማ ካብኡ ንላዕሊ)” ኣድለይቲ እዮም ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: According to a study led by Neil Ferguson, Imperial College physical distancing and other measures are necessary "as long as it is available (within 18 months of use or more) "

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: ዊልያም ሻፍነር ካብ ቫንደርቢት ዩኒቨርሲቲ() " እዚ ኮረና ቫይረስ እዚ፣ ብ ቕልጡፍ ዝምሓላለፍ ብምዃኑ መሊኡ ኣይክጠፍእን እዩ" ኢሉ ብምግላጽ "ወቕቲ እናሓለወ ዝመጽእ፣ በቢዓመቱ ዝመለስ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ" ክብል ሓሳቡ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: William Schaffner of Vanderbeat University said: "This coronavirus will not be completely eradicated because it is rapidly transmitted."

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: መሊስካ ናይ ምትሳእ ጉዳይ ኣብ ናይ ማሕበረሰብ ምክልኻል ሕማምን ኣብ ዝርግሐ ናይ እቲ ለበዳን ዝተሞርኮሰ እዩ።
en-mt: he issue of resuscitation depends on the community's immune system and the spread of the pandemic.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ምልክታት ብ ኣንጻራዊነት ዓርሶም ክኢሎም ዝፍለዩ ኣይኮኑን፣ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ድማ ምንም ዓይነት ምልክት ዘይከርእዩ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Symptoms of COVID-19 are not relatively different, and people who are infected may not have any symptoms.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: ረስንን(88%) ደረቕ ሰዓልን(68%) እቶም ብብዝሒ ዝረኣዩ ምልክታት’ዮም።
en-mt: Fever (88%) and dry cough (68%) are the most commonly seen symptoms.

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: ብዙሕ ልሙዳት ዘይኮኑ ምልክታት ድኻም፡ ካብ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ዝወጽእ ዓኽታ (ፋልጀም)፡ ናይ ምጭናው ተኽእሎ ምስኣን፡ ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ፡ ናይ ጭዋዳታትን ናይ መገጣጠምን ቃንዛ፡ ዝቖሰለ ጉሮሮ፡ ሕማም ርእሲ ፡ ምንቅጥቃጥ፡ ተምላስ፡ ሄሞፕትይሲስ፡ ውጽኣት ውይድማ ሳያኖሲስ ዘጠቓለሉ እዮም። WHO ከምዘቕምጦ ካብ ሹዱሽተ ሰባት እቲ ሓደ ኣዝዩ ብኸቢድ ክሓምምን ናይ ምትንፋስ ጸገም ከጋጥሞ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Many uncommon symptoms include fatigue, poor breathing, lack of breathing, muscle and joint pain, injured throat, headaches, hemoptysis, diarrhea, hemoptysis, diarrhea, and cyanosis.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: ናይ U.S. ማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ተላባእቲ ሕማማት (CDC)ዝርዝር ናይ ሕጹጽነት ምልክታት ከም ሕጽረት ትንፋስ፡ ዘየቋርጽ ቃንዛ ወይ ጸቅጢ ኣፍልቢ፡ሓንደበታዊ ምድንጋር፡ኣብ ምንቅስቃስ ምሽጋርን ሰመያዊ ከናፍር ወይ ገጽ ዘጠቃለለ ኣውጽዩ። እዘን ምልክታት ኣብ ዝረኣየሉ እዋን ሕጹጽ ሕክምና ከምዘድሊ’ውን ይመክር። እቲ ሕማም እናማዕበለ ምስዝኸይድ ብርቱዕ ረኽሲ ሳንቡእ፡ሓንደበታዊ ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ፡ረኽሲ ደም፡ሕጽረት ዝውውር ደምን ሞትን ከስዕብ ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Infectious Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has issued a list of emergency signs such as shortness of breath, constant pain or chest pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty in movement and the need for immediate treatment when these symptoms appear, and it also recommends urgent treatment when the disease develops, severe lung infections, sudden shortness of breath, blood transfusions and deaths.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: ገለ ካብቶም ዝተለኸፉ ምንም ዓይነት ምልከት ዘይከርእዩ ይኽእሉ፣ እዚ ማለት ድማ ምንም ዓይነት ክሊኒካዊ ምልክት ኣየርእዩን ግን ድማ ምርመራት ህላወ ረኽሲ ዘረጋግጹ እዮም። ስለዚ፣ ተመራመርቲ ነቶም ምስ እቲ ዝተረጋገጸ ጉዳይ ዘለዎ ሰብ ናይ ቀረባ ምንኽኻእ ዘልዎም ሰባት ብቐረባ ክትትል ክግበረሎም ክምዘለዎን ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ህላወ ንምፍላጥ ዝግበሩ ምርመራታት ክገብሩ ከምዘለዎም ይምኽሩ።
en-mt: Some of those infected may not see any signs of infection, which means they show no clinical symptoms, but diagnostics confirm the presence of infection, so researchers recommend that people who have close contact with someone with a confirmed case be monitored closely and tested to determine the presence of the infection.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: ቻይና ናይ ምልክት ዘይርኣዩ ካብ ውሑዳት እስካብ 44% ክምዝበጽሕ ተምቢያ።
en-mt: China is set to increase the number of signs to 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: ዝበዝሐ ግዜ እቲ መራብሒ ግዘ ( ኣብ መንጎ መልከፍትን ምልክት ሕማም ዝረኣየሉ ዘሎ ግዜ) ዝበዝሐ ግዜ ሓሙሽተ መዓልታት ዋላ እንተኮነ፡ ካብ ሓደ ክሳብ 14 መዓልታት ይፈላለ። ከም ኣብነት ናይ ዘይርጉጽነት፡ ገምጋም ናይቶም COVID-19 ዝሓዞም’ሞ ናይ ሽታ ምልላይ ክእለቶም ዘጥፍኡ መጀመርያ 30% ዝነበረ ናብ 15% ወሪዱ።
en-mt: Usually, the hunger period (between an infection and symptoms) usually varies from one to 14 days, but the uncertainty assessment of those who contract COVID-19 has dropped to 15% at the first 30%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: እዚ ሕማም ብዝርዝር ብኸመይ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ገና ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Details of how this disease spread are still under investigation.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ቀንዲ ብቀረባ ርክብ ኣብ ዝህሉን፡ ቀረባ ማለት ትሕቲ 1-2 ሜትሮ(3-6 feet)፡ ወይ ድማ ብዓይኒ ዘይረኣዩ ኣብ ግዜ ምስዓል፡ ምሕንጣስ ወይ ምዝራብ ዝስወጹ ደቀቅቲ ባእታታት እዩ ዝመሓላለፍ።
en-mt: The disease is transmitted mainly in close proximity, i.e. less than 1-2 feet (3-6 feet) or microbes that are invisible during coughing, sneering, or speaking.

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: መጽናዕቲታት ክምዝሕብሩዋ ካብ ዘይተሸፈነ ምስዓል ዝወጽኡ ንጣባት ካብ 4.5 ሜትር (15 ፊት) እስካብ 8.2 ሜትር(27 ፊት) ክጎዓዙ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Studies show that unsubsured images can travel from 4.5 feet (15 feet) to 8.2 feet (27 feet).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: ዋላኳ እቲ ቫይረስ ብ ኣጠቓላሊ ኣየር ወለድ እንተዘይኮነ፣ዝተወሰኑ ሰባት እቲ ቫይረስ ብ ኣናኡሽተይ፡ ኣብ እዋን ዘረባ ክፍጠሩ ዝኽእሉ፡ ኣብ ኣየር ን ዝነውሐ ጊዘ ዝጸንሑ ንጣባት ክመሓላለፍ ክምዝኸእል ርእይቶ የቕርቡ። ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ንጣባት ኣብ እዋን ን ደገ ምንፋስ፡ ኣብ ዘረባ ሰዓት ሓዊሱ ክፍጠሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Although the virus is not airborne in general, some people suggest that the virus can be transmitted to long-term air-conditioned drops that can be formed during small speech, and respiratory networks can be burned during outdoor breathing.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: እዞም ባእታታት ኣብ ኣፍ ወይ ኣፍንጫ ብቀረባ ዝርከቡ ሰባት ክዓልቡ ወይ ድማ ንውሽጢ ሳናቡእ ክኣትዉ ይኽእሉ’ዮም።
en-mt: hese elements can land in people's mouth or nose or enter the lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ገለገለ ሕክምናዊ መስርሂታት ከም በዓል ኢንቱቤሽንን Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation(CPR) ነቲ ኣብቲ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዝጸንሕ ኣኽታ ምስ ኣየር ብምሕዋስ ኣብ ኣየር ዝርግሐ ቫይረስ የስዕቡ።
en-mt: Some medical procedures, such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), cause the spread of viruses in the air by mixing the respiratory aches with the air.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: ዝተበከለ ንብረት ወይ ኣካል ከም ቆርበት ተንኪፍካ ዓይንኻ፡ ኣፍንጫኻ ወይ ኣፍካ ብምሓዝ እቲ ቫይረስ ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: Contaminated property or body can spread by touching the skin, eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: ብ ዓይኒ ምድሪ ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ ዝብሉ ስግኣታት እኳ እንተሃለዉ፣ እዚ ሓደጋ ግን ኣዝዩ ዝተሓተ እዩ።
en-mt: Despite the risks that it can be transmitted through the earth's eyes, this risk is much lower.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና መንግስቲ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ብ መንገዲ ዐይኒ ምድሪ ናይ ምምሓልላፍ ትኽእሎኡ ክሒዶሞ እዮም። እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ'ቲ ምልክት ዝረኣየሉ ጊዜ ጀሚሩ ዘለዋ ናይ መጀምሪያ ሰለስተ መዓልቲታት ኣዝዩ ተምሓላላፋይ ዝኾነሉ እዩ ይኹን ዳኣመበር እቶም ምልክታት ቅድሚ ምርኣዮም ን ኣብቶም ቀጸልቲ ናይ'ቲ ሕማም እዋናትን 'ውን ምዝማቱ ክቕጽል ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: he Chinese government has blocked sarS-CoV-2 transmission through the earth's eyes, and the virus has been very convulsive for the first three days since the symptoms appear, but it can continue to spread before symptoms appear.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: ሰልስተ መዓልታት ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምምዕባሎም ሰባት ብመርመራ ሕማም ከምዘለዎም ክረጋገጽ ይከኣል’ዩ። እዚ ማለት ከኣ ብዘይ ዝኾነ ምልክት ተላባዕነት ከም ዘሎ ይሕብር።
en-mt: Three days before symptoms develop, people can be tested for disease, which means that there is no sign of infection.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: ብላባራቶሪ ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ ሕማም ምልክት ዘይብሎም ሰባት ውሑዳት’ዮም፡ ግን ኣብ ውሱናት ሃገራት ብዘይ ዝኾነ ምልክታት ሕማም ከመሓላልፉ ከምዝኽእሉ ዝተኻየዱ መጽናዕትታት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: Laboratory-confirmed people do not have symptoms, but studies have shown that in certain countries they can spread the disease without symptoms.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: ናይ ኣውሮፓ ማእኸል ምክልኻልን ምቁጽጽርን ሕማም( ECDC) ምንም እኳ እቲ ሕማም ብምንታይ መንገዲ ብቐሊሉ ከምዝመሓላለፍ እንተ ዘይተፈልጠ፡ሓደ ሰብ ግን በ ኣጠቓላሊ ክልተ ወይድማ ሰልስተ ሰባት ክብክል ይኽእል እዩ ኢሉ የቕምጥ። እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ሰዓታት ኣትሒዙ እስካብ መዓልቲታት ኣብ ናይ ኣካላት ገጽ ይጽንሕ እዩ።
en-mt: The European Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (ECDC) warns that although it is not known in what way the disease spreads easily, a person can infect two or three people in total.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: ግልጺ ብዥኮነ መልክዑ. እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ፕላስቲክ(ፖሊፕሮፓይሊን) ስጋብ ሰለስተ መዐልቲታት ክረኣ ክምዝኽእልን፡ 304 ድማ ኣብ ስተይንለስ ስቲል፡ ኣብ ካርቶን ድማ ን ሓደ መዓልቲ ፡ ኣብ ኮፐር ድማ ስጋብ ኣርባዕተ ሰዓታት ክፍለ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: in a clear form. he virus can be seen in plastic polypropylene for three days, 304 in steinles, steel for one day on cardboard and four hours in copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: እዙይ ግን፣ ኣብ ራሕሲን መጠን ሙቐትን ዝተደረኸ እዩ። ናይ ገዛ እንስሳትን ካልኦት እንስሳትን COVID-19 ተረኺቡዎም እዩ።
en-mt: however, this is driven by temperature and humidity, and domestic animals and other animals have been diagnosed with COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: ናይ ብሪጣንያ ሰበ-ስልጣን ድሕሪ እንስሳታት ምሓዝ ልክዕ ከምቲ ዝተለኽፈ ንብረት ድሕሪ ምሓዝካ ኣእዳውካ ተሓጸብ ዋላ’ኳ እንተበሉ፡እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳታት ናብ ሰባት ከምዝመሓላለፍ ዘርኢ መረዳእታ የልቦን።
en-mt: British authorities say that after catching animals, wash your hands just as after you have an infected property, even though there is no evidence that the virus is spreading from animals to humans.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ኖቨል ቫይረስ 2 ኮይኑ፣ ካብ ሰለስተ ኒሞኒያ ዘለዎም ምስ ኣብ ዉሃን ዘጋጠሙ ክበድቲ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ጸገም ዝተሓሓዙ ሰባት እዩ ንመጀምሪያ ጊዜ ተነጺሉ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is a novel virus 2, which has been isolated for the first time in three people with pneumonia and those with severe respiratory problems in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኩሉ መልክዓት ናይዚ ሓድሽ ዝተቐላቐለ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ቫይረስ ኣብ ተመሳሰልቲ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ይርከቡ። ካብ ሰውነት ወጻኢ ሳምና ነቲ ዝከላኸሎ ሽፋን ብምሕቓቕ ነዚ ቫይረስ ክቐትሎ ይኽእል። ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ምስቲ ነበር ሳርስ-ኮቭ ብቀረባ ይመሳሰል።
en-mt: All forms of the newly released SARS-CoV-2 virus are found in similar natural coronaviruses, and outside the body, soap can kill the virus by hugging its protective cover. SARS-CoV-2 is closely similar to sars-cov-2.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: ካብ እንስሳታት ዝተበገሰ ክምዝኸውን ይእመን።
en-mt: It is believed to be derived from animals.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: ናይ ጄነቲክ ምርምራት ከምዘጋለጹዎ ኮረና ቫይረስ ብ ጄኒቲክ ምስ ቤታኮረና ቫይረስዝምደብ እዩ፡ኣብ ደረጃ ክፋል ናይ ዓሌት ድማ ምስ ካልኦት ካብ መንካዕ ዝብገሱ ቫይረሳትን ምስ ሰበጅነስ ሳርብኮቫይረስ (ላይኔጅ B)) ዝምደብ እዩ።
en-mt: Genetic research has found that the coronavirus is genetically linked to the beta coronavirus, and in the genetic part of the species, it is associated with other respiratory viruses and sebene sarbcovirus (Lineage B)..

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: ምስ ካልኦት ናይ መንካዕ ኮርና ቫይረሳት(BatCov RaTG13) ኣብ ሙሉእ ናይ ጄነም ደረጃታት 96% ዝመሳሰል እዩ።
en-mt: BatCov RaTG13 is similar to other bat coronaviruses at 96% of the entire genem levels.

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ኣብ ሰባትን ፓንጎሊን ዝተብሃሉ እንስሳታትን ዝርከቡ ቫይረሳት፡ ናይ ሓደ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ፍልልይ ጥራይ ከምዘለዎም ብቻይናውያን ተመራመርቲ ብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: The only difference between viruses in humans and pangolin animals was found by Chinese researchers in February 2020.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: ሙሉእ ናይ ጀነቲክ ምምስሳላት ክምዘርእዩዎ ብንኡሱ 92% ናይ ጀነቲክ ባእታታት ኣብ መንጎ ፓንጎሊን ኮሮናቫይረስ ን SARS-CoV-2 በተመሳሳሊ ዝርከቡ እዮም፡ እዚ ድማ ፓንጎሊን ከም ማእኸለዋይ ተሸካሚ ኢልካ ንምርግግጋጽ እኹል ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: Full genetic analogies show that at  very 92% of genetic elements are found in the same way as pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is not enough to confirm pangolin as a medium carrier.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: በዚ ቫይረስ መልከፍቲ ብምልክታቱ ክፍለጥ’ኳ እንተተኻእለ ብናይ ኣኽታ reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction(rRT-PCR) መርመራታት ወይ ድማ ብCT ምስሊ ክረጋገጽ ኣልዎ።
en-mt: Although infections can be detected by the virus, they must be confirmed by a CT-image reaction or CT image.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: CT ካብ PCR ንላዕሊ ነቲ ሕማም ናይ ምርካብ ክእለት ከምዘለዎ ግን ከዓ ምስ ካልኦት ዓይነታት ኒሞንያን ሕማማትን ክፈልዮ ከምዘይክእል ኣብ ዉሃን ዝተኻየደ ንPCRን CTን ዘወዳድር መጽናዕቲ የመልክት።
en-mt: A study comparing PCR and CT found that CT has a higher ability to diagnose the disease than PCR, but cannot distinguish it from other forms of pneumonia and disease.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: ካብ ማርች 2020 ጅሚሩ፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ራዲዮሎጂ ኮሌጅ " CT ን COVID-19 ክም ናይ መጀመሪያ ናይ ምጻረዪ ምርመራ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል የብሉን" ክብሉ ተላቢዮም።
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology has been told that "CT and COVID-19 should not be used for initial covid-19 testing."

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ፕሮቶኮላት ምርመራ ናይ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 RNA ብWHO ተዘርጊሑ። እቲ ፋልማይ ብ ጃኑዋሪ 17 ተዘርጊሑ።
en-mt: Various diagnostic protocols for sars-cov-2 RNA were distributed by WHO. The falcon was released on Jan. 17.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: እቲ መርመራ ዝጥቀመሉ real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction(rRT-PCR)ይበሃል።
en-mt: The real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction used by the test is called rRT-PCR.

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: እዚ መርመራ ኣብ ኣካለ ምስትፋንስ ወይ’ውን ደም ክግበር ይከኣል።
en-mt: he test can be performed in the body or blood.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: ብሓፍሻ ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ውሑዳት ሰዓታት ክሳብ መዓልታት ይርከብ።
en-mt: Results are generally available in a few hours to days.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ እዚ መርመራ ብኣፍንጫን ሶርኖን ዝኣቱ ስዋብ ዋላ’ውን ናይ ጎሮሮ ስዋብ ክግበር ይከኣል’ዩ።ኣብ ደም ጸረ-ነፍሲ ዘለልዩ መርመራታት’ውን ብውሱናት ላባራቶሪታትን ካምፓኒታትን ይስርሑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Generally, this test can be performed by nose and sorno, even throat swabs, and anti-soul tests in blood are also being performed by determined laboratories and companies.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 6 2020፡ ጀሚሩ ካብዚ'ም ዋላ ሓደ ብገፊሑ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንክወዕል ብዝግባእ ዝተረጋገጸ ሓቅነት ክህልዎ ኣይከኣለን።
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, none of these have been widely verified.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: ኣብ US ብCellex ዝስራሕ ዘሎ ናይ ጸረ ቫይርስ መርመራ ብውሕስነቶም ዝተረጋገጸ ላባራቶሪታት ንህጹጽ ኣገልግሎት ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ተፈቒዱ።
en-mt: Antivirus testing done byCellex in the US has been approved for use by laboratories that are safely certified for emergency use.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: ናይ እቶም ምልክት ዘየርኣዩ ሰባት ዝተልዓሉ ናይ ራድዮ ግራፊን CT ምስሊታት ከምዘርእዩዎ asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions ዝበሉ ምልክታት የርእዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Radio graphin CT images of people who do not show symptoms show symptoms such asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: ብዓለምለኻዊ መርበብ ኢንተርነት ዝዝርጋሕ ናይ ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማት ስእላዊ ውጺእታት ብናይ ጥልያን ማሕበር ራድዮሎጂ ይዳለው ኣሎ።
en-mt: Pictures of confirmed patients, distributed through the global internet, are being produced by the Italian Radiology Association.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: ምስ ካልኦት ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ከም ኣደኖቫይረስ ክመሳሰል ስለዝኽእል፡ ን COVID-19 ብዘይ PCR ብምርኣይ ጥራይ ክፍለጥ ኣይክእልን’ዩ።
en-mt: It can be similar to other infectious diseases such as adenovirus, so COVID-19 cannot be detected simply by looking at PCR.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: ናይ ኣፍ ልቢ CT ውጽኢታት ምስ PCR ክወዳደር ከሎ ነዚ ለበዳ ካብ ካልኦት ሕማማት ናይ ምፍላይ ክእለቱ ዋላ’ኳ ትሑት እንተኾነ፡ ስሉጥን ሕማም ናይ ምልላይ ክእለቱ ልዑል ምዃኑን፡ ኣብ ቻይና ብዝተኻየደ ሰፊሕ መጽናዕቲ ተራእዩ። እዚ ከኣ ኣብ ለበዳዊ ቦታታት ከም ናይ መርመሪ መሳርሒ ክንጥቀመሉ ከም እንኽእል ይጥቁም።
en-mt: Compared to PCR, chest CT results showed that its ability to distinguish this outbreak from other diseases despite its low effectiveness and high detection capabilities, which are used as a testing tool in epidemiological sites.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: ብ ክልቲኦም ራድዮግራፍን CT ዝተልዓሉ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምስሊ መግለጺታት ንምርኣይ ዘኽእሉ ኣብ ኣርተፊሻል ኢንተለጀንስ ዝድረኹ ናይ ኮንቩሉሽናል ኒዩውራል ኔትዎርክታት(convolutional neural networks) ኣብ ምዕባለ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Convolutional neural networks, which are inspired by both radiographs and CT,are in development, allowing them to view images of the virus.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: ኣካላዊ ንጽህና ምህላው ኣእዳው ምህጻብ፡ብረሳሕ ኣእዳው ዓይንኻ፡ኣፍንጫኻ ወይ’ውን ኣፍካ ዘይምትንካፍ፡ናብ ሶፍት ምስዓል ወይ ምሕንጣስ ብድሕሪኡ ድማ ነቲ ሶፍት ብግቡእ ምድርባይ ገለ ካብቶም ምልባዕ ዘወግዱ ስጉምትታት’ዮም።
en-mt: Having physical  cleanliness, washing hands, eyes, nose or mouth with dirty hands, coughing or touching a soft, and then throwing the software properly are some of the steps to avoid stimuli.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: እቶም በቲ ርኽሲ ተጠቒዖም ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ኣብ ህዝባዊ ቦታት ኣብ ዝኽኮኑሉ ሰዓት ናይ ሰርጀሪ ማስክ ንኽገብሩ ይምከሩ።
en-mt: People who may have been infected with the infection are advised to wear a mask when in public.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: ናይ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቕ ስጉምቲታት ምትሕልላፋት ንምክልኻል ዝምከሩ ኮይኖም መብዛሕቲኦም መንግስቲታት ኩሎም ካብ ን ናብን ሃገራትን በቲ ለበዳ ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታታ ዝግበሩ ኣገድስቲ ዘይኮኑ ጉዕዞታት ኣጊዶም እዮም ውይድማ ንኸይግበሩ ለበዋ ገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: It is advised to prevent the transmission of physical distancing measures, and most governments have banned non-essential travel to and from countries affected by the pandemic.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኣብዝሓ ሃገራት ናይ ዓለም ኣብ ብሕብረተሰብ ደረጃ ዝዛመተሉ ደረጃ በጺሑ ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, the virus has spread to the public in many countries around the world.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: እዚ ማለት ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ውሽጢ ማሕበረሰባት እናተዛመተ እዩ ማለት እዩ፣ ገለ ናይ ማሕበረሰብ ኣባላት ድማ ኣብይን ብ ኸመይን ክምዝተለኽፉ ኣይፈልጡን። እቶም ን በቲ ሕማም ዝተለኸፈ ስብ ዝሕክሙ ሰብ ሞያ ጥዕና ግቡእ ጥንቃቐታት ንኽገብሩ ይምከሩ፣ ክም ናይ ንኽክእ ጥንቃቐታትን ናይ ዓይኒ መጠንቀቕታታትን። ናይ ኣስር ንኽክእ ምድላይ ን ስብ ጥዕና ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ መበገሲ ኣብ ምፍላጥን ቀጸልቲ ምትሕልላፋት ንምክልኻል ኣዝዩ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: his means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some members of the community do not know how and how to get infected, health professionals treating infected fat are advised to take appropriate precautions, precautions and eye alerts.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: መንግስቲታት ናይ ካባቢያዊ ሓበሬታ ዳታ ካብ ሞባይል ስልኪታት ምጥቃሞም ናይ ወልቃውነት ሕቶ ዘልዓለ ኮይኑ ኣሎ፡ ን ኣምነስቲ ኢንተርናሽናል ሓዊሱ ካልኦት 100 ዝኾኑ ትካላት ነዚ ከምዚ ዝ ኣምሰለ ሰለላታት ወሰን ንኽቅመጠሉ ዝጽውዑ መገለጺታት ኣውጺኦም እዮም።
en-mt: he government has raised questions about the use of local data from mobile phones, and Amnesty International has issued 100 other agencies calling for such restrictions.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ዝተፋላለዩ ናይ ሞባይል መተግበሪታት ኣብ ተግባር ውዒሎም እዮም ወይድማ ን ወለንታዊ ምጥቃም ቀሪቦም እዮም፣ ካብ ኣፕሪል 7,2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ካብ ደርዘን ንላዕሊ ዝኮኑ ናይ ሰብ ሞያ ጉጅለታት ክም ብሉቱዝ ተጠቒምካ ናይ ተጠቃማይ ቅርበት ናብ ካለኦት ስልኪታት ምምዝጋብ ዝኣምሰሉ ኣብ ወልቃውነት ጸገም ዘይፈጥሩ መፍትሒታት ኣነሰርሑ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, a number of mobile apps have been implemented or offered for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, more than a dozen professional teams have been working on solutions that do not pose any problems, such as registering a user's closeness to other phones using Bluetus.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: ብድሕሪኡ፡ ተገልገልቲ ምስ ሓደ ብ COVID-19 ዝተለኽፈ ሰብ ናይ ቀረባ ርክብ እንተነይርዎ መልዕኽቲ ይበጽሆ። መልከፍቲ ንምውጋድ ብዝምልከት ዝዘሩ ዘለዉ ጌጋዊ ኣተሓሳስባታት፡ ከም ኣብነት ኣፍንጫ ብማይ ምሕጻብ፡ ዓፍ ብማውዝዋሽ ምጉጽጓጽ ውጽኢታዊ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: After that, servants receive messages if they have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, and misconceptions about avoiding infection, such as washing the nose with water, mouthwash, and massage are ineffective.

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: ዋላኳ ብዙሓት ትካላት ንምምዕባል ኣብ ምስራሕ ዝርከባ ይኹና ፣ ናይ COVID-19 ክታበት ግን ዛጊድ የለን።
en-mt: Many companies are working to develop, but there is no COVID-19 vaccine.

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምዝማት ንምክልኻል ዝምከር እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: CDC ከምዝሕብሮ ሰባት ኣእዳዎም ብሳሙናን ማይን ብውሕዱ ንእስራ ካልኢት ቀጻሊ ብምሕጻብ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ድሕሪ ሽንቲቤት ምጥቃም ወይ’ውን ብዓይኒ ዝርአ ርስሓት እንተልይወን፡ ቅድሚ ምግቢ ምብላዕን ድሕሪ ፊጥ ምባል፡ ምስዓል ወይ’ውን ምሕንጣስ።
en-mt: According to the CDC, people should wash their hands regularly with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after urinating or coughing before eating and after coughing.

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ነቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ኣካል ወዲ ሰብ ወጻኢ፣ ናይ ኣቑሑ ሳሙና ናይ መከላኸሊ ሰውነቱ ብምትኳስ ክቕተሎ ይኽእል እዩ፣
en-mt: his can kill the virus outside the human body by firing on the body's protective equipment.

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: CDC ወሲኹ ድማ ማይን ሳሙናን ኣብዘይርከበሉ ሰዓት፣ብውሑዱ 60% ኣልኮል ዝተሓወሶ ናይ ኣልኮል ሳኒታይዘር ምጥቃም ክብል ምኽሩ ይህብ።
en-mt: he CDC recommends using at least 60% alcohol-related sanitizer when soap and water are not available.

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: WHO ዓይንኻ፡ ኣፍንጫኻ ወይ`ውን ኣፍካ ብረሳሕ ኣእዳውካ ኣይትሓዝ ኢሉ ንሰባት ይመክር።
en-mt: Don't touch your eyes, nose or mouth with dirty hands.

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: ናይ ኣካላት ገጽታት ብዝተፈላለዩ ኬሚካላት(ን ስቴይንልስ ስቲል ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ደቒቓ ድሕሪ በቲ ጸረ-ታህዋስያን ምውልዋል) ካብ ታህዋስያን ነጻ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም፡ 62-71% ኢታኖል፡50-100% ኢይሶፕሮፓኖል፡0.1% ሶድየም ሃይፖክሎራይት፡0.5% ሃይድሮጅን ፐርኦክሳይድ ን 0.2-7.5% ዝኾን ከዓ ፖቪዶን ኣዮዳይን( povidone-iodine) ዝሓወሱ ክኾኑ ኣለዎም:
en-mt: Body appearances can be free of parasites (n. Steinles Steel within one minute of being infected by the antimicrobial) and must be 62-71% ethanol 50-100% isopropanol 0.1% sodium hypochlorite 0.5% hydrogen peroxide for 0.2-7.5% and povinone-iodine

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: ካልኦት ከም ቤንዛልኮኒየም ክሎራይድ( benzalkonium chloride) ን ክሮሄክሲዳይን ግሉኮስ( chrohexidine gluconate) ዝበሉ ብጽባጻት ዝተሓተ ንጥፈት ዘለዎም እዮም።
en-mt: Others, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less active in cosmetics.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
targetString: CDC ናይ COVID ኣብ ዝኾነ ትካል፣ ኣብ ከም ቢሮ ውይድማ ናይ ህጻናት መሕብሐቢ ቦታ፣ ኩሎም ክም ቢሮታት፣ ሽንት ቤታት፣ ናይ ሓባር ቦታት፣ ብሓባር ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕሉ ምም ታብሌት፣ ተች ስክሪናት፣ ኪይቦርዳት፣ ሪሞት ኮንትሮላት ን ATM ማሺናት ዝበሉ ናይ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ ኣቑሑ ብዝሓመመ ሰብ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ዝውዕሉሉ ሰዓት፣ ጸረ-ታህዋስያን ክግበረሎምን ክ ጸርዩን ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In any company such as an office, children's shelters, offices, toilets, shared places, tablets, screens, keyboards, retrotroot control and ATM machines must be anti-inflammatory and cleaned whenever they are used by someone who is sick.

sourceString: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
targetString: ሰባት ክስዕሉ ወይ ከሕንጥሱ ከለዉ ኣፎምን ኣፍጭኦምን ብብርኪ ኢዶም ክሽፍኑን ዝተጠቀሙሉ ሶፍት ብኣግኡ ክጉሕፉን ውዱባት ጥዕና ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: It is recommended that people cover their mouths and mouths with their hands when coughing or sneering.

sourceString: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
targetString: ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ናይ ሕክምንና ማስክ ክገብሩ ይምከሩ። ማስክ ምልባስ ኣብ ግዜ ምዝራብ፡ ምሕንጣስ ንምስዓልን ብዝሕን ርሕቀትን ናይ`ቶም ኣብ ትንፋስ ዘለዉ ነጠብጣባት ንምግታእ ይጠቅም።
en-mt: People who are sick are advised to wear a medical mask, and wearing a mask is used to prevent coughing during speaking and preventing the number and distance of the droplets in your respiratory.

sourceString: The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
targetString: መዓስን ከመይን ናይ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን መሸፈኒ ማስክ ትጥቀም ብዝምልከት WHO መምርሒታት ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: He issued guidelines on when and how to wear a mask.

sourceString: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
targetString: ናይ University of Leeds (ሊድስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ) ቫይሮሎጂስት ስቲፈን ግሪፊን “ብዘይጽሩያት ኣእዳው ገጽ ምትንካፍ ቀንዲ መተሓላላፊ መንግዲ ብምዃኑ፥ ማስክ ምልባስ ንሰባት ገጾም ከይተናኽፉ የተባብዖም።” ይብል። ሕሙማት ዝኣልዩ ሰባት’ውን ማስክ ክገብሩ ይምከሩ።
en-mt: University of Leeds (University of Leeds) virologist Stephen Griffin says: "Wearing masks encourages people not to touch their faces because touching the face with clean hands is a major means of communication."

sourceString: The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
targetString: WHO ዋላኳ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ምግባር ሰባት ገጾም ንኸይንኸኡ ዝገብር ክምዝኾነ ዝኣምኑሉ ጉዳይ እተኾነ፣ ኣብ ሙሉእ ጥዕና ዝርከቡ ሰባት ፣ ከም COVID-19 ዝሓመመ ክንክን ዝገብሩ ተጋላጽነቶም ዓብዪ ኣብዝኾነሉ ጥራሕ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ንኽገብሩ ይላበዉ።
en-mt: Despite the WHO's belief that wearing masks prevents people from covering their faces, people in health, such as those who are sick with COVID-19, are encouraged to wear masks only when their face is high.

sourceString: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሃገራት ናይ ኣባላት ናይ ሕብረተሰብ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ንኽጥቀሙ የበረታትዓ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Many countries are encouraging members of the community to wear face masks.

sourceString: In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
targetString: ኣብ U.S.፡ CDC ሕክምናዊ ዘይኮኑ ካብ ጨርቂ ዝተሰርሑ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒታት ምጥቃም ክብል ይላቦ። ቻይና ድማ ብፍላይ በቶም ኣብ ምሉእ ጥዕና ዝርከቡ ናይ ሕብረተሰብ ኣባላት ተጠቒምካ ዝድርበዩ ናይ ሕክምናይ መሸፈኒ ማስክታት በተልይ ካዓ ምስ ካልኦት ሰባት ኣብ ቅረባ ንኽከእ(1 ሜትር (3ፊት)ወይ ዝነኣሰ) ኣብ ጥቕሚ ነክውዕሉ ትላቦ።
en-mt: In the U.S.S., the CDC calls for the use of non-medical fabric-based face masks, and China is particularly urged to use medical masks thrown away using members of the entire health community to replace them with others (1 meter (3 fit) or smaller.

sourceString: Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
targetString: ሆንግ ኮንግ፣ ኣብ ህዝባዊ መጎዓዝያ ኣብ ዝኾኑሉ ሰዓት ውየድማ ኣብ ብዙሕ ህዝቢ ዝእከበሉ ቦታ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ሰዓት፣ ናይ ስረጀሪ ማስክ ምግባር ካምዘ ድሊ ትመክር።
en-mt: Hong Kong is advising to wear a mask when on public transport or in a crowded area.

sourceString: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
targetString: ክኢላታት ሕክምና ታይላንድ ሰባት ኣብ ገዛ ባዕሎም ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ክሰርሑን እናሓጸቡ ክጥቅሙሉን ኣተባቢኡ።
en-mt: Thai medical experts encouraged people to make face masks at home on their own and use them washing.

sourceString: The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
targetString: ቼክ ሪፐብሊክን ስሎቫኪያን ማስክ ከይገበሩ ውይድማ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን ከይሸፈኑ ናብ ህዝባዊ ቦታት ምውጻእ ከልኪለን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: the Czech Republic and Slovakia have banned people from wearing masks or face coverings.

sourceString: On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 16፣ ቬትናም ኩሉ ናብ ህዝባዊ ቦታት ዝኸዱ ሰባት ዓርሶም ካልኦትን ንምሕላው ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ንኽገብሩ ጻውዒት ኣቕሪባ።
en-mt: On March 16, Vietnam called on everyone who goes to public places to wear masks to protect their crops and others.

sourceString: The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
targetString: ናይ ኦስትሪያ መንግስቲ ዝኮነ ናብ ናይ መስተ ግሮሰሪ ዝኣቱ ሰብ ናይ ገጽን ኣፍንጫን መሸፈኒ ማስክ ክገብር ኣለዎ ክብል ኣዚዙ።
en-mt: he Austrian government has ordered anyone entering a drinks grocery store to wear a mask.

sourceString: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
targetString: እስራኤል ንኩሎም ተቀማጦ ኣብ እኩባት ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ክገብሩ ሓቲታ።
en-mt: Israel has asked all residents to wear masks.

sourceString: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April.
targetString: ካብ መፋርቕ ማርች ኣትሒዛ ዓሰርተ ሚልዮን ማስክታ ንመዕልቲ ክትሰርሕ ዝጸንሐት ታይዋን ካብ 1 ኤፕሪል ንኹሎም ተሳፈርቲ ባቡራትን ናይ ከተማ ኣቶቡሳትን ማስክ ንኽገብሩ ኣገዲዳ።
en-mt: Taiwan, which has been making 10 million masks for the day since mid-March, has forced all passengers on trains and buses to wear masks on April 1.

sourceString: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
targetString: ፓናማ ናብ ደገ ኣብ ዝውጹሉ ሰዓት ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ምግባር ኣገዳዲ ክኸውን ብምግባር፣ ነቶም ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ክገዝኡ ዘይኽእሉ ዝኾን ኣብ ገዛ ዝስራሕ ማስክ ንክሳለጥ ተላቢያ።
en-mt: Panama has made it mandatory to wear face masks when entering the country, and it is mandatory for those who are unable to wear masks at home.

sourceString: Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore.
targetString: ናይ ገጽ መሽፈኒ ማስክታት ኣብ ጃፓን ፣ ደቡብ ኮሪያን ማሌይዢያን ሲንጋፖርን እውን ብሰፊሑ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል ኣሎ።
en-mt: Face masks are also widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia and Singapore.

sourceString: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
targetString: ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት (ማለት ኣካላዊ ርሕቀት) ናይ ቀረባ ርክብ ብምውጋድ ናይ`ቲ ሕማም ዝርግሐ ንምቅናስ ዝግበር መቆጻጸሪ ተላባዕነት ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: Social distancing (i.e. physical distancing) includes control to reduce the spread of the disease by eliminating close contact.

sourceString: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
targetString: ውሸባ፡ ናይ ጉዕዞ ዕገዳታት፡ ከምኡ’ውን ዕጻወ ቤት-ትምህርትታት፡ ቦታ ስራሕ፡ ስታድየም፡ ሲነማታትን ሸቀጥ ቦታታትን ገለ ካብቶም ክውሰዱ ዝክእሉ ስጉምትታት እዮም።
en-mt: Travel restrictions, as well as closed schools, workplaces, stadiums, cinemas and merchandise are just some of the measures that can be taken.

sourceString: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
targetString: ውልቀ ሰባት ኣብ ገዛ ብምጽናሕ፡ ጉዕዞታት ብምቕንሳ፡ ናብ ሰባት ዝእከቡሉ ቦታ ካብ ምኻድ ዓርሶም ብምዕቃብ፡ ምንኽኻእ ዘይብሎም ሰላምታታት ብምልውዋጥ፡ ካብ ካልኦት ድማ ኣካልዊ ርሕቐቶም ብምሕላው ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት መንገዲታት ከተግብሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም ።
en-mt: Individuals can apply social distancing methods by staying at home, reducing travel, avoiding going to people's gathering places, exchanging unsweeemed greetings, and maintaining physical distance from others.

sourceString: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
targetString: ብዙሓት መንግስቲታት ኣብ በቲ ለበዳ ዝተጠቕዓ ቦታት ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ክም ኣገዳዲ መምርሒ ኣውርዲን ኣለዋ ወይድማ ይላበዋ።
en-mt: Many governments have issued or required social distancing in places affected by the pandemic.

sourceString: The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
targetString: ብ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ናይ ጥዕና ትካላትን ዝምከር ልዑል መጠን ናይ ምትእኽኻብ ካብ 250 ሰባት(ኣብ እቲ ክልል ዝተረጋገጸ ናይ COVID-19 ጉዳይ እንተዘይ ሃልዩ ) ብቕልጡፍ ናብ 50 ሰባት ክወርድ ክኢሉ እዩ፣ጽኒሑ ድማ ናብ 10 ሰባት ወሪዱ እዩ።
en-mt: High levels of gatherings, recommended by U.S. health agencies, were able to quickly drop from 250 people (unless there is a confirmed case of COVID-19 in the region), to 50 people, and later dropped to 10.

sourceString: On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
targetString: ብ22 ማርች 2020 ጀርመን ኣብ ደገ ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ንላዕሊ ምእካብ ከልኪላ። ብዕድመ ዝደፍኡን ውሽጥዊ ሕዱር ሕማማት ከም ሽኮርያ፡ ልቢ ድኻም፡ ሕማም ምስትንፋስ፡ ጸቅጢ ደምን ድኹም ስርዓተ-ምክልኻልን ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝያዳ ክሓሙን ክጥቅዑን ይኽእሉ’ዮም። ስለዚ ብፍላይ ኮማዊ ለበዳ ኣብ ዘለወን ቦታታት ብዝተካእለ መጠን ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑ ብሲ.ዲ.ሲ. ተሓቢሮም። ኣብ መወዳእታ ማርች 2020፡ ው.ጥ.ዓ.ን ካልኦት ትካላት ጥዕና ኣብ ክንዲ “ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት” “ኣካላዊ ርሕቀት” ምባል ጀሚሮም። ምኽንያት’ዚ ከኣ ማሕበራዊ ርክባት ብኣካል ወይ’ውን ብርሕቀት ከየቋረጽካ ኣካላዊ ምቅርራብ ምጉዳል ንምምልካት’ዩ።
en-mt: On March 22, 2020, Germany banned outdoor gatherings of more than two people, and people with ageing and internal chronic diseases such as diabetes, heart disease, fatigue, respiratory disease, blood pressure and poor immune systems could be sicker and infected, so they could stay at home as much as possible, especially in places with communal outbreaks. At the end of March 2020, other health organizations began calling it "physical distancing" instead of "social distancing," which is to symbolize a reduction in physical intimacy without interrupting social interactions in person or distance.

sourceString: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
targetString: ናይ “ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት” ቃል ኣጠቓቕማ፣ ኣብክንዲ ብኻልኦት ኣማራጺታት ተተቒሞም ምስ ካልኦት ሰባት ርክቦም ዝቕጽሉ፣ ሰባት ናብ ምንጽጻል ዝብል ኣተሓሳስባ ንኽኣትዉ ገይርዎም እዩ። ገለ ሰበ ስልጣናት ናይ ጾታዊ ርክብ ጥዕና መምርሒታት ኣብ እዚ ናይ ለበዳ ኣዋን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንኽውዕሉ ኣዚዞም።
en-mt: he use of the word "social distancing" has led to the idea of maintaining contact with other people, and some authorities have ordered sexual health guidelines to be used in this pandemic.

sourceString: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
targetString: ጾታዊ ርክብ ምሳኻ ምስዝቕመጥን እቲ ቫይረስ ወይ ምልክት ናይቲ ቫይረስ ዘይብሉ ሰብ ጥራይ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ኢሎም ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: If you have sex with someone who has no symptoms of the virus or symptoms, it should only be advised.

sourceString: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
targetString: ነቶም ብ COVID-19 ዝተለኸፉን ውይድማ ተለኺፎም ክኾን ይኽእል ኢሎም ነብሶም ዝጥርጥሩን ኣብ ገዛ ዓርሰኻ ምንጻል ዝምከር እዩ።
en-mt: It is recommended to stay at home for those who are infected with COVID-19 and suspect that they may have been infected.

sourceString: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
targetString: ናይ ጥዕና ኤጀንሲታት ን ዓርሰ ምንጻል ዝኾኑ ዝርዝር መምርሒታት ኣውጺኦም። ብዙሓት መንግስቲታት ንኹሎም ኣብ በቲ ረኽሲ ዝተጠቕዓ ቦታት ዝነብሩ ሰባት ዓርሰ ተነጽሎ ንኽገብሩ ተላብዮም እዮም ወይድማ ትእዛዝ ኣመሓላሊፎም እዮም።
en-mt: Health agencies have issued detailed guidelines for abortion, and many governments have ordered or ordered that all people living in affected areas be isolated.

sourceString: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
targetString: እቲ ዝሓየለ ናይ ነብሰ-ዉሸባ መምርሒታት ነቶም ኣብ ልዑል ሓደጋ ዘለዉ ጉጅለታት እዩ ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: he strongest self-defense guidelines have been issued to high-risk groups.

sourceString: Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
targetString: ሕማም COVID-19 ምስዘለዎ ሰብ ርክብ ዝንበሮምን ካብ ሕማም ብዝሒ ዘለዎ ሃገር ውይ ቦታ ብቀረባ ዝተመልሱን ካብታ ንመወዳእታ ርክብ ዝነበሮም ግዜ ኣትሒዞም ን 14 መዓልታት ኣብ ገዝኦም ክውሸቡ ይምከሩ።
en-mt: People who have been in contact with someone with COVID-19 and have returned from a country with a large number of illnesses are advised to stay at home for 14 days from the last contact.

sourceString: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
targetString: ን ለበዳ ንምቁጽጽር ዘኽእሉ ስጉምቲታት፣ ን ከይጋፍሕ ምግባር ውይድማ ምቁጽጻርን ምዝሕሓልን እዮም።
en-mt: Measures to control the spread of the pandemic are to prevent and prevent the spread.

sourceString: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ እቲ ለበዳ መጀመርታ ደረጃ ምግታእ ከም ስጉምቲ ተወሲዱ እዚ ድማ እቶም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ንምክትታልን ንምግላልን ዝዓለመ ኾይኑ፣ ነቲ ሕማም ናብ እቲ ዝተረፈ ህዝቢ ካብ ምልባዕ ጠጠው ንምባል ካልኦት ናይ ብከላ ምቁጽጻር ዘኽእሉ ስጉምትታትን ክታበታትን እውን ኣለው እዮም።
en-mt: In the early stages of containing the pandemic, measures have been taken to monitor and isolate infected people, and other pollution control measures and vaccines are available to stop the spread of the disease to the rest of the population.

sourceString: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
targetString: ነቲ ናይ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ምቁጽጻር ኣብ ዘይከኣለሉ ግዜ፣ እቶም ጻዕሪታት ናብ ምዝሕሓል ደረጃ ይመጹ እሞ፣ ዝውሰዱ ስጉምቲታት ትላባድነት ንምዝሓልን ኣብ'ቲ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ስርዓትን ኣብ ሕበረተሰብ ዘሕድሮ ጽልዋ ን ምቕናስ ዝግበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: When it is impossible to control the spread of the virus, the efforts come to a slowing down, and measures are taken to reduce the spread of the virus and reduce its impact on the health care system and the community.

sourceString: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
targetString: ምቁጽጻርን ምርድዳእን ብምጥቃም ብሓንሳብ ክስራሓሉ ይከኣል’ዩ።
en-mt: It can be used together to control and understand.

sourceString: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምርባሕ ከም እቲ ንቡር ትሕቲ 1 ክኸውንን ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምጥፋእን ጽዑቕ ስጉምትታት የድልዮ። ገለ ክፋል ናይ ምቁጽጻሩ ከኣ ነቲ ጥርዚ ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ምጉዳል፡ ወይ’ውን ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ጥውዮ ምጽፋሕ ዘጠቓለለ’ዩ።
en-mt: Intensive measures are required to keep the virus under 1 normal and eradicate it, and some measures to control it include reducing the spread of the pandemic or spreading the virus.

sourceString: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ናይ ጥዕና ግልጋሎታት ካብ ዓቕመን ንላዕሊ ዝኾነ ግልጋሎት ናይ ምሃብ ሓደጋ ብምቕናስ ክትባትን ሕክምናታትትን ንኸማዕብሉ ተወሳኺ ግዜ ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: this will allow health services more time to develop vaccines and treatments by reducing the risk of overcapacity.

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: ብዘይ መድሓኒት ዝወሃቡ መከላከሊ ሜላታት ነዚ ለበዳ ኣብ ምቁጽጻር ብዙሕ ተራ ኣለወን። እዘን ሜላታት ብውልቀሰባት ክውሰዱ ዝኽእሉ ጥንቃቀታት ከም ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ማስክ ምልባስን ነብሰ-ውሸባን፡ ብኮም ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት ንምሕላው ዝግበሩ ከም ዕጽዋ ቤት-ትምህርትታትን ምትእኽካብን ከምኡ’ውን ግዳማዊ ጽሬት ምሕላውን የጠቓልላ። ዝሓየለ ጥንቃቀታት ከም ዕጽዋት ከተማታትን እገዳ ጉዕዞን ከኣ ኣብ ቻይና ተጽዕኖ ናይዚ ለበዳ ምስበዝሐ ዝተወስዳ ስጉምትታት’የን።
en-mt: Preventive measures such as hand washing, wearing masks and self-isolation include social distancing, such as school closures and gatherings, and stronger precautions such as lockdowns, cities and travel restrictions, measures that have been taken in China to increase the impact of the pandemic.

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: ካልኦት ሃገራት’ውን ዝርግሐ ናይዚ ቫይረስ ዝገትኡ ዝተፈላለዩ መምርሒታት ይሰርሓሉ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Other countries have also implemented guidelines for the spread of the virus.

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮሪያ ናይ ጅምላ ምጽራይን ክባቢያዊ ኳራንታይን ብምትእትታው ኣብ ናይ ውልቀ ሰባት ምንቅስቓሳት መጠንቀቕታ ኣሕሊፋ።
en-mt: South Korea has issued a warning to private movements by introducing mass clearance and local quarantine.

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: ሲንጋፖር ነቶም ዝተለኽፉን ነቶም ን ዓርሶም ኳርንታይን ዝገበሩን ናይ ገንዝብ ድጋፍ እንትትገብር ኣብ ልዕሊ እቶም ክምኡ ዘይገበሩ ድማ ክቢድ ናይ ገንዘብ ቅጽዓት ኣንቢራትሎም ኣላ።
en-mt: Singapore has provided financial support to those infected and those who have done so to their crops and imposed harsh financial sanctions on those who have not done so.

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: ታይዋን ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ፍርያታት ብምውሳኽ፣ ኣብቶም ናይ ሕክምናዊ ቀረባት ዝሓብኡ ድማ ቅጽዓት ኣንቢራ። ን እንግሊዝን ን ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካን ዝምልከቱ መርእዪታት ክምዘርኣዩዎ ምዝሕሓላት (ናይቲ ለበዳ ምዝማት ዝቕንሱ ግን ጠጠው ዘየብሉ) ን ዓፈናታት(ናይ'ቲ ለበዳ ዕብየት ብ ተጻራሪ ክኸይድ ዝገብሩ) ዝበሉ ዓብይቲ ፈተናታት ክጋጥመን እዩ።
en-mt: Taiwan has imposed sanctions on those who hide medical supplies, and there will be major challenges such as slowing the spread of the pandemic (reducing the spread of the pandemic but not ending it) and the spread of the pandemic (which pushes the growth of the pandemic to go against it).

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: እቶም ዝተመጣጠኑ ናይ ምኽልኻል ፖሊሲታት ንጠለብ ሕክምና ብ2/3፡ መጠነ ሞት ድማ ብፍርቂ ዘግዱሉ’ዮም። እዚ ክንሱ ኣማኢት ኣሽሓት ሞትን ሕክምናታት ልዕሊ ዓቕሞም ክሰርሑን ይርአ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Balanced preventive policies have reduced the demand for treatment by 2/3 and the death rate by half, resulting in hundreds of thousands of deaths and treatments being overworked.

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: ዕፋናታት ኣድላዪ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ፣ ግን ድማ እስካብ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ውሽጢ ህዝቢታት ምዝውዋሩ ጠጠው ዘብል ክቕጽል ኣለዎ፣ (ወይድማ ከታበት እስካብ ዝርከብ፣ ቀዲሙ እንተ ብጺሑ)፣ ምኽኒያቱም ክልከላታት ክልሕልሑ ከለው እቲ ለበዳ መሊሱ ክደግስ ስለዝኽእል።
en-mt: Vaccines may be necessary, but the virus must continue to circulate within peoples until it is detected (or, if it is detected in the first place), because the pandemic can repeat itself when restrictions are lifted.

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: ነዚ ለበዳ ንምቅናስ ክግበር ዘለዎ ስጉምትታት ማሕበራውን ቁጠባውን ሓስያታት ከምጽእ ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: Social and economic measures to reduce the pandemic can lead to social and economic consequences.

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ እዋን ኣንጻር COVID-19 ዝሰርሕ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒት የለን፡ ግን ንምምዕባሎምን ብዝነበሩ መድሃኒታት ፈተናታት ይግበር ኣሎ።
en-mt: Currently, there is no anti-virus drug against COVID-19, but tests are being conducted on its development.

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: ናይ ጉንፋዕ መድሃኒታት ምውሳድ፡ ፈሰስቲ ምውሳድ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ዕረፍቲ ምውሳድ ንምልክታቱ ከዕግሶ ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: Taking cold medications, taking sedatives, and taking breaks can help alleviate symptoms.

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: ኣብ መጠን ክብደት ብምድራኽ፡ ናይ ኦክስጅን ሕክምና፡ናብ ቬን ዝኣትዉ ፈሰስቲን ናይ መተፈሲ ሓገዝ ከድሊ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Respiratory aid may be required for oxygen treatment for respiratory infections entering The Vein.

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: ናይ ስቴርዮድ ምጥቃም ውጽኢታት ከጋድድ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The use of stereo may worsen the results.

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: ንካልኦት ቫይረሳት ቅድሚ ሕጂ ዝተፈቅዱ ጸረ-ቫይረስ ምድሃኒታት ኣብ ምሕካም ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ተራ ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ኣሎ።
en-mt: He is studying other viruses that have previously allowed antivirus drugs for the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: ውድብ ጥ ዕና ዓለም "ገለ ባህላዊን ናይ ገዛ ውሽጢ ክም ምፍትሒ ሕማም ዝውሰዱ ነገራት" ብ SARS-CoV-19 ዝተበገሱ ምልክታት ኣብ ምርሃው ተራ ክህልዎም ይኸእል እዩ ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has said that "some traditional and indoor-based symptoms" may be common in the diagnosis of SARS-CoV-19.

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: ዓቕሚ ምዕባይን ን ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ማእኸላት ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ድልየት ብዘማልእ መልክዑ ክመዓራረዩን ምግባር WHO ብመሰረት ዝገለጾ ነቲ ለበዳ መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ ክም ወሳኒ ንጥቢ ዝረኣይ እዮም።
en-mt: Developing and adapting the capacity of health care centers to meet the needs of COVID-19 patients is crucial to responding to the pandemic, according to the WHO.

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: ECDCን ናይ WHO ቤት-ጽሕፈት ኣብ ኤሮጳ ንሆስፒታላትን ትካላት ጥዕናን ዝምልከት መምርሒታት ሰኒዱ። ትካላት ጥዕና ኣብ ምርመራ COVID-19 ዘተኮረ ኣገልግሎት ላባራቶሪ ኣብ ምሃብ፡ ዘይህጹጽ መጥባሕቲታት ምስራዝ፡ COVID-19 ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ፈሊኻ ምሕካምን ናይ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ዓቕሚ ሰቦምን ቁጽሪ ዓራትን ቨንቲሌተራትን ክብ ኣብ ምባልን፡ ብሓጺሩ ንዘለዎም ሃብቲ ብኸመይ ይጥቀሙሉ ዝነግር ሰነድ እዩ።
en-mt: he ECDC and the WHO Office in Europe have published guidelines on hospitals and health facilities, a document that describes how health agencies use their short resources to provide laboratory services focused on COVID-19 testing, the removal of emergency surgeries, the isolation of COVID-19 patients, and the increase in the number of beds and ventrilates.

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ፈለማ ሕሙም (ማለት ሕሙም ዜሮ ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ) ካበይ ከምዝተበገሰ ብዙሕ ጥርጣረታት ኣሎ።
en-mt: There are many doubts about where the original patient (i.e. patient zero) originated.

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ብሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ ከምዝተለኽፈ ዝተፈልጠ ሰብ ኣብ ዉሃን፡ ሁበይ፡ ቻይና ብ1 ዲሰምበር 2019 ተረኪቡ።
en-mt: he first new coronavirus was detected in Wuhan, Hubey, China, on December 1, 2019.

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ወርሒ፣ ኣብ ሁበይ ዝነበረ ቁጽሪ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ጉዳያት ቀስ እንዳበለ ወሲኹ።
en-mt: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubi increased.

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: እዚኦም ምስ ናይ ሁዋናን መርካቶ ዓሳን ካልኦት እንስሳታትን ዝተኣሳሰሩ’ዮም። እዚ ቫይረስ ካብዚኦም እንስሳታትን’ዩ ነቒሉ ዝብል ሓደ ክልስሓሳብ ኣሎ። ረኽሲ ሳንቡእ ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ብ26 ታሕሳስ ብብዝሒ ብዶክተር ዣንግ ጂክሲያን ናይ ሁበይ ሆስፒታል ተራእዮም ተሓኪሞምን። እዚ ሓኪም ከኣ ብ27 ታሕሳስ ንውሃን ጂያንጋን CDC ሓቢርዎም።
en-mt: hese are related to Juana and Mercato fish and other animals, one theory is that the virus has spread among these animals, and patients with lung infections were most commonly seen and treated by Dr. Zhang Jixian of Hubei Hospital on December 26, a doctor told the Yangan CDC on December 27.

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: ብ ዲሰምበር 30 ናይ ዉሃን ማእከላዊ ሆስፒታል ጉጅለ ሓካይም ብዛዕባ’ዚ “ንሳርስ ዝመስል ኮሮናቫይረስ” ንመሳርሕቶም ኣጠንቂቖም።
en-mt: On December 30, a team of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital warned their colleagues about the "sars-like coronavirus."

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: ሸሞንተ ካብዞም ሓካይም፡ ሊ ወንሊያንግ ብምጥቕላል፡ ዘይሓቀኛ ወረ ዘርጊሕኩም ብምባል ብፖሊስ ተቐጺኦም። ኣይ ፈን’ውን ንዓለም ብምሕባራ ብሓለፍታ ተቐጺኣ።
