en-mt: Eight of these doctors, Lee Wenliang, were punished by police for spreading false rumors, and she was punished by her bosses for telling the world.

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: ኣብ Wuhan Municipal Health Commission (ዉሃን ጥዕና ኮሚሽን ምምሕዳር) ድሒሩ ህዝባዊ ምልክታ ብ31 ታሕሳስ ብምውጻእ ንWHO ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: he Wuhan Municipal Health Commission (Wuhan Health Commission) later released a public notice on December 31.

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመሪ ወርሒ ጃኑዋሪ ምርመራታት ንምጅማር ዘኽኣሉ እኹላት ናይ ዘይተፈልጡ ናይ ኒሞኒያ ጉዳያት ናብ ናይ ዉሃን ናይ ጥዕና ሓለፍቲ ጸብጻብ ተገይሮም ነይሮም። ኣብቶም እቲ ለበዳ ዝጀመረሎም ና መጅመሪያ ግዜያት፣ ናይ ጉዳያት ቁጽሪ ኣብ ሸውዓተን ፈረቓን መዓልቲታት ዕጽፊ ይኸውን ነይሩ።
en-mt: At the beginning of January, enough unknown cases of unaccounted for to start tests were reported to Wuhan's health officials, and in the early days of the pandemic, the number of cases doubled in seven and a half days.

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመርታን መፋርቕ-ጃንዋሪ 2020, እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ካልኦት ናይ ቻይና ዞባታት ተላቢዑ፣ እዚ በቲ ናይ ቻይናውያን ሓድሽ ዓመት ዝግበር ጉዕዞ ኮይኑ ብ ዉሃን ድማ ናይ ትራንስፖርት ማእኸልን ናይ ዓበይቲ ባቡር መተሓላለፊ ስለዝኾነት ዝተሓገዘ እዩ።
en-mt: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other regions of China, including the Chinese New Year's day trip, aided by Wuhan as a transportation hub and a major railway transit.

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: ኣብ 20 ጃንዋሪ፣ ቻይና፣ ክልተ ኣብ ቤጂንግ ከምኡውን ሓደ ኣብ ሸንጀን ሓዊሱ፣ ዳርጋ 140 ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ኣመዝጊባ።
en-mt: On January 20, China recorded nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two in Beijing and one in Schengen.

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: ድሒሩ ዝመጸ ወግኣዊ ሓበሬታ ከምዘርእዮ ብ ጃኑዋሪ 20 2020 6,174 ሰባት ምልክታት የርእዩ ነይሮም። ብ ማርች 26 ሕብራት መንግስታት ብብዝሒ ናይ ሕሙማት ንቻይናን ጥልያንን በሊጻተን። ብ ኣፕሪል 9 2020 ልዕሊ 1.61 ሚልዮን ሕሙማት ብዓለም ደረጃ ተረኺቦም፥ ልዕሊ 97,000 ሰባት ሞይቶም፥ ልዕሊ 364,000 ሰባት ከኣ ሓውዮም።
en-mt: Later official data showed that by January 20, 2020, 6,174 people showed symptoms, and in March 26, governments over 26 u.s. governments had surpassed China and Italy, and by April 9, 2020, more than 1.61 million patients were diagnosed worldwide, more than 97,000 people died and more than 364,000 people were healed.

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: ናብ 200 ዝኾኑ ሃገራት ን ክልላትን ብ ንኡሱ ሓደ ጉዳይ ኣጋጢምወን ኣሎ።
en-mt: About 200 countries and regions have suffered.

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: ብሰንኪ’ዚ ለበዳ ኣብ ኤሮጳ ብዙሓት ኣባላት ሸንገን ነጻ ምንቅስቓስ ብምክልካል ኣብ ዶባተን ሓለዋ ኣተኣታትየን።
en-mt: Due to the pandemic, many members of the Schengen Area have imposed patrols on their borders.

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: ብሃገር ደረጃ ንምቑጽጻር ዝትግበሩ ዘለዉ ግብረመልስታት፡ ውሸባ (ማለት ኣብ ገዛ ወይ መዕቖቢኻ ምጽናሕ ወይ ምዕጻው ከተማታት) ከምኡ’ውን ቀልጢፍካ ገዛኻ ምእታው የጠቃልሉ። ካብ ዕለት 2 ሚያዝያ ኣትሒዙ ኣስታት 300 ሚልዮን፣ ወይ ከባቢ 90% ህዝቢ ሕቡራት መንግስታት፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ገለ መልክዕ ናይ ውሸባ ነይሮም። ልዕሊ 50 ሚልዮን ሰባት ኣብ ፊሊፒንስ፡ ኣስታት 59 ሚልዮን ሰባት ኣብ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃን 1.3 ቢልዮን ሰባት ኣብ ህንድን ኣብ ገዝኦም ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Nation-level controls include quarantine (i.e. staying in your home or shelter or closing cities) and quickly entering your home. As of April 2, about 300 million people, or about 90% of the U.S. population, have been under some form of quarantine. More than 50 million people in the Philippines, about 59 million people in South Africa and 1.3 billion people in India have been quarantined at home.

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: ብ26 ማርች፡1.7 ቢልዮን ሕዝቢ ዓለም ኣብ ትሕቲ ውሸባ ነይሮም። ድሕሪ ክልተ መዓልቲ እዚ ቁጽሪ ናብ 2.6 ቢልዮን-ከባቢ ሓደ ሲሶ ሕዝቢ ዓለም ደይቡ።
en-mt: On March 26, 1.7 billion people in the world were under quarantine, and two days later that number rose to 2.6 billion-about one-third of the world's population.

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: እቲ ፈላማይ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ጉዳይ ኣብ ዕለት 1 ዲሰምበር 2019 ኣብ ውሃን ተመዝጊቡ፡ ሓደ ዘይተረጋገጸ ጸብጻብ ከምዘርእዮ ግን እቲ ፈላማይ ጉዳይ ኣብ ዕለት 17 ኖቨምበር ከምዝነበረ እዩ።
en-mt: he first case of COVID-19 was recorded in water on 1 December 2019, but an unconfirmed report indicates that the first case was reported on November 17.

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: ዶ/ር ጃንግ ጂሲያን ኣብ ዲሰምበር 26 ናይ ዝትጎጀሉ ናይ ኒሞኒያ ጉዳያት ተዓዚባ፣ እቲ ትሰርሓሉ ሆስፒታል ድማ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 27 ናብ ዉሃን ጂያንጋን CDC ጽብጻብ ገይሩ።
en-mt: Dr. Jang Jisian observed the cases of pneumonia on December 26, and the hospital where she worked reported to the Wuhan Jiangan CDC on December 27.

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: ብ27 ዲሰምበር 2019 ኣብ ሕሙማት ዝተገብረ ጀነቲክ መርመራታት ምስ ሳ.ር.ስ. ዝመሳሰል ኮሮናቫይረስ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: On December 27, 2019, genetic tests in patients found a coronavirus similar to s.r.s.

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: ኣብ ዲሰምበር 31 ብ ናይ ውሃን ሙኒሲፓል ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽነር ህዝባዊ መግለጺ ሂቦም።
en-mt: On December 31, he issued a public statement by the Water and Municipal Health Commissioner.

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: WHO ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ መዓልቲ እዩ ሓበሬታ ረኺቡ።
en-mt: The WHO received the information on the same day.

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: እዞም መግለጺታት ኣብ ዝወጹሉ ሰዓት ኣብ ዉሃን ዝርከቡ ዶክተራት "ወረ ትንዝሑ ኣለኹም" ተባሂሎም ብ ፖሊስ መጠንቀቕታ በጺሑዎም እዩ።
en-mt: At the time of these statements, doctors in Wuhan received a warning from the police that they were "spreading rumors."

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: ቻይናዊ ሃገራዊ ኮሚሽን ጥዕና ኣቐዲሙ ንጹር መርትዖ ናይ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ምትሕልላፍ ከምዘየለ’ዩ ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: China's National Health Commission has previously said there is no clear evidence of human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: ኣብ መጨረሻ ጃኑዋሪ፣ ናይ ቻይና መንግስቲ ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምቁጽጻር ዝዓለመ፣ ደሓር ድማ ብ ናይ እቲ ኮሙኒስት ፓርቲ ዋና ጸሓፊ ሲጂፒንግ ዝተገለጸ "ናይ ህዝቢታት ኩናት" ዝብል ስያመ ዝተውሃቦ ጎስጓስ ኣበጊሱ ኣሎ።
en-mt: At the end of January, the Chinese government launched a campaign aimed at containing the virus and later dubbed the "People's War" described by the Communist Party's secretary-general Sigging.

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: እቲ "ኣብ ታሪኽ ወዲ ሰብ እቲ ዝዓበየ ውሻበ" ተባሂሉ ዝተገልጸ፣ ክሊሓለዋ ንጽሕና ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 23 ተኣዊጁ፣ ካብን ናብን ውሃን ዝግበር ጉዕዞ ጠተው ኣቢሉ፣ እዚ ድማ ናብ ጠቕላላ 15 ከተማታት ሁበይ ተስፋሕፊሑ፣ ብሰንኩ ድማ ኣብ 57 ሚሊዮን ህዝቢ ጽልዋ ኣሕዲሩ።
en-mt: described as "the greatest dog in human history," the clean-up climate was declared on January 23, expanding travel to and from hubi, expanding to a total of 15 cities and affecting 57 million people.

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: ኣብታ ከተማ ናይ ውልቀ መኪና ምጥቃም ተኸልኪሉ ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: Private cars were banned in the city.

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ሓዱሽ ዓመት(ጃኑዋሪ 25) ጽብላት ኣብ ብዙሓት ቦታታት ተሰሪዞም እዮም።
en-mt: The Chinese New Year (January 25) has been canceled in many places.

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽጢ 10 መዓልታት ዝተሓንጸ ሁዎሸንሻን ሆስፒታል ዝተበሃለ ግዝያዊ ሆስፒታል ተሰሪሑ ከምዝተወድአ ሰበስልጣናት ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Authorities said the temporary hospital, Huushhenshan Hospital, had been completed within 10 days.

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: ዓቕሚ ናይ ሕሙማት ምቅባል ንምድንፋዕ ተባሂሉ ደሓር ካልኣይ ሆስፒታል፡ ለይሸንሻን ሆስፒታል፡ ተሰሪሑ።
en-mt: A second hospital was later built to boost patient reception capacity.

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: ካብቶም ሓደስቲ ዝተሰርሑ ሆስፒታላት ብተወሳኺ፣ ቻይና ካልኦት 14 ኣብ ዉሃን ዝርከቡ ናይ መአከቢ ኣዳራሻትን ስታዲየማትን ዝኣምሰሉ ናይ ግልጋሎት ቦታታት ናብ ጊዜያዊ ሆስፒታላት ቀዪራቶም እያ። ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 26፣ እቲ መንግስቲ ካልኦት ናይ COVID-19 ለብዳ ንምቁጽጻር የኽእሉ እዮም ዝበሎም ክም ን ተጉዓዝቲ ዝምልከቱ ናይ ጥዕና ኣዋጃት ምእዋጅ ዝበሉን ናይ ስፕሪንግ ፌስቲቫላት ምንዋሕ ዝበሉን ስጉምቲታት ወሲዱ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the newly built hospitals, China has transformed 14 other service locations in Wuhan, such as assembly halls and stadiums, into temporary hospitals, and on January 26, the government announced health proclamations for travelers and extended Spring festivals, which it said would allow other COVID-19 pandemics to control them.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ እታ ሃገር ዝርከቡ ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ቤት ትምህርቲታትን እውን ተዓጽየን እየን።
en-mt: Universities and schools across the country were also closed.

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: ናይ ሆንግ ኮንግ ክልላትን ማኩን ብዙሓት ብፍላይ ድማ ምስ ቤት ትምህርቲታትን ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ብዝተትሓሓዘ ስጉምቲታት ወሲዶም እዮም፡ ።
en-mt: Hong Kong's regions and Macau have taken measures, especially in connection with schools and universities.

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ውሱናት ቦታታት ብርሕቀት ናይ ምስራሕ ስጉምትታት ተኣታትዮም።
en-mt: Remote-working measures have been introduced in Remote Areas in China.

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: ካብ ናብን ሁበይ ዝካየዱ ጉዕዞታት እግዳታት ተነቢሩሎም እዩ።
en-mt: Restrictions on travel to and from Hubi have been suspended.

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: ህዝባዊ ትራንፖርት ተመሓይሹ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ቤተ-መዘክራት ንግዚኡ ኣብ ቻይና ተዓጽየን።
en-mt: Public transit has been improved and museums are temporarily closed in China.

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: ናይ ህዝባዊ ምንቅስቓሳት ቁጽጽር ኣብ ኣብዝሓ ከተማታት ተግባራዊ ዝኾነ እዩ፡ ከባቢ 760 ሚልዮን ሰባት ድማ (ፈርቂ ናይ ህዝቢ ብዝሓት) ገለ ዓይነት ናይ ደገ ክልከላታት ዝገጠሞሞ እዮም። እዚ ለበዳ ቅድሚ ኣብ ማርች ናብ ዓለምለኻዊ ደረጃ ምእታው፣ ናይ ቻይና ሰበ ስልጣናት እቲ ቫይረስ "ካብ ካል ኦት ሃገራት ከይኣትዎም" ጥቡቕ ስጉምቲታት ወሲዶም እዮም።
en-mt: Public movement controls are in effect in many cities, and about 760 million people (about a fifth of the population) have faced some form of gate restrictions, including the outbreak before it reached international levels in March, when Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus "from entering other countries."

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: ንምሳሌ፣ ቤጂንግ ን ኹሎም ናብታ ከተማ ዝኣትዉ ዓለምለኻዊ ተጉዓዝቲ 14 መዓልቲ ኣብ ኳራንታይን ጻንሒት ዓቀሚጣ ኣላ። ኣብ ማርች 23፣ ኣብ ሜይን ላንድ ቻይና ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲታት ሓደ ጉዳይ ጥራሕ እዩ ኣብ ሃገር ውሽጢ ምምሕልላፋት ተረኹቡዋ እሱ ድማ ሓድ ካብ ኢስታንቡል ናብ ጓዋንግጁ ዝተመልሰ ወልቀ ሰብ እዩ ነየሩ።
en-mt: Beijing, for example, has a 14-day quarantine period for all international travelers entering the city, and on March 23, only one case was transmitted domestically in five days in Maine, China, and one person who had returned from Istanbul to Guangzhou.

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 24 2020፣ ናይ ቻይና ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ሊ ከቺያንግ፣ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሃገር ውሽጢ ዘሎ ምግፋሕ ብ መሰራታዊነት ጠጠው ክምዝበለን እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ትሕቲ ቑጽጽር ክምዝወዓለ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On March 24, 2020, Chinese Prime Minister Li Cheqiang announced that the spread of the virus would be basically stopped and that the outbreak would be brought under control in China.

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: ካብ ዉሃን ወጻኢ፣ካብ እቲ ምዕጻው ዝትግበር፣ ድሕሪ ክልተ ወርሒ፣ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ መዓልቲ ኣብ ሁበይ ዝነበሩ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት ክቐሉ ተገይሮም እዮም፣ ናይ ቻይና ወጻኢ ጉዳያት ሚኒስትር ኣብ ማርች 26 2020 ከምዘፍለጦ ካብ ማርች 28 ጀሚሩ፣ ኩሎም ቪዛ ዘለዎም ይኹኑ ናይ መንበሪ ፍቓድ ዘለዎም ዝገብሩዎም ምእታዋት ክምዝተቛረጹ ብምግላጽ፣ እዚ ፖሊሲ እዚ መዓስ ከምዘብቅዕ ግን ዝርዝር ሓበሬታ ኣይሃቡን።
en-mt: two months after the lockdown, travel restrictions in Hubei on the same day have been lifted, China's foreign ministry announced on March 26, 2020, that all visa holders and residence permit holders will be suspended from March 28, but did not elaborate on when this policy would end.

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: እቶም ናብ ቻይና ንምእታው ዝደልዩ ናብ ቻይና ኤምባሲታትን ቆንስላታትን ናይ ቪዛ ሕቶ ከቕርቡ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Those seeking entry must submit visa applications to Chinese embassies and consulates.

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: መንግስቲ ቻይና ፋብሪካታትን ትካላት ንግድን ብዕለት 30 ማርች ክኸፍታ ፋይናንስያዊ ደገፍ ብምሃብ ኣተባቢዑ። 4 ኤፕሪል ሰዓት 10፤00ናይ ሰለስተ ደቓይቕ ጸጥታ ክትፍለምን መዓልቲ ሓዘን ክትከውንን ብሃገራዊ ቆንስል ተኣዊጁ። ዳግማይ ምልዓል ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከየምጽእ ስግኣታት ስለዘሎ ግን ማእከላይ መንግስቲ ንስድራቤታት ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት ንምሕላው ሓዘኖም ብመርበብ ኢንተርኔት ክገልጹ ተመሃጺኑ።
en-mt: he Chinese government encouraged factories and businesses to open March 30 with financial support. April 4 was declared by the National Consulate at 10:00 a.m. for three minutes of security and a day of mourning, but the central government was urged to express their condolences online to families to maintain social distancing.

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ናብ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ጃኑዋሪ 20 2020 ካብ ቻይና ክምዝተዛመተ ተረጋጊጹ እዩ።
en-mt: COVID-19 has been confirmed to have spread to South Korea from China on January 20, 2020.

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: ናይ እታ ሃገር ናይ ጥዕና ኤጀንሲ ክምዝሓበሮ ብሰንኪ ኣብ ዴይጉ ዝነበረ ሺንቺዮንጂ ናይ እየሱስ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ዝበሃል ናይ ሓዱሽ ሃይማኖታዊ ምትእኽኻብ፣ ኣብ ፈብሩዋሪ 20 ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት በድንቢ ወሲኾም ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: According to the country's health agency, a new religious gathering called Shinciongji Church of Jesus in Deigu increased cases on February 20.

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: ካብ ዉሃን ንደይጎ ዝበጽሑ ኣመንቲ ሺንቸንጂ ጠንቂ መበገሲ ናይዚ ለበዳ’ዮም ዝብል ጥርጣረታት ኣሎ።
en-mt: Shinchenji pilgrims from Wuhan in Gogo are suspected to be the cause of the pandemic.

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: ካብ ፌብሩዋሪ 22 ጀሚሩ፡ ካብ 9,336 ተኸተልቲ ቤተክርስትያን፡ 1,261 ወይ ድማ 13% ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ከምዘለዎም ሓቢሮም። ደቡብ ኮርያ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ናይ ጥንቃቀ ግዜ ከም ዘላ ብ23 ለ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ኣዊጃ።
en-mt: As of Feb. 22, 9,336 church followers reported having symptoms of 1,261, or 13% of them. South Korea declared it at the highest alert time in 23 Le February 2020.

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: ብ28 ፌብሩዋሪ ልዕሊ 2,000 ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማት ኣብ ኮርያ ተመዝጊቦም። ብ29 ፌብሩዋሪ ከዓ 3,150 በጺሖም።
en-mt: On February 28, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were registered in Korea, and on February 29, they reached 3,150.

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: ሰለስተ ወተሃደራት ደቡብ ኮርያ ብመርመራ ቫይረስ ምስ ተረኽቦም ኩሎም ወተሃደራዊ መዓስከራት ደቡብ ኮርያ ኣብ ትሕቲ ውሸባ ኣትዮም።
en-mt: When three South Korean soldiers were detected by a virus test, all South Korean military bases were placed under quarantine.

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: ናይ መንገዲ ኣየር መደባት እውን ብዝበጽሖም ጽልዋ ተቐዪሮም እዮም። ደቡብ ኮሪያ ኣብ ዓለም እቲ ዝዓበዬን ብሉጽ ዝተወደበ ኣብ ሕዝቢታት ዝግበር ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምጽራይ ምርመራ ምግባርን እቶም በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ድማ ተፈልዮም ዝቕመጡሉን ምስ እቶም ዝሓመሙ ርክብ ዝነበሮም ሰባት ኣስር ደሊኻ ናይ ምርካብን ኣብ ምፍላይ ተመኩሮ ኣተኣታትያ ኣያ።
en-mt: South Korea has also introduced the world's largest and best organized population testing of the virus and the experience of identifying and identifying those infected with the virus.

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ምጽራይ መንገዲታታ ኣገደስቲ ዝኾኑ ሓደሽቲ ዓለምለኻዊ በጻሕቲ ክግበሩ ዘለዎም ብ ሞባይል መተግበሪ ዝፍጸሙ ናይ ምልክታት ዓርሰ-ጥቆማታት፡ ምርመራ ኣብ ዝተገብረ ኣብ ቀጻሊ መዓልቲ ውጽኢቶም ዝበጽሕ ን ናይ መዓልታዊ ዝግበር ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚ ድማ ናብ 20000 ክብ ክብል ዝገብሩ ናይ ጎዳና ኣብ መኪና ከለዉ ዝግበሩ ምርመራታት ዘጠቓልል እዩ።
en-mt: its clearing routes include mobile app signals that must be carried out by new international visitors, whose results will be achieved the next day and increase the daily testing capacity to 20,000.

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮርያ ነዚ ለበዳ ንምቁጽጻር ዝወጠነቶ መደብ፡ ዋላ’ውን ብሃገር ደረጃ ውሸባ እንተዝይተገብረ፡ ክም ዕዉት’ዩ ዝሕሰብ። ሕብረተሰብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ብናይ ፕረዚደንት ሙን ጀይ-ኢን ግብረመልሲ ኣብዚ ግዚ ቕልውላው መጀመርያ ተሓጒሶም።
en-mt: South Korea's plan to contain the pandemic is expected to succeed even if it does not take a national lockdown, and South Korean society is pleased with President Moon Jae-in's response at the beginning of the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: ኣብዝሓ ኮርያውያን ወይ ብምኽኒያት መንግስቲ ነቲ ለበዳ ዝሓዘሉ መንገዲ ን ሙን ብምኽሳስ፣ ውይድማ ብምውዳስ ናይ ፊርማ ምትእኽኻብ ኣብ ምግባር ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Many Koreans or the government are blaming Moon for handling the pandemic, and they are holding a signature gathering to praise moon.

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 23፣ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣርባዕተ ሰሙናት እቲ ዝተሓተ መዓልታዊ ጉዳያት ጽብጻብ ገይራ።
en-mt: On March 23, South Korea reported the lowest daily cases in four weeks.

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: ብ29 ማርች፡ ካብ 1 ሚያዝያ ጀሚሩ ኩሎም ሓደሽቲ ወጻእተኛታት በጻሕቲ ንክልተ ሰሙን ከምዝውሸቡ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On March 29, from 1 April, all new foreign visitors will be quarantined for two weeks.

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: ብመሰረት ኣብ ኣፕሪል 1 ዝወጹ ናይ ሚድያ ጸብጻባት፣ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ካብ 121 ዝተፈላለያ ሃገራት ናይ ምርመራ ሓገዝ ንኽትገብር ተሓቲታ።
en-mt: According to media reports released on April 1, South Korea has been asked to provide testing assistance from 121 different countries.

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: ኢራን እቲ ኣብ ኮም ዝተረኸበ ናይ መጀምሪያ ዝተረጋገጸ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ጉዳይ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 19 ዕላው ገይራ፣ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ከም ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስተርን ሕክምናዊ ትምህርቲን፣ ኣብታ መዓልቲ ክልተ ሰባት ሞይቶም።
en-mt: Iran made a pre-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 case on February 19, after which two people died that day, according to health minister and medical education.

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: ካብቶም ኣቐዲሞም ብመንግስቲ ዝተወሰዱ ስጉምቲታት ውሽጢ ፡ ኮንሰርታትን ባህላዊ ምርኢታት፡ ናይ ዓርቢ ጸሎት መደባት ስረዛ፡ ናይ ዩኒቨርስቲታት ፡ ላዕለዎት ናይ ትምህርቲ ትካላትን ቤት ትምህርቲታት ድማ ምዕጻው ፡ ዘጠቓልል እዩ።
en-mt: Among the measures taken by the government in the past included the closure of concerts and cultural exhibitions, friday prayer programs, and the closure of universities, higher education institutions and schools.

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: ኢራን ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምውጋእ ሓሙሽተ ትሪልዮን ሪያል መዲባ ኣላ።
en-mt: Iran has set aside five trillion riyal to fight the virus.

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ሃሳን ሩሃኒ ብ 26 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ውልቀሰባት እምበር በዚ ለበዳ ንዝተተንከፉ ቦታታት ናይ ምውሻብ መደባት ከምዘየለ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: President Hasan Rouhani said on February 26, 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine individuals, but not to those affected by the pandemic.

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ከተማታት ዝግበር ጉዕዞ ንኽውሰን ዝገብሩ መዳባት ኣብ ወርሒ ማርች ዕላው ተገርይሮም ይኹን ደኣምበር ኣብ መንጎ ከተማታት ዝግበር ጽዑቕ ናይ ትራፊክ ምንቅስቓሳት ካብ ናይ ፐርሺያ ሕዱሽ ዓመት ኣቐዲሙ ክካየድ ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Restrictions on travel between cities were closed in March, but intense traffic between the cities continued to take place a year earlier than in Percia.

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: ኣብ ቆም ዝርከቡ ናይ ሽያ ታቦታት ንኣመንቲ ክሳብ 16 ማርች 2020 ተኸፊተን ክጸንሓ’የን። ኣብ ወርሒ ፌብሩዋሪ ኢራን ከም ማእከል ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ብምዃን ድሕሪ ቻይና ክትስራዕ ክኢላ።
en-mt: Shia tablets in Coca-Cos will remain open to believers until March 16, 2020, when In February, Iran was able to be built after China as the epicenter of the pandemic.

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: ድሕሪ ብዛዕባ ኣብ ኢራን ዘሎ ለበዳ ዝተገብረ ምሽፈፋን ዝተገብረ ስምዕታታት፣ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 28 ካብ ዓሰርተ ንላዕሊ ዝኾና ሃገራት ናይ ጉዳያተን ኣሰር ናብ ኢራን ወሲዳናኦ ኣለዋ ፣ እዚ ድማ ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ዝርጋሐ ካብቲ ብ ናይ ኢራን መንግስቲ ዝተጠቐሰ 388 ጉዳያት ንላዕሊ ክምዝኾን ዘርኣየ እዩ።
en-mt: In the wake of the spread of the pandemic in Iran, more than ten countries took their cases to Iran on February 28, surpassing the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government.

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: ፓርላማ ኢራን ስርሑ ኣቋሪጹ።23 ካብቶም 290 ኣባላቱ በቲ ቫይረስ ከምዝተለኽፉ ብዕለት 3 ማርች ብመርመራ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: Iran's parliament has suspended operations.23 of its 290 members have been infected, according to an investigation on March 3.

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 12፡ ሁማን ራይት ዎች፡ ን ናይ ኢራን እስርቤት ሓለፍቲ፡ ብዘይ ዝኾነ ይኹን ቅድመ ኹነት ንቶም ናይ ሓሳብ ፍልልዮም ብ ሰለማዊ መንገዲ ብ ብምግላጾም ዝተኣሰሩ ሰባት ንኽትፈትሕን፡ እቶም ካልኦት ዝምልከቶም እስረኛታት እውን ብ ጊዜያዊነት ን ኽፈትሑ ሓቲቶም።
en-mt: On March 12, Human Rights Watch called on Iranian prison officials to release detainees detained for expressing their ideological differences without any preconditive conditions and for the temporary release of the other detainees.

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: ኣብ ከም እሰር ቤታት ዝበሉ እኹል ሕክምናዊ ክንክን ዘይብሎም ዕጹዋት ትካላት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምግፋሕ ሓደጋ ዝዓበየ ክምዝኾን የቐምጥ።
en-mt: In closed institutions such as prisons that do not have adequate medical care, the risk of spreading the virus is higher.

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: ብ ማርች 15 መንገስቲ ኢራን 100 ሰባት ብሓንቲ መዓልቲ ከምዝሞቱ ሓቢራ። እዚ ከኣ ካብ ምጅማር ለበዳ ኣትሒዙ ዝበዝሐ ቁጽሪ ምዃኑ’ዩ።
en-mt: On March 15, Iran's government reported that 100 people had died in one day, the highest number since the start of the pandemic.

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: ብውሕዱ 12 ኣብ ስልጣን ዘለዉ ዋላ ነበር ኢራናውያን ፖለቲካውያንን ሰበስልጣንን ብሰንኪ እቲ ሕማም ከምዝሞቱ ብ17 ማርች ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: At least 12 incumbent Iranian politicians and officials died from the disease on March 17.

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: ብ23 ማርች ኣብ ኢራን ብምኽንያት ኮሮናቫይረስ፡ኣብ ሰዓት 50 ሓደሽቲ ሕሙማት ከምኡ’ውን ሀደ ሓድሽ ሞት ኣኣብ ሰርተ ደቓይቕን ተራእዩ።
en-mt: On March 23, Iran saw 50 new cases per hour due to the coronavirus and a new death in less than ten minutes.

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: ወኪል WHO ብዝሓበሮ ኣብ ኢራን ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ካብ እቲ ብወግዒ ዝተሓበረ ብሓሙሽተ ዕጽፊ ዝዛየደ ክኸውን ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: According to the WHO, the number of cases in Iran could be five times higher than the one officially reported.

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ እቲ ብ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኢራን ዝተገብረ ማዕቀብ፣ ናይ እታ ሃገር ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ላብዕ ንምቁጽጻር ቁጠባዊ ክእለት ኣዝዩ ይጸልዎ ከምዘሎ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: In addition, U.S.-led sanctions on Iran have severely affected the country's economic ability to control the virus.

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: ናይ UN ናይ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ላዕለዋይ ኮሚሽነር ን ኢራን ሓዊሱ በቲ ለበዳ ዝተጠቕዓ ሃገራት ዘለወን ኢኮኖሚያዊ ማዕቀብ ንክቐለለን ጻውዒት ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: he UNITED NATIONS High Commissioner for Human Rights has called on Iran to lift economic sanctions.

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ናብ ጥልያን ብዕለት 31 ጃኑዋሪ ከምዝኣተወ፡ ድሕሪ ብመርመራ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ዝተረኽቦም ክልተ ቻይናውያን በጻሕቲ ሮም ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: The outbreak entered Italy on 31 January after two Chinese tourists in Rome were confirmed by sars-cov-2 tests.

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: ጉዳያት ብ ፍጥነት ክ ወስኹ ምስጀምሩ፣ ናይ ጣልያን መንግስቲ ኩሎም ናብ ቻይና ዝግበሩ ናይ ኣየር በረራታት ጠጠው ክብሉ ብምግባር ናይ ሕጹጽ ግዜ ኣዋጅ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: As the cases began to pick up quickly, the Italian government declared a state of emergency by suspending all air flights to China.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: 16 ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ኣብ ሎምበርዲ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 21 ምርካቦም ጀሚሩ ፡ ዘይተተሓሓዚ ዝርግሐ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ጉጀለ ጉዳያት ድሒሩ ተረኺቦም እዮም። ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 22 ፣ ቤት ምኽሪ ሚኒስትራት ነቲ ለበዳ ንምቁጽጻር ሓዲሽ ኣዋጅ-ሕጊ ኣውጺኦም፣ እዚ ካብ ዝተፈላለያ 11 ከተማታት ናይ ሰሜን ጣሊያን ዝመጹ 50,000 ዝተወሸቡ ዘጠቓልል እዩ።
en-mt: 16 Confirmed cases began to be found in Lomberdi on February 21, when an unrelated spread of COVID-19 cases were later found. In February 22, the Council of Ministers issued a new decree to contain the outbreak, which includes 50,000 asylum seekers from 11 cities in northern Italy.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ጁሰፔ ኮንቴ “ኣብቶም ናይ እቲ ለባዳ ቦታት፣ መእተውን መውጽእን ክፉታት ኣይክኾኑን እዮም” ክብሉ ተዛሪቦም።
en-mt: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said: "They will not be bad at the gates, entry and exits."

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: ኣብቶም ከባቢታት ዝነበሩ ምስ ስራሕን ናይ ስፖርታዊ ምንቅስቓሳትን ዝተትሓሓዙ ጥርጣረታት ስርዓት ክሕዙ ተገይሮም እዮም።"ኣብ ማርች 4፣ መንግስቲ ጣልያን ኣብታ ሃገር ዝሞቱ 100 ምስ ምብጻሑ፣ ኣብ መላእ እታ ሃገር ዝርከባ ኩለን ቤት ትምህርቲታን ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ንኽዕጸዋ ትእዛዝ ኣመሓላሊፎም "
en-mt: Doubts about work and sports activities in the areas have been subjected to a system of protests. "On March 4, when the Italian government reached 100 dead in the country, they ordered the closure of all schools and universities across the country."

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: ኩሎም ዋና ናይ ስፖርታዊ ምድላዋት፣ ሴሪኣ ኤ ኹዕሶ እግሪ ጸወታታት፣ እስካብ ኣፕሪል ኣብ ዕጹው ንኽካየዱ፣ ይኽን እምበር ኣብ ማርች 9፣ ኩሎም ስፖርታዊ ጸወታታት ብንኡሱ ንሓደ ወርሒ ተቛሪጾም እዮም።
en-mt: All main sporting events, Serie A football matches, will be closed until April, but on March 9, all sports will be suspended for at least a month.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 11፣ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኮንቴ ብዘይካ ሱፐር ማርኬታትን ፋርማሲታትን ዳርጋ ኩሎም ንግዳዊ ምንቅስቓሳት ጠጠው ንኽብሉ ትእዛዝ ኣመሓላሊፎም። ኣብ ማርች 6፣ ናይ ጣልያን ናይ ኣንስቴዢያ ኮሌጅ( Italian College of Anaesthesia)፣ ኣንልገሲያ( Analgesia)፣ ረሱሳይተሽን ን ጽኑዕ ክንክን ማእኸል( Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI)) ምናልባት ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ ዝኽእሉ ናይ ትሪያጅ ፕሮቶኮላት ዝምልከቱ ናይ ሕክምናዊ ስነ-ምግባራት ኣሕቲሞም።
en-mt: On March 11, Prime Minister Conte issued an order to suspend almost all commercial activities except supermarkets and pharmacies. In March 6, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, and the Resuscitation and Intensive Care Center (SIAART), published medical ethics relating to potentially-used therapeutic protocols.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: ብ ማርች 19 ጥልያን 3,405 ሞት ድሕሪ ምምዝጋባ ብብዝሒ ሞት ካብዚ ለበዳ ንቻይና በሊጻታ።
en-mt: On March 19, Italy surpassed China with 3,405 deaths.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 22፣ ሩስያ ትሽዓተ ሕክምናዊ ኣቑሑ ዝጸዓና ወታደራዊ ኣውሮፕላናት ናብ ጣልያን ክምዝለኣኸት ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: On March 22, Russia announced that nine military aircraft carrying medical supplies would be sent to Italy.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: ካብ ኤፕሪል 5 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን 128,948 ብመርመራ ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማት፡ 15,887 ሞትን 21,815 ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ነይሮም፡ዝበዝሑ ድማ ኣብ ሎምባርዲ ዝተባህለ ክልል ነይሮም።
en-mt: As of April 5, there were 15,887 deaths and 21,815 cured patients in Italy, with 128,948 confirmed cases, most of them in the Lombardy region.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: ናይ CNN ሪፖርት ከምዘርእዮ፣ ናይ ጣልያን ብዙሕ ቁጽሪ ዘለዎ ናይ ኣረግቶት ህዝቢ ምህላውን ብቕልጡፍ ንኹሎም ቫይረስ ንዘለዎም ሰባት ምርመራ ምግባር ዘይምኽኣልን ነቲ ናይ ዓብዪ ናይ ሞት ደረጃ የበርክቱ ከምዘለዉ ኣመልኪቱ።
en-mt: According to a CNN report, Italy's largest population of elderly people and the inability to get tested immediately for all people with the virus are helping with the high mortality rate.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: መጅመሪያ እንግሊዝ ነቲ ሕማም ዝሃበቶ መልሲ ዝሑል ዝበሃል እዩ ነይሩ፣ ብዚ ድማ ናይ እግሊዝ መንግስቲ እስካብ 18 ማርች 2020፣ ዝኾነ ዓይነት ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ውይድማ ኣብ ዜጋታቱ ናይ ጅምላ ኳራንታይን ስጉምቲታት ኣይወሰድን ነይሩ።
en-mt: he UK's initial response to the disease was cold, and until 18 March 2020, the British government had not taken any social distancing measures against its citizens.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: ከም ውፅኢት ድማ፣ እቲ መንግስቲ ነቲ ኣብ ማሕበረሰብ ስግኣት ዝፈጠረ ጉዳይ ኣመልኪቱ ዘርኣዮ ናይ መልሲ ኣዋህባ ሕጽረትን ጻዕቒን ዝተልዓለ ወቐሳ ኣጋጢሙዎ እዩ። ኣብ ማርች 16፣ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ቦሪስ ጆንሰን ን ኹሎም ኣገደስቲ ዘይኮኑ ጉዕዞታትን ማሕበራዊ ርክባት ጠጠው ብምባል ሰባት ብዝተኽኣለ መጠን ኣብ ገዛኦም ኮይኖም ንኽሰርሑን ናብ ከም እንዳ መስተታት፣ ቤት ምግቢታትን ቲያትርን ካብ ምኻድ ንኽዕቀቡ ለባዋኦም ገሊጾም።
en-mt: As a result, the government's response to the threat posed by the community has been met with a growing criticism, and on March 16, Prime Minister Boris Johnson banned all non-essential travel and social connections and urged people to work from home as much as possible and avoid going to places such as drinks, restaurants and theatres.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 20፣ መንግስቲ ኩሎም ናይ መዝናግዒ ቦታታት ከም እንዳ መስተታት ፣ ጂምናዚየማት ዝበሉ ትካላት ብዝተኽኣለ መጠን ብቕልጡፍ ንኽዕጸዉ ኣዊጆም፣ ኣብዚ በዳሂ እዋን እዚ ስራሕ ስእነት ንምክልኻል ድማ፣ ንስራሕተኛታት ክሳብ £2,500 ን ዝኾነ ወሰን፣ ናይ ደሞዞም 80% ንምኽፋል ቃል ኣትዮም። ኣብ ማርች 23፣ እቲ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ብዝበለጸ ጥብቕ ዝበሉ ከም ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ ምትእኽኻባት ምኽልካል፣ ናይ ጉዕዞን ኣብ ደገ ዝግበሩ ተግባራት ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ዝምልከቱ ስጉምቲታትን እገዳታት ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On March 20, the government announced the close of all facilities such as drinks, gymnasties, and to prevent joblessness at this challenging time; to prevent joblessness; to limit workers to up to £2,500; to pay 80% of their salary; in March 23; in March 23, the Prime Minister announced restrictions on gatherings that included more than two people, travel and social distancing measures.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: ካብቶም ሕሉፋት ስጉምቲታት በተጻራሪ፣ እዞም እገዳታት እዚኦም ብዝትግበሩ ናይ ገንዘብ ቅጽዓታትን ምትእኸኻባት ምብታን ብ ፖሊስ ሓይሊ ዝትግበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Contrary to some of the latest measures, these restrictions are enforced by the police force for money laundering and collection.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: ዝተኣዘዙ እንትኾኑ፡ ብዘይካ እቶም ከም ሱፐር ማርኬታት፡ ባንኪታት፡ ናይ ሃርድዌር ሹቓት፡ ናይ ፔትሮል ጣቢያታት ን ጋራጃትን ዝበሉ "ኣገደስቲ" ተባሂሎም ዝተፈለዩ፣መብዛሕቲኦም ቢዝነሳት ንኽዕጸዉ ትእዛዝ ተሓላሊፉ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to those ordered, such as supermarkets, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations and garages, most orders have been issued to close.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 20፣ እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙም ኣብ ፓስፊክ ሰሜን ምዕራብ ዋሺንግተን ኣብ ሓደ ካብ ዉሃን ጃኑዋሪ 15 ዝተመልሰ ሰብኣይ እዩ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: On January 20, the initial COVID-19 patient was found in a man who had returned from Wuhan on January 15 in the Pacific Northwest of Washington.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: ናይ ሗይት ሃውስ ናይ ኮረና ቫይረስ ግብረ ሓይሊ ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 29 ተጣዪሹ።
en-mt: he Coronavirus Task Force was launched on January 29.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: ብ31 ጥሪ ምምሕዳር ትራምፕ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ህጹጽነት ኣዊጁ። ኣብ ልዕሊ ካብ ቻይና ዝመጹ መንገደኛታት ድማ ምእታው ተኸልኪሎም።
en-mt: On January 31, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and entry on travelers from China was denied.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 28 2020፡ ማእኽል ምቁጽጽር ሕማም- ናይ መንግስቲ ኣሜሪካ እቲ ዝዓበየ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ትካል- ናይ ባዕሎም ናይ መመርመሪ ኪት ክምዘማዕበሉ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: On January 28, 2020, the Centers for Disease Control - the U.S. government's largest public health agency - said it would develop its own testing kit.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: ዋላ’ኳ ከምኡ እንተገበሩ፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ምርመራ ደንጒዮም ጀሚሮም። እዚ’ዩ ከኣ ኣብቲ ግዜ ዝነበረ ሓቀኛ ዝርግሐ ናይቲ ለበዳ ዝሓብኦ።
en-mt: Despite this, the United Nations began a delayed investigation, which hid the true spread of the pandemic at the time.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: እቲ ምርመራ ፣ ብ ሰንኪ ኣብ ወርሒ ፌብሩዋሪ ብ ፌደራል መንግስቲ ዝተሰርሑ ጸገም ዘለዎም ኪትስ ፣ ብ መንግስታዊ ዘይኮኑ ትካላት(ናይ ትምህርቲ ማእኸላት፣ ትካላትን ሆስፒታላት) ዝስርሑ ድማ እስካብ ወርሒ ፈብሩዋሪ መጨረሻ ናይ ፌደራል መንግስቲ መረጋገጺ ዘይምርካብ ፣ ሰባት ነቲ ምርመራ ብቑዕ ንምዃን ኸማልኡ ዘለዉዎም ሮቛሒታት እስካብ ናይ ማርች ወርሒ መጀምሪያ ኣክባቢ ኣዝዮም ጥቡቓት ብምንባሮም( ድሕሪኡ ግን ናይ ዶክተር ትእዛዝ እዩ ዝድለ) ክተኣጓጎል ክኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: The test was delayed by the start of March because of the fact that kits operated by the federal government in June; non-governmental organizations (educational centers, facilities and hospitals) did not have federal government credentials until the end of February; and because the factors that people must meet to qualify for the test were so close to the start of March (but then a doctor's prescription was required).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: ክሳብ ፌብሩዋሪ 27, ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ትሕቲ 4,000 መርመራታት ጥራይ ከምዝትኻየደ ኣብ ዋሺንግተን ፖስት ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: As of February 27, there are only under 4,000 investigations in the United States, according to the Washington Post.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: ክሳብ ማርች 13፣ ካብ 14000 ዝነኣሰ ምርመራታት ክምዝተገበሩ ዘርኢ ጸብጻብ እትላንቲክ ኣቕሪቡ ።
en-mt: As of March 13, 14,000 tests will be conducted.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: ብ22 ማርች፡ ኣሶስየትድ ፕረስ“ምልክታትን ትዕዛዝ ሓኪምን ዘለዎም ብዙሓት ሰባት፡ ነቲ መርመራ ንምርካብ ካብ ሰዓታት ክሳብ መዓልታት ይጽበዩ ኣለዉ።”ኢሉ ሓቢሩ።ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ፋልማይ ዘጋጠመ ሞት ኣብ ዋሺንግተን ስቴት ብ29 ፌብሩዋሪ ድሕሪ ምምዝጋቡ፡ ጋቨርነር ጀይ ኢንስሊ ናይ ህጹጽ ኩነት ኣዊጁ። ካልኦት ሃገራት’ውን ድሕሪ ቁሩብ ሰዓብኦ።
en-mt: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported that "many people with symptoms and doctor's orders waited from hours to days to find the test." After Falmay's death in the United States was recorded in Washington State on February 29, Gawerner Jay Insley declared a state of emergency, and other countries followed him a little later.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ሲያትል ዝርከባ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ብዕለት 3 ማርች ተዓጽየን። ብድሕሪኡ’ውን ኣብ መፋርቅ ወርሒ ማርች ኣብቲ ሃገር ዝርከባ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ክዕጸዋ ጀሚረን። ኣብ ማርች 6, 2020: ሕቡራት መንግስታት ብዛዕባ’ዚ ሓድሽ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ኣብ እቲ ሃገር ከምጽኦ ዝኽእል ጽልዋ ብክኢላታት ስነ-ሕማምለበዳ ካብ ኢምፐርያል ኮሌጅ ላንደን ተመኺራ።
en-mt: Schools around Seattle closed on March 3, followed by mid-March, schools in the country began to close, and on March 6, 2020, the United States was consulted by experts from Imperial College Landon about the impact of the new coronavirus on the country.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ መዓልቲ፣ ፕረዚደንት ትራምፕ ነቲ ናይ Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act ሕጊ ፈሪሙ፣እዚ ድማ ነተን ናይ ፌደራል ኤጀንሲታት ነቲ ለበዳ መመከቲ ዝኸውን $8.3 ቢሊየን ዶላር ናይ ህጹጽ ኩነታት ገንዘብ ዘቕርበ እዩ።
en-mt: On the same day, President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provides federal agencies with $8.3 billion in emergency funds to justify the outbreak.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: ኮርፖሬታት ኣብ ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት ኣቐሚጦም, ኮንፈረነንሳት ስሪዞም፡ ስራሕተኛታት ድማ ኣብ ገዛ ኾይኖም ንኽስርሑ ኣብረታቲዖም።
en-mt: Corporations placed travel restrictions on employees, canceled conferences, and encouraged workers to work from home.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: ናይ ስፖርታዊ ምድላዋትን ወቕቲታት ተሰሪዞም ኣለዉ። ኣብ ማርች 11፣ ትራምፕ ን 30 መዓልቲታት ዝጸንሕ ካብ ማርች 13 ዝጅምር፣ ካብ እንግሊዝ ወጻኢ ንዘለዋ ንመብዛሕቲእን ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሃገራት ዝምልከት ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: Sports preparations and seasons have been canceled. In March 11, Trump announced travel restrictions for most and European countries outside Of England, starting on March 13, which will last for 30 days.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: ኣብቲ ቀጻሊ መዓልቲ ነቲ እገዳ ን እንግሊዝን ኣየርላንድን ክሓውስ ገይሩ ኣግፊሕዎ እዩ።
en-mt: On the next day, the ban was lifted for England and Ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 13, ህጹጽ እዋን ኣዊጁ፣ እዚ ድማ ናይ ፌደራል ናይ ገንዘብ ድጋፍ ንቅልውላው መልሲ ንክህብ ገቢሩዎ እዩ።
en-mt: On March 13, he declared a state of emergency, which led federal funding to respond to the crisis.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: ካብ ማርች 15 ጀሚሩ፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ቢዝነስ ትካላት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ንምቕናስ ክበሃል፣ ተዓጽዮም እዮም ውየድማ ኣብ መላእ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሰራሕ ሰዓተን ቀኒሰን እየን።
en-mt: As of March 15, many businesses have closed their working hours across the United States to reduce the spread of the virus.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: እስካብ ማርች 17፣ እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ኩለን እተን 50 ስቴታትን ኣብ ኮለምቢያ ዲስትሪክትን ምህላው ተረጋጊጹ እዩ።ኣብ ማርች 23፣ ኣብ ኔውዮርክ ሲቲ ዘሎ ኣጠቓላሊ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ቀጽሪ 10,700 በጺሑ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ካብ ዘለዉ ኣጠቓላሊ ጉዳያት ዝለዓለ እዩ።
en-mt: As of March 17, the epidemic has been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Colombia. In March 23, the total confirmed cases in New York City reached 10,700, the highest number of cases in South Korea.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 25፡ እቲ ኣመሓዳሪ ምስቲ ናይ ጉዳያት ዕጽፊ ምኻን ካብ 2.0 መ ዓልቲታት ናብ 4.7 መዓልቲታት ክብ ምባሉ ፡እቲ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት እንሰርሐ ይመስል ክብል ገሊጹ ።
en-mt: On March 25, the governor said that the doubling of the number of cases had increased from 2.0 a.m. to 4.7 days, making it appear that we were working on social distancing.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: ካብ ማርች 28 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ኔውዮርክ ሲቲ 32,308 ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ነይሮም፣ 672 ሰባት ድማ በቲ ቫይረስ ሞይቶም። ኣብ ማርች 26፣ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ን ቻይናን ጣልያንን ሓዊሱ፣ካብ ዝኾነ ናይ ዓለምና ሃገር ንላዕሊ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ነይሮማ። ካብ ኣፕሪል 8 ጀሚሩ፣ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ 400,335 ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት እክህለዉ 12,841 ሰባት ድማ ሞይቶም እዮም።
en-mt: Since March 28, there have been 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people have died from the virus; in March 26, the United States has burned China and Italy; there have been more confirmed cases than any other country in the world; since April 8, there have been 400,335 confirmed cases in the United States and 12,841 people have died.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: ከም ኣብ ማርች 30 ዝነበረ ናይ ሚድያ ጸብጻባት ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ፕሬዝደንት ትራምፕ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት መምርሒታት እስካብ ኣፕሪል 30 ክምዘናውሑዎ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: According to media reports on March 30, U.S. President Trump has extended social distancing guidelines until April 30.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: ኣብ ተምሳሳሊ መዓልቲ፣ USNS Comfort ዝተብሃለ ከባቢ 1000 ዓራታት ዝሓዘ መርከብ ሆስፒታል ኣብ ኔውዮርክ ምዕራፉ ገይሩ።
en-mt: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1,000 beds, has launched its chapter in New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል 3, ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ውሽጢ 24-ሰዓት 884 ሞት ብሰንኪ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኣመዝጊባ።
en-mt: On April 3, the United States recorded 884 deaths from coronavirus within 24-hours.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: ኣብ ግዝኣት ኔውዮርክ እቶም ጉዳያት ኣብ ኣፕሪል 3 ካብ 100000 ሰባት በሊጾም ኣለው። ናይ ዋይት ሃውስ ነቲ ሓደጋ ኣንኢሱ ብምርኣዩ ን ብ ሰበ ስልጣን ጥዕና ን ሳይንቲስታትን ዝግበሩ መግለጺታት ን ምስ'ቲ ቫይረስ ዝተትሓሓዙ ሕትመታት ብ ቢሮ ምክትል ፕሬዝደንት ማይክ ፔንስ ኣቢላ ብምምራሑ ዝውቀሰሉ እዩ።
en-mt: In New York State, the cases exceeded 10,000 people on April 3, when the White House lowered the risk and led health officials and scientists" statements and related printouts through Vice President Mike Pence's office.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: ኣጠቓላሊ ናይ ትራምፕ ነቲ ቅልውላው ዝሓዙሉ መንገዲ ብዘምልከት ብ ናይ ፓርቲያዊ መሰመር ዝፍለዩ ክልተ መርገጺታት ኣለው።
en-mt: rumpot's overall approach to the crisis has two different ways of responding to the crisis.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: U.S. ንእቶት ኣገደስቲ ናውቲ፡ብፍላይ ድማ ናውቲ ሕክምና፡ኣብ ልዕሊ ቻይና ምምርኳሳ ብገለ ናይ U.S. ሓለፍትታትን ጋዜጠኛታትን ተነቒፉ።
en-mt: U.S. reliance on China for essential materials, particularly medical supplies, has been criticized by some U.S. officials and journalists.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: ቅዲ ናይ ኣየር ጉኦዞ ብምርኣይ ዝርግሐ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ንምግማት ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ትራቭል መዲስን ጆርናል ኣብ መፋርቅ ጃኑዋሪ 2020 ተሓቲሙ።
en-mt: A study to estimate the spread of the virus was published in the Travel Medicine Journal in mid-January 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: ባንክኮክ፡ ሆንግኮንግ፡ ቶክዮን ታይፐይ ካብ ዉሃን ዝበዝሐ ተመላለስቲ ዘለወን ሃገራት ምዃነን ኣብ 2018 ካብ ማሕበር ዓለምለሃዊ በረራ ዝተዘርግሐ ሓብሬታ ይገልጽ።
en-mt: Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo and Taipei are the countries with the most passengers than Wuhan, a 2018 data leak from the International Flight Association says.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: ዱባይ፣ ሲድኒ ን ሜልቦርን ን ካብ ዉሃን ዝብገሱ ሰባት ወሩያት መብጽሒታት ኮይኖም ተጸብጺቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Dubai, Sydney and Melbourne from Wuhan are considered to be the most popular times.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: ብ መንጽር ድሉውነት ካብተን 20 ህቡባት ናይ በጻሕቲ ከተማታት ባሊ ኣብ ዝተሓተ እንትትቕመጥ፣ ኣብ ኣውስትራሊያ ዝርከባ ከተማታት ድማ ካብተን ብሉጻት ተመዲበን። ኣውስትራሊያ ን ኖቨል ኮርና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ዝኸውን ናይ ህጹጽ ግዜ መልሲ መውሃቢ መድብ ኣብ ፈብሩዋሪ 7 ዕላው ገይራቶ እያ።
en-mt: Contrary to readiness, Bali is the lowest of the 20 popular tourist cities, and Australian cities are among the best, and Australia has set an emergency response schedule for the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on February 7.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ኮቪድ-19 ዝምልከትን ገና ብሕጂ ብዙሕ ዝፍለጥ ጉዳይ ከምዘሎ፣ ከምኡ ውን ኣውስትራሊያ ነዚ ላብዕ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ኣብ ዶብ ምዕጻውን ኣብ ርክባት ምግባርን ኣትኩሮት ብምሃብ ከም እትሰርሕ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: Much is still being known about COVID-19 and Australia is working to close the border and contacts to prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: ብ21 ማርች ህጹጽ ኩነት ህዝባዊ ድሕነት ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: A public safety emergency was declared in Australia on March 21.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: ኣብ ውሃን ኣብ ናይ ሕዝባዊ መጎዓዝያታት ኣብዝተነበረ ጽፉፍ ናይ ኳራንታይን ስራሕቲ ዝተልዓለ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ዜጋታትን ናይ ዲፕሎማሲ ስራሕተኛታተን ብ ዋናነት ባዕለን ብዘዳለዋእን ቻርተር ኣውሮፕላናት ዜጋታትን ካብቲ ቦታ ንምውጻኣ መድብ ዝሓዛ እንትኾና ናይ ቻይና ሰብ መዚታት ድማ ሕጋዊ መሰነያታ ከሳልጡ እዮም።
en-mt: Many countries, which have lifted quarantine work on water and on public transport, mainly schedule citizens and diplomatic staff to leave the country on self-produced and chartered aircraft, while Chinese officials will exercise legal rights.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: ካናዳ፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ፡ ጃፓን፡ ህንዲ፡ ስሪላንካ፡ ኣውስትራልያ፡ ፈረንሳ፡ ኣርጀንቲና፡ ጀርመንን ታይላንድን ካብተን ንደቂ ሃገሮም ንምጥርናፍ ዝተጓየያ ቀዳሞት ሃገራት እየን።
en-mt: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany and Thailand were among the first countries to go out to help their country's children.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: ፓኪስታን ዝኾኑ ዓይነት ዜጋታት ካብ ቻይና ከምዘይተውጽእ ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: Pakistan has said it will not withdraw any citizens from China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 7 ብራዚል 34 ብራዚላውያን ውይድማ ናይ ስድራ ቤት ኣባላይ ምስ ኣርባዕተ ፖላንዳውያን፣ ሓደ ቻይናዊን፣ ሓደ ናይ ህንዲ ዜጋን ካብቲ ዝነበሩዎ ናብ ድሕንነቱ ዝተሓለወ ቦታ ኣንቀሳቒሳ።
en-mt: On February 7, Brazil moved 34 Brazilian family members, along with four Poles, a Chinese national and an Indian national.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: ናይ ፖላንድ ፣ ቻይና ን ህንዲን ዜጋታት ድሕሪ እታ ናይ ብራዚል ኣውሮፕላን ቅድሚ ናብ ብራዚል ምኻዳ ኣብ ፖላንድ ጻንሒት ምግባራ ፣ ኣብ ፖላንድ ክጸንሑ ክኢሎም እዮም ።
en-mt: Citizens of Poland, China and India have been able to stay in Poland after the Brazilian plane flew to Brazil.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: ካብ ዉሃን ዝተመልሱ ብራዚላውያን ኣብ ጥቓ ብራዚልያ ዝርከብ ወተሓደራዊ መዓስከር ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Brazilians returning from Wuhan have been evacuated from a military base near Brasilia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: ሽዑንሽዑ 215 ካናዳውያን(176 ኣብታ ቀዳመይቲ በረራ፡ 39 ድማ ኣብታ ካልኣይቲ ብመንግስቲ U.S. ዝተሓዝአት በረራ) ካብ ዉሃን ኣብ CFB Trenton ንክልተ ሰሙን ክውሸቡ ተወሲዶም።
en-mt: Immediately, 215 Canadians (176 on the first flight and 39 on the second flight, which was held by the U.S. government) were taken from Wuhan at CFB Trenton for two weeks.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: ብዕለት 11 ፌብሩዋሪ 185 ካናዳውያን ዝሓዘት ካብ ዉሃን ዝተበገሰት ኣየር ኣብ CFB Trenton ዓሊባ።
en-mt: On February 11, an air-conditioned air from Wuhan, containing 185 Canadians, touched down at CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: ናይ ኣውስትራሊያ ሰበ ስልጣናት ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 3 ን 4 ን 277 ዜጋታት ካብ ካልኦት ሃገራት ናብ ክሪስማስ ኣይስላንድ ማእኸል ህንጸት ኣእትያ እያ። እዚ ናይ ህንጸት ማእኽል ድማ ብድጋሚ ክም ኳራንታይን ፋሲሊቲ ኮይኑ ተስሩሑ እዩ፣ እቶም ዜጋታት ድማ ኣብኡ ን 14 መዓልቲታት ጸኒሖም እዮም።
en-mt: Australian authorities on February 3 and 4 brought 277 citizens from other countries to Christmas Island, a construction center that was once again a Quarantine Facility, where citizens stayed for 14 days.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: ናይ ኒውዝላንድ ናይ ነብሲ ኣድሕን በረራ ኣብ ኣኡክላንድ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 5 በጺሑ፣ እቶም ተጉዓዝቲ (ገለ ካብ ኣውስትራሊያን ካብ ፓሲፊክን ዘጠቓለለ) ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ኡክላንድ ኣብ ዝርከብ ናይ ሓይሊ ባሕሪ ቤዝ ኳራንታይን ተገይሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: New Zealand Rescue Flight arrived in Aukland on February 5, and passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were stranded at the Naval Base Quarantine in northern Ukland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: ኣብ ፈብሩዋሪ 15፡ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኣብ ዳይመንድ ፕሪንሰስ ናይ ተጉዓዝቲ መርክብ ዉሽጢ ዝርከቡ ኣሜሪካዉያን ከም እተውጽእ ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: On February 15, the United States announced that it would withdraw U.S. passenger networks in Diamond Princess.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 21, 129 ናብ ዓዶም ዝምለሱ ካናዳውያን ዝጸዓነት ኣውሮፕላን ኣብ ትሬንቶን፣ ኦንታርዮ ዓሪፋ።
en-mt: On February 21, 129, a plane carrying repatriated Canadians landed in Trenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: ኣብ መጀምሪያ ወርሒ ማርች፣መንግስቲ ህንዲ ዜጋታቱ ካብ ኢራን ምውጻእ ጀሚሩ። ኣብ ማርች 14 በ መንግስቲ ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ኮንትራት ዝተትሓዘት ናይ መንገዲ ኣየር ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ኣውሮፕላን 112 ዜጋታት ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ናብ ሃገሮም መሊሳ።
en-mt: Early in March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran, and on March 14, a South African airliner contracted by the government returned 112 South African nationals back home.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: ቅድሚ በረራ ሕክምናዊ መርመራ ኣብ ዝተገብረሉ እዋን ኣርባዕተ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃውያን ምልክታት ኮሮናቫረስ ስለዘርኣዩ ንድሕሪት ተሪፎም።
en-mt: During a medical pre-flight test, four South Africans were left behind because they showed symptoms of coronavirus.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: ብመርመራ ነጻ ዝተብሃሉ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃውያን ጥራይ’ዮም ንሃገሮም ክምለሱ ተፈቒድሎም።
en-mt: Only South Africans who are tested are allowed to return home.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: ናይ ምርመራ ውጽኢታት ናይ በረራ ክሩ፣ ፓይለታት፣ ናይ ሆተል ሰራሕተኛታት፣ ፖሊስን ወታደራትን ሓዊሱ፣ ኣብቲ ሰብኣዊ ልኡኽ ዝተሳተፉ ኹሎም ደቡብ ኣፍሪካውያን ነጻ ምዃኖም ኣረጋጊጹ፣ ክም ኣካል ጥንቃቐ ድማ ፣ኩሎም ን 14 መዓልቲታት ኣብ ራንች ሪዞርት ኣብ ትሕቲ ክትትልን ኳርንታይንን ክጸንሑ ተገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Test results included flying crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers, and confirmed that all South Africans involved in the humanitarian mission were free, and all were kept in the Ranch Resort under surveillance and quarantine for 14 days.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: ብ20 ማርች፣ ሕብረት መንግስታት ወተሃደራቱ ካብ ኢራቅ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ በብቁሩብ ክስህብ ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: On March 20, the Union governments began withdrawing troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: ብ5 ፌብሩዋሪ፡ 21 ሃገራት (ቤላሩስ፡ ፓኪስታን፡ ትሪኒዳድን ቶቤጎን፡ ግብጽን ኢራንን ዘጠቃለለ) ናብ ቻይና ረድኤት ከምዝሰደዳ ሚኒስተር ወጻኢ ጉዳያት ቻይና ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On 5 February, 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobego, Egypt and Iran) sent aid to China, according to the Chinese foreign minister.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: ገላ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዩኒቨርስቲታት ዝመሃሩ ቻይናውያን ተምሃሮ፣ ናብ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታታት ቻይና ሓገዝ ንምልኣኽ ሓቢሮም። እቲ ዝዓበየ ናይ እቲ ጉጅለ ኣባላይ ኣብ ቺካጎ ኣከባቢ ዘለው እንትኾኑ፣ ናብ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ዝርከባ ሆስፒታላት ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 30፣ 50,000 N95 ማስክታት ክልእኹ ክኢሎም እዮም። ናይ ሰብኣዊ ሓገዝ ትካል ቀጥታዊ ረድኤት ምስ FedEx ብምትሕግጋዝ ድማ 200000 ናይ ገጽ ማስክታት ግሎቫትን ጋውናትን ሓዊሱ ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ዓርሰ መክላኸሊ ኣቑሑት ናብ ዉሃን ዩኒየን ሆስፒታል ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 30 ብ ናይ ህጹጽ ናይ ኣየር መጓዓዚ ክልእኹ ከኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Gala: Chinese students studying at American universities; the largest member of the group is in the Chicago area; hospitals in Hubey province in January 30; 50,000 N95 masks In cooperation with FedEx, the humanitarian aid agency has burned 20000 face masks, gloves and gants, along with other protective equipment, to Wuhan Union Hospital on January 30 with emergency services. hey can't fly the air.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: ብ5 ለካቲት ቢልን መሊንዳን ጌትስ $100 ሚልዮን ንWHO ከምዘውፍዩ ሓቢሮም። እዚ ወፈያ ናብ ናይ ክታበት መጽናዕትታትን ናይ መድሓኒት ፈተነታትን ከምኡ’ውን ነቶም “ኣብ ሓደጋ ዘለዉ ህዝብታት ኣፍሪቃን ደቡብ ኤስያን” ንምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ምዃኑ ድማ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: On February 5, Bill and Melynda Gates announced that they would donate $100 million to WHO, a donation to vaccine studies and drug trials, as well as to protect "at-risk peoples of Africa and South Asia."

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: ሰነተር ሪቻርድ ጎርዶን 3.16 ሚልዮን ናይ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን መሸፈኒ ማስክ ናብ ዉሃን ድሕሪ ምስዳዱ፡መንግስቲ ቻይና ብ6 ፌብሩዋሪ ንፊሊፒንስ 200,000 ናይ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን መሸፈኒ ማስክ ከምዝለገሰ ኢንተርኣክስዮን ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: After Senator Richard Gordon sent 3.16 million face masks to Wuhan, the Chinese government donated 200,000 face masks to the Filipinos on February 6, Interacion said.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 19፣ ናይ ሲንጋፖር ቀይሕ መስቀል ናብ ቻይና $2.26 ሚልዮን ዋጋ ዘውጽእ ርዳእታ ከምዝልእኽ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: In February 19, the Singapore Red Cross announced it would send its understanding to China worth $2.26 million.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: ጃፓን ሓደ ሚልዮን ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ናብ ዉሃን ለጊሳ። ቱርኪ ናይ ሕክምና ኣቕሑ ልኢኻ። ሩስያ ልዕሊ 13 ቶን ናውቲ ሕክምና ናብ ዉሃን ሰዲዳ። ማሌዥያ 18 ሚልዮን ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲ ከምዘወፈየት ሓቢራ። ጀርመን ዝተፈላለዩ 10,000 ሃዝማት ሱት ዘጠቃለለ ናውቲ ሕክምና ኣብጺሃ። ከምኡ’ውን ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ 17.8 ቶን ናውቲ ሕክምና ናብ ቻይና ኣወፊያ፡ ተወሳኺ 100 ሚልዮን ዶላር ፋይናንሳዊ ሓገዝ ድማ ንውጹዓት ሃገራት ከምተወፊ ምሒላ። ድሕሪ ቻይና ምርግጋኣ ድማ፡ እታ ሃገር ነተን ብቫይረስ ዝተጠቅዓ ሃገራት ሓገዝ ትሰድድ ኣላ።
en-mt: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey sent medical supplies, Russia sent more than 13 tons of medical supplies to Wuhan, and Malaysia reported that it had donated 18 million medical gloves, germany used 10,000 hazmat suits The United States has donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China, and an additional $100 million in financial aid has been donated to vulnerable countries, and after China' stabilization, the country is sending aid to virus-stricken countries.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች፣ ቻይና፣ ኩባ፣ ከምኡ እውን ሩስያ ናይ ሕክምና ኣቑሑት ድጋፍን ሞያተኛታትን ናብ ጣልያን ነቲ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ ንምምካት ሰዲደን።
en-mt: In March, China, Cuba, and Russia sent medical supplies and professionals to Italy to deal with the coronavirus pandemic.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: ነጋዳይ ጃክ ማ 1.1 ሚልዮን ናይ መርመሪ ኣቕሓ፡ 6 ሚልዮን ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ምስ 60,000ናይ መከላከሊ ክዳን ናብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ፡ ኢትዮፕያ ብሕብረት ኣፍሪቃ ንክዝርጋሕ ሰዲዱ።
en-mt: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million test items with 6 million face masks with 60,000 naysayers to be distributed by the African Union to New Flower Ethiopia.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: ብድሕሪኡ ናብ ፓናማ 5,000 መመርመሪ መሳርሒ፡ 100,000 ናይ ገጽ ማስክን 5 ቨንቲለተራት ሰዲዱ።
en-mt: He then sent 5,000 detectors to Panama, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventrils.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: ማ እውን ንካናዳ ናይ ሕክምና ቀረባት ለጊሱ። ኔዘርላንድስ፣ ስፔይን፣ ቱርኪ፣ ጂዮርጂያ፣ ከምኡ ውን ቼክ ሪፓብሊክ ብዛዕባ እቶም ኣብ ቻይና ዝስርሑ ማስክታትን ናይ መመርመሪ ናውቲ ዘለዎም ሻቕሎት ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Ma also donated medical supplies to The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed concern about masks and testing materials made in China.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: ንምሳሌ ናይ ትኽክለኝነት መጠኖም 30% ዝኾኑ 58,000 ኣብ ቻይና ዝተሰርሑ ናይ መመርመሪ ኪት ኣወጊዳ፣ ኔዘርላንድ ድማ 600,000 ጸገም ዝተረኸቦም ናይ ቻይና ማስክታት መሊሳ ኣላ።
en-mt: For example, china has removed 58,000 test kits, which are 30% of the correct size, and the Netherlands has restored 600,000 problem-ridging Chinese masks.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: ቤልጀም 100,000 ጥቕሚ ኣልቦ ማስክታት መለሳ። እዘን ማስክትታ መጀመርያ ካብ ቻይና መጽየን ተባሂሉ እንተነበረ ደሓር ግን ካብ ኮሎምብያ ከምዝመጻ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: Belgium returned 100,000 useless masks, which were originally referred to as China but later found to be from Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: ብ ኻሊእ ወገን ፣ኣብ ገለ ከባቢታት ላቲን ኣሜሪካን ኣፍሪካን ድማ ናይ ቻይና ርዳእታ ብጽቡቕ ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ እዩ።ኣብ ኣፕሪል 2፣ ናይ ዓለም ባንክ ን ኣብ ዕብየት ዝርከባ ሃገራት ዝኽውን ናይ ርዳእታ መድብ ኣበጊሱ።
en-mt: On the other hand, in some parts of Latin America and Africa, China's understanding has been well received, and in April 2, the World Bank and the World Bank has set up a development aid plan.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO ነዚ ለብዒ ኣብ ምሓዝን ምቁጽጻርን ንቻይናውያን ሰበስልጣን ኣመስጊኑዎም።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) thanked the Chinese authorities for handling and controlling the pandemic.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO(ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም) ምስቲ ኣብ 2002-2004 ዝነበረ ለበዳ SARS ንምክልኻልን ምቁጽጻርን ዝዓንቀፈ ምስጢራውነት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣብዚ ናይ ሕጂ ቕልውላው እቲ ማእከላይ መንግስቲ “ኣብቲ ዝቀራረብ ዘሎ ናይ ቻይና ሓድሽ ዓመት ረበሻ መታን ከይለዓል ሓበሬታ ቀጻሊ ይዝርግሕ ኣሎ”ይብል።
en-mt: Compared with the secrecy that prevented and control the SARS outbreak of 2002-2004, the central government says that in the current crisis, "it is continuing to spread information to prevent the rise of the nearby Chinese New Year."

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 23 ጃንዋሪ፣ ከም ኣብ ውሃን ናይ ጉዕዞ ምእጋድ ዝምልከት ናይ እቶም ማእኸላዊ ሰበ ስልጣናት ውሳነ ግብረመልሲ፣ ወኪል ናይ WHO ጓደን ጋለያ ዋላኳ እዚ WHO ዝወሰዶ ስጉምቲ ዘይምከር እንተኾነ፣ ብተማሳሳሊ ድማ ነዚ ለበዳ ኣብቲ ብጣዕሚ ዝበዝሓሉ ቦታ ንምቁጽጻር ክበሃል ኣገዳሲ ውሳኔ እዩ" ነዚ ድማ "ዘይተሓስበ ናይ ህዝቢ ጥዕና ታሪኽ" ክብል ጸዊዕዎ። ኣብ 30 ጃንዋሪ፣ ነቲ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ከምዝተሓላለፍ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ምስተረጋገጸን ኣብ ካልኦት ሃገራት ድማ ምውሳኽ ቁጽሪ ጉዳያት ምስተራእየ፣ WHO ነዚ ለበዳ Public Health Emergency of International Concern (ዓለምለኸ ትኹረት ዘድልዮ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ህጹጽ ኣዋን፣PHEIC)፣ ሻድሻይ PHEIC ክብል ሰይምዎ፣ እዚ ካብ 2009 ኣትሒዙ እቲ ስጉምቲ ክወሰድ ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: On January 23, in response to the decision of the central authorities on the issue of travel bans, such as water and travel bans, a representative of the WHO's Guaden Gallai said that although this measure was not recommended, it was similarly important to control the outbreak in the most popular areas, calling it an "unintended public health history." Public Health Emergency of International Concern (public health emergency emergency,PHEIC), sixth PHEIC, which has been in action since 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: እቲ PHEIC ብሰንኪ ስግኣት ናይ ዓለማዊ ዝርግሐ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ናብ ትሑትን ማእከላይን እቶት ምስ ድኹም ናይ ሕክምና ዓቕሚ ዘለወን ሃገራት፡ ምዃኑ መራሒ WHO ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ገሊጹ።
en-mt: THE PHEIC WAS CAUSED BY THE THREAT OF GLOBAL SPREAD, PARTICULARLY TO LOW AND MIDDLE-INCOME COUNTRIES WITH POOR MEDICAL RESOURCES, WHO LEADER TEDROS SAVED THEM.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: ከም ግብረመልሲ ናይ ትግባረ ዕገዳታት ጉዕዞ፡ ቴድሮስ”ንጉዕዞን ንግድን ዝዕንቅፉ ስጉምትታት ኣድላዪ ዝኾነሉ ምኽንያት የለን፡ WHO(ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም) ከዓ ንግድን ምንቅስቃስን ምዕንቃፍ ኣይድግፎን’ዩ” ኢሉ።
en-mt: In response to the travel restrictions, Tedros said: "There is no reason why measures that interfere with travel and trade are necessary, and who (World Health Organization) does not support stumbling trade and movement."

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: ኣብ ፊብሩዋሪ 5፣ WHO ን ዓለምለኻዊ ማሕበረስብ ናይ $675 ሚልዮን ሓገዝ ሕቶ ኣቕሪቡ፣ ን ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለውን ሃገራት ስትራቴጂካዊ ድለውነት ናይ ገንዘብ ድጋፍ ንምግባር፣ "ዋላ እቲ ቫይረስ ይከሰት፣ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ንምፍላይ ዘኽ እል ዝተርገሐ ስርዓት የብለንን" ነዘን ሃገራት ዝግበር ደጋፍ ህጹጽ ክኸውን ኣለዎ
en-mt: In February 5, the WHO requested $675 million in aid to the international community, in order to provide strategic financial support to low-income countries, "even if the virus occurs, there is no system to separate people from the virus"

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: ቀጺሉ ቴድሮስ “ሓይሊ ሰንሰለትና ክንዲ እቲ ዝደኸመ ኣባልና’ዩ” ክብል ኣዊጁ። ከምኡ’ውን ነቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ሕበረተሰብ “ካብ ድሓር ምጥዓስ፡ ሎሚ ምውፋር” ኢሉ ተማህጸነ። ብዕለት 11, ፌብሩዋሪ፣ WHO(ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም) ኣብ ዘካየዶ ዛዕባ፡ ነዚ ሕማም ኮቪድ-19 ኢሉ ሸየሞ።
en-mt: Next, Tedros proclaimed that "the power of our chains is as weak as our member," and he urged the international community to "deploy today from a later regret," and on the agenda of the 11th February, who (World Health Organization) named the disease COVID-19.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: ብሓደ መዓልቲ ቴድሮስ ሓፈሻዊ ጸሓፋይ UN ኣንቶንዮ ጉተሬስ ነዚ ንምቅላስ “ምሉእ ሓይሊ ናይ UN ክህብ”ከምዝተሰማምአ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: One day Tedros said he had agreed to "give the full strength of the UN" to fight it.

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: ከም ውጽኢቱ ብUN ናይ ቅልውላው ምሕደራ ጉጅለ ተዳልዩ። እዚ ከኣ ምውህሃድ ናይ UN ግብረመልሲ ዘፍቅድ ኮይኑ ጥቅሙ ከኣ ኣባላት WHO “ኣብቲ ናይ ጥዕና ጸገም ብምትኳር ክሰርሑ’ም ካልኦት ውዱባት ኣብቲ ዝዓበየ ናይ ማሕበራዊ፡ ቁጠባውን ምዕባለኣዊ ጽልዋታት ክእለቶም ከበርክቱ መታን’ዩ።”
en-mt: As a result, a crisis management team was organized by UN, which allows for the integration of UN response, and the benefits are that WHO members "work by focusing on the health problem and enabling other organizations to contribute to their greater social, economic and developmental impacts."

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: ብ14 ለካቲት ብWHO ዝምራሕ ሓደ ዝዕላምኡ ጉጅለ ምስ ቻይና ተመስሪቱ። ዕላምኡ ድማ ክኢላታት ዓለምን WHOን ብምውፋር ምስ ኣገደስቲ ሰበስልጣን ዎርክሾፕን ኣኼባታትን ብምክያድ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ጽልዋ ናይ ንጥፈታት ብደረጃ ክልላትን ዞባታትን፡ ከተማታትን ገጠራትን ዘጠቓለለ፡ ብኣካል ብምዕዛብ ነቲ ኣብ ውሽጢ ቻይና ዝካየድ ኣተሓሕዛ ንምድንፋዕን ናይቲ ሕማም ክብደትን ተላባዕነትን ንምጽናዕን እዩ። ብ25 ለካቲት WHO “ዓለም ናይዚ ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ ተኽእሎ ንምድላው ዝያዳ ክትጽዕር ኣለዋ” ክብል ኣዊጁ። ምስ’ዚ ኣከቲሉ ድማ ዋላ’ኳ ሽኡ ለበዳ ክበሃል እንትዘይተኻእለ፡ ሃገራት ኣብ ናይ ምድላው ደረጃ ክጸንሃ ከምዘለወን ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On February 14, a WHO-led group was formed with China, with the aim of deploying world and WHO experts, holding workshops and meetings with important officials, and physically observing the impact of activities, including regional, regional, cities, and rural areas, to promote treatment within China and to study the severity and infectiousness of the disease, who declared on February 25 that "the world must do more to prepare for the possibility of the coronavirus pandemic." hey said they had.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: ኣብ ኢራን ኣጋጢሙ ንዘሎ ናይ ለበዳ ምጅማር መልሲ ኣብ ምውሃብ ፣ እቲ ዘሎ ኹነታት ንምግምጋም፣ ወድብ ዓለም ጥዕና( WHO) ናብ ኢራን ጥሙር ልኡኽ ጉጅለ ሰዲዱ። ኣብ ፊብሩዋሪ 28፣ ናይ WHO ሓለፍቲ ክምዝበሉዎ፣ ናይ ኮርና ቫይረስ ስግኣት ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ካብ "ልዑል" ናብ "ኣዝዩ ልዑል" ክብ ከምዝብል ብምሕባር፣ እዚ ድማ እስካብ ሐዚ ካብ ዝገበሩዋ ናይ ስግኣት ግምገማ እቲ ዝለዓለ መጥንቀቕታ እዩ።
en-mt: Responding to the outbreak in Iran; the World Health Organization (WHO) sent a delegation to Iran to assess the situation; in Fibruwari 28; WHO officials to dismiss it; suggesting that the threat of the Coronavirus worldwide from "high" to "very high" was the highest alert ever.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: ማይክ ርያን፣ ናይ WHO ህጹጽ መደባት ኣፈጻሚ ዳይሬክተር፣ ኣብ ዝሃቡዎ መግለጺ "ኩሎም ኣብ እዛ ፕላኔት ዘለው መንግስታት ናይ ሓቅነት ፈተነ ዝግብሩሉ እዩ፡ ንቕሑ" ክብሉ መጠንቀቕታ ሂቦም።
en-mt: Mike Rhiann, who's director of emergency programs, warned in a statement: "All governments on the planet are trying to make a real test, stay awake."

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ እዚ ኣብ መንገዲ ክህሉ ይኽእል እዩ ድልዋት ክትኮኑ ድማ ኣለኩም፡"ትኽክለኛ መልሲ ንክወሃቡ ምጉስጓስ ድማ" ዓለም ካብቲ ዝኽፍእ ጋጣሚ ንክትድሕን ክረድእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: he virus may be on the way, and you must be ready to "push for a correct answer" can help save the world from the greatest chance.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: ራየን ብዝገለጾ እቲ እዋናዊ ሓበሬታ ነዚ ሕማም ዓለምለኻዊ ለበዳ ዘብሎ ኣይኮነን። ከምዚ ዓይነት ኣዋጅ ምእዋጅ ማለት ድማ “ኩሉ ሰብ ኣብዛ ዓለም በቲ ቫይረስ ከምዝጥቓዕ ምቅባል’ዩ” ክብል ቀጺሉ።
en-mt: According to Ryan, the latest information does not call the disease a global pandemic, and declaring such a declaration means "accepting that everyone in this world is infected."

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: ብ11 ማርች WHO ነዚ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝርግሐ ለበዳ ምዃኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 11, THE WHO declared the spread of the coronavirus a pandemic.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
