en-mt: Wildlife smuggling and the possibility of transmission of diseases from animals to humans - health risks related to the trade of forest animals

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: ን ናይ ሕማም ምስትንፋስ ኮረና ቫይረስ 2019 (COVID-19) ንSARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስን ዝግበሩ ናይ ላብራቶሪ ፈተነታት ህላወ ናይ ቫይረስን ረኽሲ መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ ዝፈርዩ ጸረ-ነፍሳትን( antibodies) ዘፍልጡ መንገዲታት ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: Laboratory tests for the Respiratory Disease coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) and the SarS-CoV-2 virus include ways to detect the presence of viruses and antibodies in response to infections.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: ኣብ ናሙናታት እቲ ቫይረስ ምህላዉ ብ RT-PCR እዩ ዝረጋገጽ፣ ናይቲ ኮሮናቫይረስ ' RNA ስለዘለሊ።
en-mt: he presence of the virus in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR because the coronavirus has RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ እዚ ስፔስፊክ እዩ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ RNA ንከለሊ ጥራሕ እዩ ድማ ተሰሪሑ።
en-mt: his test is specialized and is only available for the diagnosis of the SARS-CoV-2 virus RNA.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: ናይ ቀረባ ግዜን ንጡፍ ረኽሲን ንምርግጋጽ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝወዓለ እዩ።
en-mt: It has been used to ensure a near-term and active infection.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: ናይ ኣንቲ ቦዲታት ምርመራ (ሴሮሎጂ) ንምርመራን ህዝባዊ ሓለዋን ይጠቅም እዩ።
en-mt: Anti-body inspection (serology) is useful for diagnosis and public custody.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምርመራታት ክንደይ ሰባት በዚ ሕማም ከምዝተተሓዙ እዩ ዘርኢ፣ እቶም ምልክታቶም ኣዝዮም ኣናእሽተይ ዝነበሩ ወይ ምልክት ዘየርአዩ እውን ሓዊሱ።
en-mt: Antibiotic tests show how many people have been infected, as well as those whose symptoms were too small or showed no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: ትኽክለኛ መጠነ-ሞት ናይዚ ሕማምን ብዝሒ ናይ herd immunityን ብውጽኢት ናይዞም ምርመራታት እዮም ዝፍለጡ።
en-mt: he exact death rate and the number of herd immunity are known by the results of these tests.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: ውሱን ምርመራ ብምህላዉ፡ ካብ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ዝኾነ ሃገር ብዛዕባ ዝርግሐ ናይ'ቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ህዝብታቶም እሙን ዳታ ዘልዎ የለን።
en-mt: As of March 2020, no country has credible data on the spread of the pandemic in its populations.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: ኣብ 23 መጋቢት፣ ልዕሊ 3% ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ዝመርመረት ማንም ሃገር ኣይነበረትን፣ ኣብ ሃገራት ምርመራታት ዝካየዱሎም መገዲታት ድማ ዓብዪ ኣፈላላይ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: On March 23, no country tested more than 3% of its population, and the way tests are conducted in countries differs greatly.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: እዚ ቁጽሪ ሪፖርት ንዝተገበሩ ናይ ሞት ኬዛት እውን ብዓብዪኡ ዝጸልው እዩ ዝመስል፣ ኣብ ገለ ሃገራት ልዕሊ ዝተገመቱ ክኾኑ ይረኣዩ ስለዘለዉ።
en-mt: hese deaths also seem to be very high, as they are considered to be above estimates in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: ናይ ብሓቂ ሪቨርስ ትራንስክሪፕሽን ፖሊመሬዝ ቸይን ግብረ መልሲ (rRT-PCR) ብምጥቃም እቲ ምርመራ ብዝተፈላለዩ ሜላታት ካብ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ብዝተወሰዱ ናሙናታት፣ ናዞፋሪንጃል ስዋብ ወይ ናይ ዓኽታ ናሙና ሓዊሱ ክካየድ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Using a truly revered transcription polymerase chin response (rRT-PCR), the diagnosis can be conducted through various methods with samples taken from the respiratory system, nazofarinjal swabs or a sample burned.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝተወሰኑ ሰዓታ ክሳብ 2 መዓልቲታት ክቐርቡ እዮም።
en-mt: Results will be available in up to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: እቲ ብናይ ጎሮሮ ስዋብ ዝስራሕ ናይ RT-PCR ምርመራ ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይቲ ሕማም ሰሙን እዩ ተኣማኒ።
en-mt: he RT-PCR test, operated by throat swab, is reliable during the first week of the disease.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: ጸኒሑ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሳንቡእ እናተራበሐ እንከሎ ኣብ ጉሮሮ ክጠፍእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Later, the virus can disappear in the throat while it is spreading in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: ንኣብ ካልኣይ ሰሙን ምርመራ ዝገበሩ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት፣ ከም መማረጺ ናይ ናሙና ማቴርያል ካብ ውሽጢ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ብሳክሽን ካቴተር ወይ መስዓሊ ማቴርያል (ዓኽታ) ምጥቃም ይከኣል።
en-mt: For people who have been tested for the second week, a sample of material can be used as a substitute for a catheter or a visual material from within the respiratory body.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: ሓደ ካብ እቶም ናይ መጀመሪያ ናይ PCR ፈተነታት ሓደ ኣብ በርሊን ውሽጢ ኣብ ቻሪቴ( Charité) ብ ወርሒ ጥሪ 2020 real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ብምጥቃም ማዕቢሉ እዩ፣ በዚ ድማ 250,000 ዝኸውን ኪት( kits) ብ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ተዘርጊሑ እዩ።
en-mt: One of the first PCR trials was developed in Berlin by using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) in January 2020, resulting in 250,000 kits distributed by the World Health Organization.

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ኣብ 23 ጥሪ 2020 ምርመራ ኣማዕቢላ እያ።ናይ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ተትካል Kogenebiotech ክሊኒካል ደረጃ ዘለዎ፣ PCR-መሰረት ዝገበረ SARS-CoV-2 መለለዪ ኪት (PowerChek ኮሮናቫይረስ) ኣብ 28 ጥሪ 2020 ኣማዕቢሉ።
en-mt: He said the U.K. developed a test on January 23, 2020, and South Korea's replacement Kogenebiotech developed a clinical-grade SARS-CoV-2 identification kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on January 28, 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: ነቲ ብኹሎም ቤታ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ሼር ዝተገበረ ናይ "E" ጂን ይደሊ፣ እቲ RdRp ጂን ድማ ብፍሉይ ን SARS-CoV-2።ኣብ ቻይና፣ BGI ጉጅለ ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ሕክምና ምህርቲታት ምምሕዳር ን PCR-መሰረት ዝገበረ SARS-CoV-2 መለለዪ ኪት ንኢመርጀንሲ ናይ ምጥቃም ፍቓድ ካብ ዝረኸቡ ትካላት ሓደ እዩ ኔሩ።ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ፣ ናይ ሕማም ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ማእኸል (CDC) ናይ 2019-ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ናይ ብሓቂ RT-PCR መመርመሪ ፓነል ናብ ናይ ህዘባዊ ጥዕና ሓለዋ ቤተ ፈተነታት ብናይ ዓለምለኻዊ መወሃሃዲ ሓገዛት ኣቢሉ ኣሰራጭዩ።
en-mt: It seeks the "E" gene made by all beta coronaviruses Sher, and the RdRp gene specifically seeks SARS-CoV-2.In China, the BGI group of Chinese National Medicine Products Management Kit for PCR-Based SARS-CoV-2 Identification Kit for Emergency In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) distributed the 2019-new coronavirus (2019-nCoV) truly RT-PCR testing panel to public health watchdog laboratories through global coordination assistance.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: ካብ እቶም ሰለስተ ዝጸንሑ ናይ ጄነቲክ ፈተነታት( genetic tests) እቲ ሓደ ብሰንኪ ግጉይ ሪኤጀንትን( reagents) መደምደምታ ዘይብሎም ውጽኢታት እዩ ተረኺቡዎ ከምኡ ድማ ኣብ ኣትላንታ CDC ዝተናወሐ ናይ ፈተነ ኩነታትን ኣስዒቡ፥እዚ’ዩ ድማ ኣብ ሙሉእ ወርሒ ለካቲት 2020 መዓልታዊ ብገምጋም ካብ 100 ዘይበዝሕ ናሙናታት ብዕዉት ንኽካየዱ ዝገበረ።
en-mt: One of the three long-running genetic tests was caused by incomplete reagents and inconclusive results, as well as extended testing conditions at the Atlanta CDC, which successfully conducted no more than 100 samples on a daily basis throughout February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: ክልተ ኣካላት ተጠቒምካ ምረርመራ ምግባር ክሳብ 28 ለካቲት 2020 ተኣማኒ ተገይሩ ኣየተወሰደን ነይሩ፣ ድሕሪኡ ድማ እዩ ናይቲ ግዝኣትን ከባቢያዊን ቤተ ፈተነታት እቲ ምርመራ ክጅምርዎ ተፈቒድዎም።
en-mt: wo tests were not credible until February 28, 2020, after which state and local laboratories were allowed to begin the investigation.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ ብናይ መግቢን መድሓኒትን ምምሕዳር ፍቓድ ተዋሂብዎ እዩ ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ግዘ ጥቕሚ ፍቓድ።US ኮመርሻል ቤተ ፈተነታት ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 መጀመርያታት ምርመራ ጀሚሮም።
en-mt: his test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under the emergency use authorization.US Pharmaceutical Laboratories began initial testing in March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 5 2020 ጀሚሩ ላብኮርፕ( LabCorp) ኣብ RT-PCR ዝተደረኸ ህላወ ናይ COVID-19 ብሃገር ደረጃ ምርመራ ክገብር ምዃኑ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: From March 5 2020 LabCorp announced it would conduct a national investigation into the existence of COVID-19 inspired by RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics (ኩዌስት ዳያግኖስቲክስ) ብተመሳሳሊ ኣብ 9 መጋቢት 2020 ሃገር ለኻዊ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics also submitted a countrywide COVID-19 test on 9 March 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: ምንም ዓይነት ናይ ገደብ ቁጽሪ ኣይተኣወጀን; ናይ ናሙና ምእካብን ፕሮሰስ ምግባርን ብናይ CDC ረቛሒታት መሰረት ክካየድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: No restrictions have been imposed; Sample collection and processing should be conducted on the basis of CDC criteria.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: ኣብ ሩስያ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ብናይቲ ግዝኣት ናይ ቫይሮሎጂን ባዮቴክኖሎጂን መጽናዕቲ ማእኸል VECTOR ማዕቢሉ ዝቐረበ እዩ።
en-mt: IN RUSSIA, COVID-19 TESTING HAS BEEN DEVELOPED BY THE STATE'S VECTOR CENTER FOR THE STUDY OF VIROLOGY AND BIOTECHNOLOGY.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ኣብ 11 ለካቲት 2020 እቲ ምርመራ ብፌደራል ናይ ሓለዋ ኣገልግሎት ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ዝተመዝገበ እዩ ኔሩ።ኣብ 12 መጋቢት 2020፣ ማዮ ክሊኒክ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ረኽሲ ዘለሊ ምርመራ ኣማዕቢሉ ተባሂሉ።ኣብ 13 መጋቢት 2020፣ Roche Diagnostics ኣብ 3.5 ሰዓታት ልዑል በዝሒ ምርመራታት ክገብር ንዝኽእእል ምርመራ ናይ FDA ፍቃድ ረኺቡ፣ ስለዚ ድማ ሓደ ማሽን ኣብ24 ሰዓታት 4,128 ዝኾኑ ምርመራታት ከካይድ ይገብር።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the diagnosis was registered by the Federal Guard Health Care Service, which was said to have developed a COVID-19 infection-detecting test; on March 13, 2020; Roche Diagnostics obtained an FDA license for a maximum number of tests in 3.5 hours, so a machine would conduct 4,128 tests in 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: ኣብ 19 መጋቢት 2020፣ FDA ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ጥቕሚ ፍቓድ (EUA) ንናይ Abbott ቤትፈተነታት ሂቡ ኣብ Abbott's m2000 ሲስተም ንዝግበሩ መርመራታት; FDA ተመሳሳሊ ፈቓዳት ን Hologic, LabCorp, ከምኡውን Thermo Fisher Scientific ሂቡ ኔሩ።
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted a sudden benefit license (EUA) to Abbott's home for tests on the Abbott's m2000 system; The FDA granted similar consents to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: ኣብ 21 መጋቢት 2020፣ Cepheid ብተመሳሳሊ ናይ 45 ደቓይቕ ዝወስድ ምርመራ EUA ካብ FDA ተቐቢሉ። ።
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid received a similar 45-minute EUA test from the FDA.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA ኣይዞተርማል ኒዩክሊክ ኣሲድ መጉልሂ ቴክኖሎጂ ዝጥቀም ምርመራ ኣብ ክንዲ PCR ንምጥቃም ፈቓድ ሂቡ።
en-mt: The FDA has approved a diagnosis using izothermal nuclear acid thermal technology to use PCR instead.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: እዚ ቀጸልቲ ተቐያየርቲ ሙቐታት ዘየድሊ ስለዝኾነ እዞም ሜላታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓሙሽተ ደቓይቕ ዝኸውን ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ 13 ደቓይቕ ድማ ኣሉታዊ ውጽኢታት የቕርቡ።
en-mt: Since these continuous temperatures are unnecessary, these methods produce positive results within five minutes and negative results within 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ 18,000 ዝኾኑ እዞም U.S. ን Abbott ን ዘለዉ ማሽናት 50,000 ምርመራታት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ንከካይዱ ትጽቢት ይግበሮ ኣሎ።ሞኖክሎናል ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምስ ናይቲ ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኒዩክሎካፕሲድ ፕሮቲን (N ፕሮቲን) ብምትሕሓዝ ዝሰርሕ ምርመራ ኣብ ታይዋን ይምዕብል ኣሎ፣ ምርመራታት ከም ናይ ቅልጡፍ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ምርመራታት ኣብ 15 ክሳብ 20 ደቓይቕ ከካይድ ተስፋ ተገይርዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Currently, 18,000 of these U.S. and Abbott-owned machines are expected to run 50,000 tests in one day.Monoclonal antibiotic testing is being developed in Taiwan, where tests, such as rapid flu tests, are expected to run in 15 to 20 minutes.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: ናይ መጋቢት 2020 ናይ ጽሑፋት ገምጋም ናይ "ኣፍ ልቢ ራድዮግራፋት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይቲ ሕማም ደረጃ ነቲ ሕማም ናይ ምርካብ ክእለቶም ውሑድ እዩ፣ CT [computed tomography] ግን ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምፍጣሮም እውን ከለልዮ ይኽእል እዩ " ክብሉ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, a review of "chest radiographers have limited ability to diagnose the disease in the early stages of the disease, but CT [computed tomography] can also identify it before symptoms develop."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: ኣብ CT ዝረኣዩ ልሙዳት ባህርያታቱ ክልተኣዊ ማልቲሎቡላር ሳዕሪ ዝመስሉ ምሽፋን ናብ ጸግዓዊ፣ ዘይምቕሩሕ ዳሕረዋይ ኣካል ምስርጫው እዮም።
en-mt: Its most common characteristics in CT are the spread of bilateral multilobulular grass to the last part of the body.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: ሳብፕሉራል ዓብላሊነት፣ ርግራግ ባይታን ኮንሶሊዴሽነን እቲ ሕማም እንዳገደደ ክኸይድ ከሎ ይምዕብሉ።
en-mt: Corporal epilepsy, depression, and consolidence develop as the disease worsens.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: ኣብ መበቆል ናይዚ ሕዚ ለበዳ ዉሃን PCR ን CT ን ምንጽጻር ኣብ ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ፡ CT ልዕሊ PCR ብዝበለጸ ሕማም ከምዘሎ ዝፈልጥን ዋላ እንተኾነ፣ ብዝተሓተ ግን ኣየናይ ሕማም ኣይፈሊን`ዩ፣ መብዛሕትኦም ስሊታቱ ምስ ኒሞንያን ካልኦት ሕማማትን ዝመሳሰሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In a study comparing PCR and CT at the origin of the current outbreak, CT knows that there is a higher incidence of PCR, but at the least it does not distinguish between which diseases, most of its symptoms are similar to pneumonia and other diseases.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ናይ ራዲዮሎጂ ኮሌጅ( American College of Radiology) " CT ከም ናይ መጀምሪያ መጻረዪ ወይከዓ ናይ መጀምሪያ ደርጃ ናይ COVID-19 መመርመሪ ክኸውን የብሉን" ክብሉ ተላቢዮም። ካብ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ድማ CDC PCR ከም ናይ መጀመሪያ መጻረዪ ንክኸውን ለበዋኡ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: In March 2020, the American College of Radiology was told that "CT should not be a starting counter or a starting-up of COVID-19 testing," and from March 2020, the CDC recommended that PCR be used as the first counterproductive.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: ነዚ ሕማም ንምጥቃዕ ዝግበር ናይ ኣካላትና ስርዓተ-ምክልኻል ግብረ መልሲ IgM ን IgG ን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምምስራት ዘጠቃለለ እዩ።
en-mt: Our body's immune system response to this disease involves the formation of IgM and IgG antibiotics.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: እዚኦም ድማ ምልክታት ድሕሪ ምጅማሮም ኣብ 7 መዓልታት ወይ ድሕሪኡ ነቲ ረኽሲ ንምርካብ፣ በዚ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዑ ከምዝኾኑ ንምርግጋጽን፣ ንናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ሓለዋን ይጠቕሙ።መርመራታት ኣብ ማእኸላይ ቤተ ፈተነታት (CLT) ወይ ብናይ ክንክን ነጥቢ ምርመራ (PoCT) ይካየዱ።
en-mt: hese are used for population protection to locate the infection within 7 days or after symptoms begin, to make sure they are not infected. Tests are carried out at the Central Laboratory (CLT) or Care Point Test (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: እቲ ልዑል-ዝሓለፈ ኣውቶሜትድ ሲስተም ኣብ መብዛሕትኦም ክሊኒካል ቤተ ፈተነታት እዞም ምርመራታት እዚኦም ከካይዱ ይኽእሉ እዮም ኣቕርቦቶም ግን ኣብ ናይ ሕድሕድ ሲስተም መምርቲ ሬት ዝድገፍ ይኸውን።
en-mt: he high-over-automation system can conduct these tests in most clinical laboratories, but their supply may be supported by the mutual system's guidelines.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: ሴርያል ናሙናታት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምክትታልን ዋላ`ኳ እንተጠቀሙ፡ CLT ናይ ደም ነጻላ ናሙና እዩ ብልምዲ ዝጥቀም።
en-mt: Although ceramine samples are used to track immunity, CLT is a blood-free sample that is commonly used.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: ን PoCT ነጸላ ናይ ደም ናሙና መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ኣብ ቆርበት መርፍእ ብምውጋእ ዝውሰድ እዩ።
en-mt: A blood sample of PoCT is usually taken by injecting a needle on the skin.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: ከም ናይ PCR ሜላታት ኤክስትራክሽን ስጉምቲ ቅድሚቲ መርመራ ኣየድሊን።ኣብ መጋቢት 26, 2020, FDA ከምዝተሓተትዎ ነቲ ኤጀንሲ ምልክታ ዝሃቡ 29 ትካላት ሓቢሩ ስለዚ ድማ ሕዚ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምርመራታቶም ከሰራጭዉ ክኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: As with PCR methods, extraction measures are not required before testing. On March 26, 2020, the FDA said they were asked, according to 29 companies that had signaled to the agency that they were now able to spread their antibiotic tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: ካብ ሚያዝያ 7, 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ብናይ ሃንደበታዊ ጥቕሚ ፈቓድ ብ FDA ሓደ ምርመራ ጥራሕ እዩ ተፈቒዱ።ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 መወዳእታታት፣ Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics (ዩሮኢሚዩን ናይ ሕክምና ቤተ ፈተነታት ዳያግኖስቲክስ) ን Epitope Diagnostics (ኢፒቶፕ ዳያግኖስቲክስን) ንናይ ምርመራ ኪታቶም ፍቓድ ረኺቦም፣ ኣብ ናይ ደም ናሙናታት ኣንጻር እቲ ቫይረስ ዝምረቱ IgG ን IgA ን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ንምልላይ ይጠቕሙ።
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one test has been approved by fda with a sudden benefit permit. By the end of March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics (Euroimun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics) have obtained approval for their diagnostic kits, using blood samples against the virus to detect IgG and IgA antibiotics.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚ ዝተፈላለዩ ሓደ ሚእቲ ናሙናታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰዓታት ይምርምር፡ ስለዚ ድማ ልዕሊ እቲ ልሙድ ናይ ቫይረስ RNA PCR ምርመራ ኣዝዩ ዝፈጠነ እዩ።
en-mt: Screening capacity tests a number of one hundred samples within hours, and therefore far more than usual viral RNA PCR diagnosis has been significantly fastest.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: እዞም ጸረ-ነፍሳት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድሕሪ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ምፍጣር 14 መዓልቲታት እዮም ዝፍለጡ።ኣብ ኣፕሪል መጀመርያ፣ UK ዝዓደገቶም ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኪታት ንምጥቃም ብቑዓት ከምዘይኮኑ ኣረጋጊጻ።
en-mt: hese antibiotics are usually diagnosed 14 days after the infection, and at the beginning of April, the UK proved that they were not eligible for antibiotic kits purchased by the UK.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: ሆንግ ኮንግ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑሉ ዝኽእሉሉ ሜላ ኣዳልያ፣ "ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ክፍሊ ናይ መመርመሪ ናሙና ቱቦ ነቲ ተሓካሚ ይህቦ "፣ እንትፍ ይብሉሉ ውጽኢቶም ድማ ጸኒሖም ክፈልጡ ይግበሩ።ናይ ብሪታንያ NHS ዝተጠርጠሩ ኬዛት ኣብ ገዛኦም ዝሕከሙሉ ሜላ ክጅምር ከምዝኾነ ሓቢሩ፣ ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ናብ ሆስፒታል ኣብ ዝመጹሉ ግዜ ከስዕብዎ ዝኽእሉ ስርጭት ንምቕናስ ወይ ሕሙማት ዘምጽኣ ኣምቡላስታት ዝግበረለን ዲስኢንፌክት ምግባር ንምቕናስ፡ ኣብ ናይ መኪናኻ ኮይንካ ብዝርከብ ኣገልግሎት ዝግበሩ ናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠርጠሩ ኬዛት ምርመራታት፣ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሰብ ሞያ ኣግባባዊ ዝኾኑ ቅድመ ጥንቃቐታት ወሲዱ ናሙናታት ይወስድ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has developed a method for suspected people to stay at home: "The Emergency Department provides a testing sample tube for the patient" and lets them know their results later. Brittany's NHS says it will begin a method of treating suspected cases at home, reduce the spread of sick people when they arrive at hospital or reduce the disinfective of ambulances that bring patients, testes in your car, health care professionals He takes precautions and take samples.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: ኣብ ጎደናታት ኣብ መኻይን ምርመራ ዝገብሩ ማእኸላት ንደቡብ ኮሪያ ካብ ካልኦት ሃገራት ንላዕሊ ኣዝዩ ብዝቀልጠፈን ዝጸዓቀን መንገዲ ምርመራታት ንኽትገብር ኣኽኢሉዋ እዩ። ኣብ ጀርመን ናይ ሃገራዊ ማሕበር ስታቱቶሪ ጥዕና( National Association of Statutory Health Insurance) ሰብ ሞያታት ጥዕና ኣብ መጋቢት 2፡ ብተንቀሳቐሲ መስርሕ ኣብ መዓልቲ 12000 ምርመራታት ናይ ምግባር ዓቕሚ ከምዘለዎ ብምሕባር ኣብቶም ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ድማ 10700 ዝኾኑ ምርመራታት ከምዝገበሩ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Roads testing centers have enabled South Korea to carry out inspections in a much faster and more loaded way than in other countries.In Germany, the National Association of Regulatory Health Insurance in Germany reported the capacity of 12,000 tests a day through a mobile process on March 2, and 10700 in the past week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: አቲ ምርመራ ብዶክተር ዝተኣዘዘ እንተኾይኑ ወጻኢታት ብናይ ጥዕና መድሕን ይሽፈን።
en-mt: he cost of the test is covered by health insurance if prescribed by a doctor.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: ናይ Robert Koch Institute (ሮበርት ኮኽ ትካል) ፕረዚደንት ከምዝበልዎ፣ ጀርመን ኣብ ሰሙን 160,000 ምርመራታት ናይ ምክያድ ሓፈሻዊ ብቕዓት ኣለዋ።
en-mt: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has the overall competence to carry out 160,000 inspections per week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 19 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ብዙሓት ከተማታት ኣብ መኪናታት ዝግበር ምርመራ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Since March 19, inspections of cars have been carried out in many cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: ካብ 26 መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተኻየደ ሓፈሻዊ ምርመራ ኣይፍለጥን፣ ምኽንያቱ ኣወንታዊ ምርመራታት ጥራሕ እዮም ሪፖርት ዝግበሩ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: As of March 26, 2020, a general test in Germany is unknown because only positive tests have been reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ቤተ ፈተነ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ናይ ካላንደር ሰሙን 12/2020 ጀሚሩ እንተንኢሱ ብሓፈሻ 483,295 ናሙናታት ክሳብ 12/2020 ምርመራ ተገይርሎም 33,491 ናሙናታት (6.9%) ድማ ን SARS-CoV-2 ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢት ኣርእዮም።ኣብ እስራኤል፣ መጽናዕቲ መካየድቲ Technion ን Rambam ሆስፒታልን ናይ 64 ሕሙማት ናሙናታት ብሓደ ግዜ ምምርማር ዝከኣለሉ ሜላ ምሂዞም ፈቲኖሞን፣ እቶም ናሙናታት ብምሕዋስ እቶም ዝተሓወሱ ናሙናታት ኣዎንታዊ ኮይኑ እንተተረኺብዎም ጥራሕ ተወሳኺ ምርመራ ክግበሮም ዝገብር።ኣብ ውሃን 2000-sq-ሜትር ሃንደበታዊ መለለዪ ቤተ ፈተነ "Huo-Yan" (ቻይንኛ: 火眼, ወይ "Fire Eye" ብኢንግሊሽ) ኣብ 5 ለካቲት 2020 ብ BGI ተኸፊቱ፣ ልዕሊ 10,000 ናሙናታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ፕሮሰስ ዝገብር።
en-mt: Starting with the calendar week of 12/2020, the first laboratory study showed positive results of 483,295 samples by 12/2020, and 33,491 samples (6.9%) for SARS-CoV-2. henion tested Rambam Hospital and a method that could test samples of 64 patients at once; the samples were tested only if the samples were found to be positive.  יהוה, or "Fire Eye" in English) opened in BGI on February 5, 2020, making more than 10,000 samples a day of processing.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: እዚ ህንጻ ብናይ BGI-መስራቲ Wang Jian እንዳተራኣየ 5-መዓልታት ወሲዱ። እዚ ናይ ምርመራ ዓቕሚ ክምዕብል እንተዘይከኣል ኔሩ፡ ናይ ሁቤይ ኬዛት ካብዚ ናይ ሕዚ 47% ንላዕሊ ምኾኑ ነይሮም ናይ ክትትልን ውሸባን ወጻኢ ድማ ዕጽፊ ክውስኽ ይኽእል ምንባሩ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: The building took 5-days, as shown by BGI-founder Wang Jian, who said that if it could not be developed, Hubei's cases would have exceeded the current 47% and could double the cost of surveillance and quarantine.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: ናይ ዉሃን ቤተ ፈተነ ብ Huo-Yan ቤተ ፈተነታት ናይ Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, ከምኡውን Shanghai ተኸቲሉ፣ ብጠቕላላ ኣብ ናይ ቻይና 12 ከተማታት።
en-mt: Wuhan's laboratory was followed by Huo-Yan's laboratory experiments of Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, a total of 12 cities in China.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: ኣብ 4 መጋቢት 2020 መዓልታዊ ምርመራታት ብሓፈሻ 50,000 ምርመራታት ብመዓልቲ ኮይኖም።ክፍቲ ምንጪ፣ ብ Origami ምርመራታት ዝቐረበ ንድፊ ልዕሊ ናይ 1122 ሕሙማት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ናሙናታት 93 መመርመሪታት ጥራሕ ክምርምር ይገብር።እዞም ዝተመጣጠኑ ንድፊታት ኣብ ኣናእሽተይ ቤተ ፈተነታት ብዘይ ናይ ሮቦት ፈሰስቲ ተሓዝቲ ሓገዝ ክካየዱ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: By March 4, 2020, daily inspections totaled 50,000 tests per day. Open Source; Design by Origami Tests will examine only 93 samples of more than 1122 patients with COVID-19 samples.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት፣ ኣብ EU ን UK ን ከምኡውን US ናይ ሪኤጀንት ሕጽረታትን ዘይብቑዕነትን ብዙሕ ምርመራ ንምክያድ ዓብዪ ውጥረት ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: In March, there was a huge tension in the EU, the UK and the US to conduct a large number of inspections of Regent's shortcomings and inaccucuity.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: እዚ ሓደሓደ ጸሓፍቲ ንናሙናታት ኣብ 98 °C (208 °F) ን 5 ደቓይቕ ምውዓይ RNA ጄኖማት ንዝበለጸ ምርመራ ምስዳድ እውን ዘካተተ ናይ ናሙና ምድላው ፕሮቶኮላት ንክድህስሱ ጌርዎም እዩ።ኣብ 31 መጋቢት United Arab Emirates (ሕቡራት መንግስታት ዓረብ ኤሜሬትስ) መብሕትኦም ብዝሒ ህዝቡ ልዕሊ ማንም ካልእ ሃገር ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ምርመራ እንዳገበረት ከምትርከብ ተሓቢሩ፣ ማዕረ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ምርመራ ንምግባር እንዳሰርሐት ከምትርከብ ድማ ተገሊጹ እዩ።
en-mt: On March 31, the United Arab Emirates (United Arab Emirates) announced that its population had tested for coronavirus more than any other country, and it was revealed that it had worked to test samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: ናይ ኣብ መኪናኻ ከለኻ ብዝርከብ ኣገልግሎትን፣ ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ስኬል ካብ ቤተ ፈተነ ጉጅለ 42 ን BGIን(ኣብ ናይ "Huo-Yan" ሃንደበታዊ መለለዪ ቤተ ፈተነታት ናይ ቻይና መሰረት ዝገበረ) ምትሕብባር እዩ።
en-mt: With services in your car, the population scale is a collaboration from the Group of 42 and BGI (based on the Chinese-based laboratory's sudden identification of Huo-Yan).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: ኣብ 14 መዓልቲታት ዝተሃንጸ ኮይኑ፣ እዚ ቤተ ፈተነ ዓሰርተ ኣሽሓት ናይ RT-PCR ምርመራታት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ከካይድ ይኽእል እዚ ድማ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ እንትካየድ ንመጀመርያ ግዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Built in 14 days, the laboratory can conduct tens of thousands of RT-PCR tests in one day, the first time outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: ኣብ ናይቲ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተፈላለዩ ጀኒቲክ ገጽታ ዘነጻጸሩ ዝተፈላለዩ መመርመሪ ትእዛዛት ኣብ ቻይና፣ ፈረንሳይ፣ ጀርመን፣ ሆንግ ኮንግ፣ ጃፓንን ዩናይትድ ስቴትስን ማዕቢሎም።
en-mt: A variety of testing orders have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለወን ባዕለን ከምርታ ዘይኽእላ ሃገራት ዝስደድ ዘሎ ናይ ጀርመን ናይ ኪት ምህርቲ ተቐቢልዎ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has adopted German kit kits that are being exported to low-income countries themselves as unable.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: ናይ ጀርመን ቅመማ ኣብ ጥሪ 17 2020 እዩ ተሓቲሙ፡ እቲ ብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ( U.S.) ማእከል ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ዝተዳለወ ፕሮቶኮል ክሳብ ጥሪ 28 ዝርከብ ስለዘይነበረ ናይ ምርመራታት ምድንጓይ ተፈጢሩ ነይር። ቻይናን U.S.ን እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምጅማሩ ኣብ ተኣማንነት ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት (test kits) ጸገም ኣጋጢሙወን ነይሩ እዩ፡ እዘን ሃገራት እዚእንን ኣውስትራሊያን ድማ ብሰብ ሞያ ሕክምና ብዝተብሃሎ መሰረትን ጠለብን ኣብ ምምላእ እኹል ኪትስ ክቕርባ ኣይከኣላን።
en-mt: Its German spice was published on January 17, 2020, when the protocol developed by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control (U.S.) had not been available until January 28, and China and the U.S. had had problems with reliability testing kits at the start of the pandemic, and these countries and Australia were unable to provide enough Kitts to meet the demands and demands of medical professionals.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ክነጻጸር ከሎ፣ ሰብ ሞያታት ናይ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ሰፊሕ ናይ ምርመራ ኣቕርቦት ስርጭት ሓድሽ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ቀኒስዎ ይብሉ።
en-mt: Compared to South Korea, experts say widespread testing has stopped the spread of the new coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: ናይ ምርመራ ዓቕሚ፣ ብዓብይኡ ኣብ ናይ ግሊ ቤተ ፈተነታት፣ ኣብ ብዙሓት ዓመታት ብናይ ደቡብ ኮርያ መንግስቲ ዝተሰርሑ እዮም።
en-mt: Testing capacity, largely in private laboratories, has been developed by the South Korean government over many years.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: ኣብ 16 ማርች፣ ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናይ ምርመራ ፕሮግራማት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ንምቕናስ ከሳልጡ ሓቲቱ።በቲ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ሰፊሕ ምስርጫው ብዝፈጠሮ ኣማኢት ኣሽሓት ናይ ግሊ ምርመራታት ኣብ ናይ U.S. ቤት ፈተነታት ስለዝተኻየዱ፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ስዋባትን ኬሚካል ሬጀንትን ኣቕርቦት ስለዝተዳኸመ ናይ ምርመራ ልዑል ሕቶታት ይቐርቡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: At 16 March, the World Health Organization (WHO) has requested that screening programs be able to reduce COVID-19, because hundreds of thousands of individual tests have been conducted at U.S. home tests caused by the widespread spread of the virus, and because the supply of swam and chemical regents has been weakened.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ቻይና ኣብ ናይ መመርመሪ ኪቶም ዘጋጠመሞ ናይ ዘይትኽክለኛት ጸገም ሪፕሮት ጌሮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, China filed a reprocessional problem with a test kit.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴተስ፣ ብ CDC ዝማዕበሉ ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት "ጸገማት;" ነይርዎም፣ እቲ መንግስቲ ድሕሪኡ ናይ ግሊ ሕክምናታት ምርመራ ኣጊዱ ዝበረ ቢሮክራቲክ ገደብ ኣልዒሉ።ሰፔን ካብ ናይ ቻይና Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd መመርመሪ ኪታት ዓዲጋ፣ ውጽኢታቶም ድማ ዘይትኽክል ከምዝኾነ ኣረጋጊጻ።
en-mt: In the United States, there were "problems";" diagnostic kits developed by the CDC; the government subsequently banned inspections of private treatments and lifted a bureaucratic limit.Sepen purchased testing kits from China's Shenzhen Biotechnology Co., Ltd., and confirmed their results were not accurate.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: እቲ ትካል እዞም ዘይትኽክለኛ ውጽኢታት ናይ ናሙናታት ኣተኣኻኽባ ጸገም ዘስዐብዎ ወይ እቶም ኪታት ብትኽክል ብዘይ ምጥቃም ዝመጸ ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ ኢሉ።
en-mt: he company said these improper results may have resulted in problems with the collection of samples or the lack of proper use of the kits.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: ናይ ስፓኒሽ ሚኒስትሪ ዝተሰሓሓተ ውጽኢት ዘምጽኡ ኪታት ኣወጊዱ፣ ብ Shenzhen Bioeasy ዝቐረቡ ካልኦት መመርመሪ ኪታት ከምዝጥቀም ሓቢሩ።80% ናይ እዞም ቼክ ሪፐብሊክ ካብ ቻይና ዝዓደገቶም መመርመሪ ኪታት ዝተሰሓሓተ ውጽኢት ሂቦም።ስሎቫኪያ ካብ ቻይና 1.2 ሚለዮን ኪታት ዓዲጋ ዘይትኽክለኛታት ኮይኖም ድማ ረኺባቶም።
en-mt: The Spanish ministry eliminated kits that produced a wrong result; it said it would use other testing kits offered by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of these test kits purchased by the Czech Republic from China gave the wrong results. Slovakia bought 1.2 million kits from China and found them to be illegal.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር Matovič እዚ ናብ Danube ንክድርበ ሓሳብ ሂቦም።Ateş Kara ናይ ቱርኪ ጥዕና ሚኒስትሪ ቱርኪ ካብ ቻይናዝዓደገቶም ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት "ልዑል ናይ ጌጋ ሬት" ከምዝነበሮምን "ከምዘይተጠቐምዎምን" ሓቢሮም።UK 3.5 ሚልዮን ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020 መጀመርያታት ግን ንጥቅሚ ዝውዕሉ ከምዘይኮኑ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovič recommended that this be thrown into Danube.Ateş Kara, Turkey's health ministry, said inspection kits purchased from China had "high faulty nets" and "did not use them." THE UK bought 3.5 million diagnostic kits from China but were not for use in the first place in April 2020.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: ምርመራ፣ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ዘርአዩ ምውሻብን እዞም ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝነኽእዎም ሰባት ምክትታልን፣ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢታት የርእዩ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Testing, testing for positive results and monitoring of people who have positive SARS-CoV-2 results are showing positive results.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ጣልያን ከተማ Vò፥ ኣብ ጣልያን ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቦታ ሞት ፣ ዝሰርሑ ዘለዉ ተመራመርቲ ኣብ 3,400 ዝኾኑ ሰባት ክልተ ዙር ምርመራ ኣካይዶም፣ በብ ዓሰርተ መዓልታት ኣፈላላይ።
en-mt: In the Italian city of Vò, italy's first COVID-19 death site, researchers working on 3,400 people conducted two rounds of tests, separating them in ten days.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: ዳርጋ ፍርቂ ዝኾኑ ፖዚቲቭ ውጽኢት ዘለዎም ምልክት ዘይብሎም እዮም፣ ኩሎም ዝተረኸቡ ኬዛት ድማ ተወሺቦም።
en-mt: Nearly half of the positive results are unmarked, and all detected cases have been removed.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: ናብቲ ኮም ጉዕዞ ብምኽልካሉ፣ እዚ ሓደሽቲ ረኽሲታት ከወግድ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: By preventing travel to the community, new infections can be avoided.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: ብሓያል ናይ ንኽክእ ክትትል፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ምርመራታትን ውሸባን፣ ናይ 2020 ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ ምስ ካልኦት ዝማዕበላ ሃገራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ኣዝዩ ትሑት ክኸውን ክኢሉ እዩ፣ እዚ ክኸውን ዝኸኣለ ድማ ብዘይ ኣገዳዲ ናይ ሬስቶራንትታትን መሸጣ ቦታታት ምዕጻው እዩ።
en-mt: With strong surveillance, travel restrictions, inspections and quarantines, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic has managed to be very low in Singapore compared to other developed countries, with the closure of restaurants and retail outlets without the need to.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ምድላዋት ተሰሪዞም እዮም፣ ሲንጋፖር ድማ ንነበርቲ ኣብ ገዝኦም ንክጸንሑ ኣብ 28 መጋቢት ምልላይ ጀሚራ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ቤት ትምህርቲታት ድሕሪ ናይ በዓል ዕረፍቲ ኣብ 23 መጋቢት ኣብ ግዚኦም ተኸፊቶም።
en-mt: Most preparations have been cancelled, and Singapore began identifying residents to stay at home on March 28, but schools reopened in time on March 23 after a holiday break.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ካልኦት ሃገራት ነቲ ለበዳ ብሓያል ናይ ንኽክእ ክትትል፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ምርመራታትን ኳራንቲንን፣ እሞ ግን ክነንድቲ ኣገዳዲ ብዘይኮነ ምዕጻዋት ክቆጻጸርኦ ክኢለነ እየን፣ ንኣብነት ኣይስላንድን ደቡብ ኮርያን።
en-mt: Several other countries have been able to control the pandemic with strong surveillance, travel bans, inspections and quarantines, but with non-mandatory closures, e.g Iceland and South Korea.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: ስታስቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ብዙሕ ምርመራ ዝገበራ ሃገራት፣ ምስ ናይ ሞት ቁጽሪ ክነጻጸር ከሎ፣ ዝተሓተ ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣለወን፣ እዚ ድማ እዘን ሃገራት ቀሊል ምልክት ዘለዎምን ምንም ምልክት ዘይብሎምን ሰባት ምፍላይ ብምኽኣለን እዩ ዝኸውን።
en-mt: Countries that have tested a lot have a lower death rate compared to the number of deaths, which is because these countries are able to distinguish between people with mild symptoms and no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: ውድብ ዓለም ጥዕና(WHO) ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚን ዘይብለንን ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ COVID-19 ወሱን ልምዲ ዘለዎ ሃገራዊ ላብራቶሪ ዘለወን ሃገራትን፡ እቶም ናይ መጀመሪያ ሓሙሽተ ኣዎንታዊን፡ ዓሰርተ ኣሉታዊ ናይ COVID-19 ምርመራ ውጽኢታት ናብ እተን 16 ናይ WHO መወከሲ ላብራቶሪታት ክልእኻ ኣለወን ክብል ተላቢዩ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has warned countries with no testing capacity and a national laboratory with COVID-19 practice should send the first five positive and ten negative COVID-19 tests results to the 16 WHO referral laboratories.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: ካብ 16 መወከስቲ ቤትፈተነታት፣ 7 ኣብ ኤስያ፣ 5 ኣብ ኣውሮፓ፣ 2 ኣብ ኣፍሪካ፣ 1 ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካ 1 ድማ ኣብ ኣውስትራሊያ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: It is located in 16 references, 7 in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: ኣብ ዝስዕብ ቻርት፣ ረድፊ “ኣወንታዊናይ % ምርመራታት” ብናይታ ሃገር ናይ ምርመራ ፖሊሲ እዩ ዝውሰን።
en-mt: In the following chart, the "positive percentage of tests" is determined by the country's testing policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: ናብ ሆስፒታል ዝመጹ ሰባት ጥራሕ ምርመራ ትገብር ሃገር ካብ ዜጋታታ ኩሎም ትምርምር ሃገር ንላዕሊ ፖዘቲቭ ብ % ምርመራ ይህልዋ፣ ምልክት የርእዩ ኣየርአዩ ብዘየገድስ፣ ካልኦት ነገራት ማዕረ እንከለዉ።
en-mt: Only people who come to the hospital are tested positive for more than all the country's citizens, regardless of whether they show symptoms, and other things are equally.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ፣ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት እውን ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ኮይኑ፣ ካብ ኢድካ ሓመድ፣ ቅብኣት፣ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት፣ ወይ ካልኦት ዘይተደለዩ ጥረ ነገራት ንምእላይ ዕላማ ዝሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is also known as hand washing, which is designed to remove dust, ointment, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances from your hands.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽጢ መዓልቲ ኣብ ዘለዉ "ኣገደስቲ ግዘታት " ብቐጻልነት ኣእዳውካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ናይ ብዙሓት ሕማማት ምምሕልላፍ ይቕንስ እዩ፣ ንኣብነት ተቕማጥን ኮሌራን፣ ብ ካብ ፍታን–ናብ ኣፍ መገዲ ዝመሓላለፉ ሕማማት እዮም።
en-mt: Continuing to wash your hands with soap during the "important periods" of the day reduces the transmission of many diseases, such as living conditions and cholera; diseases that are transmitted from linen to mouth.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: ሰባት ንኣብነት፣ ዓይኖም፣ ኣፍንጭኦም፣ ወይ ኣፎም (ንኣብነት፣ ሙከስ መምብሬን) ቅድሚ ምንክኦም ኢዶም እንተዘይተሓጺቦም ብናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት እውን ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም ።
en-mt: People can also be infected with respiratory diseases if they do not wash their hands before contact, for example, their eyes, nose, or mouth (e.g. mucus, mucus mambre).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ኣብ መዓልቲኹም ኢድ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዘድልየሎም ሓሙሽተ ወሰንቲ ግዘታት: ቅድሚን ድሕሪን ምፍታንኩም፣ ድሕሪ ናይ ህጻንኩም መዓኮር ምሕባስኩም ወይ ናፒ ምቕያርኩም፣ ቅድሚ ውላድኩም ምምጋብኩም፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕኩምን ቅድሚ ምግቢ፣ ጥረ ስጋ፣ ዓሳ፣ ጸባን ምድላውኩም እዮም።
en-mt: Five important things to wash your hands with soap each day, after swimming or changing your baby's locks, before eating your child, preparing before eating and preparing food, meat, fish, milk and milk.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: ማይን ሳሙናን ኣብ ዘይርከበሉ ግዘ፣ ኣእዳውኩም ብሓሞኽሽቲ ምጽራይ ትኽእሉ። ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ እዩ ዝመክር:
en-mt: When soap and water are not available, you can wash your hands with a motile.

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: ምግቢ ቅድሚ ምድላውኩም፣ ኣብተዳልዉሉ ግዘን ድሕሪኡን።
en-mt: Before preparing a meal, prepare it.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: ንዝሓመመ ሰብ ቅድሚን ድሕሪን ምትንካፍ።
en-mt: Before and after touching a sick person.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: ሽቓቕ ናይ ዝተጠቐመ ህጻን ዳየፐር ድሕሪ ምቕያር ወይ ድሕሪ ምጽራይ።
en-mt: after changing or cleaning the baby diaper.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫኹም ምንፋጥኩም፣ ምስዓልኩም ወይ ምህንጣስኩም።
en-mt: When you're coughing, coughing, or sneering.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: እንስሳት ድሕሪ ምትንካፍ፣ ምምጋብ፣ ወይ ናይ እንስሳት ቀልቀል ድሕሪ ምትንካፍ።
en-mt: Animals after touching, feeding, or animal waste.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ምስ ሕክምናዊ ከይዲታት ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ጽሬት ተግባራት ይውክሉ።
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene is associated with medical hygiene practices.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: ቅድሚ መድሓኒት ወይ ሕክምናዊ ክንክን ምትግባር ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ስርጭት ክከላኸል ወይ ክቕንስ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands before taking medication or medical care can prevent or reduce the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ዋና ናይ ጥዕና ዕላምኡ ኣእዳው ካብ ፓቶጂናትን (ሕማም ከስዐቡ ዝኽእሉ ባክቴርያ፣ ቫይረስመ፣ ወይ ካልኦት ማይክሮኦርጋኒዛማት) ጉድኣት ወይ ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ኬሚካላትን ምጽራይ እዩ።
en-mt: he main purpose of hand washing is to clean the hands from pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that cause disease) and chemicals that cause damage or disease.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ብፍላይ ምግቢ ንዝሕዙ ሰባት ወይ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምና ፊልድ ዝሰርሑ ሰባት እዩ ዘገልግለል፣ ንሓፈሻዊ ህዝቢ እውን ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: This is particularly useful for people who hold food or work in a medical field, and is also useful for the general public.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናይ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ፣ ኮሮናቫይርስ፣ ከምኡውን ካልኦት ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ዝርጋሐ ምቕናስ፣ ናይ ተቕማጥ ረኽሲ መምጽኢ ምኽንያታት ምክልኻል፣ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲታት ምቕናስ ሓዊሱ፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ጥዕና ጥቕሚታተ ኣለዉዎ።
en-mt: Washing your hands has many health benefits, reducing the spread of influenza, coronaviruses and other infectious diseases, prevention of causes of infections, reducing respiratory infections, and many health benefits.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ኣብ ገዛ ንዘጋጥም ሕርሲ ናይ ናጽላታት ቁጽሪ ሞት ምቕናስ።
en-mt: Reducing the number of deaths due to domestic pregnancies.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: ኣብ 2013 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ዝተመሓየሸ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተግባራት ናብ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ዝኾኑ ህጻናት ናይ ንውሓት ጸገም ከምዘስዕብ ኣርእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: A 2013 study showed improved hand washing practices lead to length problems in children under five years of age.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ዘይማዕበሉ ሃገራት፣ ብሰንኪ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስን ናይ ተቕማጥ ሕማማትን ዘጋጥሙ ናይ ህጻናት መጠን ሞት፣ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ብምሕጻብ ካልኦት ቀለልቲ ባህርያዊ ለውጢታትን ብምልላይ ከተጉድሎም ትኽእል።
en-mt: In developed countries, infant mortality rates caused by respiratory and respiratory diseases can be reduced by identifying other mild natural changes by washing your hands with soap.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: እዚ ቀሊል ተግባር በዚ ሕማም ዝመጽእ ሞት ብ 50% የጉድሎ።
en-mt: his simple action reduces the death toll from the disease by 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ዘበረታትዑ ጎስጓሳት፣ ንብዝሒ ናይ ተቕማጥ ናብ ሓደ ሲሶ የውርድዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለዎም ቦታታት ምስ ጽሩይ ማይ ምቕራብ ክነጻጸር ዝኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing reduces the number of residents to one-third, compared to providing clean water in low-income areas.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: ሕማም ተቕማጥ ብ48% ንምጉዳል ኢድ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዓብዪ ግደ ይጻወት። ኣእዳው ብማይን ሳሙናን ምሕጻብ ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ፣ ገዛን ማሕበረሰብን ዝተለምዱ ናይ ተቕማጥን ረኽስታት ስርዓተ-ምስትንፋስን ንምክልኻን እቲ ዝነጠፈን ዝሓሰረን ኣማረጺ እዩ።
en-mt: Soap plays an important role in reducing the spread of constitutive disease by 48%; washing hands with soap and water is the fastest and cheapest option for preventing common respiratory infections in school, home and community.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: ረኽሲ ሳንቡእ፣ ከቢድ ዓይነት ARI ኮይኑ፣ ኣብ ዓመት ህይወት ኣስታት 1.8 ሚልዮን ቆልዑ ብምቕጣፍ፣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ዘለዉ ቆልዑ ቁጽሪ ሓደ ቀታሊ ሕማም እዩ ።
en-mt: Lung infections; a severe form of ARI; the number one deadly disease for children under the age of five, killing about 1.8 million children a year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: በቢዓመቱ ብተቕማጥን ኒሞንያን 3.5 ሚልዮን ዝኾኑ ህጻውንቲ ይሞቱ።
en-mt: Each year, 3.5 million children die from pneumonia.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: UNICEF ከምዝበሎ፣ ቅድሚ ምግቢ ምብላዕን ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ቤት ምጥቃምን ኢድካ ብሳሙናን ማይን ምሕጻብ ልምዲ ምግባር ልዕሊ ክትባትን ሕክምናን ናይ ብዙሓት ሰባት ህይወት የድሕን። ብሰንኪ ተቕማጥ ዝስዕብ ቁጽሪ ሞት ብፍርቂ፣ ብኸቢድ ረኽሲ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ዝመጹ ሞታት ድማ ብርብዒ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: ACCORDING TO UNICEF, THE PRACTICE OF WASHING YOUR HANDS WITH SOAP AND WATER BEFORE EATING FOOD AND AFTER URINATING CAN SAVE MANY LIVES, REDUCING THE NUMBER OF DEATHS FROM LIVING BY HALF AND DEATHS FROM SERIOUS RESPIRATORY INFECTIONS BY A QUARTER.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ምስ ካልኦት ጽሬት መሐለዊ ስጉምቲታት ከም ኣካል ናይ ማይ ፣ ጥዕናን ጽሬትን (WASH) ዝኣመሰሉ መደባት ዝተኣሳሰር እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is usually associated with other hygiene measures, such as water, health and hygiene (WASH).

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ካብ እቲ ብቀጥተኛ ኣካላዊ ምትንኽኻፍ ዝመሓላለፍ ኢምፔቲጎ(impetigo) እውን ይከላኸል እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands also protects against impetigo, which is transmitted through direct physical contact.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: ንእሽተይ ኣሉታዊ ጎድኒ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ንቆርበት ስለዘንቅጽ ናይ ቆርበት ምብልሻው ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: A small amount of negative side effects of hand washing can lead to skin damage.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: ናይ 2012 ኣብ ዴንማርክ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ከምዝረኸቦ፣ ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ናብ ምኽካኽ፣ ደረቕ ቆርበት ኤክዜማ ወይ ናይ ኢድ ደርማታይተስ ዝበሃል ኩነታት ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሰራሕተኛታት ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: A 2012 study in Denmark found that repeated hand washing can lead to smoking, dry skin eczema or hand dermatitis, which is common among health care workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: ኣዚኻ ደጋጊምካ ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ከም ናይ obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) ምልክት ተገይሩ እዩ ዝርአ።
en-mt: Wash your hands frequently as a symptom of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ናይ ካብ ቀልቀል ናብ ኣፍ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ናይ'ዚ ሕማም ንምቕናስ፣ ኣብ መዓልቲ ሓሙሽተ ወሰንቲ ኢድና ንሕጸበሎም ግዘታት ኣለዉ፣ ንሳቶም ድማ ሽንቲ ቤት ድሕሪ ምጥቃም (ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ማይ ወይ ቀልቀል ምሻን)፣ ናይ ቆልዑ መዓኮር ድሕሪ ምጽራግ (ናፒታት ድሕሪ ምቕያር)፣ ቅድሚ ቆልዑ ምምጋብ፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕን ቅድሚ/ድሕሪ ምግቢ ምድላው ወይ ጥረ ስጋ፣ ዓሳ፣ ወይ ጸባ ምድላው እዮም።
en-mt: o reduce the risk of transmission from malnutrition to mouth, there are five important periods of washing hands a day: after urinating (after urinating water or cooking), after cleaning children's nails (after changing naps), before eating children, before eating and preparing meat, fish, or milk.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ቴክኒካት ኣብ ካልኦት ኣጋጣሚታት እውን ነቲ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍ ንምግታእ ይሕግዝ እዩ። ገለ ኣብነታት፥ ቁስሊ ቅድሚ ምሕካም ድሕሪኡን ; ድሕሪ ምህንጣስ፣ ምስዓል፣ ወይ ኣፍንጫ ድሕሪ ምንፋጥ; ናይ እንስሳት ቀልቀል ምትንካፍ ወይ እንስሳት ድሕሪ ምሓዝ; ድሕሪ ጎሓፍ ምሓዝ እውን።
en-mt: Hand washing techniques also help curb transmission in other cases.Some examples: before and after treating wounds; after the nose, nose, or nose; after the touching or seizure of animal waste; even after the seizure.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት፣ ትሑት ናይ ኢድ ብሳሙናን ማይን ምሕጻብ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እዩ ዘሎ።
en-mt: In many countries, low hand washing with soap and water is comparatively high.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: ኣብ 2015 ኣብ 54 ሃገራት ዝተኻየደ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መጽናዕቲ ብማእከላይ ገምጋም 38.7% ስድራቤታት ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ከምዘተግብሩ ኣርእዩ። ኣብ 2014 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ሳዑዲ ዓረብያ ዝለዓለ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 97 ሚእታዊ ከምዘለዋ የረኢ፣ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ጥቓ ማእኸል 77 ሚእታዊ ፣ ቻይና ድማ ብዝተሓተ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 23 ሚእታዊ። ኣብ ወሰንቲ ግዘታት ኣእዳውካ ብሳሙና ናይ ምሕጻብ ናይ ባህሪ ለውጢ ንምምዕባል ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ባህሪታት ለውጢ ሜላታት ኣብ ጥቕሚ እንዳውዓሉ ይርከቡ። ኣብ ዝምዕብሉ ሃገራት ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናብ ናይ ቆልዑ ልምዲ/ጠባይ ንምእታው ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ግዘ ክፍለየሎም ይግበር እዩ።
en-mt: A 2015 handwash survey of 54 countries showed an average of 38.7% of households had the most effective hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed Saudi Arabia had the highest comparative rate of 97 percent; U.S. governments The U.S. is near the middle of 77 percent and China at a lower comparative rate of 23 percent; in the developing world, a variety of behavioral changes are being used to develop behavioral changes in soap. Hand washing is permitted at school to ensure children's behavior.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: እቲ "ወሳኒ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ፕሮግራም " በቲ ናይ ትምህርቲ ክፍሊ ኣብ ተግባር ዝወዓለ ኣብ ፊሊፒኒስ ናይ'ቲ ዝተወሰደ ስጉምቲ ስኬል ናይ ቆልዑ ጥዕናን ትምህርቲን ንምብርትታዕ ኣብነት እዩ።
en-mt: he "Critical Health Care Program," implemented by the Education Department, is an example of strengthening the scale of children's health and education in the Philippines.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: ንዓመት ክልተ ግዘ ካብ ናይ መዓናጡ ሓሳኹ ምሕካም ምስ መዓልታዊ ብሳሙና ኢድ ምሕጻብ ከምኡ'ውን ስኒ መዓለታዊ ብፍሎራይድ ምቡራሽ፣ ናይ እዚ ሃገራዊ ፕሮግራም ቀንዲ ዕላማ እዩ።
en-mt: Twice a year, washing your hands with hand soap every day, and dental fluoride are the main objectives of this national program.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንዶኔዥያ እውን ዕዉት ብዝኾነ መልክዑ ኣብ ስራሕ ውዒሉ እዩ።
en-mt: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: ሳሙናን ዲተርጀንትን ናብ ማይ ምሕዋስ ንምውጋድ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ካብ ቆርበት የመሓያይሾ።
en-mt: Mixing soap and distillergens into water improves microorganisms from the skin to avoid them.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: ናይ ሳሙናን ዲተርጀንትን ዋና ተግባር ናይ ገደባት ብጽባጽ ምቕናስን ሓቓቒነት ምውሳኽን እዩ።
en-mt: he main function of soap and distillation is to reduce limits and increase transparency.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: ቆርበት ንምጽራይ ማይ ጥራሕ እኹል ኣይኮነን፣ ምኽንያቱ ክፋል ኦርጋኒክ ሓመድ ዝኾኑ ስብሕን ፕሮቲናትን ብማይ ጥራሕ ኣይሓቁን እዮም።
en-mt: Water is not enough to clean the skin, because fats and proteins that are part of organic soil are not only watered.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: ምጽራይ ግን፣ ብምኽንያታዊ ናይ ማይ ውሕዘት ዝተደገፈ እዩ..
en-mt: But clean-up is supported by reasonable water streams..

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: ደረቕ ሳሙና፣ ዳጋጊምካ ስለትጥቀመሉ፣ ካብ ዝሓለፈ ዝተጠቐምካሉ ግዘ ባክቴርያ ሒዙ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Soap is used over and over again, so you may have bacteria from the past.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: ብዙሓት መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘካየድዎ ናይ ካብ ዝተበከለ ሓመድ ዝመሓላለፍ ናይ ባክቴርያ ዝርጋሐ ውሑድ እዩ ምኽንያቱ እቲ ባክቴርያ በቲ ዓፍራ ስለዝጠፍእ።
en-mt: Many studies have shown that the spread of bacteria from contaminated soil is very small because the bacteria disappears through the soil.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC ክሳብ ሕዚ "ብኢድካ ከይተንከፍካ ክትጥቀመሉ ትኽእል ፈሳሲ ሳምና እዩ ዝምረጽ " ኢሉ።
en-mt: he CDC has so far said, "It is important to choose soap that you can use without touching your hands."

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙናታት ንኽጥቀሙ፣ ኣብ ጥዕናዊ ንቕሓት ዘለዎም ህዝቢ ጽዑቕ ጎስጓስ ተገይሩ እዩ።
