sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ እዞም ዝምከሩ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ወይ ጸረ-ረኽሲታት ምጥቃም፣ ነቶም ብተፈጥርኦም ተጻዋርነት ናይ ጸረ-ባክተርያ መድሃኒት ዘለዎም ኦርጋኒዝማት መሪጾም ዘጥፍኡ ምዃኖም ዘርኢ መረዳእታ የለን።
en-mt: So far, there is no evidence that the use of these recommended antibiotics or antibiotics selectively eliminates organids that have resistance to antibacterial drugs.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙናታት ከም triclosan ዝኣመሰሉ ጸረ -ባክቴርያ ኤጀንትታት ዝሓዙ እዮም፣ ብዙሓት ነዚ ዝጻወርዎ ናይ ስትረይናት ዝርዝር ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, antibacterial soaps contain antibacterial agents such as triclosan, and there is a list of strains that many tolerate.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: ስለዚ፣ ጸረ-ረኽሲ ተጻወርቲ ስተርይናት በቲ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ዋላ ኣይመረጹ ፣ ክንድቲ ዝድለ ኣድማዕቲ ዘይክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: As a result, anti-infection resisters do not even choose with the antibacterial soap, and may not be as effective as needed.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: ምስ'ቲ ስርፋክታንትን ናይ ቆርበት ተኸላኻሊ ኤጀንት ጎኒ ን ጎኒ፣ እዚ ውስብስብ ፎርሙሌሽን ኣሲድ ዝሓዘ ክኸውን ይኽእለል እዩ (ኣሰቲክ ኣሲድ፣ ኣስኮርቢክ ኣሲድ፣ ላክቲክ ኣሲድ) ከም ናይ pH መመጣጠኒ፣ ጸረ ማይክሮቢያል ንጡፍ ዝኾነ ቤንዞኒክ ኣሲድን ተወሳኺ ናይ ቆርበት ኮንዲሽነራትን (ኣሎይ ቬራ፣ ቪታሚናት፣ ሜታኖል፣ ካብ ኣትክልቲ ዝተወሰዱ)። ብ University of Oregon School of Public Health(ኦሪጎን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ቤት ትምህርቲ) ዝተገበረ ሓፈሻዊ ሳይንሳዊ ገምጋም ከም ዘርኣዮ፣ ተራ ሳምና ማዕረ እቶም ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዘለዉ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ሳምናታት ብቑዓት እዮም።
en-mt: Along with the serfectant and skin-protective agent side-by-side, this complex formulation can contain acid (asynchtic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as a pH equivalent, anti-microbial active benzonic azeon A general scientific review by the University of Oregon School of Public Health (Oregon University School of Public Health) and additional skin conditions (Aloy Vera, Vitamins, Metanolol, taken from plants) showed that ordinary soaps are the same as the antibacterial soaps on the market They're worthy.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: ኢድካ ንምሕጻብ ዝምችው ውዑይ ማይ፣ ባክቴርያ ንምቕጣል ዘኽእሎ መጠነ ሙቐት የብሉን።
en-mt: Hot water to wash your hands doesn't have enough heat to kill bacteria.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: ባክቴረያ ኣብ ናይ ሰብነት መጠነ ሙቐት (37 °C) ብቕልጡፍ ይዓቢ።
en-mt: Bacteria grow rapidly at a body temperature (37°C).

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ውዑይን ሳሙና ዘለዎን ማይ ካብ ዝሑልን ሳሙና ዘለዎን ማይ ሓመድን ባክቴርያን ዝሕዙ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ዘይትታት ኣብ ምውጋድ ዝሓሸ ኣድማዕነት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, hot and soapy water is more effective in removing natural oils that contain cold, soapy water, soil and bacteria.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: ኣንጻር እምነት ብዙሓት ግን፣ ሳይንሳዊ መጽናዕቲታት ውዑይ ማይ ብምጥቃም ኣብ ኢድ ንዝርከቡ ብዝሒ ኦርጋኒዝምስ ኣብ ምቕናስ ጥቕሚ ከምዘይብሉ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: However, scientific studies have found that using hot water is useless in reducing the number of organas in the hands.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታየዘራት ወይ ናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ ማይ ዘይብሎም ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ኤጀንትታት እዮም።
en-mt: Hand sanitaires or hand antiseptive agents are hand sanitised agents that do not have water.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ 1990ታትን መፈለምታ 21 ክፍለዘመን፣ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ማያዊ ዘይኮኑ ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ፈሰስቲ (ኣልኮላዊ መጽረዪ ኢድ፣ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ መጽረዪ ኢድ፣ ወይ ሳኒታይዘር) ተጠላብነት ክረኽቡ ጀሚሮም።
en-mt: In the late 1990s and early 21st century, alcohol-based non-alcoholic hand sanitizer (alcoholic hand sanitizer, anti-hand sanitizer, or sanitizer) began to be introduced.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ኣይዞፕሮፓይል ኣልኮል ወይ ኢታኖል ምስ መሕፈሲ ኤጀንት ከም ካርቦመር (ናይ ኣክሪሊክ ኣሲድ ፖሊመር) ተሓዊሶም ጄል ይኾኑ፣ ወይ ሂዩመክታንት ይኾኑ ከም ግላይሰሪን ፈሳሲ፣ ወይ ናይ'ቲ ኣልኮል ናይ ምንቃጽ ጽልዋ ንምቕናስ ዓፍራ ዘለዎ ምግባር።
en-mt: Most of isopropail alcohol or ethanol are mixed with a digestive agent such as carbonated polymers, or hyuctants, such as glycerin fluid, or making foam to reduce the burn impact of the alcohol.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: ዝተጽበጸበ ሃይድሮጂን-ፐርኦክሳይድ ምጥቃም ተወሳኺ ጸረ-ማይክሮቢያል ንጥፈት ይውስኽ። እንተንኢሱ 60 ክሳብ 95% ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ብቑዓት ቀተልቲ ጀርም እዮም።
en-mt: Using anticipated hydrogen-peroxide increases further antimicrobial activity, and hand sanitizes with at least 60 to 95% alcohol are qualified germs killers.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት ባክቴርያ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ መድሓኒታት ዝጻወሩ ባክቴርያ (MRSA ን VRE ን)፣ ቲበርኪሎሲስ፣ ከምኡውን ገለ ቫይረሳት (HIV፣ ሀርፒስ፣ RSV፣ ራይኖቫይረስ፣ ቫክሲንያ፣ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ፣ ከምኡውን ሄፓታይተስ እውን ሓዊሱ) ከምኡ ውን ፋንጋይ ይቐትል።
en-mt: It kills alcoholic sanitize bacteria, various drug-resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tiberkylosis, and certain viruses (HIV, herpes, RSV, Rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungay.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: 70% ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት ኣብ ኢድካ ድሕሪ ምጥቃም፣ ኣብ ውሽጢ 30 ሰከንድታት 99.97% (3.5 ሎግ ምቕናስ፣ ምስ 35 ዴሲቤል ምቕናስ ብተመሳሳሊ) ናይ'ቶም ባክቴርያ፣ ኣብ ውሽጢ 1 ደቒቕ ድማ 99.99% ክሳብ 99.999% (4 ክሳብ 5 ና ሎግ ምቕናስ) ናይ'ቶም ባክቴርያ የጥፍእ ። ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣንጻር ባክቴርያ ብሉጻት እዮም፣ ኣንጻር ሓደ ቫይረሳት ግን ክንድቲ ኣድማዕነት የብሎምን።
en-mt: After using 70% alcohol-containing sanitizeers in your hand; 99.97% (3.5 log reduction in 30 seconds; similar to 35 decibel reductions); and 99.99% to 99.99% (4 to 5 na log reductions) of the bacteria in 1 minute.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣንጻር እቶም ንቡር ናይ ተላባዒ ጋስትሮኢንተራይትስ ሕማም መልዐሊ ዝኾኑ ኖሮቫይረስ (ወይ Norwalk) ዓይነት ቫይረሳት ኣድማዕነት የብሎምን። ኣእዳውኩም ንምትርካስ ወይ ክልቲኦም ኣእዳው ንምሽፋን ዘኽእል እኹል ናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሴፕቲክ ወይ ኣልኮል መድረዚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Alcohol-containing hand sanitizeers are not effective against norovirus (or Norwalk), a type of virus that is normal for infectious gastrointesteritis, and adequate hand antiseptive or alcohol phases should be used to wash your hands or cover both hands.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: ናይ ክልቲኦም ኣእዳውኩም ቅድሚትን ድሕሪቶምን ከምኡ'ውን ማእኸል ኣጻብዕቲኹም ክሳብ እቲ ፈሳሲ፣ ዓፍራ ወይ ጄል ዝነቅጽ ን 30 ሰከንድታት ዝኸውን ክድረዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: oth hands should be placed before and behind your fingers for 30 seconds until the fluid, foam or jell is dry.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ጫፋት ብክልቲኡ ከብዲ ኢድ ብምድራዝ ብኣግባቡ ክሕጸቡ ኣለዎም።ናይ US Center for Disease Control and Prevention (ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻልን ቁጽጽርን ማእኸል) ልዕሊ ሳኒታይዘር መድረዚታት ኢድካ ምሕጻብ የበረታትዕ እዩ።
en-mt: Finger ends should be washed properly by dredding both of the abdomen, and the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention encourages hand washing above sanitizer platforms.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: ተጠቃምነት ናይ'ዞም ኤጀንትታት ዝዓብየሉ ዘሎ ምኽንያት፣ ኣጠቃቕምኦም ቀሊል ስለዝኾነን ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ቀልጢፎም ስለዝቀትሉን እዩ። እንተኾነ ግን ከም መተካእታ ናይ ትኽክለኛ ኣተሓጽባ ኢድ ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ዝርከበሉ ክኾኑ የብሎምን ።
en-mt: he reason for the growing use of these agents is that they are easier to use and microorganisms kill quickly, but they should not be used as a substitute for proper handwashing where soap and water are available.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ብተደጋጋሚ ምጥቃም ደረቐ ቆርበት ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ፣ ስለዚ መተርከስቲ/ወይ ናይ ቆርበት መርሓስቲ ናብቲ ፎርሙላ ክሕወሱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizes can result in dry skin, so therefore, doctors and/or skin guides need to be moved to the formula.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ኣልኮል ናይ ምንቃጽ ጽልዋ ግላይስሪንን/ወይ ካልኦት መተርከሲታት ናብ እቲ ፎርሙላ ብምሕዋስ ምቕናስ ወይ ምጥፋእ ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: The combustion effect of the alcohol, glasrin and/or other insecticulation can be reduced or eliminated by mixing it into the formula.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: ኣብ ክሊኒካላዊ ፈተነታት፣ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት መርሓሲ ዝሓዙ እንትኾኑ ምስ ሳሙናታትን ኣንቲማይክሮቢል ዲተርጀንትን ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ትሑት ናይ ቆርበት ምንቃጽን ምብልሻውን ዕድል ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In clinical trials, alcoholic sanitized sanitization has a low chance of skin burn and decay compared to soaps and anti-microbial agents.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: ኣለርጂክ ኮንታክት ደርማታይቲስን(allergic contact dermatitis) ዩሪቲካርያ ሲንድረምን(urticaria syndrome) ምስ ኣልኮል ዝተሓሓዝ ወይ ምስቶም ናብ ኣልኮል መድረዚ ኢድ ዝኣትዉ ተወሰኽቲ ነገራት ልዕሊ መጠን ተኣፋፍነት(hypersensitivity) ሓልሓሊፉ ዘጋጥሙ እዮም።
en-mt: Allergic contact dermatitis and urticaria syndrome are occasionally associated with alcohol or hypersensitivity.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: ምስ ብማይን ሳሙናን ብምሕጻብ ዘስዕቦ ክነጻጸር እንከሎ፣ ኢሪታንት ኮንታክት ደርማታይተስ(irritant contact dermatitis) ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ውሑድ ስለዝኾነ፣ ሳሓቢ ንክኸውን ዝገበር እዩ።
en-mt: Compared with washing with soap and water, the irritant connect dermatitis is less likely to follow dermatitis.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: ኣድማዕነቶም ብዘየገድስ፣ ማይ ዘይኮኑ ኤጀንትታት ን ኣእዳው ካብ ኦርጋኒክ ማቴርያል ከጽርዩ ኣይኽእሉን፣ ካብ ረኽሲ ነጻ ክገብሩ ጥራይ እዮም ዝኽእሉ።
en-mt: Regardless of their effectiveness, non-water agents cannot clean hands from organic materials, they can only free themselves from infection.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: እቶም ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ባእታታት ኣብ ኢድ ስለዝጸንሑ፣ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ክንዲ ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ናይ ብዙሓት ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ባእታታት ዝርጋሐ ኣብ ምክልኻል ብቑዓት ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: Ecause the disease-causing elements remain in the hands, hand sanitization is not suitable to prevent the spread of soap and water in many disease-causing elements.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘይብሎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣድማዕነት ኣብ እቲ ንጥረ ነገራቱን ፎርሙሌሽንኑን ኣዝዩ መሰረት ዝገበረ እዩ፣ ኣብ ታሪክ እውን ብቕዓቱ ትሕቲ ኣልኮልን ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መድረዚን ኮይኑ ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: he effectiveness of non-alcoholic hand sanitization is very much based on its ingredients and formula, and its quality has also been shown to be a sub-alcoholic hand platform throughout history.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን፣ benzalkonium chloride ዝጥቀሙ ፎርሙሌሽናት ቀጻሊን እኩብን ናይ ጸረ-ማይክሮብስ ንጥፈት ኣርእዮም፣ ኣንጻር ኣልኮል፣ ድሕሪ ብተደጋጋሚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ምውዓሉ ግን ኣድማዒነቱ ቀኒሱ እዩ፣ ኣብ ቆርበት ብዘለዎ ጎድናዊ ጸገም ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: In recent years, benzalkonium chloride has shown continuous and collective antimicrobial activity, against alcohol, but its effectiveness has decreased after repeated use, possibly because of side effects on the skin.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለዎም ማሕበረሰባት ዝነብሩ ብዙሓት ሰባት ሳሙና ክዕድጉ ኣይኽእሉን ስለዚ ኣብ ክንድኡ ሓሙኽሽቲ ወይ ሓመድ ዝጥቀሙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Many people in low-income communities can't afford to buy soap, so instead they have to use ashes or dust.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: ካብ ማይ ጥራሕ ምጥቃም ሓሞኽሽቲ ወይ ሓመድ ምጥቃም ዝበለጸ እዩ፣ ክንዲ ሳሙና ግን ኣድማዒ ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: It's better to use soap than just water, but it's not as effective as soap.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: እቲ ሓመድ ወይ ሓሞኽሽቲ ብማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ዝተለኸፈ ከይኸውን እዩ ዘስግእ፣ ከምዚ እንተኾይኑ ዝርግሐ ናይ'ቲ ቫይረስ ከጉድሎ ዘይኮነ ከብዝሖ እዩ።
en-mt: he soil or disease is not infected with microorganisms, if this is the case, the spread of the virus will increase.

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: ከም ሳሙና፣ ሓሙኽሽቲ ምስ ማይ ኣብ ዝሕወሰሉ ግዘ ኣልካላይን ብጽባጽ ስለዝፈጥር፣ ዲስኢንፌክት ዝገብር ኤጀንት እዩ ።
en-mt: Soap is an agent that produces disinfectant when mixed with water.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: ሳሙና ኣብ ዘይንረኽበሉ ከም መተካእታ ሓሞኽሽቲ ወይ ሑጻ ሳሙና ክንጥቀመሎም ከም ንኽእል ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO ) ይላቦ።
en-mt: When soap is not available, we can use soap as a substitute for mold or sand, the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: ናይ US Centers for Disease Control  (ሕብራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ማእኸል) ዘቕረብዎ ትኽክለኛ ናይ ኢድ ኣተሓጻጽባ ቴክኒክ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ዝርጋሐ ንምቕናስ እዞም ዝስዕቡ ስጉምቲታት የጠቓልል:
en-mt: he U.S. Centers for Disease Control (CDC) has recommended the following steps to reduce the spread of the disease:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: ኣእዳውኩም ብውዑይ ወይ ዝሑል ፈሳሲ ማይ ኣተርክሱ።
en-mt: Wash your hands with hot or cold water.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: ዝፈስስ ማይ እዩ ዝምከር ምኽንያቱ ደው ዝበሉ ባዚናት ክብከሉ ይኽእሉ፣ እቲ ናይ ማይ ረስኒ ድማ ኣፈላላይ ዝፈጥር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: Flowing water is recommended because standing bambores can be contaminated, and the water fever is not divisive.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: ዝባን ኢድካ ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ኣጻብዕቲ፣ ትሕቲ ጽፍሪ እውን ሓዊሱ ብብዝሕ ዝበለ ሳሙና ኢድካ ደራሪዝካ ምሕጻብ።
en-mt: Wash your hands with soap between your fingers and under writing.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: ሳሙና ካብ ቆርበት ነቲ ጀርም የልዕሎ፣ መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእይዎ ድማ ሰባት ብማይ ጥራሕ ካብ ዝሕጸብዎ ንላዕሊ ብሳሙና እንተኾይኑ እዮም ብደምቢ ዝሕጸቡ።
en-mt: Soap removes the germ from the skin, and studies have shown that people wash more with soap than just wash with water.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ድረዝዎ።
en-mt: Keep it for at least 20 seconds.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: ኢድካ ምድራዝ ምፍሕፋሕ ይፈጥር፣ ጀርምታት ካብ ቆርበትካ ንክጠፍኡ ድማ ይሕግዝ፣ ንንውሕ ዝበለ ግዘ ምድራዝ ድማ ብዙሓት ጀርምታት የወግድ።
en-mt: Hand drying creates friction, helps to get germs out of your skin, and prolonged drying removes many germs.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: ብትሕቲ ዝፈስስ ማይ ኣእዳው ይላቕልቑ።
en-mt: Let your hands flow under the water.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: ኣብ ባዚን ምጽራይ ንኣእዳው መሊሱ ክብክለን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: He can wash his hands again.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: ብጽሩይ ሽጎማነ ኢድኩም ኣጽርዩ ወይ ብ ናይ ኣየር መንቀጺ ኣንቅጹ።
en-mt: Wash your hands with clean wash or wash the air.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: ርሑስን ትርኩስን ኣእዳው ብቐሊሉ ይብከሉ። ብበዝሒ ዝርስዑ ኣካላት ኣእዳው ዓባይ ኣጻብዕቲ፣ ናይ ኢድ ክሳድ፣ ሞንጎ ኣጻብዕቲን ውሽጢ ጽፍሪን እዮም።
en-mt: Dirty hands are easily contaminated,and most forgotten limbs are hands, thumbs, necks, between fingers and inner writing.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: ኣርቴፊሻል ጽፍሪታትን ዝቕብኡ ናይ ጽፍሪ ቀለማትን ማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ክሕዙ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Artificial writing and coloring can contain microorganisms.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: ደረቕ ቆርበት ሕማም ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ክውስኽ ስንዝገብር ናይ ኢድ ሎሽን ኣእዳው ካብ ድርቀት ንምክልኻል ክንጥቀመሎም ይምከር።
en-mt: When dry skin increases the chances of spreading disease, hand lotion hands are recommended to use them to protect them from dryness.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ትሑት ዋጋኦም መማረጺታት ናይ ቡንባ ማይን/ ወይ ሳሙና ዘይክህሉ ከሎ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንምብርትታዕ ክቐርቡ ይኽእሉ ንኣብነት፣ ካብ ዝተንጠልጠለ ጀሪካን ማይ ብምቕዳሕ ወይ ብምንኳልን/ ወይ ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ ሓሞኽሽቲ ምጥቃም ይከኣል። ወይ ናይ ማይ ኣቕርቦት ዝህልወሉ ኩነታት (ከም ቤት ትምህርቲታት ወይ ናይ ገጠር ቦታታት ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት)፣ ኣለዉ፣ ንኣብነት ከም "tippy-taps" ከምኡውን ትሑት ዋጋ ዘውጽኡ መማረጺታት ዝበሉ ማይ መዐቀቢ መፍትሒታት ኣለዉ ።
en-mt: A variety of low-cost options for coffee water/or soap can be offered to strengthen hand washing when there is no soap, for example, water can be drawn or drained from suspended jars and/or can be used in storm countries if necessary, or water supply conditions (such as schools or rural areas in stormy countries); there are solutions such as "tippy-taps" and low-cost options.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: tippy-tap ብገመድ ዝተኣሰረ ጆክ ብምጥቃም ዝሰርሕ፣ ብእግሪ ድማ ብምርግጋጽ ውሑድ ማይን ሳሙናን ናብ ኢድኩም ብምፍሳስ ንምጥቃም ዘኽእል ቀሊል ቴክኖሎጂ እዩ።
en-mt: Tippy-tap is a simple technology that works using a rope-bound jock, and can be used on foot by ensuring a small amount of water and soap pouring into your hands.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: ብቑዕ ናይ ኢድ ምንቃጽ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ምሕላው ከይዲ ወሳኒ አካል እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ኣብ ናይ ህዝባዊ ሽንቲ ቤታት ዘሎ ናይ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ ከይዲ ክርክራት ኣሎ እዩ።
en-mt: Proper hand washing is an important part of maintaining hand sanitization, but there are still issues in public urinary houses.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: ብዙሓት መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእዩዎ ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ልዕሊ እቶም ኣብ ብዙሓት መሕጸቢ ክፍሊታት ዝርከቡ ናይ ኤሌክትሪክ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺታት ጽሬየቶም ዝሓለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Many studies have shown paper sheets are more hygiene than electrical hand washers in many bathrooms.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: ኣብ 2008፣ ኣብ ለንደን ዝርከብ፣ University of Westminster (ዌስትሚንስትር ዩኒቨርሲቲ)፣ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ዝህብዎ ናይ ጽሬት ደረጃ ምስ ውዑይ-ኣየር ናይ ኢድ መድረቒን ዘመናዊ ዝኾኑ ጀት-ኤርን(jet-air) ዘነጻጸር መጽናዕቲ ተኻይዱ። እዚ ድማ ብ ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሶፍት ሲምፖዝየም ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣ መምረቲ ስፖንሰር ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ እዩ።
en-mt: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster in London, the University of Westminster , a study comparing paper paper paper paper-making standards to hot-air hand platforms and modern jet-air, a study by the European Soft Symposium Paper Paper Checking Provider.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: ኢድካ ተሓጺብካ ብውዑይ ኣየር ኢድካ ምድራቕ፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ባክቴርያታት በዝሒ ኣብ ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ፓዳት ብ 194% ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ 254% ክውስኽ ከምዝገብር ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands with hot air increases the overall number of bacteria in finger pads by 194% and 254% in the palm of your hand.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: ብናይ ጀት ኤር( jet-air) መንቀጺ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ፣ ናይ ባክቴርያ ምጥፋእ ዕድሉ ኣብ ውሽጣዊ ኣካል ኣጻብዕቲ ብኣቭሬጅ 42% ክኸውን ከሎ፣ ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ 15% እዩ።
en-mt: The chance of losing bacteria is 42% with avrage in the internal body of the finger; and 15% in the abdomen.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: ኣእዳውካ ተሓጺብካ ብወረቐት ፎጣ ድሕሪ ምንቃጽ፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ባክቴርያ ብዝሒ ብኣቭሬጅ ኣብ ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ፓዳት ብ76% የጉድሎ፣ ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ ብ77%። ናብ ካልኦት ናይ ሽንቲ ቤት ተጠቀምቲ ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዕድል እንተሃሊዎ ብዝምልከት መጽዕቲ ተኻይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: After washing your hands and drying with a paper of paper, the overall bacteria reduce the incidence of avrage in finger pads by 76%, and in the palm of the hand by 77%.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: ካብ እቲ ዩኒት ብ 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) ናህሪ ኣየር ዘውጽእ ናይ ጄት-ኤር(jet-air) መንቀጺ፣ ካብ ኣእዳው ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ኣልዒሉ ናብ ካልኦት ናይ መሕጸቢ ክፍሊ ቦታታት ብምብካል ናይ እቲ መሕጸቢ ቦታ ከባቢ ክሳብ 2 ሜትር ዝኣክል ናይ ምብካል ክእለት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: A jet-air stroke that emits air from the unit at 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), lifts microorganisms from the hands and pollutes the bathroom area of up to 2 meters.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: ናይ ውዑይ ኣየር ኢድ መንቀጺ ንማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ካብቲ መንቀጺ 0.25 ሜትር ዝኣክል ክነጽጎም ይኽእል እዩ ።
en-mt: Hot air hand dryer can spray microorganisms about 25 feet [0.25 m] from the spray.

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ናይ ማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ክንድቲ ስርጭት ኣይተራኣዮምን። ኣብ 2005፣ብ TÜV Produkt und Umwelt ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ፣ ዝተፈለየ ናይ ኢድ ምንቃጽ ሜላታት ገምጊሙ ነይሩ።
en-mt: Paper bags of microorganisms have not been seen as much distribution, and a 2005 study by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt reviewed different hand-drying techniques.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: ድሕሪ ኢድ ምንቃጽ፣ ኣብ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ እዞም ዝስዕቡ ለውጢታት ዝተረኣዩ እዮም:
en-mt: After drying, the number of bacteria has been observed:

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ መፍረይቲ ኣለዉ፣ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጽቲ ምስ ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ክነጻጸሩ ጸኒሖም እዮም።
en-mt: here are many different types of hand washers, which are compared to paper bags.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብዘይርከበሉ እዋን ኢድ ብትርኩስ ሳኒታይዚንግ ሶፍት ምሕጻብ ይመክር።
en-mt: It is recommended to wash your hands with soap and water.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መጽረይቲ እንተንኢሱ 60% ኣልኮል ዝሓዙ ክኾኑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Hand saners should contain at least 60% alcohol.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ኣተሓጻጽባ ኢድ፣ ኢግናዝ ሰመልውይስ ዝተባህለ ሃንጋሪያዊ ዶክተር ኣብ ውሽጢ ሆስፒታል ሕማም ከይመሓላለፍ ንምግባር ብቑዕነቱ ድሕሪ ምርግጋጹ(ኣብ 1846)፣ ግድን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕል ኮይኑ።
en-mt: Medical handwashing, Ignaz Smmeleuis, a Hungarian doctor, was confirmed for his eligibility to prevent the spread of disease within a hospital (in 1846); it became compulsory.

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል ሰራሕተኛታት ኣእዳዎም ንክሕጸቡ ዘዘኻኽሩ ኤሌክትሮኒክ መሳርሒታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are electronic devices that remind hospital staff to wash their hands.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ኣጠቓቕምኡ ንመጠነ ምትሕልላፍ ረኽሲ ከምዘጉድል ረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: A study found that its use reduced the spread of infections.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ኣተሓጻጽባ ኢድ ብውሕዱ ን15 ሰከንድታት እዩ ዝግበር፣ ብዙሕ ሳምናን ማይን ብምጥቃም ወይ ጄል ብምጥቃም ንነፍስ ወከፍ ክፋል ኣእዳው ድረዝዎ።
en-mt: Hand elling is done for at least 15 seconds, using a lot of soap and water or using a jell.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: ኣእዳው ብሓባር ኣጻብዕቲ ኣቆላሊፍካ ክድረዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Hands should be placed together with fingers.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣጻፍር ርስሓት እንተልዩ፣ ጸጓር ብሩሽ ጠጠቒምኩም ምውጻእ ትኽእሉ ኢኹም።
en-mt: If you're under the cover, you can use the hairbrush.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: ጀርምታት ኣብ እቲ ኣብ ኢድና ዘሎ ማይ ክጸንሑ ስለዝኽእሉ ብኣግባቡ ምፍሕፋሕን ብዝነቐጸ ፎጣ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Since germs can stay in the water in our hands, it is important to spread and dry your hands properly.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ New England Journal of Medicine ኣብ መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ሕክምና ከባቢታት ሕጽረት ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተቐባሊነት ዘይብሉ ነገር ከምዝኾነ ሓቢሩ፣ ብዙሓት ዶክተራትን ነርስታትን ሕሙማት ቅድሚ ምትንካፎም ኢዶም ምሕጻብ ብምርሳዖም፣ በዚ ድማ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት የመሓላልፍሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: In the New England Journal of Medicine, a shortage of hand washing is unacceptable in most medical areas, with many doctors and nurses having forgotten to wash patients' hands before touching them, thus transmitting microorganisms to them.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.

en-mt: In order to reduce the spread of germs, it is best to wash your hands before and after finding someone who is sick.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዘለዉ ናይ staphylococcal(ስታፍይሎኮካል) ረኽሲታት ንምቁጽጻር፣ ናይ ኢድ ምጽራይ ካብ'ቶም ዝዓበየ ጥቕሙ ኣብ ውሽጢ 20% ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ግዘ እዩ፣ እቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተደጋጋሚነት ናብ 35% ምስወሰኸ ድማ ዋላ ንእሽተይ ይኹን እምበር ተወሳኺ ረብሓ ተረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: To control staphylococcal infections in the hospital, hand washing is one of the greatest benefits of hand washing within 20% of the time, and when the frequency of hand washing increases to 35%, additional benefits have been achieved, even if it is small.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: ብንቡር ሳሙና ምሕጻብ ምስ ጸረ ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ምሕጻብ ክነጻጸር ከሎ ልዕሊ ሰለስተ ዕጽፊ ባክቴርያ ኢንፌክሽን ናብ መግቢ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ኣለዎ። ናይ ኣልኮል ዘለዎ ናይ ኢድ መድረዚ ምስ ብጸረ ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ን 30 ሰከንድ ክነጻጸር ከሎ እቲ ኣልኮል ዝሓዘ ኢድ መድረዚ ናይ ባክቴርያ ብከላ ልዕሊ እቲ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ብ 26% ይቕንስ።
en-mt: Washing with a normal soap has more than three times the chance of transmitting bacteria infection to food compared to washing the antibacterial soap.Alcohol-containing hand platforms for 30 seconds compared to washing hands with antibacterial soap, the alcohol-containing hand platform reduces bacteria pollution by 26% over the counter.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን ማይን ሳሙናን ካብ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መድረዚታት H1N1 ኢንፍሉዌንዛ A ቫይረስን ክሎስትሪዲየም ካብ ኢድ ኣብ ምውጋድ ዝበለጹ እዮም። ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መሰናድኦታት ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ንምምሕያሽ ዝግበሩ ጣልቃ ምእታዋት፣ ብዛዕባ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንሰረሕተኛታት ምምሃር፣ ናይ ኣልኮል ዘለዎ መድረዚ ኣቕራቦት ምውሳኽን ጽሑፋዊን ብኣፍን ነቲ ስራሕተኛ መዘኻኸሪታት ምቕራብ ዘጠቓለሉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: But water and soap are the best in avoiding alcohol-containing hand platforms H1N1 influenza A virus and clostridium. Interventions to improve hand sanitity in health care arrangements, teaching workers about hand washing, adding alcohol-containing platforms and writing and oral reminders to the worker.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: ካብ'ዞም ሕክምናታት እዚኦም ኣየኖት ብሉጻት ከምዝኾኑ ንምፍላጥ ተወሰኽቲ መጽናዕቲታት ከድልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: More studies will be needed to determine which of these treatments are the best.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት፣ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዋጋ ዘገናዘበ ፣ ጽቡቕ ጥዕና ንምሕላውን ንጽቡቕ ኣመጋግባ እውን ከም ወሳኒ መሳርሒ ተገይሩ እዩ ዝውሰድ።
en-mt: In storm countries, soap is considered an important tool for maintaining good health and maintaining good nutrition.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ናይ ማይ፣ ሳሙና ወይ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ መሳለጥያታት ሕጽረት ኣብ ገዛ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታትን ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታን ዘሎ ናይ ኣቕርቦት ሕጽረት ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ባህርያት ንምምዕባል ከቢድ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: However, a lack of water, soap or handwash facilities makes the supply at home, schools and workplaces harder to develop global handwashing characteristics.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ ኣብ መብዛሕትኦም ገጠራት ናይ ኣፍሪካ፣ ዋላ'ኳ ሕሱር ኣማረጺታት ከም ባዕልኻ ናይ መሕጸቢ ጣብያ ምህናጽ ተኽእሎ እንተሃለወ፣ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ቡንባ ዳርጋ ኣብ ነፍስ ወከፍ ሽንቲ ቤታት ሕጽረት ኣሎ።
en-mt: For example, in most parts of Africa, there is a shortage of handwash coffee in almost every bathroom, even though there are low options for building a bathroom like your own.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ትሑት ዝኾነ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ናይ ባህሪ ውጽኢት እምበር ናይ ሳሙናን ማይን ሕጽረት ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: However, low hand washing is a comparative result, not a shortage of soap and water.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: ናይ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ምብርትታዕ ናይ ፖሊሲ ውሳነታት ክጸልው ይኽእል እዩ፣ ብዛዕባ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ጥቕሚ ግንዛበ ክፈጥርን ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ እቲ ህዝቢ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ባህሪ ክፈጥርን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands with soap can affect policy decisions, it can raise awareness of the benefits of hand washing and create long-term hand washing characteristics of the public.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: እዚ በኣግባቡ ንክሰርሕ፣ ቁጽጽርን ክትትልን ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: In order for this to work properly, monitoring and monitoring is essential.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: ኣብ 70 መጽናዕቲታት ዝተኻየደ ስርዓታዊ ገምጋም ከምዝረኸቦ፣ ማሕበረሰብ መሰረት ዝገበረ ኣቀራርባ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ LMICs ኣብ ምዕባይ ኣድማዕቲ እዮም፣ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ዕዳጋ ኣቀራርባታት ክንድቲ ኣድማዕቲ ኣይኮኑን። ሓደ ኣብነት ናይ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ጎስጓስ ብ UNICEF ዝቐረበ "ሰለስተ ኮኾብ ኣቀራርባ " ዝተብሃለ እዩ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ቀለል፣ ሕሳር ዝኾኑ ስጉምቲታት ብምውሳድ ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ጽሬት ረቛሒታት፣ ተመሃሮ ኣእዳዎም ብሳሙና ንክሕጸቡ ምግባር ዘበረታትዕ እዩ።
en-mt: A systematic review of 70 surveys found that community-based approach to hand washing in LMICs is effective in promoting social marketing approaches; one example is a "three-star approach" proposed by UNICEF for schools' hand washing campaign, which encourages schools to wash their hands with soap, with other cleaning factors.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: ዝተሓተ ስታንዳርድ እንተተማሊኡ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ካብ ሓደ ናብ ሰለስተ ኮኾባት ሓፍ ክብሉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: If a minimum standard is met, schools can rise from one to three stars.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ሕማምን ናይ ህጻናት ሞትን ንምቕናስ፣ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ጣብያታት ምህናጽ ከም ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መበረታትዒ ጎስጓስ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In order to reduce the spread of the disease and infant mortality, building handwashing can be used as a campaign of encouragement.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መዓልቲ ናይ ባህሪ ለውጢ ከምጽእ ዝፍትን ዘሎ ጎስጓስ እዩ። በዚ ናይ 2019-20 ኮሮናቫይረስ ምኽንያት፣ UNICEF ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኢሞጂ ኣብ ስራሕ ምውዓል ኣፋሊጡ እዩ።
en-mt: Global Hand Washing Day is a campaign that is trying to bring about a change in behavior, and because of the 2019-20 coronavirus, UNICEF has announced the use of hand washing emojis.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: ገለ መጽናዕቲታት ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት ምስ DALYs ብዝተትሓሓዘ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ወጻኢ ኣድማዒነት ኣብ ግምት ዘአተዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Some studies have taken into account the overall external effectiveness of hand washing in stormy countries related to DALYs.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ሓደ ገምጋም ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሐጻብ ምስካልኦት ናይ ማየን ጽሬትን ከይዲታት ክረአ ከሎ ዋጋ ቖጣቢ ከምዝኾነ ኣረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: However, one review found that washing your hands with soap, along with other drinks of drinking and cleaning, is a cost of anger.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባተ ዘለዎ ናይ ጥዕና ጥቕሚ – ብፍላይ ኣብ ተጋላጺነት ኩነታት ዘለዉ ሰባት ንኣብነት ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን ዝወለዳ ኣደታት ወይ ዝቖሰሉ ወታደራት ኣብ ሆስፒታላት – መጀመርያ ኣብ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ማእኸል ብክልተ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት መስረትቲ እዩ ተፈሊጡ፣ ሃንጋርያዊ ሓኪም Ignaz Semmelweis፣ ኣብ ቬና፣ ኦስትሪያን ዝሰርሐን ናይ ኢንግሊዝ "ናይ ዘመናዊ ምጥዋብ መስራቲ" ፍሎረንስ ናይቲንግሌን እዮም።
en-mt: The health benefits of hand washing in humankind—especially those in vulnerabilities, such as recent mothers or wounded soldiers in hospitals—were first identified by two 19th-century hand hygiene founders; Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis; Florence Nightinglyn, the English "founder of modern massage" in Vienna, Austria.

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: ኣብቲ ግዘ እቲ ብዙሓት ሰባት ረኽሲታት ብ ሚያስማስ ዝበሃል ሕማቕ ጨና ዝመጹ እዮም ኢሎም ይአምኑ ኔሮም።
en-mt: At the time, many believed that infections were ed by a bad salt called miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: ኣብ 1980፣ ብመግቢ ዝመሓለለፉ ለበዳታትን ምስ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን-ዝተተሓሓዙ ረኽሲታትን ንናይ United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention( ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ማእኸላት ሕማም ቁጽጽርን ምክልኻልን) ብዝበለጸ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ነቲ ረኽሲ ከም ዋና መከላኸሊ መንገዲ ጌሮም ከበረታትዑ ዝገበረ ነይሩ።
en-mt: In 1980, food-borne plagues and health-related infections led to the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) to strengthen hand sanitization as the main preventive measure against infection.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: እቲ ኣብ 2009 ዘጋጠመ ናይ ስዋይን ፍሉ ለበዳ ን ናይ 2020 ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ለበዳ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ካብ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ዓርስኻ ንምክልኻል ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ብዛዕባ ዘለዎ ጥቕሚ ግንዛበ ዝፈጠረ እዩ።
en-mt: he 2009 swine flu pandemic and the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic have raised awareness of the benefits of washing hands with soap to protect yourself from infectious diseases in many countries.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ "ትኽክለኛ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ቴክኒካት" ዘርእዩ ፖስተራት ኣብ ጎኒ ናይ ህዝባዊ ሽንቲ-ቤታትን ኢድ መሕጸቢ ሲንክታትን ተንጠልጢሎም ይርከቡ። ኣብ ናይ ቤት ጽሕፈታት ማዕጾን ናይ ጀርመን ኤርፖርትታትን እውን ይርከቡ።
en-mt: For example, posters displaying "accurate hand washing techniques" hang on the side of public urinary tracts and handwash sinks, as well as office doors and German airports.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: እዚ "ኢድ ምሕጻብ " ዝብል ሓረግ፣ ማለት ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ነቲ ነገር ሓላፍነት ዘይምውሳድ ወይ ኣብ ገበን ተሳታፍነት ምህላው ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: he phrase "hand washing" means that a person does not take responsibility for the matter or participate in crime.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: ካብ ናይ መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ መልእኽቲ ማቲዎስ መንጌል እዩ መበቆሉ ጴንጥዮስ ጲላጦስ ንኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ናይ ምስቃል ውሳነ ኢዱ ተሓጺቡ፣ እዚ ቃል እዚ ግን ኣብ ኢንግሊሽ ማሕበረሰባት ሰፊሕ ተጠቃሚነት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Matthew's message from the Bible is that Pentecostal Pilate washed his hands in the decision to kill Jesus Christ, but this word has widespread use in English communities.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: ኣብ Shakespeare Macbeth፣ Lady Macbeth ዝፈጸመቶ ገበንን ንሰብኣያ እውን ክፍጽሞ ዝደፋፈአቶ ገበን ብዝምልከት ናይ ገበነኛነት ስምዒታ ንምጽራይ፣ ኣእዳዋ ብሓይሊ ክትሕጸብ ትጅምር።
en-mt: In Shakespeare Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to wash her hands vigorously to clear her feelings of guilt about the crime she committed and the crime she also pushed her husband to commit.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: ሰባት፣ ዘይስነ-ስርዓታዊ ተግባር ምግባሮም እንተዘኪሮም ወይ እንተሓሲቦም፣ ልዕሊ ካልኦት ብተደጋጋሚ ኣእዳዎም ከምዝሕጸቡ ተፈሊጡ፣ ንናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ናውቲታት ድማ ልዕሊ ካልእ ዋጋ ይህብዎም።
en-mt: People are known to wash their hands more often than others if they remember or think of doing unsymed behavior, and hand washing equipment is more expensive than anything else.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ኣእዳዎም ንክሕጸቡ ዝፍቀደሎም ሰባት ድሕሪ ከምዚ ዓይነት ተግባር ኣብ ካልኦት ወለንታዊ "ንንጽህና ዝውክሉ" መከሓሓስቲ ተግባራት ናይ ምፍጻም ክእለቶም ውሱን እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, people who are allowed to wash their hands are limited in their ability to engage in other voluntary "representing integrity" practices after such practices.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: ሃይማኖታት ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንጉዳይ ጽሬትን ምልክታዊ ተግባርን ዕላማ ገይሮም ይመኽሩ። ምልክታዊ ዝኾነ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ኢድካ ብዘይ ሳሙና ብማይ ጥራሕ ምሕጻብ ዋላ ይኹን፣ ኣብ ናይ ባሃይ እምነት፣ ሂንዱይዝም፣ ኣብ ጁዱይዝም ዝርከቡ ቴቪላህን ኔቲላት ያዳይምን፣ ኣብ ክርስትና ዝርከብ ላቫቦ፣ ኣብ እስልምና ዝርከብ ዉድሁ ሓዊሱ፣ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃይማኖታት ዝርከብ እምነታዊ ተገባር እዩ። ሃይማኖታት ብፍላይ ድሕሪ ገለ ተግባር ኢድካ ን ምጽራይ ምሕጻብ እውን ይመኽሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Religions recommend hand washing for the purposes of hygiene and symbolic action; figurative hand washing; washing hands without soap alone; in bahai faith; Hinduism; Televisa and Netitals yadheim; lavabo in Christianity; Woodhu in Islam; and religions, especially after certain practices, recommend washing hands.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: ሂንዱዝም፣ ጁዲዝምን እስላምን ድሕሪ ሽንት-ቤት ምጥቃም ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ሕጎም እዩ።
en-mt: Hinduism, Judism and Islam are required to wash your hands after using the toilet.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን፣ ሂንዱዝም፣ ቡደሂዝም፣ ስኪዝም፣ ጁዲዝምን እስልምናን ቅድሚ ምግቢ ምብላዕ ኢድ ምሕጻብ የበረታትዑ።
en-mt: Also, Hinduism, Buddhism, Skiism, Judism and Islam encourage hand washing before cooking.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ናይ ኮቪድ-19
en-mt: Risks of COVID-19 in the workplace

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: ኣብ ስራሕ ቦታ ዝግበሩ ናይ COVID-19 ሓደጋታት ቁጽጽራት ማለት ንምክልኻል ሕማም ኮረና ቫይረስ 2019(COVID-19) ዘገልግሉ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ድሕንነታትን ን ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር መንገዲታት ምትግባር ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: COVID-19 risk controls in the workplace are the implementation of workplace safety and risk control methods for the prevention of coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: ኣግባባዊ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽራት ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታን ዓይነት ስራሕን፣ ብመሰረት ናይ ምቅላዕ ሓደጋ ምንጪ ምርመራ፣ ናይቲ ከባቢ ናይቲ ሕማም ከቢድነት፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ንኮቪድ-19 ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ ዝኾኑ ሰባት ክቃልዑሎም ዝኽእሉ ምኽንያትን ዝተመርኮሰ እዩ።
en-mt: Appropriate workplace risk controls are based on the workplace and type of work, according to risk source testing, local severity of the disease, and the reasons why people are more likely to be exposed to COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: ናይ U.S. ስራሕ ድሕንነትን ጥዕናን ምምሕዳር (OSHA) ብዝበሎ መሰረት፣ ትሑትናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስቲ ህዝቢ ወይ መሳርሕቲ ትሑት ምንኽኻእ ዘለዎም ኮይኖም፣ መሰረታዊ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ዝውሰድዎ፣ ከም ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ክሓሙ ከለዉ ኣብ ገዛ ክጸንሑ ምግባር፣ ናይ መተንፈሲ ስነ ስርዓት፣ በቢ ግዚኡ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ምጽራይን ዲስኢንፌክት ምግባርን ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), low-exposure jobs include low exposure to the population or colleagues; basic infection prevention measures, such as handwashing; keeping employees at home when they are sick; respiratory rituals; workplace cleaning and disinfecting.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: ማእኸላይ ተቓላዕነት ሓደጋ ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ብዝተረጋገጸ ዝተተሓዙ ሰባት ብቐጥታ ብተደጋጋሚ ምንኽኻእ ክሰርሑ ዝገብሩ ስራሕቲ ዘካትቱ እዮም፣ በዚ ቀጻላይ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰባዊ ለበዳ ምኽንያት ወይ ናይ ዓለም ለኻዊ ምጉዕዓዝ ግን ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Average risk-risk jobs include working directly with people suspected or confirmed of COVID-19, but they can be prevented due to a continuing social pandemic or international travel.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ምስ ሓፈሻዊ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ከም ቤት ትምህርቲታት፣ ልዑል ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ዝጽዕቖም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት፣ ከምኡውን ገለ ልዑል ብዝሒ ዘለዎም ናይ መሸጣ መሰንድኦታት ዝሰርሑ ሰራሕተኛታት እውን የካትት።
en-mt: his also includes the general population, such as schools, high-density workplaces, and certain large number of workers working on high-density sales facilities.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ጉጅለ፣ ንናይ መሰረታዊ ናይዚ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ብተወሳኺ፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ብኮቪድ-19 እንተታሒዙ ናይ ቬንትሌሽን ተጠቃሚነት ልዑል ናይ ኣየር መጻረይታት፣ ናይ ምህንጣስ መሸፈኒን ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲን ምጥቃም ይከኣል።
en-mt: In addition to the risk control group for the basic measures for preventing infection, ventilation can be used by anyone who is infected with COVID-19 with high air conditioning, erection masks and personal protective equipment.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA ንዝተረጋገጸ ወይ ዝተጠርጠረ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙም ዝጋለጹ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ ስነስርዓት ሰራሕተኛታትን ልዑል ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ከምዘለዎም ሓበሩ፣ እዞም ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ዘካይዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ ወይ ናይ ዝተረጋገጸ ወይ ዝተጠርጠረ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙም ናሙናታት ዝእክቡ እንተኾይኖም ድማ ተቓላዕነቶም ይውስኾ።
en-mt: OSHA reported that health care providers and funeral staff who are exposed to a confirmed or suspected COVID-19 patient have a higher risk of exposure, and increase their risk if these employees perform aerosol-sing tests or collect samples of confirmed or suspected COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: ናይዞም ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ሓደጋ ምቁጽጻር ከም ኣሉታዊ ጸቕጢ ቨንትሌሽን ክፍሊታት፣ ከምኡውን ነቲ ስራሕ ኣግባባዊ ዝኾነ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ ዝኣመሰሉ ዝሓዘ ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽር እውን ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: he risk control of these employees also includes engineering controls that contain such as negative pressure, venting fees, and personal protective equipment that is appropriate for the work.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ብዙሕ ጽልዋታት ክህልዎ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: he COVID-19 pandemic can have many impacts on the workplace.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: ሰራሕተኛታት ሓሚሞም፣ ንካልኦት ሰባት ክከናኸኑ ኢሎም፣ ወይ ንከይቃልዑ ፈሪሖም ካብ ስራሕ ክተርፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Employees may be sick, caring for others, or afraid of being exposed to work.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: ናይ ንግዲ ከይዲታት ብክልተ መልክእ ክቕየሩ ይኽእሉ`ዮም፣ እንደልዮም ነገራት ዘሎ ኣቐርቦትን ነዞም እንደልዮም ነገራት ድማ እረኽበሉ መገዲን ብዝምልከት (ከም ኣብ ናይ ዘይተለመዱ ሰዓታት ምዕዳግ ወይ ኣብ መኪናኻ ኮይንካ ኣገልግሎት ምርካብ)።
en-mt: Business transactions can change in two ways, when it comes to the availability of what we want and the way to get what we want (such as buying unusual hours or getting services in your car).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ካብ ብኮቪድ-19 ብኸቢዱ ዝተጎድኣ ሃገራት ዝግበሩ መጎዓዓዘዝያታት ክቋረጹ ክግበር ይኽእል እዩ።ናይ ተላባዒ ሕማም ምድላዋትን ናይ ምላሽ ትልሚታትን ናይ ምክልኻል ተግባራት ንምክያድ ክሕግዙ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Finally, travel from countries hardest affected by COVID-19 can be suspended, and infectious disease preparations and response targets can help prevent preventive measures.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: ውጥናት ን ምስ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ዕዮታትን ዝተሓሓዝ መጠን ሓደጋ፡ ምንጭታት ተቓላዕነት ዘጠቓለለ፡ ምስ ገዛን ናይ ሕበረተሰብ ኣቀማምጣን ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ሓደጋ መበገሲታትን፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምስ ነፍስወከፍ ሰራሕተኛ ዝተሓሓዙ ናይ ሓደጋ መበገሲታትን ከምእርጋን ወይ ድማ ሕዱር ሕክምናዊ ጸገማት ኣብ ግምት ዘእተው እዮም።
en-mt: Studies include risk levels of exposure to sources associated with workplaces and occupations, including home and community settings, and risk sources associated with each employee' age or chronic medical problems.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: ኣብ እዋን ምልዓል ለበዳ ክፍጠሩ ንዝኽእሉ ኩነታት ንምቁጽጽር፡ ነቶም ናይ ሓደጋን ወዝባዊ ውጥናት ንምፍላጥ ዘኽእሉ ቁጽጽራት ኣቐሚጦም ኣለው።
en-mt: Controls have been put in place to determine risk and incident studies to control the situation during the outbreak of the pandemic.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: ናይ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ድልውነትን ምላሽ ትልሚን ንናይ ብሄራውን ክፋል ብሄራውን ምኽሪታት ተገዛኢ እዩ።
en-mt: he need for the response to infectious diseases is subject to national and national advice.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: ንለበዳ ምላሽ ናይ ምሃብ ዕላማታት ኣብ መንጎ ስታፍ ምልባዕ ምቕናስ፣ ንዝኸፈአ ጎድናዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሕልኽለኻት ተቓላዕቲ ዝኾኑ ሰባት ምክንኻን፣ ናይ ንግዲ ኦፕሬሽናት ምሕላው፣ ከምኡውን ኣብቲ ናይቲ ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ዘለዉ ከጋጥሞም ዝኽእል ጎድናዊ ጽልዋታት ምቕናስ ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: The objectives of responding to the pandemic include reducing staffing among staff, caring for people at risk of more side-effects, protecting business operations, and reducing the potential side effects of those in the supply chain.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: እቲ ንግዲ ናይ ዝርከበሉ ቦታ ናይ ሕማም ከቢድነት ነቲ ዝውስድ ምላሽ ይጸልዎ።
en-mt: he severity of the disease affects the business response.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: መቆጻጸሪ ቅድመ-ተኸተል ሓደጋ መብዛሕቲኡ ጊዜ፡ ኣብ ውሕስነት ስራሓት ጥዕናን ዝተሓሓዝ ኮይኑ ክሳዕ ዕቱብ ናይ ጉጅለ ሓደጋታት መቆጻጸሪ ስርሓት ዘለዎ ባይታ እዩ።
en-mt: Pre-follow-up risk control is usually associated with health insurance and is a place where group risk control systems are in place.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ሓደጋታት ክውገዱ ኣብ ዘይክእሉሉ፣ ብሉጻት ዝበሃሉ ቁጽጽራት ምህንድስናዊ ቁጽጽራት፣ ብምቅጻል ናይ ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት፣ ኣብ መወዳእታ ድማ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲታት እዮም።
en-mt: If the risks of COVID-19 cannot be avoided, the best controls are engineering controls, ongoing administrative controls, and finally personal protective equipment.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: ናይ ኢንጅነሪንግ ቁጽጽራት ኣብ ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ውልቃዊ ባህሪ ከይተደረኽካ ን ሰራሕተኛታት ካብቶም ምስ ስራሕ ዝተትሓዙ ሓደጋታት ምንጻል እንትኾን፡ ብደረጃ ዋጋ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዘዋጽእ ክትግበር ዝኽእል መፍትሒ እዩ።
en-mt: Engineering controls are the most cost-effective solution to isolate employees from work-related risks without being driven by an employee's personal characteristics.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ወይ ናይ ምህርቲ ዝግበሩ ናይ ፖሊሲ ለውጢታት ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ወይ ሓላፊ ስጉምቲ ዝደልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Administrative controls at work or education are policy changes that need action by an employee or supervisor.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ (PPE) ምስ ናይ ምህንድስናን ምምሕዳራዊን ቁጽጽራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ትሑት እዩ፣ ገለ ምቅላዓት ግን ንምክልኻል ክጠቅም ይኽእል።
en-mt: Personal protective materials (PPE) are low compared to engineering and administrative controls, but some exposures can be used to prevent them.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: ኩሎም ዓይነታት ናይ ውልቀ መሐለዊ መሳርሒታት ንምምራጽ ብመሰረት ነቲ ሰራሕተኛ ክወርዶ ዝኽእል ሓደጋ፣ ብዝግባእ ዝገጥሙ ከከም ኣገባብራ(ንኣብነት፣ መሳርሒታት ምስትንፋስ), ብዘይምቁራጽ ብዝግባእ ዝግበር፣ ብስሩዕ ዝምርመር፣ ዝጽገን፣ ቅያር ዝግበረሉ፣ከም ኣድላይነቱ ብዝግባእ ክውገድ፣ ምልኽኻፍ ንምውጋድ ጽርየቱ ኣብ ዝሕለወሉ ዝዕቀብ ወይ ዝጎሓፍ ክኾኑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In order to choose all types of personal protection devices, depending on the risks that may occur to the employee, they must be properly handled according to the procedure (e.g., respiratory devices), who are properly monitored, repaired, changed, removed as necessary, stored or stored in order to avoid infection.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ U.S. ናይ ስራሕ ድሕንነትን ጥዕናን ምምሕዳር (OSHA)፣ ትሑት ናይ ተቓላዒነት ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ህዝቢን ምስ መሳርሕቲን ትሑት ናይ ምንኽኻእ ዕድል ዘለዎም እዮም።
en-mt: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), jobs with low vulnerability are those with low odds of lower decline with the public and peers.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: ንኹሎም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ዝምከር መሰረታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ከም ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ብማይን ሳሙናን ምሕጻብ፡ ሰራሕተኛታት እንተ ሓሚሞም ኣብ ገዛ ንኽጸንሑ ምብርታዕ፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስኣካላት ሕግታት ከም ኣፍካ ሸፊንካ ምስዓልን ምህንጣስን ምኽባር፡ ሶፍትን ናይ ጎሓፍ መጠራቐሚን ምሃብ፡ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ናይ ቴሌኮም መራኸቢታት ወይ ድማ ናይ ሺፍት ስርዓት ምዝርጋሕ፡ ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ካልኦት ሰባት ኣቑሑን መሳርሒታትን ንከይጥቀሙ ምግባር፡ ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ መዓልታዊ ጽሬት ምሕላውን ጸረ-ህዋስያን ምግባርን ምቕጻልን የጠቃልሉ።
en-mt: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent hand washing with water and soap, strengthening respiratory regulations such as coughing and sneering, respecting softness and waste packaging, providing telecom communications where necessary, or the deployment of a shift system, keeping employees from using other people's goods and equipment, maintaining daily hygiene and anti-inspiration in the workplace.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: ኣላባዕቲ ውልቀሰባት ብቅልጡፍ ምልላይን ምፍላይን ንሰራሕተኛታት፣ ዓማዊል፣ በጻሕቲን ካልኦት ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ዘለዉን ሰባት ካብቲ ሕማም ኣብ ምክልኻል ወሳኒ ስጉምቲ እዩ።
en-mt: Rapid identification and separation of all four individuals is an important step in protecting employees, customers, visitors and others in the workplace from the disease.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ( U.S.) ማእኸል ቁጽጽር ሕማም ን ምክልኻልን( CDC) ከቢድ ናይ ኣካለ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ፡ ክሳብ ን ኣስታት 24 ሰዓታት ካብ ረስኒ፣ ምልክታት ረስኒ፣ ካብ ዝኾኑ ዓይነት ምልክታት ን ብዘይ ዝኾነ ይኹን ናይ ረስኒ መቐነሲ መድሓኒት ወይድማ ምልክታት ዝቕንሱ መድሓኒታት ከይተጠቐሙ ነጻ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ገዛ ንኽጸንሑ ይላቦ፡ ካልእ ድማ፡ ናይ ሕማም ፍቓድ ፖሊሲታት ድማ ስራሕተኛታት ኣብ ገዛ ንዘሎ ኣባል ስድራ ቤት ንኸተሓምሙ ብዘኽእል መልክዑ ክተዓጻጸፉ እዮም፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ድማ ነዞም ፖሊሲታት ክፈልጡዎም ይግባእ።
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) urges employees with severe respiratory problems to stay at home for up to 24 hours without the use of fever, fever symptoms, or any medications that reduce fever, or symptom-reducing medications, and other disease licensing policies will be extended in such a way that employees can make a family member feel at home, and employees will be able to make these policies at home. They should know them.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: ብመሰረት OSHA፣ ምእከላይ ተቓላዕነት ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲታት ምስ ዘይተፈለጡ ወይ ዝተጠርጠሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት፣ እሞ ግን ብ SARS-CoV-2 በቲ ኣብ ናይ ንግዲ ቦታታት ዘጋጥም ዘሎ ማሕበረ ሰባዊ ምልባዕ፣ ወይ ናብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሰፊሕ ምልባዕ ዘለዎም ሃገራት ብምጉዓዞም ዝተለኸፉ ክኾኑ ምስ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ብተደጋጋሚ ወይ ብቐረባ ንኽክእ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሽድሽተ ጫማ (1.8 m) ርሕቐት ክኾኑ ዘገድድ ስራሕ ዘለዎም ሰባት እዮም።
en-mt: According to the OSHA, middle-risk jobs are people with work that requires people with a six-foot (1.8 m) distance to be repeatedly or closely replaced if they are unknown or suspected of COVID-19 patients, but who may have been infected by SARS-CoV-2, community exposure in commercial areas, or travel to countries with widespread COVID-19 infection.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ምስ ሓፈሻ ሀዝቢ ንኽክእ ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ዘካትት እዩ ንኣብነት ቤት ትምህርቲታት፣ ልዑል ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ጻዕቒ ዘለዎም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት፣ ገለ ልዑል ብዝሒ ናይ መሸጣ መሰንድኦ ዘለዎም ቦታታት እውን ዘካትት እዩ።ነዚን ካብዚ ዝልዕል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ኣጋጣሚ ዘለዎም ጉጅለታትን ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽር ልዑል ብቕዓት ዘለዎም ናይ ኣየር መጻረዪታት ምግጣም፣ ናይ ቬንትሌሽን ሬት ምውሳኽ ኣካላዊ ገደባት ከም ንጹር ፕላስቲክ ናይ ምህንጣስ መከላኸሊ ምግጣምን፣ ንዓማዊል ድማ ኣብ መኪንኦም ኮይኖም ኣገልግሎት ዝረኽቡሌ መስኮት ምኽፋትን ዘካትት እዩ።ነዚን ካብዚ ዝልዕል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ኣጋጣሚ ዘለዎም ጉጅለታትን ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት ድማ ዝሓመሙ ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑ ምብርትታዕ፣ ብኣካል ዝግበሩ ኣኼባታት ብቨርችዋል ምቕያር፣ ዘይተለመዱ ሽፍቲታት ምፍጣር፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብሰፊሑ ናብ ዘለወን ቦታታት ዝግበሩ ወሰንቲ ዘይኮኑ ጉዕዞታት ምቕናስ፣ ከም ናይ ሰራሕተናታት ጭንቀት መመለሲ ፎረም ዘካተተ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ርክባት ምምዕባል፣ ንሰራሕተኛታት ብዛዕባ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መቃለዕቲን መከላኸሊ ባህርያትን ብዝምልከት ሓደሽቲ ዝኾኑ ትምህርቲታትን ስልጠናታትን ምሃብ፣ መከላኸሊ ክዳውንቲን መሳርሒታትን ክጥቀሙ ንዘለዎምሰራሕተኛታት ኣጠቓቕምኡ ምስልጣን፣ ውልቃዊ ንጽህና ዘበረታትዑ ሓገዛትን ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ምፍጣር፣ ተደጋጋሚ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ምብርትታዕ፣ ናይ ዓማዊልን ብዝሒ ህዝቢን ናይ ስራሐ ቦታ ተጠቓሚነት ምግዳብ፣ ብዛዕባ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ካልኦት ናይ ኮቪድ -19 መከላኸሊ መገዲታትን ዘርእዩ ምልክታት ምልጣፍ ዝኣመሰሉ የካትት።ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ዓይነት መሰረት ብምግባር፣ ሰፊሕ ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲታት ከም ጓንቲ፣ ጋውን፣ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ወይ ማስክ፣ መነጽር ክገብሩ ኣለዎም።

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: ሓደ ሰብ ኣብ ኣውሮፕላን እንተደኣ ሓሚሙ፡ ንሰራሕተኛታትን ንተሳፈርቲን ኣብ ምሕላው ኣግባብ ዘለዎም ቁጽጽራት ፡ ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ካብ ካልኦት ብ 6 ጫማ ምንጻል፡ ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ድማ ናይ ገጽን ኣፍንጫኝ መሸፈኒ (mask) ምሃብ ውይድማ ኣብ ዘስዕለሉ ውይድማ ኣብ ዝህንጥሰሉ ሰዓት ኣፉን ኣፍንጫኡን ብ ሶፍት ን ኽሽፍን ምግባር ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: If a person is sick in a plane, the controls on protecting staff and passengers include keeping the sick person safe by 6 feet from others and wearing a mask for the sick person, and covering his mouth and nose at the time of the crash.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: ናይ ካቢን ጉጅለታት ዝሓመመ ተጎዓዚ ኣብ ዝከናኸኑሉ ወይ ናይ ሰብነት ፈሳሲ ወይ ተበኪሉ ክኸውን ዝኽእል ቦታ ኣብ ዝነኽኡሉ እዋን ተተጠቒሞም ክድርብይዎም ዝኽእሉ ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲታት ክጥቀሙ ኣለዎም፣ እቲ ዝሓመመ ተጎዓዚ ረስኒ፣ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ሰዓል፣ ወይ ናይ ምትንፋስ ጸገም እንተልይዎ ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ እውን ክጥቀሙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Cabin teams should use medical gloves that can be discarded when caring for a sick passenger or where a body fluid or contaminated area may be contaminated, and they should also use personal protective equipment if the sick passenger has a fever, a constant cough, or difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: ጓንቲታትን ካልኦት ተጠቒምካ ምድርባይ ዝከኣሉ ኣቑሑትን ኣብ ባዮሃዛርድ ሳንጣ ክድርበዩ ኣለዎም፣ ዝተበከሉ ቦታታት ድማ ክጸርዩን ዲስኢንፌክት ክግበሩን ኣለዎም።ንናይ ንግዲ መጎዓዓዝያ፣ ናይ መዘናግዒ ጉዕዞ መርከባትን ካልኦት ናይ ተጎዓዓዝቲ ጀልባታትን፣ ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ክትሓምም ከለኻ ጉዕዞኻ ምንዋሕ፣ ዓርስኻ ምፍላይን ኣብቲ መርከብ እንከሎ ዝኾነ ሰብ ረስኒ ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት እንተተርእዩ ድማ ንኣብኡ ዘለዉ ናይ ሕክምናኣባላት ምፍላጥ ዝኣመሰሉ ዘካትት እዩ።
en-mt: Gloves and other items that can be used to dump should be thrown in a biohazard suitcase, and contaminated areas should be cleaned and disposed of; commercial transport, recreational travel vessels and other passenger boating; extending the journey when you are sick; isolating yourself while on board; and identifying medical members who are with it if they have a fever or other symptoms.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: ብሓሳብ ደረጃ፣ ሕክምናዊ ክትታላት ኣብቲ ናይቲ ዓርሱ ፈልዩ ዘሎ ሰብ ካቢን ክካየዱ ኣለዎም።ንቤት ትምህርቲታትን ናይ ህጻናት ክንክን ትካላትን፣ እቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ኣብ ቤት ትመህርቲ ህንጻ እንተነይሩ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰብ ምስርጫው ብዘየገድስ CDC ነቲ ህጻን ክሳብ ዘጸሪን ዲስ ዲስኢንፌክት ዝግበርን ንክዕጾ ይመክር።
