sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: ትሑት ወይ ማእኸላይ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰብ ስርጭት እንተልዩ፣ ናይ ኣካላዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ኣብ ስራሕ ክውዕሉ ኣለዎም ከም ናይ ሜዳ ጉዕዞታት፣ ኣኼባታትን ካልኦት ዓበይቲ ምትእኽኻባትን ንኣብነት ኣካላዊ ብቕዓት ትምህርቲታት ወይ ናይ ኳየር ክላሳት ወይ ኣብ ካፍቴርያ ምግቢ ምምጋብ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ጠረጴዛታት ዘሎ ክፍተት ብምስፋሕ፣ ናይ መእተዊን መውጽኢን ሰዓታት ብምውሳነን፣ ወሰንቲ ዘይኮኑ በጻሕቲ ብምቕናስ፣ ንከም ናይ ጉንፋዕ ዝበለ ምልክት ዘለዎም ህጻናት ፍሉይ ናይ ሕክምና ቦታ ምጥቃም።
en-mt: If there is a low or moderate community distribution, physical distancing methods should be employed, such as field trips, meetings and other major gatherings such as physical fitness classes or quarried classes or meals in the cafeteria, widening gaps between tables, limiting entry and exit hours, reducing non-marginal visitors, using a special treatment area for children with flu symptoms.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢያዊ ማሕበረሰባት ምልባዕ እንተልዩ፣ ንናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ብተወሳኺ፣ ንነዊሐ ግዘ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ተዓጽዮም ክጸንሑ ክግበር ይኽእል እዩ።ሕጊ ኣስፈጸምቲ መዓልታዊ ንጥፈታት እንዳካየዱ፣ ቀጥታዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሓደጋ ድማ ብ CDC ትሑት እዩ ተባሂሉ ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: In addition to social distancing methods, schools can be closed for long-term stays, law enforcement officials conduct daily activities, and direct health risks are considered low by the CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: እቶም ምስ COVID-19 ከይህልዎምዝተጠርጠሩ ወይድማ ከምዘልዎም ዝተረጋገጸ ሰባት ርክብ ክህልዎም ዝኽእል ናይ ሕጊ መኽበርቲ ኣካላት ፡ ናይ ወልቀ መሐለዊ መሳርሒ ሓዊሱ፡ ልክዕ ክም ናይ ሰብ ሞያ ሕክምና ተመሳሳሊ መምርሒታት ክስዕቡ ይግባእ።
en-mt: Law enforcement agencies who may have contact with people suspected or confirmed to have COVID-19 should fire a personal wig and follow the same guidelines as a medical professional.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: ብድንጋጸ ናይ ቀረባ ምንኽኻእ እንተተፈጢሩ፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ግዳጅ ቀበትኦምን መሳርሒታቶምን ደጊሞም ቅድሚ ምጥቃሞም ናይ ገዛ መጽረዪ ስፐረይ ወይ ዋይፕ ተጠቒሞም ከጽርዩን ዲስኢንፌክት ክገብሩን ኣለዎም፣ ዝተጠቐሙሎም PPE ታት ኣቀማምጣን ኣጎሓሕፋን ከምኡውን ክዳውንቲ ላውደሪ ብዛዕባ ምእታው ብዝምልከት ድማ ስታንዳርድ መምርሒታት ይጠቐሙ።
en-mt: In the case of a sympathetic close contact, employees should clean and disinfect before using their external belts and tools again, and use the PPE, position and style, and use standard instructions on entering Lauderry's clothing.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA ገለ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ ስነ ስርዓትን ሰራሕተኛታት ንምቅላዕ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ሓደጋ ከምዘለዉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: OSHA reported that some health care and funeral staff were at greater risk of exposure.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ተቓላዒነት ዘለዎም ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ኣቕርቦት፣ ሓገዝ፣ ቤተ ፈተነን ናይ ሕክምና መጎዓዓዝያ ሰራሕተኛታትን ዘካትቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Work with high-chance exposure includes health care supplies, assistance, laboratories and medical transport staff with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እቶም ሰራሕተኛታት ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ዘካይዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ ወይ ካብ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝፍለጡ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ናሙናታት ዝወስዱ እንተኾይኖም ኣዚዮም ተቓላዕቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Employees are very vulnerable if they conduct aerosol sing tests, or if they take samples from suspected or known COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ከይዲታት ኢንቱቤሽን፣ ሰዓል ዘጀምሩ ከይዲታት፣ ብሮንኮስኮፒ፣ ገለ ናይ ስኒ ሕክምናታትን ምርመራታትን፣ ወይ ኢንቫሲቭ ናይ ናሙና ምእካብ ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Aerosol sings include intubation, cough-start procedures, bronchoscopy, some dental treatments and tests, or insulin sample collection.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ሓደጋ ዘለዎም ናይ ቀብሪ ስራሕቲ ንናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ከምዝተተሓዙ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝተረጋገጹ መወትቲ ሬሳ ዘዳልዉ ሰባት; እዚኦም ናይ ሬሳ ምርመራ እንተካይዶም ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ እዩ።ተወሳኺ ናይቶም ብኮቪድ-19 ከም ዝተተሓዙ ዝተረጋገጹ ወይ ዝተጠርጠሩ ዝፍለዩሉ ክፍሊ ዘካትት ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽራት፣ ናይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርት ከይዲታት ዘካይዱ እውን ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Funeral work for people with high risk of exposure to people who have been suspected or confirmed dead from COVID-19; hey are more likely to be exposed if they undergo an autopsy, plus engineering controls that include separate rooms where they have been confirmed or suspected of COVID-19, and those who carry out aerosol singing courses.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: ስፔሻላይዝ ዝተገበሩ ኣሉታዊ ቬንትሌሽን ኣብ ገለ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ መሰንድኦታትን ኣግባባዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Negative ventilation done by specialized care can be appropriate in some health care and funeral arrangements.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: ናሙናታት ብ Biosafety ደረጃ 3 ጥንቃቐታት ክተሓዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Samples must be taken with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት (WHO) ናብ ሕክምና ዝመጹ ተሓከምቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተጠርጠርቲ ድዮም ኣይኮኑን ብምፍላይ ኣብ ፍሉይ መጸበዪ ቦታ ክጸነንሑ ምግባር ይመክር።ን ካልእ PPE ብተወሳኺ፣ OSHA ምስ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ተታሒዞም ከምዝኾኑ ዝፍለጡ፣ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ኣብ ውሽጢ 6 እግሪ ጫማ ንዝሰርሑ ሰባት መተንፈሲታት ይመክር፣ ነቶም ኣብ ናይ ኤሮሶል መምረቲ ምርመራ ዝሰርሑ ሰባት እውን።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) advises patients who come to therapy to stay in a special waiting area by identifying whether they are not suspects of COVID-19. And another PPE, OSHA advises respirators for people who are known to have been infected with SARS-CoV-2, respirators for people who work within 6 feet of shoes, and for those who work in aerosol testing.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ፣ ብ NIOSH-ፍቓድ ዝተወሃቦ N95 ፊልተር ዝገብር ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ መተንፈሲ ወይ ዝሐሸ ኣብ ሓፈሻዊ፣ ጽሑፋዊ ናይ ምትንፋስ መከላኸሊ ፕሮግራም እኹል ፈተነ፣ ስልጠናን ናይ ሕክምና ፈተናታትን እውን ሓዊሱ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል።
en-mt: In the United States, niosh-approved Face masks or better respirators are also used in a general, written respiratory program, as well as training and medical tests.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: ካልኦት ናይ መተንፈሲ ዓይነታት ዝበለጸ ምክልኻልን ዝሓሸ ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ምቾትን ይህቡ።WHO ሙሉእ መሸፈኒታት ኣይመክርን፣ ኮቪድ-19 ብናይ ሰውነት ፈሳሲ ዝመሓላለፍ ዘይኮነስ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም ብምዃኑ።
en-mt: Other types of respiratory systems provide the best protection and better employee comfort.WHO does not recommend full masks, because COVID-19 is not transmitted by body fluid but as a respiratory disease.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO ንመርመርቲ ሰባት ናይ ሰርጂካል ማስክ ምጥቃም ጥራሕ እዩ ዝመክር።
en-mt: he WHO only advises investigators to wear surgical masks.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: ብዘይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ናይ ምትንፋስ ናሙናታት ዝወስዱ፣ ዝሕብሕቡ፣ ወይ ዘጎዓዕዙ ሰባት፣ WHO ሰርጂካል ማስክ፣ መነጸራት፣ ወይ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ፣ ጋውንን ጓንቲን ክጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: Without aerosol, tests recommend that people who take, hide, or travel respiratory samples from COVID-19 patients should wear a surgical mask, facial masks, gloves and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ክካየዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ እቲ ሰርጂካል ማስክ ብ N95 ወይ FFP2 መተንፈሲ ክቕየር ኣለዎ።
en-mt: In the case of aerosol sing tests, the surgical mask must be changed with N95 or FFP2 respiratory infections.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ PPE ኣቕርቦት እኹል ብዘይ ምዃኑ፣ WHO ናይ PPE ኣድላይነት ብቴሌሜዲሲን ንምቕናስ፣ ኣካላዊ መፈላለዪታት ከም ንጹር መስትያት ክጥቀሙ፣ ናይ ቀጥታ ክንክን ዝገብሩ ሰባት ጥራሕ ናቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ክኣትዉ፣ ነቲ PPE ንንጹር ስራሕ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ጥራሕ ብምጥቃም፣ ንተመሳሳሊ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዝተፈላለዩ ሕሙማት ክንክን ኣብ ዝህቡሉ ግዜ ከየውጽእዎ ምጥቃም ክቕጽሉ፣ ነቲ ናይ PPE ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ክቆጻጸርዎን ከተሓባብሩን፣ ንናይ ሕማም ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ማስክ ዘይምጥቃም ብምብርትታዕ ንክሰርሑ ይመክር።
en-mt: In order to reduce the need for PPE global PPE, the WHO recommends reducing the need for PPE with tetidisine, using physical distancing as clear mirrors, accessing people with DIRECT care only when necessary, using PPE only when necessary for clear work, continuing to monitor and cooperate with the PPE supply chain, and to strengthen the use of masks for people who do not show symptoms.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: ካብ: ካተሪነ ማሀር፣ Wikimedia Foundation CEO
en-mt: From Kateine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ን: ኩሎም ናይ Wikimedia Foundation staff (ዊኪሚድያ ፋውንዴሽነን ስታፍ)
en-mt: For all Wikimedia Foundation staff (Wikimedia Foundation and Staff)

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: ዋኒን መስመር: [ኮቪድ-19] እቲ ጽዕንቶ ብምቅላል ንመጻኢ ምድላው
en-mt: [COVID-19] Preparing for the Future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: መስደዲ ዕለት/ሰዓት: 14 መግጋቢት፣ 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: Date/time: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: ፍቓድ ምሃብ: CC0: ዝተዓቀበ መሰል የለን
en-mt: here is no right to CC0

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: ኣብዚ ወርሒ እዚ ንባዕልና ኣብ ከቢድ ኩነታት ኢና ረኺብናዮ ዘለና።
en-mt: We've found ourselves in a tough position this month.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ነንባዕልና ዘለና ዓለምለኻዊ ምትሕሓዛትናን ሓላፍነታትናን ግልጺ ገይሩ ዘርኢ ነገር እዩ።
en-mt: he COVID-19 pandemic is a clear indication of our own global responsibilities and responsibilities.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: ንማሕለኻታቱ ኣብነት የብልናን።እንተኾነ ግን ዋና ምላሽና ኣብ ናይ ዓለም ሓዘኔታ፣ ምትሕብባርን ማሕበረ ሰብ ምህናጽን ኣብ ማእከል ናይዚ ድርጅት ልቢ ምፍጣር ከምዝኾነ ንፈልጥ ኢና።
en-mt: We don't have an example for its commitments, but we know that our main response is to create a heart at the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: ብኢመይል፣ ምድውዋልን ቻትን ዝረኣናዮ ኣብ መንጎ መሳርሕቲታትና ዘሎ ምሕዝነትን ምትሕልላይን ምስኦም ክንሰርሕ ዕድል ዝረኸብና ዘደንቑ ሰባት ከምዝኾኑ ዘረጋግጽ እዩ።
en-mt: What we have seen through email, call and chat confirms that the friendship and care between our colleagues is amazing people who have had the opportunity to work with them.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: ንኩልኹም ከም መሳርሕተይ ጌረ ክቖጽረኩም ብምኽኣለይ ኣዝየ ሕጉስ እየ።
en-mt: I'm very happy to be able to count you all as my teammates.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ኣብ ስራሕና ዘለዎ ምስጋና ኣካፊሉኒ።
en-mt: Last week, everyone shared their gratitude for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ዓለም ናብ Wikipedia ገጻ ክትጥምዝዝ ምኽኣላ ክንደይ ትርጉም ከምዘለዎ ኣዘኻኺሮምኒ፣ እዚ ወሳኒ ሓገዝ ኦንላይን ኮይኑ ንኩሉ ሰብ ቅሩብ ኮይኑ ምጽንሑ ሓያል ምልክት እዩ።
en-mt: It reminded me of how important it is for the world today to turn to Wikipedia, a powerful sign that online help is short-lived for everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: ስራሕኩም እዚ ንክሳኻዕ ይገብር፣ እዞም ሳይታት ንክጸንሑ ወይ መሳርሕቲና ክኽፈሉ ክትገብሩ እንተኽኢልኩም ወይ ማሕበረ ሰብና ድሕንነቱ ሓልዩ ንክጸንሕ ይገብር።
en-mt: Your work will make it work, if you can stay these sites or pay our co-workers, or keep our community safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: ዓለም Wikipedia ዘቕርቦ ሓበሬታ የድልያ እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ካብ ካልእ ግዜ ንላዕሊ።
en-mt: he world needs information, especially now more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: እዚ ግዜ እዚ እንገብሮ ነገር ጥራይ ዘይኮነስ፣ ነቲ ነገር ከመይ ንገብሮ ዝብል ነገር፣ ኣብ ዓለም ትርጉም ዘለዎ ጽልዋ ዘሕድረሉ ግዜ እዩ።
en-mt: It is not only a time to do what we do, but also to have a meaningful impact on the world about how we do it.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: ብምኽንያት ናይ'ዚ ተልእኾ ኣድላይነትን ተበርክቱዎ ግደን ፡ ካብ'ዚ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ሰሙን ጀሚሩ ሓቢርና ኣብ ንሰርሐሉ መንገዲ ዝተወሰኑ ርኡያት ለውጢታት ክንገብር ኢና።
en-mt: Due to the need and the role of this mission, we will make some significant changes in the way we work together next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: ናይ ስራሕ መደባትና ምትዕርራያት
en-mt: Adjustments to our work schedules

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Robyn ቅድም ክብል ከምዝበሎ፣ እዚ ናይ c-team ብዛዕባ ኣሰራርሓና ንክመያየጡን ንዝመጹ ዝተወሰኑ መዓልቲታትን ኣዋርሕን መደብ ከውጽኡን ተራኺቦም ነይሮም።
en-mt: Robyn said earlier that the c-team had met to discuss our procedures and plan for a few days and months to come.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዝርርብ እዚ፣ ነዚ ኣጋጢሙና ዘሎ ኩነታት ኣግባብ ምላሽ እዩ ኢልና ዝሓሰብናዮ ነገርን ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ እቲ ድርጅት ቀጻሊነት ክህልዎ እንታይ ክንገብር ከምዘለናን ኣብ ግምት ኣእቲና።
en-mt: In this discussion, we looked at what we thought was a good response to the situation and what we need to do to keep the organization continuing.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: ብዓብይኡ ጭንቀት ኣወጊድና ተልእኾና ንነዊሕ ግዜ ክንሕግዝ ኢና ደሊና።
en-mt: We wanted to help with our mission for a long time.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: መሊስኩም ክትድውሉ ትደልዩ እንተኾይንኩም፣ ጸገም የብሉን።
en-mt: If you want to go back, it's okay.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: ንኩሎም ስታፋት፣ ኮንትራክተራትን ናይ ኮንትራት ሰራሕተኛታትን:
en-mt: For all employees, contractors and contract employees

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: መዓልታዊ ናይ ስራሕ ትጽቢታትና ኣብ መዓልቲ 4 ሰዓታት ዝኾኑ እዮም፣ ወይ 20 ሰዓታት ኣብ ሰሙን ክሳብ ካልእ ሓበሬታ ዝወሃብ።
en-mt: Our daily work expectations are 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week to other information.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: በዓል ኣይኮንናን ንእውጅ ዘለና - ልዕሊ ልሙዳት ሰዓታት ክትሰርሑ ትኽእሉ እንተኾይንኩም፣ እዚ ተልእኾ ክጥቀመልኩም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: We are not declaring it a holiday - if you can work more than usual hours, this mission can be used for you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ዓለም ኣብዚ ግዘ እዚ ምግማታ ከቢድ እዩ፣ ንትፈትውዎም ሰባት ንምክንኻን ኮነ፣ ግሮሰሪ ንምዐዳግ፣ ወይ ናብ ዶክተር ንምኻድ፣ ድሕንነትኩም እዩ ንሕና ቅድሚያ ንህቦ።
en-mt: However, the world is hard to imagine at this time, taking care of loved ones, buying groceries, or going to a doctor, your safety is a priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: ግዜኹም ኣይንከታተሎን ኢና።
en-mt: We don't track your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: እንድሕር ሓሚምኩም ናብ ስራሕ ኣይትኺዱ።
en-mt: Don't go to work if you're sick.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: እዚ ብዘይ ምባል ምርዳእ ዝከኣል ነገር እዩ፣ ግን ንብሎ ኣለና።
en-mt: It's understandable, but we're saying it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: ናይ ሕማም መዓልታት ወይ PTO ኣድልዩን - ንማናጀርኩም ንገርዎ ጉጅለኹም ድማ ካላንደሮም ንከስተኻኽሉ ሓግዝዎም እቶም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ምሽፋኖም ንምርግጋጽ ድማ መደብ ኣውጽኡ።
en-mt: You need sick days or PTO - tell your manager and help your team adjust their calendars and plan to ensure the jobs are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መርመራ ውጽኢትካ ኣወንታዊ እንተኾይኑ፡ ብኽብረትካ ንBryan ኣብ T&amp:C Ops ኣፍልጦ መታን T&amp:C ደገፍን ነቲ ኩነታትካ ካብ ምሕደራ ዘድሊ ኣተክሮት ክግበረሉ ክሕግዙኻ)።
en-mt: (If your COVID-19 test result is positive, please contactBryan at T& C Ops to help you get the necessary tests to manage your situation.)

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: ብሰዓት ዝሰርሑ ሰባት ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ክኽፈሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Working hours will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: ምስ ኮንትራክተራትናን ሰዓታዊ ስታፍ መሳርሕትናን ዝኣተናዮ ቃል ክነኽብር ኢና።
en-mt: We will continue to work with our contractors and timely staff.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: ኩሉ ሰብ ብመሰረት እቲ ኣብ ልሙድ ኩነታት ዝነበረ ኣብ ስራሕ ዘወዕሎ ሰዓት ክፍሊት ይፍጸመሉ።
en-mt: Everyone is paid according to the normal conditions.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: እዚ ድማ እንተሓሚምኩምን ናብ ስራሕ ክትከዱዘይትኽእሉ እንተኾይንኩምን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to go to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: ክትሰርሑ ትደልዩ እንተኾይንኩም፣ ክንሕግዘኩም ኢና።
en-mt: If you want to work, we will help you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሰባት ንስራሕ ኣብ ዘለናዮ ዓለም ንዘሎ ጭንቀት መወገዲ መንገዲ ጌሮም ይጥቀምዎ።
en-mt: A lot of people use our work as a way to get rid of anxiety in our world.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: እንሰርሖ ስራሕ ኣዝዩ ዘዕግብ ውጽኢት ዘለዎ ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ኣብ ከምዚ ዓይነት ግዜ።
en-mt: Our work can be very satisfying, especially at these times.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: ሕጂ'ውን፣እዚ ብዛዕባ ንነብስኻምክንኻን እዩ።
en-mt: Now this is about taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: ምስ ማናጀርኩም ክትርዳድኡ ኢና ንሓተኩም፣ እንታይ ክንጽበ ከምዘለና ፈሊጥና ንክንዳሎ ምእንታይ።
en-mt: We ask you to understand what to expect.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: ገለ ስራሕቲ ወሰንቲ ተባሂሎም ይምደቡ።
en-mt: Some jobs are called important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: ምግባር ክንቅጽሎም ዝግብኡ ሓደሓደ ነገራት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Here are some things we need to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: ናይ SRE; HR Ops; Trust&ampን ናይ ድሕንነትን ምእካብ ምወላን ጉጅለታት(ምስ ካልኦት) ነቲ ኣድላዪ ስራሕ ሓገዝ ከድልዮ ዝኽእል ይሰርሑ።
en-mt: the serum; the hrs; Trust & and safety and fundraising teams (along with others) work that may require assistance.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: ናይዚ ግዜ እዚ ዕላማታት ንምኽላስን ንተልእኾና ዋና ኣገዳሲ ዝኾነ ነገር ንምሕጋዝ ብዝብል ትኹረትና ንምቕያርን ከይዲ ንጅምር ኢና።
en-mt: O day, we are going to begin to focus on achieving our goals and helping to help what is important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: ኩላትና ክንገብሮ ዝግባእ ብዙሕ ነገር ኣሎ፡ ኣብቶም ኣዝዮም ኣድለይቲ ዝኾኑ ፕሮጀክቲታት ጠመተ ክንገብር ኢና።
en-mt: There's a lot we all need to do, and we're going to focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: ሕዚ ቀስ ምባል ጸኒሑ ኣይጎድእን።
en-mt: Slowing down won't hurt any more.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ እዚ ምስ ሓለፈ “ንምርካብ ክልተ ዕጽፊ ንምኻድ” ኣይተለምናን ኣለና።
en-mt: When this pandemic has passed, we are not asked to "go twice as hard to find."

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: ናይ ሰዓት ገደባት ንምኽባር ተወሰኽቲ ሰዓታት ክትሰርሑ ትጽቢት ኣይግበረኩምን።
en-mt: You are not expected to work extra hours to comply with curfews.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: ገለ ነገራት ከምዝተቐየሩ ንቕበል፣ ሓደሽቲ ዕላማታትን ግዜ ገደባትን ንምድላው ድማ ንሰርሕ ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ።
en-mt: We accept that some things have changed, and we work to prepare for new targets and deadlines if necessary.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: ነቲ APP (ዓመታዊ ትልሚ) እንታይ የጋጥሞ?
en-mt: What happens to the app's annual budget?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: ናብዚ ሓድሽ ነባራዊ ዓለምና ንምእታውን ናይ መዓልታዊ ናይ ስራሕ ሰዓታት ንምስትኽኻልን፣ ናይ 2020-2021 ዓመታዊ ትልሚና ዝርከበሉ ግዘ ገደብ ክነስተኻኽል ንሓስብ ኣለና።
en-mt: In order to enter our new world and set daily working hours, we are considering adjusting our 2020-2021 annual target.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: ዕላማና ናይ 2019-2020 ትልሚና ምንዋሕ ሓሳብ ምቕራብ እዩ እዚ ድማ ሰራሕተኛታት ወሳኒ ስራሕ፣ ዓርሶም ምክንኻንን፣ ዝፈትውዎም ሰባት ምክንኻንን ቅድሚያ ንክህቡ ዝፈቅድ ደጀት ንምፍጻም እኹል ግዜ ይህብ፡ ከምኡውን ኣብ ዝቅጽል ዝተወሰኑ ሰሙናት መደቦም ተቐኒሱ ክሰርሑ ዝደልዩ ንምምዳብን እዩ።
en-mt: Our aim is to propose an extension for 2019-2020, which will give employees enough time to complete key jobs, care for their loved ones, and to allocate those who want to work in the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ግዜ ገደብ ምንዋሕ ናይዚ ግዜ እዚ ዘተተለሙ ናይ ስራሕ ጽዕንቶታትን ጸቕጢታትን ኣብ መላእ እቲ ድርጅት ብሓይሊ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: He reduces the pressures and pressures of work throughout the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: ፕሮፖዛልና ናብቲ ቦርድ ኣብ ቀጻላይ ሰሙን ክነቕርብ ኢና ፍቓድ ምስረኸብና ድማ ኣብ ቀጻላይ ስጉምቲና ተወከልቲን ጉጅለታትን ብዝምልከት ክነሐድሶ ኢና።
en-mt: We will submit our proposal to the Board next week and, once approved, we will update it with respect to representatives and groups in our next step.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: ን APP ጉጅለ ንናይዚ መሪሕነትኩም ነመስግን።
en-mt: Thank you for this app group.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: ናይ ቤት ጽሕፈት ኩነታት፣ ተቓላዕነትን ምጽራይን
en-mt: Office status, vulnerability and clean-up

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፣ ካብቶም SF-መሰረት ዝገበሩ መሳርሕትና ሓዲኡ ንኮቪድ-19 ተቓሊዑ ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ፈሊጥና።
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ካብ ናይ ጥንቃቐ ኣድላይነት ዝተለዓለ፣ ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መጽረዪ ጉጅለ ቆጺርና ኣብ ናይ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ቤት ጽሕፈት ዘለዉ ቦታታት ዲስኢንፌክት ንክገብሩ ኣትዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: However, more than a precautionary requirement, we have a team of anti-virus filters that have entered the San Francisco office to disinfect.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል ደረጃ ጸረ ቫይረስ ብጽባጽ ተጠቒሞም ኩሉ ዝንካእ ቦታ ዲስኢንፌክት ጌሮምዎ፣ ነቲ ሎቢን ናብ ደብሪና ዝመጹ ናይ ሊፍት ባክታትን እውን ከይተረፈ።
en-mt: he hospital's anti-virus measures have been used to make all the area disinfectable, even the lobby and elevator bucks that came to our door.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: እቲ ህንጻ ናይ ተቐማጦኡ ድሕንነት ድጋፍ ዝህቡ ናይ ባዕሉ ሓላፍነታዊ ክንክን ፕሮቶኮል ዝጥቀሙ ፍርያማትይሰርሓሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: he building is designed for products that use its own responsible care protocol to support the safety of its occupants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: ክንምለስ ክንውስን ከለና ቤት ጽሕፈትና ብኣግባቡ ዝተዳለወ ከምዝኸውን ርግጸኛታት ኢና።
en-mt: We are confident that our office will be well equipped when we return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: ናይ DC ቤት ጽሕፈትና ኣብ WeWork እዩ ቦትኡ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ፕሮቶኮሉ ድማ ምሳናን ምስ ኩሎም ናይ DC-መሰረት ዝገበሩ ናይ ስታፍ ኣባላት ኣካፊልዎ እዩ።
en-mt: Our DC office is located in WeWork and has shared the COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: ካብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ DC ቤት ጽሕፈትና ናብ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ርሕቐት ዘለዎ ቦታ ምስ ብሳንፍራንሲስኮ ሼር ዝተገበረ መምርሒ ኣተግቢሩ።
en-mt: Since last week, our DC office has implemented a guide to a full-distance location with San Francisco Sher.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: ከም ገለ ናይ NYC-መሰረቶም መሳርሕትና፣ ኣብ ብሩክሊን ቦታ ብዛዕባ ምክራይ እንዳተመያየጥና ኢና ኔርና።
en-mt: Like some of our NYC-based colleagues, we discussed renting a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: እዞም ዝርርባት ቀጺሎም እዮም ግን ድማ ክደናጎዩ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: These conversations have continued, but they can be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: ገለ መሳርሕትና ንመጀመርያ ግዜ እዮም ርሒቖም ዝሰርሑ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: For the first time, some of our colleagues are working away.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ ርሑቕ ቦታ መሳርሕትና ምስትኽኻል እዩ ኢሎም ይኣምኑ፣ ስለዚ ድማ ገለ ምኽሪታት ከቕርቡልኩም ይደልዩ:
en-mt: We believe that long-term work is a long-term relationship, so they want to offer you some advice.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: ኣኼባታት ዝካየዱሉ ንውሓት ግዜ ካብ ሓደ ወይ ድማ ክልተ ሰዓት ንላዕሊ ከይውስኽ ምግባር።
en-mt: To increase the duration of meetings for more than one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: ነዋሕቲ መደባት ዘድልዩ እንተኾይኖም፣ ኣብ ዝተወሰኑ መዓልታት ብኸመይ ክሰባበሩ ከምዝኽእሉ ኣብ ግምት ኣእትዉ።
en-mt: If long-planned, consider how they can be broken in a few days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: እቶም ኣኼባታት ብገልጺ ፍለይዎም፣ ኣጀንዳ ይሃልኹም ኣቐዲምኩም ድማ ዝንበብ ማቴርያል ስደዱ።
en-mt: Let's take a look at the meetings, and read them in advance.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: ነዚ ቪድዮ ዲፎልት ግበርዎ፣ ብናይ ጎግል ዶክስን ዙምን ናይ ቀጥታ ሕብረትን ርክባትን ንምስላጥ።
en-mt: Make this video default, to capture direct unions and relationships through Google Docs and Zume.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: ሕድሕድ ኣኼባታት ንምክያድ መምርሒ ይሃሉኻ፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ነቲ ቻት ይቆጻጸሮ ናይ ተዛረብቲ ዝርዝር ድማ ይከታተል፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ድማ ማስታወሻ ይውሰድ (ወይ ብሕብረት ማስታወሻ-ይውሰዱ)።
en-mt: Have instructions to hold each other's meetings, anyone controls the chat and follows a list of speakers, and anyone can take notes (or take a note together).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: ዝምችው ሄድሴት ኣድሊኩም እንተነይሩ ናብ ናይ ቴክ ሓገዝ ኢመይል ስደዱ።
en-mt: If you need a quiet address, send an email to Tech Help.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: ናይ ድሕንነት ካሕሳከም ንምግቢ ተጠቐሙሉ።
en-mt: Use security as a food.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: ናብ #remoties ቻነል ኣብ ስላክ ብዛዕባ ዘተሰራጨዉ ስራሕቲታት ምስ መሳርሕቲታትኩም ንምዝርራብ ተሓወሱ
en-mt: #remoties to talk to your colleagues about the work on the channel

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: እዚ ናይ HR ኦፕሬሽን ጉጅለ ኣብ መላእ እቲ ፋውንዴሽን ምውሳኹ ንምሕጋዝ ንናይ webinar-መሰረት ዝገበሩ ኤርጎኖሚክስ ይከታተሉ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: This HR operations team is monitoring webinar-based ergonomics to help with its rise across the foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ንኩሎም ማሕበረሰባት ብWikimedia ዝምወሉ ከም editathons ዝኣመሰሉ ህዝባዊ ምድላዋት፡ WHO እቲ ለበዳ ጠፊኡ እዩ ኢሉ ክሳብ ዝእውጅ፡ ከስርዙ ሓቲትናዮም።
en-mt: Last week, we asked all communities to cancel public events such as editathons, which are funded by Wikimedia, until who declares that the pandemic is over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ምስራዝ ሕቶና ወይ ካልኦት ገደባት እቲ ተስማዕሚዕናሉ ዝነበርና ናይ ፈቓድ ንጥፈታቶም ምርካብ ዘይከኣል ከምዝገብሮ ከምዝርደኣናን ንምድንጓዩ ወይ ነዞም ሽቶታት ምምሕያሽ ማንም ሰብ ከምዘይቕጻዕ ክነፍልጦም ንደሊ።
en-mt: We want to make it known that we understand that this cancellation request or other limitations make it impossible to access their consent activities, and that no one will be punished for delaying or improving these goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: ኣብ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ሰሙን ናይ Wikimania ተወሳኺ መምርሒታትን ካልኦት ክልላዊን ቴማቲክ ማሕበረሰባዊ ኮንፈረንስታተን ክንከታተል ኢና።
en-mt: Next week, we will follow Wikimania's additional guidelines and other regional and thematic community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ማሕበረ ሰብ ሓፈሻዊ ስምዒት ሓዘንን ምድንጋጽን እዩ፣ ኣብ ናይ ባዕሎም ማሕበረ ሰባት፡ Wikimedia ወይ ካልእት ኣትኲሮም ክሰርሑ ብምኽኣሎም ድማ ዕረፍቲ ይስምዖም።
en-mt: he international community is a general feeling of sadness and compassion, and they feel relaxed about being able to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia or otherwise.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: ኣብ ምቕጻል፣ CRT ነቲ ማሕበረ ሰብ ጽዕንትኡ ንክቆጻጸርን ምስኦም ዘለና ርክብ ንክንከታተልን ዘኽእል ቦታ ንምፍጣር ኣብ Meta-Wiki ፔጅ ንምፍጣር ይሰርሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In the meantime, CRT is working to create a Meta-Wiki page to create a space for the community to monitor its load and monitor our relationship with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: ምስ COVID-19 ዝተሓሓዙ ጉዳያት ኣፍልጦ ምህላው
en-mt: Getting to know cases related to COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: ንቀጻላይ ሓሙስ ናይ ዕደመ መልእኽቲ ናብ ካላንደርኩም ክንሰድድ ኢና፣ 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT ንፍሉይ ናይ ስታፍ ኣኼባ።
en-mt: We will send a message to your calendar on Thursday at 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: ነዚ ግዜ እዚ ተወሰኽቲ ምሕዳሳት ንምክፋል፣ ሕቶታትኩም ንምምላስን ነን ባዕልና ንምርኻብ ግዜ ንምውሳድን ክንጥቀመሉ ኢና።
en-mt: We will use this time to share more updates, answer your questions and take the time to meet ourselves.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: ኣብዚ ነገር እዚ ብሓባር ኢና ኣቲናዮ ዘለና ብዝተኸኣለና ድማ ክንተሓጋገዝ ኣለና።
en-mt: We're in this together and we need to do our best to help.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ፣ ነዚ ሓበሬታ ኣብ ኢመይል ምርካብ ክትቅጽሉ ትኽእሉ፣ ካልኦት ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተተሓሓዙ ወሰንቲ ሓበሬታታት እውን፣ ኣብ Office Wiki ይርከቡ።
en-mt: You can now continue accessing this information by email, and other important information related to COVID-19 can also be found at Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT እዞም ገጻት ክሕደሱን ኩሎም እዞም ሓበሬታታት ድማ ኣብ ሓደ ቦታ ክኾኑ ይገብር።
en-mt: CRT will make these pages updated and all of these data to be in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ብኸቢዱ ተጠቒዖም ኣብ ዘለዉ ሃገራት ምስ ዝነብሩ ስታፍ ዘለና ርክብ ክንቅጽል ንሰርሕ ኣለና።
en-mt: We are currently working on maintaining our relationship with countries that are severely affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ጉዕዞ፣ ምድላዋት፣ ዓብዩ ናይ ስራሕ ከይዲ፣ ወይ ናይ ሽፋን ማሕለኻ፣ ወይ ካልእ ሓገዝ እትደልየሉ ነገር፣ ብኽብረትኩም ን CRT ከተመልክቱን ምስኦም ንኽትሰርሑን ከይትፈርሑ።
en-mt: About travel, preparations, a major job, or your coverage oath, or something else that you need, please do not be afraid to apply for CRT and work with them.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: ንሕና ሓገዝን ክራይን ከም ኣድላይነቱ ክንህበኩም ኢና ኣብዚ ዘለና።
en-mt: We are here to provide you with help and support as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: ምስጢራዊ ወይ ዘሕፍረኩም ጉዳይ እንተሊኩም፣ ብኽብረትኩም ናብ Bryan Judan ኢመይል ግበሩ - ናይ HR International Global Operations (ኤች ኣር ዓለም ለኻዊ ኦፕሬሽን) ዳይሬክተር።
en-mt: If you have a confidential or embarrassing case, please email Bryan Judan - director of HR International Global Operations (HR Global Operations).

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: እዞም ለውጢታት እዚኦም ስራሕናን ግቡእናን ከምዝገደፍና ክርኣዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: hese changes should not be seen as a loss of our work and duties.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: እኳ ድኣስ፣ ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ፣ ስራሕናን ግቡእናን ኣብ ሕሉፍ ካብ ዝነበረ መንገዲና ፍልይ ብዝበለ ክቕየሩ ከምዘለዎም መርአይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: In fact, it is an indication that our work and our duties today need to change differently than in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: ነንባዕልና ንክንተሓጋገዝን ሓቢርና ክንሰርሕን ክጠቕሙና ይኽእሉ እዮም ኢልና ንሓስቦም ስጉምቲታት እዚኦም እዮም፣ ዘድልይዎም ሓገዛት ንምንቅስቓሳትና እንዳቕረብና፣ ንዓለም ድማ ብዝድገፉሉ ሓገዝ እንዳሓገዝነና።
en-mt: hese are steps that we think can help us to help ourselves and work together, providing the help we need, and helping the world with their support.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: ትልሚ ዝተገበሮ ስራሕና እቲ ግዜ ክሳብ ዝመጽእ ክጽበየና ክጸንሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Our work will continue to be waiting for the time to come.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: ንግዚኡ ነንሕድሕድና ንተሓጋገዘሉን ነቲ ኣገዳሲ ዝኾነ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ሰሙን ወይድማ ኣብቶም ዝቅጽሉ ኣዋርሕ ንዝመጽእ ስራሕ ባይታ ንፈጥረሉን ግዜ እዩ።
en-mt: It's time for us to help each other and create the most important space for work to happen next week or in the coming months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: ኩልኹም እዚ ክኸውን ንክትሰርሑ ንጽበየኩም፣ ስለዚ ድማ ንባዕልኹምን ቤተ ሰብኩምን ክትከናኸኑ ዘድልየኩም ነገራት ክርከቡ ከለዉ ባዕልኹም ክትረኽብዎ ብቑዓት ክትኾኑ መታን።
en-mt: We expect all of you to do this, so that you can be fit to take care of yourself and your family.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: ሐዚ፣ ብኽብረትኩም -- ኣእዳውኩም ተሓጸቡ ገጽኩም ድማ ኣይትንክኡ!
en-mt: Please wash your hands and don't touch your face.

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, ን Tony S), ከምኡውን እቶም ዝተረፉ ኣመራርሓ ጉጅለታት (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, ን Toby N ን)።
en-mt: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, Tony S), and the rest of the leadership teams (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'Angiotensin- ኢንዛየም ቀያሪ 2 (ACE2) ኣብ ሳንቡእ፣ ኣብ ልቢ፣ ኣብ ኩላሊትን ኣብ መዓናጡን ኣብ ዝርከቡ መትኒታት ደጋዊ ኣካል (ግድግዳ ዋህዮ) ተጣቢቑ ዝርከብ ኢንዛየም እዩ።
en-mt: b'Angiotensin-Inzaum Change 2 (ACE2) is an entomom that is attached to the back wall of the lungs, heart, kidneys and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 ን ዓቐን ኣንጅዮተንሲን-II ብምጉዳልን ንኣንጅ(1-7) ብምውሳኽን ንንጥፈታት ናይ ኣንጂዮተንሲን ኮንቨርቲንግ ኢንዛይም (ACE) ይጻረር ።እዚ ድማ ንናይ መትነ-ልባዊ ሕማማት ንምፍዋስ ተስፋ ዘለዎ መድሃኒት ይገብሮ ። ACE2 ን ገሊኦም ኮሮናቫይረሳት ከም መእተዊ ናብ ዋህዮታት እውን የገልግል እዩ ።
en-mt: By reducing the dose of angiotensin-II and adding ange (1-7), ACE2 counters the activity of angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE), making it a promising drug for treating inflammatory diseases.ACE2 is also used as an introduction to some corona viruses into the cells.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: ኣብ ሰባት ዝርከብ ነፍሳዊ ቅመም መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ hACE2ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ።
en-mt: Soul spices found in humans are often called hACE2te.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 ዚንክ ዝሓዘ ሜታሎኢኤንዛይም እንትኸዉን ኣብ ናይ ኢንዶቴልያልን ካልኦት ዋህዮትን ደጋዊ ኣካል ይርከብ።
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme contains 2 zinc and is found in the back of the endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 ፕሮቲን N-ተርሚናል ፔፕቲዴዝ M2 ዶሜን ከምኡውን C-ተርሚናል ኮሌክትሪን ሬናል ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ መጎዓዓዚ ዶሜን ዝሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 proteins contain N-terminal Peptidez M2 Domain and C-Terminal Colectrine Renal Amino Acid Transport Domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 ነጸላ መሕለፊ ዘለዎ ዓይነት I መምብሬን ፕሮቲን እዩ፣ ናይ ኤንዛይም ንጡፍ ዝኾነ ዓብላልነት ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ሳንቡእን ካልኦት ቲሹታትን ብላዕሊ ተቓሊዑ ዝረኣይ እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I mbrain protein that is sensitive to the lungs and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ካብ ዋህዮ ወጻኢ ዝኾነ ናይ ACE2 ዶሜን ካብ ትራንስመምብሬን ዶሜን ብካልእ ሼዴዝ ዝበሃል ኢንዛይም ይቑረጽ፣ እቲ ድሕሪኡ ዝፍጠር ሓቓቒ ፐሮቲን ድማ ናብ ናይ ደም ትቦታት ይስደድ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ብሽንቲ ክውገድ ይግበር።
en-mt: An extracellular ACE2 domain from the transmembre and domain is cut by another enzyme called Sheldtz, and the purple perotene that is then produced is transferred to blood vessels and then removed by urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ከም ትራንስመምብሬን ፕሮቲን, ACEI 2 ን HCoV-NL63 ን እንኮላይ ን ገለ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከም በዓል SARS-CoV (SARS ንቫይረስ); ከምኡ’ውን SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 ን effect ቫይረስ) ዋና መተኣታተዊ ነጥቢ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል እዩ።
en-mt: such as transmbrobrain proteins, ACEI 2 and HCoV-NL63 and some coronaviruses such as SARS-CoV (SARS for virus; SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 and effect virus) are the main triggers.

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: ብፍላይ ድማ ናይ SARS-CoV S1ን SARS-CoV2ን ፕሮቲን ስፓይክ ምስ ኣብ ደጋዊ ኣካል ናይ እቶም ዋህዮታት ዝርከብ ACE2 ኤንዛይም ዶሜይን ዝግበር ምትእስሳር ኢንዶሳይቶሲስን ትራንስሎኬሽንን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስን ናይ እቲ ኤንዛይምን ኣብ ዋህዮ ዉሽጢ ናብ ዝርከብ ኢንዶሶም ዝፍጠር እዩ።
en-mt: In particular, the interaction of SARS-CoV S1 and SARS-CoV2 protein spikes to ACE2 enzyme domain on the back of the cells is the endocytosis and translocation of the virus and the enzyme's internal endosomy.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር ብዙሓት ሰብ ሞያን ተቖጻጸርቲ ኣካላትን ንምቕጻል ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ACE ገታኢ ን ARB ፍወሳን ይመኽሩ ።
en-mt: However, many professionals and supervisors recommend standardized ACE-controlled ARB treatments to continue.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: ኣብ ጁላይ 11, 2012 ዝተሓተመ ስሩዕ ዝኾነ ገምጋምን ሜታ አናላይሲስን ፣ "ናይ ACE inhibitors ምጥቃም ምስ ቁጽጽራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ 34% ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ናይ ምምዕባል ዕድል ከምዝቐነሰ" ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: A regular assessment and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012 showed that "the use of ACE inhibitors reduced the chances of developing lung stroke by 34% compared to controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: ልዕሊ እዚ፣ "ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ምፍጣር ዕድል ብናይ ACE ኢንሂቢተራት ኣብ ዝተሓከሙ ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ናይ ምምዕባል ዕድል ዝነበሩ ሕሙማት ክቕነስ ተኻኢሉ እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ስትሮክን ናይ ልቢ ውድቀትን ከጋጥሞም ኣብ ዝኽእለሉ ሰባት።
en-mt: "The chances of developing a lung stroke have been reduced in patients treated by ACE inducers who were at risk of developing severe lung stroke, especially in people who are at risk of stroke and heart failure."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: ዋላ እኳ እቲ ውጽኢት ንኒሞንያ ከም ዝንኪ እተዘይኣመተ ምጥቃም ናይ ACE ገታእቲ ምስ ምንካይ ብሰንኪ ኒሞንያ ዝስዕብ ሞት ይተሓሓዝ እዩ ።
en-mt: Although the results are associated with a reduction in pneumonia, the unsustenable use of ACE intercepters is linked to a decrease in pneumonia - related deaths.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሪኮምቢናንት ናይ ሰብ ACE2 (rhACE2) ንህጹጽ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣት ሓድሽ ሕክምና እዩ፣ ፑልምናሪ ሃይፖዳይናሚክስን ናይ ኦክሲጅን ሳቹሬሽንን ብ lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome( ሊፖፖሊሳካራይድ-ዝመጸ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ምጭንናጭ ምልክታት ሕማም) ናይ ዘለወን ውላዳት ሓሳማታት ከመሓይሽ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Reconbinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is a new treatment for acute lung damage; pulmnaary hypodynamics and oxidation have been seen to improve the pigs of children with lipopolysaccharide-acute respiratory distress syndrome (lipopolysaccharide-derived acute respiratory distress syndrome).

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: ናይ rhACE2 ካብቲ ዝነበሮ ፃዕቂ ፍርቂ ዝበፅሓሉ ጊዜ ከባቢ 10 ሰዓታት ኮይኑ ፣ ካብቲ ናይ 24 ሰዓታት ኣብ ስራሕ ዝጸንሓሉ (ጻንሒት) ጊዜ በተወሳኺ ናብ ስራሕ ዝኣትወሉ ጊዜ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ 30 ደቓይቕ ይኸውን።
en-mt: he duration of RHACE2 is about 10 hours longer than the 24-hour period and within 30 minutes of entering work.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ብዙሓት ርካቦታት rhACE2 ንናይ renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ዘይቕበሉ ሰባት ተስፋ ዘለዎ መድሓኒት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ ኣንጂዮቴንሲን II ልዑል ኣብ ዝኾነሎም ሕማማት።ዝተከሉ rhACE2 ንከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም ክሕክም ኣብ ክሊኒካል ፈተነ ተረጋጊጹ እዩ።
en-mt: Many findings of rhACE2 can be a promising drug for people who do not accept renin-angiotensin system inhibitors, and angiotensin II has been proven in clinical trials to treat serious respiratory dystrus syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 ናይ ሞባይል ሶፍትዌር መተግበሪ ማለት ነቲ ኣብ 2019-20 ኮሮና ቫይረስ ለበዳ መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ፣ ብምትንካፍ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍ ንምክትታል ሓበሬታ ይህቡ እዮም፥ ማለት ምስ ብሕማም ዝተታሕዘ ውልቀ-ሰብ ርክብ ዝነበሮም ሰባት ናይ ምፍላይ መስርሕ እዩ።
en-mt: b's COVID-19 mobile software app provides information to monitor transmission in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. identifying people who have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: ኣብ ገሊኦም ግዝኣታትን ሕጋዊ ስልጣናትን ብወግዓዊ ሓገዝ ናይ መንግስቲ ተሰንዮም ብዙሓት ኣፕሊኬሽናት ተኣሚሞምን ተሰሪሖምን።

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ እቶም ናይ እቲ መተግበሪ ተጠቀምቲ ጂኦግራፊያዊ ኣከባቢ ብምክትታል ዝተመስረቱ ስርዓታት ብዛዕባ ብሑትነት ዝምልከት ስግኣት ክለዓሎም ጸኒሑ እዩ።

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ካብቶም ናይ ውልቀ ሰባት ብሓትውነት ኣብ ምሕላው ዝሓሹ ዝበሃሉ ኣማራጺታት ብሉቱዝ ብምጥቃም ናይ ተጠቃሚ ደረጃ ቅርበት ናብ ካልኦት ስልክታት ምልኣኽ እዩ።
en-mt: One of the best ways to protect individuals' privacy is to send user-level intimacy to other phones using Bluetus.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: ኣብ 10 ኤፕሪል 2020 ጎግል ምስ ኣፕል ብሓባር ኮይኖም ብሉቱዝ መሰረት ጌሩ ዝሰርሕ መተግበሪ ቀጥታ ናብ ኣንድሮይድን iOS ኦፕሬቲንግ ሲስተምን ኣብ ምዉህሃድ ከምዝሰርሑ ተዛሪቦም።
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google said it was working with Apple to integrate a Bluetuzz-based app directly to Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ መንግስቲ ቻይና ምስ ኣሊፓይ ብምትሕብባር ዜጋታት ምስ COVID-19 ዝተትሓዘ ሰብ ርክብ ከምዝነበሮም ዝነግሮም መተግበሪ ኣብ ስራሕ ኣውዒሎም።
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government has partnered with Alipay to develop an app that tells citizens that they have had contact with someone infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ 200 ከተማታት ቻይና ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ይርከብ። ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ትሬስ_ቱጌዘር ዝተባህለት ኣፕሊኬሽን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ተርከብ።
en-mt: It is being used in more than 200 Chinese cities, with an app called Trace_Tuguezer in Singapore being used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: እዚ መተግበሪ ብናይ ከባብያዊ IT ማሕበረሰብ ዝማዕበለ ኮይኑ ንመንግስቲ ተዋሂቡ ንህዝቢ ድማ ክፍቲ ኮይኑ ይርከብ። ሰሜን ማሴዶኒያ "StopKorona!" ብዝብል ዝጀመሮ ብብሉቱዝ መሰረት ዝተሰርሐ መተግበሪ እዩ። ጥቕሙ ድማ ምስ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ርክብ ዘለዎ ሰብ ንምርካብን ንጥዕና ባዓል ሞያ ቅልጡፍ ዝኾነ መልሲ ምሃብን እዩ።
en-mt: Developed by the local IT community, it has been given to the government and is open to the public, a Blues-based app launched in Northern Macedonia called "StopKorona!" and its benefits are to find someone who is in contact with a sick person and respond quickly to professional health.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: እቲ መተግበሪ ብ Ministry of Communication and Technology(ናይ ርክብ ን ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስቴር) ን ብ Ministry of Health(ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስቴር)ን ዝማዕበለ እዩ።
en-mt: The application has been developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology (Ministry of Communications and Technology) and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: ካብ14, ኤፕሪል 2020 ኣቢሉ እቲ መተግበሪ ብጉግል ፕሌይ ስቶርን ኣፕል ስቶር ክሳብ ዚጸድቅ ይጽበ ኔሩ።
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the app was waiting for the app to be approved by Google Play Store and the Apple Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል 12፡ እታ ርክባት ትከታተል ምምዕባል ኣፕሊኬሽን ከም ዝሰጎመን ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰሙናት ንምስላፍ ቅሩብ ምዃኑን እቲ መንግስቲ ሓቢሩ ።ተመሳሳሊ ኣፕሊኬሽን ንምምዕባል ኣብ ኣየርላንድን ፈረንሳን ይውጠን ኣሎ(“ኮቪድ ግታእ”) ።
en-mt: On April 12, the government said it had announced that the development of the app, which monitors the contacts, and is about to be posted within weeks.

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: ኣውስትራሊያ ኒውዚላንድን ኣብ ናይ ሲንጋፖር TraceTogether መተግበሪ ን BlueTrace ፐሮቶኮልን መሰረት ዝገበሩ መተግበሪታት ንምጥቃም ኣብ ግምት የእትዋ ኣለዋ።ሩስያ ንዝተረጋጹ ኣብ ሞስኮ ዝነብሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት geofencing መተግበሪ ክተላሊ እያ፣ ካብ ገዝኦም ከምዘይወጹ ንምርግጋጽ ዝተነደፈ መተግበሪ እዩ።
en-mt: Australia and New Zealand are considering using apps based on the Singapore TraceTogether app blueTrace perotol.Russia will install geofencing apps for confirmed COVID-19 patients living in Moscow, an app designed to make sure they don't leave home.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: ሮስ ኣንደርሰን ኣብ ካምብሪጅ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ድሕነት ምህንድስና ፕሮፌሰር፡ ምስ ኣብ ኣፕሊኬሽን መሰረት ዝገበሩ ስርዓታት ተተሓሒዞም ክመጽኡ ዝኽእሉ ብዙሓት ተግባራዊ ጸገማት ዘርዚሩ ።እዚ ድማ ንግጉይ ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢት ምሃብን ምስ ምጥቃም እታ ኣፕሊኬሽን ኣብ ውሑድ ክፋል እቲ ህዝቢ ተተሓሒዙ ክመጽእ ዝኽእል ምጉዳል ኣድማዕነትን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of safety engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of practical problems that could arise in conjunction with application-based systems.These include mis-evaluating positive results and reduced effectiveness associated with the use of the app in a small part of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: ዝተሰሓሓተ ወይ ጎዳኢ ሓበሬታ ናይ ዝህቡ ናይ "ኮሮናቫይረስ" መተግበሪታት ስርጭት ንምፍታሕ፣ Apple ምስ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተተሓሓዙ መተግበሪታት ናብ App Store ክሓውሱ ዝፈቕደሎም ድርጅታት ገደብ ጌሩ፣ ን "ዕላዊ" ወይ ንተኣመንቲ ድርጅታት ጥራሕ እዩ ዝፈቅድ።
en-mt: In order to solve the spread of coronavirus apps that provide misinformation or harmful information, Apple has limited organizations that allow coronavirus-related apps to be converted to the App Store, only allowing "private" or trusted organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: ጉግልን ኣማዞንን ተምሳሳልቲ እግዳታት ኣተግቢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Google and Amazon have introduced similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: ናይ ብሕታውነት ጎስጎስቲ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ መተግበሪታት ብምጥቃም ዝግበር ናይ ሓፋሽ ክትትል ከምጽኦ ዝኽእል ጽልዋ ብዘለዎም ስግኣት ድምጾም ኣስሚዖም፡ ብፍላይ ድማ እዚ ንለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ንምግታእ ኢሉ ዝተሃንጸ ናይ ክትትል ሃዋሁ እቲ ሓደጋ ድሕሪ ምሕላፉ ይፍንጣሕ ድዩ ዋላስ ኣይኮነን ብዝምልከት ።
en-mt: Privacy advocates have voiced concerns about the impact of public surveillance using coronavirus apps, especially when it comes to whether this surveillance environment built to curb the coronavirus pandemic will spread after the disaster.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty Internationalን ካልኦት ልዕሊ 100 ዝኾኑ ትካላትን ኣብ ከም ዚኦም ዓይነታት ስለላታት ገደብ ክግበር መግለጺ ሂቦም።
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations have issued statements to impose restrictions on such types.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: እቲ ትካል ኣብ ናይ መንግስቲ ፕሮጀክትታት ሸሞንተ ኩነታት ኣዊጁ፡
en-mt: The company has announced eight conditions on government projects

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: እቲ ክትትል ‘’ሕጋዊ፣ኣገዳስን ተመጣጠነን’’ ክኸዉን ይግባእ።
en-mt: The monitoring should be 'legal, relevant and proportionate'.

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ናይ ምቁጽጻርን ምክትታልን መደባት ናይ ዘብቅዑሉ እዋን መግለጺ የድልዮም እዩ።
en-mt: A description of the time for monitoring and monitoring programs is required.

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: ናይ ዳታ ጥቕሚ ንCOVID-19 ጥራሕ ክወሰን እዩ።
en-mt: Data use is limited to COVID-19.

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ናይ ሓበሬታ ድሕነትን ሕቡእነትን ኣብ ጭብጢ መርኩስ ብምግባር ክሕለውን ከምዝሕለው ክረኣይን ኣለዎ ።
en-mt: Information security and privacy must be protected and protected based on facts.

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ዲጂታዊ ጽኑዕ-ሓለዋ ንምብኣስ ፍልልይን ጉስያን ከወግድ ኣለዎ፡
en-mt: In order to prevent digital security, differences and differences must be avoided

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: ዝኾነ ይኹን ዳታ ምስ ሳልሳይ ኣካል ምክፋል ብሕጊ ክግለጽ ኣለዎ;
en-mt: Any data sharing with third parties must be disclosed by law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ኣንጻር ጥቕዓታትን ናይ ዜጋታት ነዞም ጥቕዓታት እዚኦም መልሲ ናይ ምሃብ መሰል ሓለዋ ክህልዉ ኣለዎ;
en-mt: there must be protection against attacks and the right of citizens to respond to these attacks;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: "ትርጉም ዘለዎ ተሳትፎ" ብ ኩሎም "ዝምልከቶም ሼር ተሓዝቲ" የድሊ እዩ፣ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታትን ናይ ዝተሓዋወሱ ጉጅለታትን ሓዊሱ። ናይ ጀርመን ኮኣስ ኮምፒዩተር ክለብን(CCC) ዶብ ዘይግድቦም ጸብጸብቲን(Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) እውን ቼክሊስት ኣውጺኦም እዮም።
en-mt: "Meaningful participation" is required by all "relevant sher holders" and has burned public health professionals and mixed teams, and the German Coas Computer Club (CCC) has also released a Czechist report that does not require borders.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: እዚ ቀሪቡ ዘሎ ናይ Google/Apple ትልሚ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዘይኮነሉ ግዘ እዚ ናይ ክትትልን ሓለዋን ሜላ ካብ ናይ ኤሌክግሮኒክስ መጥቀሚታቶም ብምውጋድ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ናይ ሓለዋ ጸገም ክፈትሑ ይደለዩ።
en-mt: In the case of google/Apple's proposed target, they want to solve a permanent security problem by removing this monitoring and protection method from their electrolyx applications.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: ገለ ሃገራት መተግበሪታት ካብ ምጥቃም ኔትዎርክ መሰረት ዝገበረ ናይ ቦታ መድለዪ መገዲታት ተጠቒመን፣ መተግበሪታት ካብ ኢንተርኔት ናይ ምውራድን ኣድላይነትን ናይ ምክትታላት ተኽእሎታት ንምውጋድ ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: Some countries have used location search routes based on the use of networks; it is useful to eliminate the possibilities of downloading apps from the internet and the need for surveillance.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: ኣብ እስራኤል ኣብ ኔትዎርክ መሰረት ዝገበረ ምክትታል ጸዲቑ ኣሎ ።
en-mt: In Israel, there is a network-based monitoring.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: ንጥረ ናይ ከባቢ ሓበሬታ ክረከብ ዝኽእል ኣብ መርበብ ዝተመስረተ መፍትሒ ዓቢ ዝኾነ ናይ ብሑትነት ፀገም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: A web-based solution that can access local information has a major privacy problem.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: ኮይኑ ግን ኩሎም ማእኸላይ ሰርቨር ዘለዎም ናብ ውልቃዊ ናይ ኣከባቢ መሐበሪ ክረኸቡ ኣለዎም ማለት ኣይኮነን፡ ማእከላይ ሰርቨር ውሽጣዊ ርክባት ንምስልሳል ጥራይ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንኽውዕሉ ዝገብሩ ብዙሓት ናይ ብሑትነት ፖሊሲታት ተፈጢሮም ኣለዉ (ኣብ ታሕቲ ዘሎ ክፋል ይርኣዩ)።
en-mt: However, this does not mean that all those with a medium server must access a personal environment database, but there are many privacy policies that allow central servers to be used only for internal interactions (see shown in the section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፣ ናይ ንኽክእ ከይዲ ንምክትታል ካብ መተግበሪ ወጻኢ ዝኾነ ስርዓት ኣብ ጥቕሚ ውዒሉ እዩ።
en-mt: In South Korea, an out-of-the-app system has been used to monitor the going.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: ርእሱ ዝወሰነ መተግበሪ(app) ካብ ምጥቃም፡እዚ መስርሕ መጠቆሚ ሓበሬታ ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ምንጭታት ከም በዓል ናይ ሞባይል መከታተሊ ዳታ ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ካርታ ሽመታ ዳታ ብምሕዋስ ናብቲ ሕማም ዝተቃልዑ ውልቀ-ሰባት ጽሑፋዊ መልእክትታት ይሰድድ።
en-mt: From using a self-determined app, this process sends written messages to individuals exposed to the disease by mixing data from a variety of sources, such as mobile tracking data and map appointment data.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: እዚ ሓበሬታ እዚ ተነኻኺኦም ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ካብ ምንቃሕ ብተወሳኺ፣ እቲ መንግስቲ እቲ ናይ ቦታ ሓበሬታ ንህዝቢ ቅሩብ ጌርዎ፣ ድሕሪ ናይ እታ ሃገር ናይ MERS ለበዳ ምኽንያት ዝተፈጠረ ናይ ሓበሬታ ፖሊሲ ለውጢ ክፍቀድ ዝገበሮ ነገር እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the fact that this information may have been affected, the government has made the location information available to the public, allowing changes in information policy after the country's MERS pandemic.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: እዚ ሓበሬታ እዚ ብዝተፈላለዩ መተግበሪታትን መርበብ ሓበሬታትን ቅሩብ እዩ።ከም በዓል ጀርመን ዝበላ ሃገራት እውን ማእኸላይን ናይ ውልቃዊነት -ዓቃቢ ስርዓት ይጥቀማ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: His information is relatively small in a variety of apps and websites, and countries such as Germany are using a central and personal privacy system.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ብሑትነት ብምሕላው ምስ ሕሙም ርክብ ዘለዎም ሰባት ንምርካብ ዝግበር ኣከያይዳ ብሕጋዊ ኣግባብ ዝተሰረተ ኮይኑ ነዚ ዝምርምር ስነፅሑፍ ኣካል ተነኣሰ ኣብ 2013 ተጀሚሩ። ካብ 7 ሚያዝያ 2020 ጀሚሩ ልዕሊ ደርዘን ዝኾኑ ጉጅለ ባዓል ሞያታት ከም ብሉቱዝ ሎው ኢኔርጂ (BLE) ብምጥቃም ተጠቃማይ ናብ ካልኦት ስልክታት ክንደይ ዝኣክል ይቐርብ ዝብል ብምምዝጋብ ብሑትነት ዘይጎድእ መፍትሒ ምጥቃም ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, more than a dozen professional professionals, such as Bluetus Low Energy (BLE), have been using a non-harmful solution to determine how close the user is to other phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ PEPP-PT ዝተማእኸለን ዘይተማእኸለን ኣቀራርባ ዝሓዘ ናይ ሕብረት ጻዕሪ እዩ፣ ነጸላ ፕሮቶኮል እውን ኣይኮነን። ዘይተማእኸሉ ፕሮቶኮላት ዝበሃሉ ናይ ውልቃዊነት-ዝሕልዉ ኣቕርቦታት ክትትል (DP-PPT/DP-3T)፣ ግዜያዊ ናይ ንኽክእ ቁጽሪታት (TCN, fka ንኽክእ ምድላው ቁጽሪታት፣ CEN)፣ ውልቃዊ ብቐሊሉ ተቓላዒ ፕሮቶኮላትን ናይ ተንቀሳቓሲ ንኽክእ ምክትታልን (PACT) ከምኡውን ካልኦት ካብ ማእኸለ ምብታን እዩ።
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a union effort with a balanced and unprotected approach, and it is not an isolated protocol. Unimbanked protocols are monitoring personal-protected supply (DP-PPT/DP-3T); temporary replacement numbers (TCN, fka replacement numbers, CEN); personally vulnerable protocols and mobile replacement monitoring (PACT) and others from the center.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: ኣብዚኦም ፕሮቶኮላት፡ ዝልለ ውልቃዊ ሓበሬታ ካብ'ዚ መሳርሒ ኣይወጽእን ከምኡ'ውን ኩሉ ምስምማዕ ሓበሬታ ኣብ'ቲ መሳርሒ ይፍጸም።
en-mt: Personal information identified by these protocols will not be removed from this device and all agreeing information will be processed on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ MIT ሚድያ ላብራቶሪ ዝርከብ ናይ ፅንዓት ጉጅለ ኣንይ ቦታ መረዳእታት ኣብ ምእካብን ኣብ ምጥቃምን ናይ privacy-preserving ቴክኒካት ብምጥቃም ውይድማ path intersection data ብምጥዋም ናይ COVID-19 ናይ ተላባድነት ቅልጣፈ ንምፍላጥ ውሕስ መንገዲ ኣብ ምምዕባል ይርከቡ።
en-mt: A resilience group at the MIT Media Lab is working on a safe way to collect and use privacy-preserving techniques to detect the spread of COVID-19 through path intersection data.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: መሰረቱ ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ዋይትፔፐር "ዝወስለቱ ኣፓት፡ ምዕቃብ ውልቃዊ ብሕትና ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ" ብምግባር ኣብ ማርች 2020 ዝተዘርግሐ እዩ ።ካልእ ተመሳሳሊ ጻዕሪ ድማ ብ ኤኒግማ ኤምፒሲ ዝበሃል ኣብ ኤምኣይቲ ሜድያ ላብራቶሪ ዝማዕበለ ናይ ብሕቲ ቴክኖሎጂታት ዘማዕብል ትካል ዝተሰርሐ ሴፍ ትሬስ ፕላትፎርም እዩ።
en-mt: His foundation in research from Whitepepper was released in March 2020 with "dedicated apat protecting our personal privacy during an epidemic," another similar effort was made by Enigma MpC, a private technology development company developed in the MM Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: ሴፍ ትሬስ ውሕሰነቶም ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ ሃርድዌር ቴክኖሎጂታት ብምጥቃም፡ ተጠቀምቲ ናይ ውልቂ ኣድራሻን ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ምስ ካልኦት ተጠቀምቲን ሰራሕተኛታትን ብዘይ ስግኣት ክለዋወጡ ዝገብር እዩ።
en-mt: Safe Trace uses hardware technologies that have proven their safety to ensure customers exchange personal addresses and health conditions with other consumers and employees without any threat.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ኣፕሪል 2020፣ ዓለም ለኻዊ TCN ሕብረት ብዛዕባ ተመሳሳሊ ዝኾኑ ኣቀራርባታትን ተደራረብቲ ፕሮቶኮላትን ብዝምልከት ዝሓበሩ ጉጅለታት ዝተመስረተ እዩ፣ ዕላምኡ ድማ ምቁርራጽ ንምቕናስን፣ ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ መከታተሊን መንቅሒን ኣፓት ኣብ ምፍጣር ብሓባር ምስራሕን እዩ፣ ናይ ብሰፊሑ ዝተሰራጨወ ቁልፊ ከይዲ።
en-mt: As of 5 April 2020, the International TCN Union (IOCN) is forming a coalition of groups on similar approaches and overlapping protocols, with the aim of reducing disruption, working together to create a global monitoring and monitoring app.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: ኣብ ኤፕሪል 9, 2020 መንግስቲ ሲንጋፖር እቲ ስሩዕ ናይ እቲ መንግስቲ መተግበሪ ዝጥቀመሉ ብሉትሬስ ፕሮቶኮል ከምዝተኸፈተ ገሊፁ።
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the Government of Singapore announced that the standard government application was opened by the Blotress Protocol, which is used by the government.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል 10, 2020 ን ናይ ኣንድሮይድን ኣይ ኦ ኤስን ናይ ሞባይል መድረኽ ዝቆጻጸሩ ጉግልን ኣፕልን፡ ብሕታዊነት ይዕቅብ እዩ ዝበልዎ ብምጽንባር ኣብ ትሑት ሓይሊ ብሉቱዝ ቴክኖሎጂን ውሕስነት መዐቀቢ ክሪፕቶግራፊን መሰረት ዝገበረ ርክባት ናይ ምክትታል ተበግሶ ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, which controls the Android and IOS mobile platforms, announced a surveillance initiative based on low-power Bluetouz technology and the security of cryptography.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: b'Drug ደጊምካ ምመሕያሽ (ናይ መድሓኒት ደጊምካ ንካልእ ዕላማ ምውዓል፣ ሪ -ፕሮፋይሊንግ፣ ንካልእ ስራሕ ምውዓል ወይ ናይ መድሓኒት ምቕያር እውን ተባሂሉ ይፍለጥ) ንካልእ ሕማም ወይ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ክሕክም ኣፍልጦ ዝተወሃቦ መድሓኒት ንካሊእ ሕማም ክውዕል ምግባር ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: b'Drug Re-improvement (also known as re-applying medication for other purposes, re-profileing, other work or drug conversion) means that a drug recognized for treating another disease or health condition is used for another disease.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Kuomo of New York said the trial of hydroxychloroquine (hydroxychloroquine) and hydroxychloroquine would begin on March 24. At 28 March, the FDA granted hydroxyoquine sulfate (hydroxyoquine sulfate) and chloroquine phosphate (chloroquine phosphate) and chloroquine phosphate under the sudden use of chloroquine (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: እቲ ፍወሳ ብ ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕትታት ናይ FDA ተቐባልነት ዝረኸበ ኣይኮነን ከምኡ’ውን ብ ናይ EUA ህጹጽ እዋን ፍቓድ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂሶም ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ግን ፍወሳ ክረኽቡ ንዘይከኣሉ ሕሙማት ከም ናይ ሙከራ ህጹጽ ፍወሳ እዩ ተፈቒዱ።
en-mt: The treatment was not approved by FDA clinical studies and was approved as a trial emergency treatment for patients who were hospitalised with EUA emergency approval but could not be treated in clinical trials.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2, ጀርመን ነቲ መድሃኒት ካብ ጃፓን ንምእካብ ከምእትገዝኦን ናብ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ዝሕከሙሉ ሆስፒታላት ዩኒቨርሲቲ ንምዝርጋሕ ሰራዊት ከም ትጥቀምን ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: On March 2, Germany announced that it would buy the drug from Japan and use the military to distribute it to university hospitals where COVID-19 patients are treated.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.

en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has offered offers to the Trump administration about the purchase of the drug, which may not be as useful in serious cases of epidemics as the virus is so widespread.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
