en-mt: It may not be safe for pregnant women to get pregnant.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር(ካሌትራ) ዝተገብረ፡ ውህደት ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ሎፒናቪርን ሪቶናቪርን ”ምንም ጥቕሚ ከምዘነበሮም” ደምዲሙ ኣሎ ።
en-mt: A study has concluded that a combination of antivira drugs Lopinavir/Ritonavir (Kaletra) had "no benefit."

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: እዞም መድሓኒታት HIV ምስ ፕሮቴዛት ብምትሕሓዝ ከይባዛሕ ዝኽእልክሉ እዮም።
en-mt: hese drugs may not be associated with HIV.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: ኣብ ኮሎራዶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዘለዉ ኣጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ምስ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ፕሮቴዝ ዝተሓሓዘ ኮምፓውንድ ንምፍጣር መድሓኒታት ከመሓይሹ ይፍትኑ ኣለዉ።ኣብ እቲ ናይ ሳይንሳዊ ማሕበረ ሰብ ን HIV/AIDS(ኤች ኣይ ቪ/ ኤዲስ) ጥራሕ ተባሂሎም ዝማዕበሉ መድሓኒታት ንካልእ ዓላማ ንምውዓል ሓፍቲታት ኣብጥቕሚ ይውዕሉ ኣለዉ ብዝብል ነቐፌታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A research team at the University of Colorado is trying to improve medicines to create compounds associated with SARS-CoV-2 prosthetics, which are being criticized in the scientific community for the use of aids/AIDS-only drugs for other purposes.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ኣብቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ምትሕግጋዝ ፈተነ ኣጠቓሊሎምዎ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has included lopinavir/ritonavir (Lopinavir/Ritonavir) in the global assistance trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir(ሬምድስቪር) ብ Gilead Sciences ን ናይ ኢቦላ ቫይረስ ሕማምን ማርበርግ ቫይረስ ረኽሲን ንክከላኸል ተፈጢሩ።Gilead Sciences እዚ Remdesivir(ሬምድስቪር) ኣንጻር ዝተፈላለዩ ፊሎ -፣ ኒሞ -፣ ማራሚክሶ -፣ከምኡውን ኮሮና- ቫይረሳት ናይ ጸረ ቫይረስ ንጥፈታት ከምዘለውዎ ጸኒሖም ተረዲኦሞ።
en-mt: Remdesivir (Remdsvir) was created by Geographical Sciences to prevent Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections.:: Gil Sciences later understood that this Remdesivir (Remdsvir) has antivirus activities against various philoso -, pymo -, Maramikso -; and coronaviruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: ናይ እዞም ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሓኒታት ሓደ ጸገም ብሚቹዌሽን ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቕሚ ምምዕባል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ናብ ዝኸበደ ሕማምን ዝርጋሐን ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: One problem with these anti-viral drugs is the development of resistance capacity through mutation, which can lead to more serious disease and spread.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: ገለ ቅድም ክብሉ ዝወጹ ቅድመ ፈተነ መጽናዕቲታት remdesivir ንምጽዋር ልዑል ጀነቲክ ገደብ ኣለዎ ኢሎም።ብ ክሊቭላንድ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሆስፒታላት ዝተኻየዱ ክልተ ፈተነታት፡ ሓደ ን ማእኸላይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሰባት ሓደ ድማ ን ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሓዊሱ ብዙሓት ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Some preliminary studies have suggested that there are high genetic limits for remdesivir resistance, and two trials conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals, one for people with moderate diseases and one for serious illnesses, are underway.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ሕዚ እዋን ብምኽንያት COVID-19 ከቢድ ሕማም ሒዝዎም ናብ ሕክምና ንዝኣተዉ ሕሙማት ብደም ሱር ዝወሃብ ቫይታሚን ሲ ዘፅንዑ ሰለስተ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ኣለዉ። ካብዚኦም ድማ፡ ክልተ ናይ ፕላሴቦ ቁፅፅር (ቻይና፣ካናዳ) ሓደ ድማ ብዘይ ቁፅፅር (ጣልያን) ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Currently, there are three clinical trials that study blood-root vitamin C for patients who have been admitted to the hospital with a serious illness due to COVID-19, including two placebo controls (China; Canada) and one without supervision (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 24፣ 2020 ናይ ኔውዮርክ ክልል ናይ ኣዚትሮማሲን ዝተብሃለ ፀረ-ተሃዋስያን ሙከራ ጅሚራ ኣላ።
en-mt: On March 24, 2020, the New York region began a testing of aztromasin.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ጃፓን ብሄራዊ ናይ ዓለማዊ ጥዕናን ሕክምናን ማእኸል (NCGM) Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide) ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ንኣስሚ ዝጠቅም ዝትንፈስ ኮርቲኮስቴሮይድ ናይ ኖቭል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ምልክት ገና ንዘየርአዩ ሕሙማት ከም ፈዉሲ ዝጠቅም ምዃኑ ንምምርማር ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ ከምዝጅምር ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Health and Medicine (NCGM) has announced that it will launch a clinical trial to examine whether teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), a respiratory corticosteroid for asymology, can be used as a cure for patients who have not yet demonstrated symptoms of the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: ካብ ዴንማርክ፣ጀርመንን ኣዉስትሪያን ኣብ ሕክምና ዝርከቡ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘጋጠሞም 200 ሕሙማት ተወሲዶም ንዉፅኢታዉነት ናይ angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 ደረጃ II ፈተነ ኣብ መስርሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A trial of 200 patients with serious illnesses from Denmark, Germany and Austria have been taken and phase II trials are underway for the effectiveness of angiotensin-converting enzymes.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: ናይ ኣብ ካናዳ ዝርከብ Montreal ናይ ልቢ ትካል colchicine(ክሎኪሳይን) ኣብ ቀሊል ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ፑልሙናሪ ሕልኽላኻትን ቁጠዐን ኣብ ምቕናስ ዘለዎ ግደ ኣብ ምጽናዕ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Montreal-based Canadian heart company colchicine (Clokisain) is studying the role of pulmuenary complexion and anger in people with mild COVID-19 symptoms.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: እቲ COLCORONA ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ መፅናዕቲ 6000 ዝኾኑ ዕድሜኦም ካብ 40 ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ ብCOVID-19 ዝተትሓዙን ቀሊል ዝበሃል ምልክታት ዘርኣዩ፡ ሕክምና ዘየድልዮም ሕሙማት ኣብ ምምልማል ይርከብ።
en-mt: he study, called COLCORONA, recruited 6,000 patients over the age of 40 who had COVID-19 and who did not need treatment.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: ጥኑሳት ወይ ጸባ ጡብ ዝዕንግላ ኣዴታት ወይ ኣድማዒ ናይ ጥንሲ መከኸሊ ኣገባብ ዘብለን ብቑዓት ኣይኮናን።
en-mt: Pregnant women who breastfeed or have an effective pregnancy control system are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: ብዙሓት ጸረ-ምርጋእ ዝኾኑ ባእታታት ኣብ ጣልያን ይፍተኑ ኣለው ።
en-mt: Many anti-inflammatory tests are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: ትሑት ናይ ሞለኪዩላዊ ክብደት ዘለዎ ሄፓሪን ብብዝሒ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ይጥቅም፡ ብዚ ምኽንያት ከኣ ናይ ጣልያን ሕክምና ኤጀንሲ ናይ ኣጠቃቕማኡ መምርሒታት ንከሐትም ተገዲዱ።
en-mt: Heparin with low molecular weight is used to treat more patients, and as a result, the Italian Medical Agency has been forced to publish its use guidelines.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: ኣብ 300 ሕሙማት ዝተገብረ ናይ ብዙሕ ማእኸል መፅናዕቲ ናይ ኢኖክሳፓሪን ሶድየም ከም መከላኸልን ከም መድሃኒት መጠን ጥቕሚ ንኽፅናዕ ኣብ ጣልያን ኣብ ሚያዝያ 14 ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: A multi-center study of 300 patients to study the benefits of inoxaparin and sodium as a preventive was announced in Italy on April 14.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ስለዝኾነ፡ ብዙሕ ስነፍልጠታዊ ኣድህቦ ኣብ ቅድሚ ዝርግሐ MERS፡SARS ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ምዕራብ ናይል ቫይረስ ማዕቢሎም ተቐባልነት ንዝረኸቡ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ዳግማይ ኣብ ዕላማ ኣብ ምእታው ክግበር ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: Ecause SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, a large number of scientific advances have been re-targeting anti-virus drugs that have evolved before the spread of MERS SARS and the Western Niel virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ሪባቪሪን: ሪባቪሪን ከም መድሃኒት COVID-19 ኮይኑ ንኽሰርሕ ናይ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም መምርሒ ይመክር።
en-mt: Ribaviri and Ribaviri recommend the 7th Edition of China's Guidelines to Act as a COVID-19 drug.

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir(ኡሚፈኖቪር): umifenovir(ኡሚፈኖቪር) ብናይ ቻይና መበል 7ይ ሕታም መሰረት ንኮቪድ-19 መሐከሚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ተመኺሩ ነይሩ
en-mt: Umifenovir (Umiifenovir) umifenovir was consulted for the use of COVID-19 in accordance with China's 7th Edition

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: ገለ ጸረ-ረኽሲታት ከም ንኮቪድ-19 መድሓኒት ኮይኖም ክቐርቡ ይኽእሉ እዮም ተባሂሎም ዝተፈለዩ ኣለዉ:
en-mt: Some anti-infections may be used as a cure for COVID-19

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab(ቶሲሊዙማብ) (ጸረ-IL-6 ተቐባሊ): ኣብ ቻይና ፈቓድ ተዋሂብዎ።
en-mt: Tocilizumab (tocilizumab) (anti-IL-6 receptor) has been granted a will in China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: ከምኡ’ውን ፈተነታት ኣብ ጣልያንን ቻይናንን ቶሲሊዙማብ# COVID-19 ን ርአ።
en-mt: See also trials in Italy and China about COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: b'A ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት ኣብ 2019 ንዘጋጠመ ኮሮና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ዝከላኸል ናይ ስነሓሳብ ክትባት እዩ።
en-mt: a COVID-19 vaccine is a theoretical vaccine that protects against the coronavirus (COVID-19) in 2019.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈትነኡ ዝወደአ ዝኾነ ዓይነት ከትባት እኳ እንተዘይ ሃለወ፣ ነዚ ክምዚ ዝበለ ከትባት ንምምዕባል ብዙሓት ፈተነታት ኣብ መስርሕ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Although no clinical trials have been completed, many trials are underway to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 መወዳእታታት፣ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ኣብ ውሽጢ 18 ኣዋርሕ ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2፣ ነቲ ሕማም ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ዝኸውን ክትባት ክምዕብል እዩ ኢሉ ከምዘይጽበ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: At the end of February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 to be developed within 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ሓሙሽተ ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት ኣብ መድረኽ I ናይ ድሕነት መስናዕትታት ኔሮም።
en-mt: In April, five vaccine candidates were at stage I safety procedures.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 እዩ ህላወኡ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: COVID-19 was announced in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 2020 ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዓብዪ ለበዳ ዝተዘርገሐ እንኾን፣ ክትባት ንምምዕባል ድማ ብዝሕ ዝበለ ኢንቨስትመንትን ናይ መጽናዕቲ ንጥፈታት ኣስዒቡ እዩ።
en-mt: In 2020, there was a major pandemic spread around the world, and the development of a vaccine resulted in a lot of investment and research activities.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብዙሓት ትካላት ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝኸዉን ዝተሓተሙ ጄኖማት ብምጥቃም ክትባት ንምምዕባል ይሰርሑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: A number of companies are working to develop a vaccine using sealed genoms for SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል ዝተገለጸ፣ ናይ CEPI ትካል ናይ ክትባት ምዕባለ ወሰንቲ ነጥቢታት፣ ፍጥነት፣ ናይ ምምራት ዓቕሚ፣ ብበዝሒ ምርካብ ምኽኣል፣ ከምኡውን ዓለም ለኻዊ ኣቕርቦታት እዮም።
en-mt: As noted in April, CEPI's vaccine development is key points, speed, capacity to lead, increased availability, and global supply.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ናይ CEPI ኣይ ተመራመርቲ ስነ-ፍልጠት 10 ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ቴክኖሎጂ መድረኻት ኣብ መጀመርታ 2020 ኣድማዒ ክትበት ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ንምፍጣር ኣብ ትሕቲ መጽናዕቲን ምዕባለን ከምዝነበሩ ጸብጻብ ሂቦም።
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under study and development to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19 by early 2020.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: ናብ ናይ ፌዝ I ናይ ደሕንነት መጽናዕቲ ዝዓበዩ ዋና መድረኻት ነዞም ዝስዕቡ ዘጠቓለሉ እዮም:
en-mt: he main stages of the Fez I safety study include:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: ኒኩሊክ ኣሲድ (DNA and RNA))( ብርኪ I ኣማዕባሊን ናይ ክትባት ሕፁይን)፡ ሞደርና mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Niculic acid (DNA and RNA) (knee I developer and vaccine candidate) Moderna mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: viral vector(ቫይራል ቬክተር) (ፌዝ I መማዕበሊን ናይ ክትባት ሕጹይን: CanSino Biologics(ካንሲኖ ባዮሎጂክስ), ኣድኖቫይረስ ዓይነት 5 ቬክተር)
en-mt: Viral vector (Viral Vector) (Fez I developing and vaccine candidate CanSino Biologics (Cansino Biology), Adnovir type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: ብናይ CEPI ሳንቲስትታት ኣብ ኣፕሪል ሪፖርት ከምዝተገበረ፣ 115 ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ኣብ ናይ ምዕባለ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃታት ይርከቡ፣ ምስ 78 ዝተረጋገጹ ንጡፋት ፕሮጀክትታት (79፣ Milken Institute ከምዝበሎ)፣ 37 ካልኦት ድማ ኣዊጆም፣ እንተኾነግን ንእሽተይ ህዝባዊ ሓበሬታ ብምጥቃም እዩ (ኣብ ትልሚ ክህልዉ ዝሕሰቡ ወይ ዝተነደፉ)።
en-mt: According to CEPI Coins, 115 general vaccine candidates are in the early stages of development, with 78 confirmed active projects (79, Milken Institute) and 37 others announced, but using a small amount of public information (which are intended or designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: ደረጃ I-II ፈተነ ካብ ኩሉ ንላዕሊ ድሕንነት፣ኢምኖጀነሲቲ ምርመራ፣ዘይስሩዕ ኮይኑ ናይ ፕላሴቦ ቁፅፅር ዘለዎ ከምኡ እውን ኣብ ብዙሕ ቦታታት ዝካየድ ኮይኑ ትኽክለኛን ዉፅኢታዉነትን ናይ መድሓኒት መጠን እዉን ዝዉስን እዩ።
en-mt: Phase I-II testing is the most safety, imgeneity test, irregular placebo control, and is conducted in many places and determines the accuracy and effectiveness of the drug.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: ናይ ፌዝ III ፈተነታት ዝበዝሑ ተሳተፍቲን መምዘኒ ጉጅለ ዘለዎምን ከምኡ’ውን ንምክልኻል ሕማም ናይ ክታበት ኣድማዕነት ፈተነታት ምስ ምቁጽጻር ኣብ ተደላዩ መጠን መድሃኒት ዝመጽኡ ኣሉታዊ ሳዕቤናት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Fez III trials include the largest number of participants and those with a group of measurements, as well as negative effects on desired doses of medications when controlling vaccine effectiveness trials to prevent disease.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: ካብ እቶም 79 ኣብ ንጡፍ ምዕባለ ዘለዉ ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት( April 2020 መጀመርታ ጀሚሩ ዝተረጋገጹ)፡ 74 ኣብ ናይ ወዲ-ሰብ ፈተነ ደረጃ ኣይነበሩን (ሕጂ'ውን ኣብ ቅድመ-ክሊኒካዊ ምርምር እዮም ዘለዉ)።
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed early April 2020), 74 were not in the human experimental stage (and are still in pre-clinical research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 24፣ 2020 ኣብ ኣውስትራሊያ፣ ናይ ኩዊንስ ላንድ ዩኒቨርስቲ ናይ ሞለኪዩላዊ ክላምፕ ን ናይ ቫይርስ ፕሮቲን ብምቕያር ናይ ሰብነት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ተኽእሎ ክነቓቕሕ ዝኽእል ክትባት ዓቕሚ ኣብ ምምርማር ከምዘልው ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: On January 24, 2020, the University of Queensland of Australia announced that it is testing the ability of a vaccine that can activate the body's immune system by changing its molecular clamps for viruses proteins.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 24፣ 2020 ኣብ ካናዳ ኣብ ሳስካቻውን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝርከብ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ክትባት ማእኸል(VIDO-InterVac) ኣብ 2021 ፈተነ ዝግበረሉ ክትባት ስራሕ ክምዝ ጀመሩ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On January 24, 2020, the World Vaccination Center at the University of Saskatchun, Canada, announced that it would begin testing the VIDO-InterVac vaccine by 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: ክትባት ናይ ምምዕባል ፕሮጀክትታት ጃንዋሪ 26፣ 2020 ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ማእኸል ሕማም ቁፅፅርን ምክልኻልን ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ድማ ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 28 ተጋዊሖም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Projects to develop the vaccine were announced on January 26, 2020 at the China Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 29, 2020፡ ጃንሰን ፋርማሰውቲካል ካምፓኒታት ብ መሪሕነት ሃነከ ሽዊተሜከር ንምምዕባል ክታበት ስራሕ ከም ዝጀመሩ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: Around January 29, 2020, Jansen announced that pharmacies had begun work on developing vaccines under the direction of Hanenke Schweitemecker.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: ጃንሰን ምስ ቫክሳርት ዝተብሃለ ናይ ባዮቴክኖሎጂ መሻርኽቱ ብምትሕብባር ብኣፍ ዝዉሰድ ክትባት የማዕብል ኣሎ።
en-mt: Jansen is working with his biotech partner, Vauxart, to develop an oral vaccine.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 18 2020፡ ኢመርጀንት ባዮ_ሶልዩሽንስ ምስ ቫክሳርት ብምዃን ነቲ ክታበት ንኸማዕብሉ ኣዊጆም ።
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent Bio_Solutions, along with Vauxart, announced the developing of the vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 8፣ 2020 ኣብ ሮማኒያ ዝርከብ ና ኦንኮገን ላብራቶሪ ኣብ ምስ ን ካንሰር ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዘወዓለ ኒዮኣንቲጅን ክትባት ሕክምና ዝመሳሰል ናይ ክትባት ቴክኖሎጂ ንድፊ ኣመልኪቱ ናይ ፅናዓት ወረቐት ኣሕቲሞም ኣለው።
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, the Oncogen Laboratory in Romania published a study paper on the design of vaccine technology similar to the neoantium vaccine for cancer.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 25 ፣ናይ ምርምር ትካል ዋና ሓላፊ ናይ ክታበት ምስራሕ ከምዝወድኡን ፈተነታት ኣብ ምጅማር ከምዘለዉ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On March 25, the chief executive of the research firm announced that vaccination work had been completed and that trials were under way.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ 27 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ ናይ Generex መሓዛ ትካል, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology፣ ናይ Ii-Key(ሊ-ኪይ) ፔፕታይድ ክትባት ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ንምፍጣር ናይ ክትባት ፕሮጀክት ይጅምሩ ምህላዎም ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, Generex's partner company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced that they were launching a vaccine project to create a vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: ኣብ ‘’ዉሽጢ 90 መዓልትታት’’ ኣብ ሰብ ክፍተን ዝኽእል ናይ ክትባት ሕፁይ ንምምዕባል ደልዮም።
en-mt: They wanted to develop a vaccine candidate that could be tested on humans in '90 days'.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ማርች 2020፣ ናይ Washington University (ዋሽንግተን ዩኒቨርሲቲ) ኣብ St. Louis(ሴንት ሉዊስ) ክትባት ናይ ምምዕባል ፕሮጀክት ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020; Washington University (Washington University) announced a project to develop a vaccine at St. Louis (St. Louis).

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ማርች 2020፣ United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick ን ናይ ኣብ ሲልቨር ስፕሪንግ ዘሎ ናይ Walter Reed Army Institute of Research፣ ክልቲኦም ኣብ ምዕራባዊ ሜሪላንድ ዝርከቡ ኮይኖም፣ ክትባት ኣብ ምምዕባል ይሰረሑ ምህላዎም ድማ ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Research Institute of Silver Spring, both of which are based in western Maryland, announced that they were working on developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ 10 ማርች 2020፣ Emergent Biosolutions ምስ Novavax Inc ብሓባር ምስራሕ ምጅማሩ ኣብሲሩ።
en-mt: On March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions began working together with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ምምዕባልን ምፍራይን ክታበት።
en-mt: the development and production of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: እቶም መሻርኽቲ ናይ ቅድሚ ክሊኒካዊ ምርመራን ደረጃ I ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነን ኣብ ጁላይ 2020 ንምክያድ ትልሚ ከምዘለዎም ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: Partners announced their intention to conduct pre-clinical testing and Phase I clinical trials by July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 12, 2020 ናይ ህንዲ ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስቴር ምስ 11 ዝተነጸሉ ሰባት እንዳሰርሑ ምዃኖም ኣፍሊጡ ፣ ነቲ መድሓኒት ንምስራሕ በቲ ዝቐልጠፈ ኣሰራርሓ እውን እንተኾነ ብንኡሱ ካብ ሓደ ዓመትን ፈረቓን ክሳብ ክልተ ዓመት ከምዝወስድ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, India's Ministry of Health announced that it was working with 11 isolated people, even with the fastest procedures to make the drug, which would take at least a year and a half to two years.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 12፣ 2020፣ ኣብ ከተማ ኩዩቤክ ዝርከብ መዲካጎ ዝተብሃለ ትካል ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ካናዳ ናይ ጥዕና ምርምር ትካል ዝግበር ውሱን ናይ ገንዘብ ሓገዝ ኮይኑ ኮሮና ቫይረስ መሳሊ ባእታ ኣብ ምምዕባል ክምዝርከብ ፀብፃብ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, a Quebec-based company, Medicago, reported that it would provide limited funding under the canadian health research agency to develop a coronavirus vaccine.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹይ ኣብ ናይ ቤትፈተነ መጽናዕቲ ይርከብ፣ ኣብ ሰብ ምፍታን ድማ ኣብ ጁላይ ወይ ኦገስት 2020 ክካየድ ትልሚ ተታሒዝዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he vaccine candidate is currently under trial and is scheduled to take place in July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: ኣቐዲሙ ኣብ’ቲ ሰሙን፡ ናይ US ፕሬዝደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ን CureVac ፡ ነቲ መንግስቲ ጀርመን ዝተቓወሞ ንምርካብ ክታበት “Covid-19 ዝውዕል ‘ብዙሕ ገንዘብ’ ኣቕሪቡ“ ክብል ዘ-ጋርዲያን ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Earlier that week, U.S. President Donald Trump told CureVac that "he had offered a "lot of money" to fund the COVID-19 vaccine.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 17, 2020 ናይ ኣሜሪካ ናይ መድሓኒት ኩባንያ ፊዘር ምስ ናይ ጀርመን ኩባንያ ባዮኤንቴክ ብሓደ ናይ mRNA-based ክትባት ንምስራሕ ክምዝተውዓዓሉ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, us pharmaceutical company Fitzer announced that it would be working with German company BioNTech to develop a single mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: ኣብ mRNA ዝተመርኮሰ ክትባት ሕፁይ ዝኾነ BNT162 ኣብ ፕሪክሊኒካል ምርምር ዝርከብ እንትኾን፡ ቀፃሊ ናይ ክሊኒካል ፈተነታት ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020 ክጅመር ከምዝኾነ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: An mRNA-based vaccine-based bNT162 is in preclinical research and next clinical trials are expected to begin in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: ኣብ ጣልያን ኣብ ማርች 17፣ 2020 ታኪስ ባዮቴክዝበሃል ናይ ጣልያን ትካል ኣብ ኣፕሪል፣2020 ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ውፂኢታት ብምርካብ እቲ ናይ መጨረሻ ኣብ ወዲ ሰብ ዝግበር ፈተነ ድማ ካብ መስከርም ኣቢሉ ክምዝጅምር ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: In Italy, on March 17, 2020, the Italian company Takis Biotechs announced that it would launch clinical results in April 2020 and that the final human trials would begin.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: ማርች 19 2020 ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ናይ ኤፒደሚክ ኢኖቬሽን ሕብረት (CEPI) ናይ US$4.9 ሚሊዮን ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት መፅናዕቲ ኢንቨስትመንት ከምዝገበረ ሓቢሩ። ካብ እዚ ብተወሳኺ ድማ ንኢኒስቲቱት ፓስተር፣ ቴሚስ ባዮሳይንስ (ቪዬና፣ኣዉስትሪያ) ከምኡ’ዉን ዩኒቨርስቲ ፒትስበርግ ብምስታፍ ጠቕላላ ንCOVID-19 ክትባት ምዕባለ ዝዉዕል ናይ CEPI ኢንቨስትመንት ናብ US$29 ሚልዮን ክዓቢ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: March 19, 2020, the Epideamic Innovation Union (CEPI) in France announced that US$4.9 million had invested in the COVID-19 vaccine research, and it also increased CEPI investment to US$29 million by participating in the Institute Pastor, Thames Biosciences (Vienna, Austria) and the University of Pittsburgh.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: ናይ CEPI ናይ ኢንቨስትመንት ምሻርኽቲ ንCOVID-19 ዝኸዉን ክትባት ንምምዕባል ዝሳተፉ፡ ሞደርና፣ ኩሬቫክ፣ ኢኖቭዮ፣ ኖቫቫክስ፣ ዩኒቨርስቲ ሆንግ ኮንግ፣ ዩኒቨርስቲ ኦክስፎርድ ከምኡዉን ዩኒቨርስቲ ክዊንስላንድ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: CEPI's investment partners include Moderna, Kurevak, Inovio, Novavax, The University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford and the University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: ኣብ 20 ማርች 2020፣ ናይ ሩስያ ጥዕና ኦፊሻላት ሳይቲስትታት ናይ ሽድሽተ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ኣብ እንስሳት ምፍታን ምጅማሮም ገሊጾም።
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health authorities announced that six different vaccine candidates were testing animals.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 20፣2020 ናይ ሎንደን ኢምፐሪያል ኮሌጅ ተመራመርቲ ን COVID-19 ዝኾን ዓርሱ ዘጋውሕ ናይ RNA ክትባት ኣብ ምምዕባል ክምዝርከቡ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, researchers at Imperial College London said they were developing an RNA vaccine for COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: እቲ ተወዳዳሪ ክታበት ኣብ ውሽጢ 14 መዓልታት ምቕባል ኣሰራርዓ ሕነተ-ሰረት ካብ ቻይና ማዕቢሉ።
en-mt: he vaccine was developed in China within 14 days.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ ማርች፡ መንግስቲ ካናዳ ከም መዲካጎ ን ተበግሶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሳስካቸዋንን ዝመሰሉ ናይ ካናዳ ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ትካላትን ከም ሕክምናዊ ሰረ-ስጉምቲ ኣንጻር COVID-19 ኣብ ዘቕረብዎም ብዙሓት ሕጹያት ክታበታት ዝትግበሩ 96 ናይ መጽናዕቲ ውጥናት ንምምዋል 275 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ካናዳ ክህብ ምዃኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: Finally, the government announced that it would provide $275 million to canadian universities and organizations such as Medicago and the University of Saskatchewan initiative to fund 96 research projects on 96 vaccine candidates, such as medical measures against COVID-19.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ግዜ መንግስቲ ካናዳ ንምምዕባል ናይ COVID-19 ክታበት ዝውዕል 192 ሚልዮን ዶላር ካናዳ ከምኡ’ውን ካልእ ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ምስ ዘጋጥም ዝጠቅም ብዙሓት ሕደስቲ ክታበታት ዝህልዎ “ናይ ክታበት ባንክ” ንምምዕባል መደባት ኣፍሊጡ፡፡
en-mt: At the same time, the Government of Canada has announced plans to develop $192 million for the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and a "vaccination bank" with many new vaccines to benefit in the event of another coronavirus pandemic.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: ኤፕሪል 2 2020 ናይ ፒትስበርግ ዩኒቨርስቲ ቤት-ትምህርቲ ሕክምና ተመራመርቲ ናይ PittCoVacc ዝበሃል ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት ኣብ ኣናፁ ምርምር ‘’ናይ SARS-CoV-2 S1 ሳብዩኒት ክትባት ጠንካራ ናይ ኣንቲጅን-ስፔስፊክ ኣንቲቦዲ መልሲ [ኣብ ኣናፁ] ከምዘምፀ MNA ኣፍሊጡ። እዚ ድማ ኢምዩናይዜሽን ምስተፈጥረ ድሕሪ 2 ሰሙን ይፍጠር።’’
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, mNA announced that the PittCoVacc COVID-19 vaccine, pittCoVacc, would produce a strong anti-ion-1 anti-participant response [in the anabolic] vaccine, which will be created 2 weeks after the emergence of immanation.'

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: ኤፕሪል 16 2020 ኣብ ካናዳ ውሽጢ ዝርከብ ዋተርሉ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ቤት-ትምህርቲ ፋርማሲ DNA ዝመሰረቱ ናይ ክታበት ብኣፍንጫ ዝንጸግ ሕጹይ ይምስርት ከምዘሎ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On April 16, 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy in Canada said it was establishing a DNA-based vaccine candidate.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: ባክቴሪዮፌጅስ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ብምዋዓል፣ እቲ DNA ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ ወዲስብ ኣብ ዝርከብ ባክቴሪያ ውሽጢ ብምርባሕ ጉዳኣት ዘይብሉ ቫይረስ መስል ባእታታት ብምፍራይ እቲ ናይ ሰብነትና ሕማምም ተከላኻሊ ኣናፃር ሳርስ ኮሮና ቫይረስ (SARS-CoV-2) ናይ ባዕዳዊ ነገራት መከለኻሊ የፍሪ።
en-mt: y the use of bacterial infections, the DNA is moved inside the bacteria and produces non-harmful virus-like substances, and the body's immune response to SARS-CoV-2 produces foreign substances.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020፣ ናይ US መንግስቲ፣ ኢንዳስትሪን ሰለስተ ዩኒቨርስቲታትን ናይ IBM ሱፐር ኮምፒዩተራት ፣ ምስ ናይ ክላውድ ኮምፒቲንግ ሓገዛት ናይ Hewlett Packard Enterprise፣ Amazon፣ Microsoft፣ ከምኡውን Google ብምትሕብባር ንምጥቃም ፍልፍላት ሃብቲ ኣኪቦም እዮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, the U.S. government, industry and three universities collected resources for the use of IBM supercomputers, in collaboration with Cloud Computing Support, hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: ሓድሓደ ክትባታት ውሱናት ዘይኮኑ ወይድማ ዝበሃሉ ሳዕቤናት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Some vaccines have consequences that are not effective or not.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: እዚ ማለት ድማ ካብቲ ዝከላኸልዎ ሕማም ንላዕሊ ጥቕሚ ክረኽቡ ይኽእሉ እዮም ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: This means they may benefit more from the disease they prevent.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: ኣብ አውስትራሊያ ዝግበር ተወሳኺ ሃንደበታዊ ሙከራ 4,170 ናይ ጥዕና ሰራሕተኛታት እናጠለበ ይርከብ።
en-mt: A further emergency test in Australia is being held by 4,170 health workers.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: ኣብ ምምዕባል ዝርከቡ ክትባታት ውሕስነቶም ዝተሓለዉ ወይ ኣድማዕቲ ዘይክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Developed plants may not be safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: ኣድማዕነት ክታበት ንምፍታሽ ኣብ ን COVID-19 ውሱናት ሞዴል እንስሳታት ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ከም ACE2-ስግረ-ጂናዊ ኣናጹ፡ ካልኦት ናይ ላብራቶሪ እንስሳታት፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ሰባት ዘይኮኑ መጥበውቲ ቫይረሳት ንምቁጽጻር ኣገዳስነት ናይ ደረጃ 3 ባዮ-ሴፍቲ ናይ ምሓዝ ስጉምትታት ከምኡ’ውን ደረጅኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ድሕነት መስርሓት ንምውሓስ ኣህጉራዊ ምውህሃድ የመልክት።
en-mt: A study of the COVID-19 dedicated animal model to test vaccine effectiveness refers to international integration to control the use of Phase 3 bio-safety measures and safe safety procedures for controlling viruses such as ACE2-trans-genetic monkeys, other lab viruses and non-humans.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: ን SARS ከምኡ’ውን ንMERS ዝኸውን ክታበት ኣብ ደቂሰብ ዘይኮኑ ናይ እንስሳት ሞዴላት ይፍተኑ ጸኒሖሞ እዮም።
en-mt: Vaccines for SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: ኣብ 2020 SARS ድሕንነቱ ዝሓለወን ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነን መድሓኒት ወይድማ ተኻላኸሊ ክትባት የብሉን።
en-mt: In 2020, SARS does not have a safe and effective vaccine.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: ኣብ 2005 ን 2006 ን ብዝተሓተሙ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ወረቐታት መሰረት፣ ናይ እዚ SARS ሓድሽ ክትባት ወይ መድሓኒት ምምዕባል ናይ መንግስቲታትን ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ሓለዋን ቀዳምነት ዝህብዎ ነገር እዩ።ኣንጻር MERS እውን ዝተረጋገጸ ክትባት የለን።
en-mt: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the development of a new vaccine or cure for the SARS is a priority for governments and public health watchdogs, and there is no proven vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: MERS ብጣዕሚ ኣስፋሕፊሑ ኣብ ዝነበረሉ ግዘ ሕጂ ዘሎ ናይ SARS ምርምር ኣንጻር MERS-CoV ረኽሲ ክታበትን መድሓኒታትን ንምምዕባል ጠቓሚ ኣብነት ክህልዎ ከምዝኽእል እምነት ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: At a time when MERS was very widespread, it was believed that current SARS research could set a useful example for the development of vaccines and medicines against MERS-CoV infections.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: ካብ ማርች 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ሓደ  ብርኪ I ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ ዝወደአን ፣ ካልኦት ሰለስተ ድማ ኣብ መሰርሕ ዝርከቡሉን፣ ኩሎም ድማ viral-vectored እቶም ክልተ ድማ adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac) ሓድ ድማ MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S) ዝኾነ (DNA ዝተድረኸ) ናይ MERS ክትባትት ነይሩ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, one knee I had completed a clinical trial in humans and three others were in the works, all of which were viral-vectored and two were adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-Gam Vac) and one MVA-MERS-S (DNA-motivated) MERS vaccine.

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: ናይ ማሕበራዊ ሚድያ ፖስትታት እቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ይፍለጥ ከምዝነበረን ክትባት እውን ከምዘለዎን ዝገልጽ ስነ-ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Social media posts have suggested that the COVID-19 virus was known and had a vaccine.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: እቶም ኣብ ማሕበራዊ ሚድያታት ዝርከቡ ናይ ዋንነት ሰርትፍኬታት ከም SARS ዝመሳሰሉ ናይ ካልኦት ኮሮና ቫይረስ ስትሬናት ጀነቲክ ሲኩዌንስን ክትባትን ዋንነት ሰርትፍኬታት እዮም።
en-mt: he ownership certificates on social media, such as SARS, are the ownership certificates for other coronavirus strains, genetic syqueens and vaccines.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ሕማም b'ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ብከቢድን ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ዝመጽእ ተላባዒ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) is a contagious disease referred to as SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: ልሙዳት ምልክታት ረስኒ፣ ሰዓልን ትንፋስ ምሕጻርን ዝኣመሰሉ ዘካትቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: ካልኦት ምልክታት ድኻም፣ ናይ ጭዋዳ ቃንዛ፣ ተቕማጥ፣ ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛ፣ ናይ ምጭናው ክእለት ምስኣንን ናይ ከብዲ ቃንዛን የካትቱ።
en-mt: Other symptoms include fatigue, muscle aches, cramps, sore throats, loss of ability to sneer and abdominal pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ካብ ግዘ ምቅላዕ ክሳብ ምልክት ምርኣይ ዝጅምረሉ ግዘ ዘሎ ግዘ ከባቢ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲታት እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲታት ኣብ ዘሎ ክፈላለ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: he period from exposure to symptoms is about five days, but it can vary from two to 14 days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ጉዳያት ናይ ለበዳ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ዘርእዩ ዋላ እንተኾኑ፣ ገለ ናብ ቫይራል ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒን ናብ ብዙሓት ኦርጋናት ውድቀትን ዘምርሑ እዮም።
en-mt: While most cases show mild symptoms of a pandemic, some lead to viral lung stroke and the collapse of many organ failures.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: ካብ 17 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ልዕሊ 2.24 ሚልዮን ጉድያት ለበዳ ኣብ መላእ 210 ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ጸብጻብ ተገይሮም እዮም፣ ልዕሊ 153,000 ሞት ድማ ኣስዒቦም።
en-mt: Since 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million outbreaks have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: ልዕሊ 568,000 ሰባት ካብቲ ሕማም ሓውዮም እዮም። እዚ ቫይረስ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ብምስዓል፣ ብምህንጣስ፣ ወይ ብምዝራብ ዝወጹ ኣናእሽተይ ንጣባት ኣብ መንጎ ቀረባ ንኽክእ ዘለዎም ሰባት እዩ ብዋናነት ዝመሓላለፍ ።
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have recovered from the disease, and the virus is transmitted mostly by coughing, snouting, or speaking, among those who have to replace small drops.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: እዞም ንጣባት ንደገ ኣብ ምትንፋስ ዝፍጠሩ ዋላ እንተኾኑ፣ ናብ ነዊሕ ርሐቐት ከይዶም ክንዲ ሰብ ምብካል ናብ መሬት ወይ ካልኦት ቦታታት እዮም ዝወድቁ።
en-mt: Although these drops are caused by breathing outside, they go to long distances and fall to the ground or other places instead of infecting humans.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: ሰባት ዝተበከለ ቦታ ነኺኦም ዓይኖም፣ ኣፍንጭኦም ወይ ኣፎም ብምንካእ ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: People can be infected with eyes, nose, or mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረሳት ኣብ ደጋዊ ቦታታት ን 72 ሰዓታት ዝኣክል ክጸንሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The virus can survive in outdoor areas for up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: ኣብ ናይቲ ምልክታት ዝጀመረሉ ናይ መጀመርያ ሰለስተ መዓልቲታት ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፊ እዩ፣ ምምሕልላፍ ኣብ ዳሕራይ ናይቲ ሕማ ደረጃታት እውን ክፍጠር ዝኽእል እንተኾነ እውን። ናይ ሕማም ውጽኢት ምርካብ ስታንዳርድ ሜላ ብናይ ብሓቂ ሪቨርስ ትራንስክሪፕቴዝ ፖሊመሬዝ ቸይን (rRT-PCR) ካብ ናዞፋሬንጃል ስዋብ ብምውሳድ እዩ።
en-mt: It is highly contagious during the first three days of the symptoms, and transmission can also occur later in the stages of the disease, but the Standard Method for obtaining a disease outcome is actually by taking a river transcriptase polymerase chin (rRT-PCR) from nazofarenjal swab.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: ማስክ ምጥቃም ነቶም ባዕሎምን ሓብሐብቶምን በቲ ቫይረስ ተታሒዝና ኢና ኢሎም ዝጥርጥሩ እዩ ዝምከር።
en-mt: Wearing a mask is recommended for those who suspect themselves and their siblings of being infected with the virus.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.

en-mt: Soaps and detergent are also suitable if used properly, and soap production weakens the virus's protective equipment, prevents it from working, and removes it from the skin and other places.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: ካልኦት ፈሰስቲ፣ ከም benzalkonium chloride ን chlorhexidine gluconate (ሰርጂካል ዲስኢንፌክታንት)፣ ትሕት ዝበለ ኣድማዒነት ኣለዎም። ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ብዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ፣ ድሕሪ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂስካ ምሕካ ምጅማሩ ናይ እንትፍታፍ ናሙናታት ብማእኸላይ ኣብ ክልተ መዓልቲታት ተወሲዶም።
en-mt: Other lice, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate, have lower effectiveness; in a study in Hong Kong, the testicle samples were taken in an average of two days after bedtime care began.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: ካብ ሽዱሽተ ተሓከምቲ ሓሙሽቲኦም፣ አቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናሙና እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ በዝሒ ኣርእዩ፣ እቲ ሻዱሻይ ድማ ኣብ ካልኣይ መዓልቱ ክምርመር እንከሎ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ በዝሒ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Five out of six patients, the first sample showed the highest number of viruses, and the sixth had the highest number of cases when tested on the second day.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ንመጀመርታ ኣብ ከተማ ዉሃን ሰለስተ ከቢድ ናይ ምትንፋስ ሕማምን ናይ ሳምባ ምቺ ሕማም ኣብዝተረኽቦም ሰለስተ ሰባት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) was first detected in three people in Wuhan with three serious respiratory illnesses and pneumonia.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ሓድሽ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ኩሎም ባህርያታት ብተፈጥሮኦም ምስ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝመሳሰሉ ኮይኖም እዮም ዝርከቡ።
en-mt: All characteristics of the new SARS-CoV-2 virus are inherently similar to the coronavirus.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: ካብ ናይ ሰብ ሰብነት ወጻኢ፣ እዚ ቫይረስ በቲ ናይ ዳጋዊ መከላኸሊኡ ዘንተዓሉ፣ ናይ ገዛ ሳሙና ይመውት እዩ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ እቲ ዋና SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ እዩ።
en-mt: Outside the body, the virus dies from household soap, sars-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: ሳንቡእት እዮም ብኮቪድ-19 ብ ኣብዝሓ ዝጉድኡ ኦርጋናት ምኽንያቱ እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እቲ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ዋህዮታት ብኤንዛይም ኣንጂዮቴንሲን-ቀያሪ ኤንዛይም 2 (ACE2) ብምጥቃም ይኣቱ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ሳንቡኣት ዓይነት II ኣሊቪዮላር ዋህዮታት ብበዝሒ እዩ ዝርከብ።
en-mt: Lungs are the most damaged organ by COVID-19 because the virus enters the human cells using enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most common in lung type II aliviolar cells.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ፍሉይ ግላይኮፕሮቲን "ስፓይክ" (peplomer) ተጠቒሙ ምስ ACE2 ይተሓሓዝ እሞ ናብ እቲ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ዋህዮ ይኣቱ።
en-mt: The virus uses a specific glycoprotin "spike" (peplomer) to be attached to ACE2 and enters the person's cell.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ልቢ ጉድኣት ኣብ 12% ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ተረኺቡ ኣብ ውሃን፣ ቻይና ሆስፒታል ኣብ ዝኣተዉ ሕሙማት ኣጋጢሙ፣ ኣብ ኣዝዮም ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ድማ ይብእስ።
en-mt: Serious heart injuries were found in 12% of people infected, hospitalized in Wuhan, China, and became more seriously ill.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: ናይ ካርድዮቫስኩላር ምልክታት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ልዑል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ብምኽኒያት ኣብ ናይ እዚ ሕማም ከይዲ ዝህሉ ስርዓታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ መልሲን ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ስርዓትን ጸገምን እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ሓድሽ ማይካርዲያል ጉድኣት ምስ ናይ ልቢ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ምኽንያት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Cardiovascular symptoms are comparatively high, which is due to systemic infection responses and immune system problems due to the go-to disease, but new mycardial damage with heart ACE2 receptors may be the cause.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: ናይ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ኣብ ልቢ ብዙሓት እዮም ምስ ናይ ልቢ ስራሕ ድማ ዝተተሓሓዙ እዮም።
en-mt: ACE2 receptors are numerous in the heart and are associated with cardiovascular function.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ደም ምርጋእ ኣጋጣሚ (31%) ናይ ቬነስ ደም ምርጋእ (25%) ኣብ ናይ ICU ናይ ኮቪደ-19 ሕሙማት ተረኺቡ እዩ እዚ ዳማ ምስ ድኹም ናይ ትንበያ ተኽእሎ ክተሓሓዝ ይኽእል እዩ። ብኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ሬሳ ምርመራ ዲፊዩዝ ኣሊቮላር ጉድኣት (DAD)፣ ከምኡውን ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ ሳንባ ሊምፎሳይታት ዝሓዙ ናይ ቁጥዐ ነዃላት ተረኺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: High blood clots (31%) of Venus blood clots (25%) have been found in ICU cases of COVID-19 patients, which can be linked to poor predictability. Dead people caused by COVID-19 have been found to have autopsies for defuse alivoric damage (DAD); and angry hives containing lymphocysis inside the lungs.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: SARS-COV-2 ን ACE2-ንናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ኢፒተልያል ዋህዮታት ዝገልጽ ትሮፒዝም ኣለዎ፣ ከቢድ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ስርዓታዊ ሃይፐርኢንፍላሜሽን ምልክታት ኣለውዎም።
en-mt: SARS-COV-2 and ACE2 have a tropism that describes the respiratory epithelial cells, and people with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hypertension.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ብፍላይ፣ ኣብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓመሙ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንባ ፓቶሎጂ ዘለዎም ሰባት፣ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ GM-CSF-መምረቲ T-cells ምስ ናይ ኢንፍላማቶሪ IL-6-መምረቲ ሞኖሳይታት ክተሓባበሩ ተራእዮም እዮም ።
en-mt: In people with severe lung pathology for COVID-19, GM-CSF-based T-cells have been shown to cooperate with IL-6 test monocys.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: ሊምፎሳይቲክ ኢንፍልትሬት ኣብ ናይ ሬሳ ምርመራ ክርከቡ ክኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Lymphocytic infusions were able to be found in autopsies.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: WHO ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ እዚ ሕማም ናይ ምርመራ ፕሮቶኮላት ኣሐቲሙ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: እቲ ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ምርመራ መንገዲ real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)እዩ።
en-mt: the real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ ኣብ ናይ መተንፈሲ ናሙናታት ብ ናዞፋሪንጃል ስዋብ ዝካየድ እዩ; እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ኣፍንጫ ስዋብ ወይ ዓኽታ እውን ምጥቃም ይከአል እዩ።
en-mt: he test is conducted in respiratory samples with nazofarinjal swab; However, it is also possible to use nose and mouth.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: ውጽኢታት ብሓፈሻ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝተወሰኑ ሰዓታት ክሳብ ክልተ መዓልቲታት ምርካብ ይከኣል።
en-mt: Results can generally be obtained within a few hours of up to two days.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: ናይ ደም ምርመራታት ምጥቃም ይከኣል፣ እዚ ግን ክልተ ናይ ደም ናሙናታት በቢ ክልተ ሰሙን ኣፈላላይ ክውሰዱ ይሓትት፣ ድማ ውጽኢታት ድማ ቅልጡፍ ዝኾነ ዋጋ ዳርጋ የብሎምን።
en-mt: Blood tests can be used, but this requires that two blood samples be separated every two weeks, and results are almost immediate.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ሳይንቲስታት ናይ እቲ ኮሮናቫይረስ ስተረይን ክፈልዩን ናይ ጀነቲክ ተኸታታልነት ከሐትሙን ክኢሎም እዮም፣ በዚድማ ኣብ ዓለም ዘለዉ ቤት ፈተነታት ኩሎም ዓርሶም ክኢሎም ነቶም በቲ ቫይረስ ዝመጽእ ረኽሲ ንምልላይ ዝግበሩ ናይ polymerase chain reaction (PCR)( ፖሊመሬዝ ሰንሰለታዊ ምውሃድ) ፈተነታት ንኸካይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: Chinese scientists have been able to isolate the coronavirus and print genetic traces, so that all the world's trials have tested their fields to detect polymerase chain reaction (PCR) to detect infections.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: ካብ 4 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምርመራ (ንጡፋት ረኽሲታት ከለሊ ይኽእል እቲ ሰብ ድማ ቅድሚ ሕዚ ተለኺፉ ምንባሩ ንፍላጥ የኽእል) ኣብ ምዕባለ ኔሮም፣ ብሰፊሑ ግን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣይወዓሉን።
en-mt: As of April 4, 2020, antibody tests (which can detect active infections and allow the person to be infected in the past) have been developed, but they are not widely used.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ናይ ምርመራ ተሞክሮ እቲ ትኽክለኝነት ካብ 60 ክሳብ 70% ከምዝኾነ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: China's testing experience showed that the test was between 60 and 70%.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዘሎ FDA ነቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ ምርመራ ነጥቢ ኣብ 21 ማርች 2020 ኣብቲ ወርሒ መወዳእታ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንክውዕል ፈቒዱ። ናይ ምርመራ መምርሒታት ብናይ ውሃን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ጆንግናን ሆስፒታል ብክሊኒካላዊ ባህርያታትን ኢፒደሞሎጂካል ሓደጋታትን ረኽሲታት ናይ ምርካብ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: The FDA in the United States approved the first diagnostic point for use at the end of the month on March 21, 2020, and diagnostic guidelines have proposed the discovery of infections from clinical characteristics and epidegological risks at Water and University Jongna Hospital.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: ናይ ምልካፍ ዕድል ዝቕንሱ መከላኸሊ መገዲታት ኣብ ገዛኻ ምጽናሕ፣ ሰብ ዝበዝሖም ቦታታት ምውጋድ፣ ኣእዳው ብሳሙናን ማይን እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ምሕጻብ፣ ጽቡቕ ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ጽሬት ብምሕላውን ዓይኒ፣ ኣፍንጫ ወይ ኣፍ ምንካእ ምውጋድን ዘተቓልል እዩ።
en-mt: Preventive measures that reduce the risk of infecting include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, maintaining good respiratory hygiene and avoiding eye, nose or mouth contact.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: CDC ክትስዕሉ ወይ ክትህንጥሱ ከለኹም ኣፍኩም ብሶፍት ምሽፋንን ሶፍት እንተዘይሃሊኩም ድማ ኩርናዕ ኢድኩም ክትጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: he CDC advises you to cover your mouth with softness when coughing or sneging and if you don't have a soft hand.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: ግቡእ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ድሕሪ ምስዓል ወይ ምህንጣስ ዝበረታታዕ እዩ።
en-mt: Proper hand hygiene is encouraged after coughing or sneering.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: CDC ምልክት ካብ ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለት ንምግታእ፣ ብዙሕ ሰብ ኣብ ዘለዎ ቦታ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ምጥቃም ይመክር። ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ጉዕዞታት ብምግዳብን ናይ ብዙሕ ሰብ ምእካብ ዘለዎ ቦታታት ብምዕጻውን፣ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ምስ ብዙሓት ሰባት ንከይራኸቡ ቤት ትምህርቲታትን ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ብምዕጻው ዝተገበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: The CDC recommends limiting the ability to communicate from people who don't show signs, wearing face masks where there is a large number of people; restricting social distancing methods; restricting travel and closing crowded gathering places; closing schools and workplaces to keep infected people from contacting more people.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: ናይ ርሕቐት ምሕላው መምርሒታት ሰባት እንተንኢሱ 6 ጫማ (1.8 ሜ) ክረሓሓቑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Distance-keeping guidelines should keep people away from at least 6 feet (1.8 m).

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: ኮቪድ -19 ንምክልኻል ብቑዕ ዝኾነ መድሓት የለን። ከትባት ድማ ዝቐረበ ተባሂሉ ክሳብ 2021 ትጽቢት ኣይግበሮን፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምቁጽጻር ቁልፊ ሜላ ናይ እዚ ለበዳ ጫፍ ምውራድ እዩ እዚ ድማ፣ "ነቲ ከርቭ ፍላት ምግባር "ይበሃል።
en-mt: here is no effective vaccine to prevent COVID-19, and the vaccine is not expected until 2021, the key method of controlling COVID-19 is to lower the tip of the pandemic, which is called "making the kerv flat."

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: CDC ውልቀ ሰባት በተደጋጋሚ እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ኢዶም ክሕጸቡ ይመክር፣ ብፍላይ ድሕሪ ናብ ሽንቲ ቤት ምኻድኩም ወይ ኣእዳውኩም ዝረአ ርስሓት እንተሊዎ፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕ ወይ ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫኹም ምንፋጥኩም፣ እንተስዒልኩም ወይ እንተሀንጢስኩም።

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
