en-mt: People are provided with care, including fluid therapy, oxidation assistance and other large organ damaged organ.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: CDC እቲ ቫይረስ ከምዘለዎም ዝጥርጥሩ ሰባት ማስክ ክገብሩ ኣለዎም ኢሉ።
en-mt: The CDC said people suspected of having the virus should wear masks.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) ናይ ስርት ምስትንፋስ ውድቀት ኣብ ምፍታሕ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝወዓለ እዩ፣ ዝህቦም ጥቕሚታት ግን ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣብ ግምት ውሽጢ እናኣተዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to resolve respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: ውልቃዊ ጽሬታትን ጥዕንኡ ዝሓለወ መነባብሮን ኣመጋግባን ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምምዕባል ዝምከሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Personal hygiene and healthy living and nutrition are recommended for the development of immune system.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: ሓገዝቲ ሕክምናታት ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ኣብ ዘለዎም ሰባት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያታት ምልክታት እዮም ዝጠቕሙ። WHO ን ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሸንን ብኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ሆስፒታል ናይ ዝደቀሱ ሰባት መተሓመሚ መምርሒታት ኣሐቲሞም።
en-mt: Medical aid is used in early symptoms of people with mild symptoms, who and the Chinese National Health Commission have published guidelines on the treatment of people hospitalized with COVID-19.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዝርከቡ ተመራመርቲ ሕክምና ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ምንጪታት ዝረኽብዎም ሓበሬታታትን ምኽርታትን ናብ IBCC ብምጥርቓም ብነጻ የቕርቡ።
en-mt: Medical researchers in the Us provide information and advice they receive from a variety of sources free of charge to the IBCC.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ፣ ንኮቪድ-19 ዝኸውን መድሓኒት የለን።
en-mt: As of April 2020, there is no cure for COVID-19.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: ንምልክታት፣ ገለ ናይ ሕክምና ሰብ ሞያታት paracetamol (acetaminophen) ኣብ ልዕሊ ibuprofen ከም ናይ መጀመርያ መጥቀሚ መሰመር ገይሮም ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) as a first line of use against ibuprofen.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: ብፍላይ ከም ኢንቲቤሽን ወይ ናይ ኢድ ቬንትሌሽን ዝበሉ ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መሰናድኦ ኤሮሶላት ክፈርዩ ዝኽእሉ ከይዲታት ኣብ ዝስረሐሎም እዋናት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምምሕልላፍ ዓቕሚ ንምቕናስ ቅድመ ጥንቃቐታት ክውሰዱ ኣለዎም ።
en-mt: Precautions should be taken to reduce the spread of the virus, especially when travel restrictions, such as intibation or hand ventilation, can produce aerosols in health care arrangements.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: ነቶም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝከናኸኑ ናይ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታት፣ እቲ CDC ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ደረጃ ጽሬት ጥንቃቐታት፣ ናይ ኽንክን ጥንቃቐታትን ናይ ብኣየር ምምሕልላፍ ጥንቃቐታትን ምስ ምጥቃም ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ናይ ብኣየር ዝመሓላለፉ ረኽሲታት መፍለዪ ክፍሊ (AIIR) ከእትውዎ ይመክር። እዚ CDC ኣብ እዚ ናይ እዚ ለበዳ ግዘ እዚ ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ (PPE) ኣጠቓቕማ መምርሒ ኣውጺኡ እዩ።
en-mt: Health professionals who care for people with COVID-19 recommend that the sick person be placed in the AirBorne Infection Identification Unit (AIIR) in addition to using the hygiene standards, care precautions and air-transmission precautions.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: እቲ ዝምክር ናይ ዓርሰ ምክልኻል ዕጥቂ: PPE ጋውን፣ መተንፈሲ ወይ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ፣ ናይ ዓይኒ መከለኸሊን ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲታትን እዮም። ቅሩባት እንተኾይኖም፣ መተንፈሲታት (ኣብ ክንዲ ናይ ገጽ ማስክታት) ይምረጹ።
en-mt: The recommended contraceptive arm is PPE gann, respiratory or face masks, eye protection and medical gloves. If they are available, respirators (rather than face masks) are chosen.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: N95 መተንፈሲታት ንኢንዳስትራያል መሰናድኦ ፈቓድ ረኺቦም እዮም ግን FDA እዞም ማስክታት ኣብ ሃንደበታዊ ናይ ፈቓድ ምጥቃም (EUA) ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ እዩ ዝፈቅድ።
en-mt: N95 respirators have been approved for industrial arrangements, but the FDA allows these masks to be used in emergencies in the use of permits (EUA).

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: እዚኦም ካብ ከም ኣቦራ ዝበሉ ናይ ብኣየር ዝመሓላለፉ ንጥረ ነገራ ንክከላኸሉ ተባሂሎም ዝተነደፉ እዮም፣ ይኹን ደኣምበር፣ ኣብ ዝተወሰኑ ስነ-ሂወታውያን ኤጀንታት ንምጥቃም ዘኽእል ውሕስና የብሎምን።
en-mt: hese are designed to protect against airborne substances such as abra, but they are not safe for use in certain ecosystems.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: ማስክ ዘይርከበሉ ግዘ፣ CDC ናይ ገጽ መከላኸሊ ወይ፣ ከም ናይ መወዳእታ መማረጺ ድማ ኣብ ገዛ ዝተሰርሑ ማስክታት ክትጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: When you do not have a face mask, the CDC recommends wearing face masks or as a last resort.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ሜካኒካዊ ቬንትሌሽን ወይ ካልእ መማረጺ ክሳብ ዘድሊ ከበድቲ ኣይኮኑን፣ ዝተወሰኑ ክፋላት ናይ እዞም ጉዳያት ለበዳ ግን ዝደልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Most COVID-19 cases are not serious as long as a pandemic, mechanical ventilation or other options are needed, but some parts of these cases require a pandemic.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: ንኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትፋስ ውድቀት ዘጋጥሞም ሰባት ዘድልዮም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ንዘለዉ ሰባት ብንጥፈት እንዳተጸንዐ ይርከብ፣ ኢንቱቤሽን ንምውጋድ ብልዑል ፍሰት ዘለዎ ናይ ኣፍንጫ ካኑላ ወይ bi-level ፖዘቲቭ ናይ ኣየር መተንፈሲ ጸቕጢ ምውጋድ ይከኣል።
en-mt: he respiratory assistance required for people in hospital for COVID-19 respiratory failure is actively studied, and high-flowing respiratory pressure can be avoided with high-flow nasal canals or bi-level positive respiratory pressure to avoid infection.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: ካብ እዞም ክልተ እዚኦም ንኣዝዮም ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ናብ ተመሳሳሊ ረብሓ ዘምርሑ እንተኾይኖም ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: It is not yet known whether any of these two lead to the same benefit for seriously ill people.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: ገለ ዶክተራት ኢንቫሲቭ ሜካኒካል ቬንትሌሽን ምጥቃም ይመርጹ ቅሩባት እንተኾይኖም ምኽንያቱ እዚ ሜላ እዚ ምስ ልዑል ናይ ኣፈንጫ ውሕዘት ካኑላ ክነጻጸር ከሎ ናይ ኢሮሶል ንጥረ ነገራት ምስርጫው ስለዝቕንስ። ከበድቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ዕድምኦም ዝደፍኡ ሰባት(ልዕሊ 60 ዓመቶም ኣብ ዝኾኑ፣ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ልዕሊ 80 ዓመቶም ሰባት) እዩ መብዛሕትኡ ዝፍጠር ።
en-mt: Some doctors prefer to use injection mechanical ventilation if available because this method reduces the spread of erosol particles compared to high canula flows, and serious cases of epidemiology are mostly created in people who are older (over the age of 60, especially people over the age of 80).

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝማዕበሉ ሃገራት ንሕድሕድ ሕሙም እኹል ዝኾነ ናይ ሆስፒታል ዓራት የብሎምን፣ እዚ ድማ ንናይ እቲ ሕክምና ስርዓት ዓቕሚ ብኮቪድ -19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንዝፍጠሩ ከበድቲ ጉዳያት መከናኸኒ ዓቕሙ ክወድቕ ዝገብሮ እዩ።
en-mt: Many developed countries do not have adequate hospital beds for each patient, which can undermine the capacity of the medical system to deal with serious cases of the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: ሓደ ኣብ ቻይና ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ከምዝረኸቦ 5% ናብ ጽዑቕ ክትትል ዩኒት ኣትዮም፣ 2.3% ሜካኒካል ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ የድልዮም ኔሩ፣ 1.4% ድማ ሞይቶም እዮም።
en-mt: A Chinese study found that 5% went into intensive monitoring units, 2.3% needed mechanical ventilation assistance, and 1.4% died.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ዳርጋ 30% ዝኾኑ ብኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝነበሩ ሰባት ቀስ እንዳበሉ ናብ ICU ኣትዮም እዮም።
en-mt: In China, about 30% of people hospitalized due to COVID-19 have been hospitalized in ICU.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: ሜካኒካዊ ቬንትሌሽን ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ክምዕብል ከሎ ውስብስብ ይኸውን ኦክሲጅኔሽን እውን ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: Mechanical ventilation in COVID-19 can be complex when an emergency respiratory dystrophy syndrome (ARDS) develops, and oxidation can be very difficult.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: ናይ ጸቕጢ ቁጽጽርን ልዑል PEEP ዘለዎም ቨንቲሌተራት ናይ ኦክሲጅን ምብጽጻሕ ብምውሳኽ ምስ ቬንትሌተር ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣታትን ኒሞቶራክስን ዝቕንሱ እዮም።
en-mt: Ventiators with pressure control and high PEEP increased access to oxidation, reducing pulmonary damage and pneumotorax associated with ventilators.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: ልዑል PEEP ኣብ ናይ ቀደም ቨንቲሌተራት ዘይክህሉ ይኽእል።
en-mt: High PEEP may not be found in old vents.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: ኣብቶም ክህልዉ ዝኽእሉ ሕክምናታት ዝግበር መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020 ተጀሚሩ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓታት ድማ ኣብ ክሊኒካላዊ ፈተነታት ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Studies on possible treatments began in January 2020, and various anti-virus treatments are under clinical trials.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: Remdesivir(ረምድስቪር) ዝሓሸ ተስፋ ወሃቢ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Remdesivir has been found to be a better provider of hope.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: ዋላ ሓደሽቲ መድሓኒታት ምምዕባል ክሳብ 2021 ክጸንሕ ዝኽኣሉ ይኹኑ፣ መብዛሕትኦም ዝፍተኑ ዘለዉ መድሓኒታት ግን ንካልኦት ጥቕሚታት ፈቓድ ረኺቦም ወይ ኣብ ልዑል ናይ ፈተነ ደረጃ እዮም ዘለዉ።
en-mt: Although the development of new drugs could last until 2021, most drugs being tested have either approved or are in a high-level trial for other uses.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: ጸረ ቫይረስ ሕክምና ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዝተረኣዮም ውልቀ ሰባት ክፍተን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Anti-virus treatment can be tested on individuals who have been diagnosed with a serious illness.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ኣብ ናይ ገለ መድሓታት ብቑዕነትን ደሕንነትን ውሕስነትን ንምርግጋጽ ኣብ ዝግበር ፈተነ ወለንታዊያን ን ክሳትፍ ሓቲቱ። FDA ንኮንቨልሰንት ፕላዝማ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ህይወት ብከቢድ ወይ ብቐጠታ ኣብ ሓደጋ ኣብ ዝኣትወሉ ግዘ ከም ናይ ፈተነ መድሓኒት ን ክኾን ግዜኣዊ ፈቓድ ሂቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has asked volunteers to participate in trials to ensure the quality, safety and safety of certain rescues, and the FDA has granted a temporary grant to the Plasma Collection as a trial medicine at a time when a person's life is seriously or permanently threatened.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ሕማም ደሕንነቱ ዝሓለወን ኣድማዒን ከምዝኾነ ዘርኢ ክሊኒካላዊ መጸናዕቲ ኣይገበረን።
en-mt: No clinical studies have shown that the disease is safe and effective.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ ቻይና ናይ እዚ ሕማም ለበዳ ንምቁጽጻር ናይ ሞባይል መተግበሪ ኣላልያ እያ።
en-mt: In February 2020, China installed a mobile app to control the pandemic.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: ተጠቀምቲ ሽሞምን ናይ ID ቁጽሮምን ከእትዉ ይሕተቱ።
en-mt: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: እዚ መተግበሪ ናይ ሰርቬላንስ ዳታ ብምጥቃም ናይ ረኽሱ ሓደጋ ኣጋጣሚ ክኸውን ዝኽእል ናይ 'ቀረባ ንኽክእ ' ክፈልጥ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: his app can use Cervelance data to detect a "near replacement" that can be a risk of infection.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: ሕድሕድ ተጠቃሚ ናይ ካልኦት ሰለስተ ተጠቀምቲ ኩነታት ክርኢ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Each user can see the conditions of the other three users.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: ሓደጋ ከስዕብ ዝኽእል ኣጋጣሚ እንተተፈጢሩ፣ እዚ መተግበሪ ዓርስኻ ምፍላይ ጥራሕ ዘይኮነ ዝመክር፣ ንከባቢያዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሰበ ስልጣናት እውን ይሕብሮም እዩ። ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፣ ታይዋንን ሲንጋፖርን ኣብ ተንቀሳቓሲ ቴሌፎን ዳታ፡ናይ ገጽ መለለዪ ቴክኖሎጂ፣ ናይ ሞባይል ተሌፎን መድለዪን ኣርቴፊሻል ኢንተለጀንስን ዝርከብ ናይ ቢግ ዳታ ኣናላይቲክስ ፣ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ንምእላሽን ዝነኽእዎም ሰባት ንምፍላጥን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕል እዩ።
en-mt: If there is a potential risk, this app advises not only self-identifying but also informs local health authorities. Big Data Analytics in mobile phone data, mobile phone search and artificial intelligence is used in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore to detect infected people and identify people who have touched them.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020፣ ናይ እስራኤል መንግስቲ ናይ ደሕንነት ኤጀንሲታት ኮሮናቫይረስ ናይ ዘለዎም ሰባት ሞባይል ተሌፎን ዳታ ንኽከታተሉ ፈቒዱሎም እዩ።
en-mt: In March 2020, the Israeli government allowed security agencies to monitor the mobile phone data of people with the coronavirus.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: እዚ ስጉምቲ ኳረንቲን ንምብርትታዕን ምስ ዝተለኸፉ ዜጋታት ዝተነኻኽኡ ሰባት ንምሕብሓን እዩ ተወሲዱ።
en-mt: The measures were taken to strengthen the Quarantine and to hide infected people with infected citizens.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020 እውን፣ Deutsche Telekom ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ንምጽናዕን ንምክልኻልን፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ተሌፎን ቦታታት ዳታ ንጀርመን ፌደራላዊ ኤጀንሲ፣ Robert Koch ትካል፣ ኣካፊልዎም።
en-mt: In March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared general telephone data with the German Federal Agency, Robert Koch Corporation, to study and prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: ሩስያ ኳረንቲ ሴሮም ዝወጹ ሰበት ንምልላይ ናይ ገጽ መለለዪ ቴክኖሎጂ ናብ ስራሕ ኣእቲያ ኣላ።
en-mt: Russia has put facial identification technology into operation to identify the exits of the Cerem Quarantine.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: ናይ ጣልያን ክልላዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽነር ጁሊዮ ጋሌራ ብሞባይል ተሌፎን አፕሬተራት "40% ዝኾኑ ሰባት ምንቅስቓሶም ቀጺሎም " ከምዘለዉ ከምዝተሓበረ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Italian Regional Health Commissioner Giulio Galleira said mobile phones "about 40% of people are still moving."

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: መንግስቲ ጀርመን ልዕሊ 42,000 ተሳተፍቲ ዝተዓደምሉ ናይ 48 ሰዓታት ሃካቶን ኣካይዱ።
en-mt: The German government held a 48-hour hackathon where more than 42,000 participants were invited.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: ናይ Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid ፕረዚዳንት፣ ኣንጻር ኮሮናይረስ ዝኸውን ዓለምለኻዊ ፈጠራዊ መፍትሒ ክፍጠር ጻውዒት የቕርቡ።
en-mt: The president of The President of Kersti Kaljulaid of Eschat has called for a global creative solution against coronavirus.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: ውልቀሰባት ኣብ ኳረንቲን፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ጎድናዊ ጸገማትን ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ፍርሒ ንባዕሉ ጭንቀት ከሕድረሎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Individuals in quarantine, travel restrictions, side problems and fear of infection can themselves become depressed.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: BBC ሮርይ ኦኮኖር ኢሉዎ ኣብ ዝበሎ "ማሕበራዊ ተነጽሎ፣ ጽምዋ፣ጥዕናዊ ጭንቀት፣ ኣዕምሮኣዊ ውጥረትን ኢኮኖሚካዊ ውድቀትን እንትበዝሕ፣ ንናይ ሰባት ስነ ኣእምሮኣዊ ጥዕናን ደሕነነት ዝጎድኡ ነገራት እዮም"።
en-mt: he BBC's Rory O'Connor said: "Social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, mental stress and economic collapse are things that are harmful to people's mental health and well-being."

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ካልኦት ልሙዳት ከም ሰዓል ዝበሉ ናይ ላዕለዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማማት ብዝምስል መልክዑ ዝተወሰኑ ምልክታት ክህልውዎ ይኽእሉ ወይ ምንም ምልክታት ዘይከርኢ ይኽእል።
en-mt: he disease may have some symptoms or may not show any symptoms in the form of other upper respiratory diseases, such as cough.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: ቀለልቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ውሽጢ ክልተ ሰሙናት ይሓውዩ፣ እቶም ከቢድ ወይ ኣስጋኢ ሕማም ዘለዎም ግን ንክሓውዩ ካብ ሰለስተ ክሳብ ሽድሽተ ሰሙናት ይወስደሎም እዩ።
en-mt: Simple cases of a pandemic can heal within two weeks, but those with serious or serious diseases take three to six weeks to recover.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: ካብ ከም SARS ን MERS ን ዝበሉ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ሓበሬታ ዝተማልእ ኣይኮነን፣ ካልኦት ተመሳሰልቲ ቫይረሳት ዝተወሰደ ሓበሬታ ከምዘርእዮ፣ ጥኑሳት ኣንስቲ ንናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከቢድ ረኽሲ ተጋለጽቲ እየን። ኣብ ገለ ሰባት፣ ኮቪድ-19 ን ሳንቡእ ብምጥቃዕ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ከሰዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Covid-19 information from other similar viruses, such as SARS and MERS, is not complete, and pregnant women are at highest 19 infections, and in some people, COVID-19 and the lungs can cause lung stroke.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: ኣብ እዞም ብከቢድ ዝተሃሰዩ፣ ኮቪድ-19 ብቕልጡፍ ናብ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ብምዕባይ ናብ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ውድቀት፣ ሰፕቲክ ሾክ ወይ ናብ ናይ ብዙሓት ኣካላት ሰብነት ውደቀት ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In those severely affected, COVID-19 can quickly increase to severe respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and lead to respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: እቶም ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተተሓሓዙ ዝኸፍኡ ጽልዋታት ሰፕሲስ፣ ዘይስሩዕ ደም ምርጋእን ናይ ልቢ፣ ኩላሊትን ጉበትን ጉድኣትን ዝጠቓለሉ እዮም።
en-mt: he worst effects associated with COVID-19 include coughing, irregular blood clots and heart, kidneys and liver damage.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: ናይ ደም ምርጋእ ዘይንቡር ኣጋጣሚታት፣ ብፍላይ ናይ ፕሮትሮምቢን ምውሳኽ፣ ኣብቶም ብ ኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝደቀሱ 6% ሰባት ተራእዩ፣ ዘይንቡር ናይ ኩሊት ተግባር እውን ኣብ 4% ናይ እዞም ጉጅለ ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Abnormal blood clots, especially increased proprorombin, were observed in 6% of hospital beds due to COVID-19, and abnormal kidney function was observed in 4% of these groups.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: ዳርጋ ካብ 20-30% ዝኾኑ ብኮቪድ -19 ዝተተሓዙ ሰባት ልዑል ናይ ጸሊም ከበዲ ኤንዛይማት (ትራንሳሚኔዝ) ኣርእዮምእዮም።
en-mt: Approximately 20 to 30% of people infected with COVID-19 showed high dark absorptive enzymes.

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: ብመሰረት ተመሳሳሊ ጸብጻብ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ምልክታት ዝረኣዩሉ መዓልቲን ሞትን ዘሎ ኣፈላላይ ዓሰርተ መዓልቲ እዩ፣ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝጽንሑሉ መዓልቲ እዩ።
en-mt: According to the same report, the difference between the day of symptoms and death is ten days, five days of hospitality.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ እቶም ናብ ICU ዝተዘዋወሩ ሕሙማት ካብ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂሶም ምሕካም ዝጀመሩሉ ስጋብ ሞት ብማእኸላይ ሸውዓተ መዓልቲታት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: However, patients who have been transferred to ICU have an average of seven days to die from lying in the hospital.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያታት መጽናዕቲ፣ ናይ መጀመርያ ምልክታት ድሕሪ ምርኣይ ክሳብ ሞት ዘሎ ግዘ 14 መዓልቲታት እዩ፣ ካብ ሽድሽተ ክሳብ 41 መዓልቲታት ግን ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In the first study, the duration of the first symptoms is 14 days to death, but may be 6 to 41 days.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: ብ National Health Commission (NHC) (ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን) ዝተገበረ ጽንዓት፣ ሰብኡት ናይ 2.8% ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እንትህልዎም ኣንስቲ ድማ 1.7% ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እዩ ዘለወን።
en-mt: According to the National Health Commission (NHC), men have a comparative mortality rate of 2.8% and women have a comparative mortality rate of 1.7%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: ናይ ዝሞተ ሰብ ሳንባ ናይ ሂስቶፓቶሎጂካል ምርመራታት ናሙናታት ዲፊዩዝ ኣልቪዮላር ጉድኣት ኣብ ክልቲኦም ሳንባታት ድማ ፋይብሮሜክሶይድ ኤክሱዴታት ሒዞም ይርከቡ።
en-mt: A dead person's lungs, histopathological tests, samples of defetus alviollar damage and fibromexoid exudes in both lungs.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: ቫይራል ሳይቶ ፓቲክ ለውጢታት ኣብ ኒሞሳይታት ተራይኦም እዮም።
en-mt: Viruses in the pathopathic mutations are found in the nemocytics.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: እዚ ናይ ሳንባ ስእሊ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ይመስል።
en-mt: This picture of the lung appears to be an emergency respiratory dysteres syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: ኣብ 11.8% ብናይ ቻይና ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን ጸብጻብ ዝተገበሩ ሞታት፣ ናይ ልቢ ጉድኣት ብናይ ትሮፖኒን ምልዓል ወይ ናይ ልቢ ምዕራፍ ዝመጹ እዮም።
en-mt: In 11.8% of the cases reported by China's Health Commission, the death toll comes from a troponin lift or heart chapter.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: ካብ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ዝወጹ ናይ ማርች ዳታታት ብዝብልዎ መሰረት፣ 89% እቶም ደቂሶም ዝሕከሙ ዘለዉ ሰባት ቅድሚኡ ካልእ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ዝነበሮም እዮም። ናይ ሕክምናዊ ምንጪታትን ሶሽዮኢኮኖሚክ ዓቕሚን ንበዝሒ ሞት ይጸልዉ እዮም።
en-mt: According to March data released from the United States, 89% of those who are being treated for sleeping have had other health conditions before, and medical sources and social capacity affect the number of deaths.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: ብ ሰንኪ ክልላዊ ፍልልያትን ከምኡውን ብሜትዶሎጂካል ፍልልይ እዚ ናይ ዝሞቱ በዝሒ ግምታት ዝተፈላለዩ እዮም።
en-mt: he number of deaths is different due to regional differences and meteorological differences.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: ነቶም ቀለልቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ብኣግባቡ ዘይምቑጻር ናይ እቲ ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ካብ እቲ ዝተገመተ ንላዕሊ ክገብሮ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Failure to properly count the simple cases of the pandemic could make the relative mortality rate higher than estimated.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር ሕጂ ዝረኣዩ ሞት ናይ ዝጸንሑ ሕሙማን ብምዃኖም ናይ ሕጂ መጠን ሞት ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ኣይግልጹን
en-mt: However, the current death rate is not fully defined as the number of patients who have died.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: ሽጋራ መትከኽቲ 1.4 ግዘ ከቢድ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ናይ ምርኣይ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎም ዳርጋ 2.4 ግዘ ጽዑቕ ክትትል የድልዮም እዩ፣ ወይ ድማ ምስ ዘየትክኹ ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ክሞቱ ዝኽእሉ እዮም። ብዛዕባ ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ሳዕቤን ስግኣታት ነይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Cigarette smokers have the potential to see severe COVID-19 symptoms at 1.4, need nearly 2.4-time intensive monitoring, or they may die when compared to non-smokers.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: ናይ ሆንግ ኮንግ ሆስፒታላት ምምሕዳር ኣብቶም ካብ እቲ ሕማም ዝሓውዩ ሰባት 20% ክሳብ 30% ዝኸውን ናይ ሳንባ ዓቕሚ ምውራድ ረኺቡ፣ ናይ ሳንባ ስካናት ድማ ናይ ሰብነት ኣካላት ዕንወት ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: The management of Hong Kong hospitals found a 20% to 30% drop in lung capacity in people recovering from the disease, and lung scans showed a debacle of the body.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ምሕዋይ፣ ናብ ድሕሪ-ጽኑዕ ክትትል ሲንድረም ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: his can lead to a post-acute syndrome.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: ስጋብ ማርች 2020፣ ዝሓለፉ ረኽሲታት ንጡፍን ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘን ናይ ሰብነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ክፈጥሩ ይኽኣሉ ኣይኽኣሉ ኣይፍለጥን እዩ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, past infections may cause active and long-term immunity from the body's disease.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: በቶም ካልኦት ኮሮናቫይረሳት ባህርይ መሰረት ዝገበሩ፣ በዚ ሕማም ዘይምጥቓዕ ተኸእሎታት ኣለዉ እዮም፣ ካብ ኮቨድ-19 ዝሓወዩ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ድሕሪ ግዘ ብ ናይ ኮረናቫይረስ ፖዘቲቭ ውጽኢት ዝተዓጀቡ ምዃኖም ዘርእዩ ጸብጻባት ወጺኦም እዮም።
en-mt: Based on the nature of other coronaviruses, there are non-infectable conditions, and reports of cases of COVID-19 recovered from covid-19 have been reported positively after the coronavirus.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: እዞም ኬዛት ናይ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝጸንሐ ረኽሲ ምግዳድ እምበር ዳግም በቲ ረኽሲ ምትሓዝ ኣይኮኑን ተባሂሉ ይእመን።
en-mt: It is believed that these cases are not a recurrence of the infection, but of forcing a long-standing infection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ተፈጥሮኣዊን ብመንገዲ ካብኡ ዝወሓዘ ረኽሲ ናይ እንስሳ መበቆል ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: It is believed that the virus has a natural and animal origin infection.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: ትኽክለኛ መበቆሉ ኣይፍለጥን፣ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 ግን ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ዝርጋሐ ዳርጋ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ዝተመሓላለፈ እዩ።
en-mt: Its exact origin is unknown, but by December 2019, the spread of the infection was almost entirely human-to-human.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020 ኣብ The Lancet ዝተሓተመ ኣብቶም ናይ መጀመርያ ዝተረጋጋጹ 41 ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ፣ ጀሚሩ ዘሎ ናይ እቶም ምልክታት ዝተርኣዩሉ መጀመሪ ዕለት 1 ዲሰምበር 2019 ከም ዝኾነ ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: A study of the first confirmed cases of COVID-19, published in The Lancet in January 2020, showed that the first confirmed cases of COVID-19 began on 1 December 2019.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: ካብ WHO ዝወጹ ዕላዊ ሕታማት ነቶም ቀዲሞም ዝተርኣዩ ምልክታት ኣብ 8 ዲሰምበር 2019 ጸብጺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: Official issues from the WHO reported the previous symptoms on December 8, 2019.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ናይ ሞት በዝሒ ንምቑጻር ብዙሓት ስጉምቲታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are many steps to reduce the number of deaths.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽሪታት እዚኦም በቢ ክልሉን በቢ ግዜኡን ይፈላለዩ እዮም፣ ብ ናይ ምርመራ በዝሒ፣ ናይ ስርዓት ጥዕና ክንክን ጽፈት፣ ናይ ሕክምና መማረጺታት፣ ካብ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ለበዳ ዘጋጠመሉ ግዘ ዘሎ ግዘን ናይ እቲ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ባህርያትን ንኣብነት ከም ዕድመ፣ ጾታን ሓፈሻዊ ጥዕናንን ይጽሎ እዩ።
en-mt: hese numbers vary by region and by time, depending on the number of tests, the quality of the health care system, the selection of treatment options, the quality of the population from the time of the first pandemic and the characteristics of the population, e.g. age, gender and general health.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: ኣብ 2019 መወዳእታታት፣ WHO ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ICD-10 ሕማም ኮዳት ሂቡ፣ U07.1 ንካብ ብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ዘጋጠመ ሞት፣ U07.2 ድማ ብዘይ ናይ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጸ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ብክሊኒካላዊ ወይ ኢፒደሞሎጂያዊ መንገዲ ብኮቪድ-19 ንዝሞቱ ሰባት። እዚ ካብ ሞት-ናብ- ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ዝሞቱ ሰባት በዝሒ ብዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ዝተወሃበ ግዘ ክካፈል ከሎ ዝብል እዩ ዘርኢ።
en-mt: In 2019, the end of 2019; WHO gave a sudden ICD-10 disease code; U07.1 deaths from laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection; and U07.2 for clinical or epidemiologically dead people from COVID-19; this is a sign that the number of deaths from death-to-epidemic cases is shared in cases of confirmed epidemic cases.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ Johns Hopkins University ስታትስቲክስ፣ ካብ 17 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ጉዳይት ለበዳ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) እዩ።
en-mt: According to Johns Hopkins University Statistics, from 17 April 2020, the global case epidemic of death is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191).

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: እዚ ቁጽሪ በቢ ክልሉ ይፈላለ እዩ። ካልኦት ስጉምቲታት ናይ ኬዝ ሞት ሬት (CFR) የካትት፣ በቲ ሕማም ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ሚእታዊ ዘንጸባርቕ፣ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ናይ ሞት ሬት (IFR) ሓዊሱ፣ ናይ ዝተለኸፉን በቲ ሕማም ናይ ዝሞቱን ሰባት ሚእታዊ የንጸባርቕ (ተመርመሩን ዘይተመርመሩን)።
en-mt: his number varies by region; other measures include case death resin (CFR), reflects the percent of deaths from the disease, burns the infection's death rect (IFR), and reflects the percent of infected and dying from the disease (diagnosed and undiagnosed).

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽራዊ መረዳእታታት እዚኦም ብግዘ ዝተገደቡ ኣይኩኑን፣ ብዝሓወየ ጉዳይ ለበዳ ገለ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ይኽተል።ጉዳይ ለበዳ ኣነጺርካ ብምርኣይ ረኽሲ ዝርከብ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ዝስዕቡ እዮም።
en-mt: hese numbers are not limited to time, but some of the population is affected by the pandemic, and the number of people infected by the pandemic.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: ኩሎም ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ሕማም ስለዘየማዕብሉ፣ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምህላው ብዛዕባ ክንደይ ሰባት ተኣኪቦም ዝብል ሓበሬታ ከቕርብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Since not all affected people develop a disease, the presence of anubodies can provide information about how many people have been collected.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: ኣብ ጣልያን ናይ መጀመርታ ማዕከል እዚ ለበዳ ዝኾንት ግዝኣት ካብ 4600 ዝኾኑ ነበርቲ 80 (1.7%) ሞይቶም።
en-mt: In Italy, the first epicenter of the outbreak, 80 (1.7%) of the 4600 inhabitants died.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: ኣብ ጋንግለት፣ እቲ ሕማም ብናይ ካርኒቫል ፌስቲቫል ምኽንያት አዩ ተላቢዑ፣ ናብ መናእሰይ እዩ ድማ ክላባዕ ክኢሉ በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ ውሑድ ሞት እዩ ኣጋጢሙ፣ ኩሎም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሞት ድማ ከምዚ ተባሂሎም ክፍለዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: In Ganglet, the disease was spread by carnival festivals and spread to young people, resulting in few deaths, and not all COVID-19 deaths should be classified as such.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ናይ ጀርመን ጥዕና ስርዓት ካብ ዓቕሙ ንላዕሊ ብዝኾነ ዋሕዚ ኣይተውሓጠን።
en-mt: Germany's health system is not overwhelmed.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ፣ ብመሰረት ኣብ ደም ለገስቲ ዝተገበረ ዳህሳስ 3% ዝኾኑ ኣንቲቦዲታት ክህልዎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In the Netherlands, about 3% of the blood donors may have antiabodies.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 ሰባት (0.004% ናይ እቲ በዝሒ ህዝቢ) ብኮቪድ-19 ከምዝሞተ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ።
en-mt: 69 people (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed dead from COVID-19.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ለበዳ እዚ ጽልዋን ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠኑን ኣብ ደቂ-ተባዕትዮን ደቂ-ኣንስትዮን ዝተፈላለየ እዩ።
en-mt: he impact of the pandemic and its comparative mortality on men and women are different.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: ብመሰረት ኣብ ቻይናን ጣልያንን ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣብ ሰብኡት ይበዝሕ።
en-mt: According to a study in China and Italy, the death rate is higher for men.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: ሰብኡት ናይ እቲ ዝዓበየ ናይ ተጋላጽነ ዕድመኦም ኣብ 50 ታት ዓመቶም እዩ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ኣንስቲን ሰብኡትን ዘሎ ኣፈላላይ ድማ 90 ጥራሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Men are in their 50s with the highest rap in their 50s, and the difference between men and women is only 90.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ንሰብኡት 2.8 ሚእታዊ እንትኸውን ንኣንስትዮ ድማ 1.7 ሚእታዊ እዩ።
en-mt: In China, the comparative mortality rate is 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ጾታ ፍልልይ ትኽክለኛ ምኽንያቱ ኣይተፈለጠን፣ ናይ ዘርኡን ባህሪያውን ምኽንያታት ግን ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: he exact reason for this gender difference is unknown, but they may be the reasons for its race and characteristics.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: ጾታ መሰረት ዝገበረ ናይ ሰበነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ኣፈላላያት፣ ኣብ ኣንስቲ ዘሎ ትሑት ሽፋን ምትካኽ፣ከም በዝሒ ደም ዝኣመሰሉ፣ በዝሒ ተደረብቲ ሕማማት ኣብ ሰብኡት ምብዝሖም፣ ንናይ ሰብኡት ብበዝሒ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እጃም ኣበርኪቱ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Gender-based immune responses, low coverage of women, the increase in the number of infectious diseases in men, such as blood volume, may have contributed to the comparative mortality rate for men.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: ኣብ ኣውሮፓ፣ 57% ዝተለኸፉ ውልቀ ሰባት ሰብኡት እንትኾኑ 72% ናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝሞቱ ሰባት እውን ሰብኡት እዮም።
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of infected individuals are men and 72% of covid-19 deaths are men.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ ኣሜሪካ መንግስቲ ምስ ጾታ ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ረኽሲታት ሓበሬታ ኣይከታተልን እዩ ዘሎ።
en-mt: As of April 2020, the U.S. government has not monitored data on sexually transmitted COVID-19 infections.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: መጽናዕቲታት ቫይራል ሕማማት ከም ኢቦላ፣ HIV፣ ኢንፍሉዌንዛን SARS ንሰብኡትን ኣንስቲን ብዝተፈላለዩ መገዲ እዮም ዘጥቅዑ።
en-mt: Viral disease studies such as Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: ልዑል ክፋል ናይ ጥዕና ሰራሕተኛታት፣ ብፍላይ ነርስታት፣ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ እየን፣ ናብ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ድማ ልዑል እዩ።
en-mt: A high proportion of health workers, especially nurses, are women and are more likely to be exposed to the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: ትካል ዓለም ጥዕና ኣብ ጥሪ 11,2020 ናይዚ ሕማም መጸውዒ ሽም "COVID-19" እዩ ኢሉ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On January 11, 2020, the World Health Organization declared the name of the disease "COVID-19."

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: ናይ ውደብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ሓላፊ ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ገብረየሱስ፣ CO ኮሮና ዝውክል እንትኸውን ፣ VI ድማ ናይ ቫይረስ፣ D ድማ ሕማም ማለት ከምዝኾነ ኣብራህሪሆም፣ 19 ድማ እቲ ለበዳ መጀመርያ ዝተፈለጠሉ ዓመተ ምህረት የመላኽት: 31 ዲሰምበር 2019።
en-mt: The head of the World Health Organization (WHO), Tedros Save Jesus; CO. represents the co-coronavirus; VI is a virus; D is a disease; 19 the year of mercy was first recognized by the angels on December 31, 2019.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: እዚ ሽም ናይ እንስሳት ዓሌት ወይ ናይ ሰባት ጉጅለ፣ ሽም እንተውጽእ ኣድልዎ ኣብ ምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ክኸውን ዝብል ዓለምለኻዊ ምኽሪታት መሰረት ብምግባር ንፍሉይ ጂኦግራፊያዊ ቦታ ከይገልጽ ተባሂሉ እዩ ተዋሂብዎ (ንኣብነት፣ ቻይና) ። እቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) እዩ ዝበሃል።
en-mt: he name is given to a special geographical location based on international advice that it will be used to prevent discrimination if an animal species or human group makes a name (e.g., China). The COVID-19 virus is called severe respiratory syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: WHO(ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም) ብተወሳኺ ን"ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ቫይረስ" ን "ንኮቪድ-19 ዘምጽእን ቫይረስ" ዝብሉ ኣገላልጻታት ኣብ ህዝባዊ መግለጺታት ይጠቀመሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: THE WHO (WHO) IS ALSO USING PUBLIC STATEMENTS TO DESCRIBE "THE COVID-19 VIRUS" AND "THE VIRUS THAT CAUSES COVID-19."

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: ክልቲኦም እቲ ሕማምን እቲ ቫይረስን "ኮሮናቫይረስ" ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ።
en-mt: Both the disease and the virus are called "coronavirus."

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ውሃን፣ቻይና ናይ መጀመርያ ለበዳ ግዘ፣ እቲ ሕማምን ቫይረስን ብሓባር "ኮሮናቫይረስ" ከምኡውን "ውሃን ኮሮናቫይረስ " ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ ነይሮም።
en-mt: During China's first pandemic, the disease and the virus were collectively referred to as "coronavirus" and "water and coronavirus."

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020፣ ነቲ ናይ 2015 ኣብ ናይ እቲ ሕማምን ቫይረስን ሽም ቦታታት ምጥቃም ዘይፍቀድ እዩ ዝብል መምርሒ መሰረት ብምግባር፣ ውደብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ናይ 2019-nCov ን 2019-nCoV ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም ናይ እቲ ቫይረስን ሕማም ዝብሉ ግዜያዊ መጸውዒ ሽማት ክኾኑ መኺሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In January 2020, in accordance with the 2015 guidelines on the unauthorised use of the names of the disease and the virus, the World Health Organization (WHO) has recommended the 2019-nCoV and 2019-nCoV be the temporary designations for severe respiratory disease and the virus.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ዕላዊ ሽማት ኣብ 11 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 እዮም ዕላዊ ተገይሮም።
en-mt: COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were official on February 11, 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ኣብ እቲ ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ዘሎ ናይ ዓቕሚ ሕጽረት፣ ገለ ዲጂታል መፍረይቲ ከም ናይ ኣፍንጫ ስዋባትን ናይ ቨንትሌተር ኣካላትን ዝበሉ ናይ ጥዕና ናውቲታት ኣብ ምሕታም ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Due to a lack of capacity in the standardized supply chain, some digital producers are printing health materials such as nasal sweaters and ventlets.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ ኣብነት፣ ናይ ጣልያን ሆስፒታል ብህጹጽ ቬንትሌተር ቫልቭ ከድልዮ ከሎ፣ እቲ መቕረባይ ድማ ኣብቲ ዝተበሃሎ ናይ ግዘ ገደብ ከቕርብ ብዘይምኽኣሉ፣ ናይ እቲ ከባቢ ጀማሪ ብግልባጥ ምህንድስና እቲ ዘድሊ 100 ቫልቭ ኣብ ሓደ ለይቲ ሰሪሑ ወዲኡ።
en-mt: For example, when an Italian hospital urgently needed a ventilator, and the offer could not provide the time limits set, the local starter completed the required 100 valves in one night.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: ድሕሪ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ለበዳ፣ ብዛዕባ መበቆሉ፣ ስኬሉ፣ ምክልኻል መገዱ፣ መድሓኒትን ካልኦት ናይ እቲ ሕማም ኣካላትን ናይ ሴራ ስነ-ሓሳባት፣ ጌጋ ሓበሬታታትን ናይ ሓሶት ሓበሬታታትን ብቕልጡፍ ኣብ ኦንላይን ክሰራጨዉ ጸኒሖም።
en-mt: After the first COVID-19 pandemic, misinformation and false information about its origin, skeletal, preventive path, medicine and other elements of the disease spread quickly online.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ነቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እንስሳት ከመሓላልፍዎ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Humans can transmit the virus to animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሓሰማ፣ ማይ ደርሆን ምብዛሕ ንምኽኣሉ እቲ መጽናዕቲ መረዳእታ ክረክብ ኣይከኣለን።
en-mt: he study could not find any evidence that the virus spreads in pigs and chicken water.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: ነዚ ሕማም ንምሕካም ዝተፈቐደ መድሓኒት ኮነ ክትባት የለን።
en-mt: There is no cure or vaccine for this disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝግበሩ ናይ ክትባታትን መድሓታትን ዓለምለኻዊ መጽናዕቲ ብመንግስታዊ ትካላትን፣ ኣካዳሚካዊ ጉጅለታትን ናይ ኢንዳስትሪ መጽናዕቲን እንዳተኻየደ ይርከብ።
en-mt: He has conducted an international study of COVID-19 vaccinated and managed by government agencies, academic groups and industry.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች፣ ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናይ "SOLIDARITY Trial" ናይዞም ዘለዉ ኣርባዕተ ጸረ ቫይረስ ኮምፓውንድታት ልዑል ተስፋ ይህቡ ምስ ምህላዎም ፈተነታት ጀሚሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In March, the WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION (WHO) launched the SOLIDARITY Trial with high hopes for the four anti-virus compounds.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: ክትባተ የብሉን ግን፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ኤጀንሲታት ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ብንቕሓት የማዕብሉ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: It is not allowed to be vaccinated, but several agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: ቅድም ክብል ኣብ SARS-CoV ዝተኻየዱ ስራሕቲ፣ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕሉ ኣለው እዚ ድማ SARS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2ን ክልቲኦም ናብ ናይ ሰብ ዋህዮ ንምእታው ACE2 ተቐባሊ ዝጥቀሙ ብምዃኖም እዩ።
en-mt: Previous work on SARS-CoV has been used because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use ACE2 receptors to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: ሰለስተ ናይ ክትባት ሜላታት ኣብ ምርመረ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Three vaccines are under test.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ ተመራመርቲ ሙሉእ ናይ ቫይረስ ክትባት ክሰርሑ እዮም ዝፍትኑ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: First of all, researchers are trying to develop a full vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: ከምዚ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ምጥቃም፣ ዘይንጡፍ ይኹን ምውት፣ ናይ ደቂ ሰብ ሰውነት ነዚ ሓድሽ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምምዕባል ዕላማ ዝገበረ እዩ።
en-mt: he use of such a virus, whether inactive or dead, is aimed at developing the human body's immune response to the new COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: ካልኣይ ስትራቴጂ፣ ክፋል ዩኒት ክትባታት፣ነቲ ናይ ሰበነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ስርዓት ን ዝተወሰኑ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ዩኒት ክፋላት ክነቓቓሕ ንምግባር ዝዓለመ እዩ።
en-mt: A second strategy, part of the vaccine unit, is aimed at the immune system and the ability to detect certain units of the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ጉዳይ ለበዳ፣ ከምዚ ዓይነት መጽናዕቲ ኣብ S-spike ፕሮቲን ነቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እቲ ACE2 ኢንዛይም ተቐባሊ ንክኣቱ ዝሕግዝ ትኹረት ዝገበረ እዩ።
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such a study focuses on S-spike proteins that help the virus enter the ACE2 enzyme receptor.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: እቲ ሳልሳይ ሜላ ድማ ናይ ኒዩክሊክ ኣሲድ ክትባታት እዮም (DNA ወይ RNA ክትባታት፣ ሓድሽ ናይ ክትባት ምፍጣር ቴክኒክ)።
en-mt: A third method is the nuclear acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a new vaccine creation technique).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: ካብዞም ዘዴታት ውሽጢ ናይ ሙከራ ኽትባት ንደሕንነትን ሓቅነትን ብፈተነታት ክሓልፉ ኣለዎም። ብኣቆጻጽራ ኣውሮፓ ኣብ መጋቢት 16፣ 2020 እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ክትባት ብኣርባዕተ ፈቓደኛ ሰባት ኣብ ሲያትል ተጀሚሩ።
en-mt: Within these methods, test vaccines must pass safety and authenticity tests, and on March 16, 2020, the first vaccine was launched in Seattle by four volunteers.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: እዚ ክትባትካብ እቲ ነቲ ሕማም ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ዝቐድሖ ዘይጎድእ ጀኒቲክ ኮድ ኣለዎ። ብኣንቲቦዲ ዝድገፍ ምምሕያሽ ኣብ ናይ SARS-COV-2 ክትባት ምዕባለ ዝተመኸረ ነገር እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን እዚ እውን መዘራረቢ እዩ።
en-mt: The vaccine has a harmless genetic code from the virus that triggered the disease, and an antibody-backed improvement has been recommended for the development of the SARS-COV-2 vaccine, but this is also a talking point.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: ካብ ኣፐሪል 2020 ጀሚሮም፣ ልዕሊ 300 ንጡፋት ክሊኒካል ፈተነታት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Since 2020, more than 300 clinical trials have been conducted.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: ኣብ hydroxychloroquine(ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኲን) ወይ chloroquine(ክሎሮኲን) ዝገበሩ መጽናዕቲታት ሓዊሱ፣ ሸውዓተ ፈተነታት ዓሶ ንምሕካም ፈቓድ ዘለዎም መድሓኒታት ይፍትኑ ነይሮም።
en-mt: Studies on hydroxychloroquine (hydroxychloroquine) or chloroquine burned; seven trials were testing approved drugs to treat malaria.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: ዳግም ንካልእ ዐላማ ዝተዳለወ ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓኒት መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ቻይና መጽናዕቲ ዝሓዘ እዩ፣ ምስ ትሽዓተ ፌዝ III ናይ remdesivir ፈተነታት ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ሃገራት ኣብ ናይ ኣፕሪል መወዳእታ ዝወጸ ሪፖርት ከምዘርእዮ።
en-mt: Re-designed anti-virus drugs for other purposes contains most of Chinese studies, along with nine Face III remdesivir trials, according to a report published in late April in various countries.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክትባት ምዕባለን ዝተመረጹ መድሓኒታትን ዓብዪ ገምጋም ተኻይዱ እዩ ። remdesivir(ሬምደስቪር)፣ chloroquine(ክሎሮኲን) ን hydroxychloroquine(ሃይድሮክስይክሎሮኲን) ን፣ lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ከምኡውን lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ምስ interferon beta(ኢንተርፈሮን ቤታ) ሓዊሱ ዝተፈላለዩ ጸረ- ቫይረስ መድሓኒታት ንናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ገምጋም ይግበሮም ኣሎ ።
en-mt: Since April 2020, a major review has been conducted on the development and selection of the COVID-19 vaccine: remdesivir (Reddesviir), chloroquine (chloroquine) and hydroxychloroquine (hydroxychloroquine) and lopin A variety of antivir/ritonavir (lopinavir/ritonavir) and lopinavir/ritonavir (lopinavir/ritonavir) are evaluating covid-19 testing with interferon beta (Interferon beta).

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: ካብ ማርች 2020 ጀሚሩ ናይ remdesivir ብቕዑነት ዘርኢ ዝተወሰነ መረዳእታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, there has been a number of remdesivir seeds.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ምምሕያሻት ኣብ ቀሊል ናይ remdesivir(ሬምደስቪር) መድሓኒት ኣብ ዝተፈተነሎም ሰባት ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Clinical improvements have been seen in people who have been tested on a simple remdesivir (Remdesvir) drug.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: ፌዝ III ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ኣብ US፣ ቻይናን ጣልያንን ይካየዱ ኣለዉ። Chloroquine፣ ዓሶ ንምሕካም ዝጠቅም ዝነበረ መድሓኒት፣ ኣብ ቻይና መጽናዕቲ ተገይሩሉ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ናይ መጀመርታ ውጽኢት ድማ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Fez III clinical trials are underway in the US, China and Italy. Chloroquine, a drug used to treat malaria, was studied in China and shown preliminary results in February 2020.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ናይ እቲ መጽናዕቲ ገምጋም ኣድለይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: However, it is necessary to review the study.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: ናይ ኮርያን ቻይናን ናይ ጥዕና ሓለፍቲ chloroquine ምጠቃም ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: Korean and Chinese health officials recommend using chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ Wuhan Institute of Virology (ናይ ውሃን ቫይሮሎጂ ትካል)፣ ናይ ሓደ ግራም መዓልታዊ ዶዝ ዝመክር እንትኸውን፣ ናይ እዚ ዶዝ ክልተ ምውሳድ ግን ኣዝዩ ሓደገኛ ከምዝኾነን ክቐትል እውን ከምዝኽእል ሓቢሩ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology (Water and Virology Company) recommends a daily dose of one gram, but suggesting two doses of this dose is very dangerous and can also kill.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ 28 መጋቢት 2020፣ FDA ናይ hydroxychloroquineን chloroquineን ንኮቪድ-19 ንታሓከምቲ ዝሐክሙ ዘለዉ ሓካይም ኣብ እዋን ህጹጽ ረድኤት ክጥቀሙ ኣፍቂዱ። እዚ ናይ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም መምርሒ interferon፣ ribavirin ወይ umifenovir እውን ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ምጥቃም እውን ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA approved hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine for COVID-19 patients to use emergency assistance, including interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir against COVID-19.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: ናይ መጀምርታ መረዳእታ ከምዝሕብሮ ልዑል ናይ ribavirin መጠን SARS-CoV-2 ብቪትሮን ንምግታዕ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: Initial data suggests that high ribavirin levels of SARS-CoV-2 are necessary to curb vitrón.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Nitazoxanide(ኒታዞሳናይድ) ድሕሪ ኣብ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምውጋድ ትሑት ጻዕቒ ምርኣዩ፣ ንተወሳኺ ኣብ vivo ዝግበር መጽናዕቲ ተመኺሩ እዩ። መጽናዕቲታት ናይ መጀመርያ ስፓይክ ፕሮቲናት ብትራንስመምብሬን ፕሮቴዝ ሲሪን 2 (TMPRSS2) ዝተተሓሓዙ ን SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ብምትእትታው ንክኣቱ ወሰንቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Nitazoxanide (Nitazosanide) is shown low concentration after the removal of SARS-CoV-2; further vivo studies have shown that early spike proteins are crucial for the introduction of SARS-CoV-2 with ACE2 receptors.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: ናይ chloroquine ን hydroxychloroquine ን ምስ azithromycinን ካብኡ ወጻኢ ዝተገበሩ መጽናዕቲታት ብዘይ ተወሳኺ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ሕክምና ማሕበረ ሰብ ክጥቀመሎም ዘይከኣለሉ ምኽንያት ዓበይቲ ግድፈታት ዘለዉዎም ብምዃኖም እዩ። Oseltamivir ን SARS-CoV-2 ኢን ቪትሮ ኣይግድብን ኣብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕክምና ድማ ዝኾነ ዓይነት እጃም የብሉን።
en-mt: he reason why chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin and beyond can't be used without further medical community research is because they have major problems. Oseltamivir does not limit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no role in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: Cytokine storm ናይ ከቢድ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ መጨረሻ ከባቢ ጎድናዊ ጽልዋ እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm is a side effect of severe COVID-19.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: hydroxychloroquine ጸረ-ሳይቶኪን ስቶርም ባህሪታት ከምዘለዎ መረጋገጺ ኣሎ።Tocilizumab ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ናይ ንእሽተይ መጽናዕቲ ድሕሪ ምክያዱ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምና መምርሒኡ ተጠቓሊሉ እዩ።
en-mt: Hydroxychloroquine is confirmed to have anti-cytokine storm characteristics.Tocilizumab was included in its medical guide after conducting a small study in China's National Small Survey.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሰባት ፖዘቲቭ ውጽኢታት ድሕሪ ምርኣይ ብ ብሄራዊ ደረጃ ኣብ ጣልያ ናይ ፌዝ 2 ኣጋጣሚ ዘይኮነ ፈተነ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: After seeing positive results in people with serious illnesses, a non-accidental trial of Fez 2 is being conducted in Italy nationally.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: ምስ ሴረም ፌሪቲን ዝተሓወሰ ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ንምፍላይ ዝግበር ናይ ደም ምርመራ ነዞም ኣብ ገለ ሰባት ናይ ሞቶም ምኽንያት እዮም ተባሂሎም ዝእመኑ ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ምዕባለታት ጽልዋ ንምቕናስ ተባሂሉ እዩ ተኻይዱ።
en-mt: Blood tests to separate serum ferritin-mixed cytokine storms have been conducted to reduce the impact of such developments, which are believed to be the cause of death in some people.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ኣብ ሕሉፍ ዝተርኣየ ጉዳይ ንናይ ብዘተፈላለዩ ምኽንያታት ዝፍጠሩ ናይ steroid refractory cytokine ዝሰደዱ ሲንድረማት መሐከሚ interleukin-6 receptor antagonist ብ FDA ተፈቒዱ እዩ፣ CAR T ናይ ዋህየ ሕክምና፣ ኣብ 2017።
en-mt: According to the FDA, the interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA in 2017 for a variety of reasons.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ ናይ ኣጋጣሚ ዝኾነ፣ ቁጽጽር ዝተገበሮመረዳእታ tocilizumab ብቑዕ ናይ CRS ከምዝኾነ ዘርኢ የለን።
en-mt: So far, there is no indication that random, controlled tocilizumab is a suitable CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: ብ ካብ ኮቪደ-19 ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ዝፈረየ ዘተጻረየን ዝሓፈሰን ኣንቲቦዲ ንዘድልዮም ሰባት ምምሕልላ፣ ከም ክትባት ዘይኮነ ግን ውሽጣዊ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ዝሃንጽ ተባሂሉ መጽናዕቲ እንዳተኻየደሉ ይርከብ።
en-mt: People who have recovered from HIV-19 have been shown to swear to people in need of anti-hiv infections, not as a vaccine, but as an internal immunity.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: እዚ ሜላ እዚ ኣብ SARS ተፈቲኑ ዘየዕግብ ውጽኢት ሂቡ እዩ።
en-mt: his method has been tested on SARS and has yielded unsatisfactory results.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ ቫይረስ ኒውትራላይዜሽን ማለት ፓሲቭ ኣንቲቦዲ ሕክምና ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2 ንምክልኻል ክገብሮ ዝኽእሎ ኣካይዳ እዩ።
en-mt: Viral neuralization is a behavior that passive antibiotic therapy can do to prevent the spread of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: ካልኦት ሜላታት ግን፣ ከም ኣንቲቦዲ -መሰረት ዝገበሩ ሴሉላር ሳይቶክሲሲቲን/ወይ ፋጎሳይቶሲስ፣ እውን ክግበሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: However, other methods, such as antibiotic-based cell cytoxycytiens and/or fagocytosis, can also be used.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: ካልኦት ድሑራት ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ ሕክምናታት፣ ንኣብነት፣ ዝተመረቱ ሞኖክሎናል ኣንቲቦዲታት ምጥቃም፣ ኣብ ምምዕባል ይርከብ።
en-mt: Other anti-anti-doping treatments, e.g., the use of monoclonal antibodies are under development.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: ናይ ኮንቨልሰት ሴረም ምፍራይ፣ ካብ ካብቲ ሕማም ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ዝተወሰደ ደም ፈሳሲ ክፋል ዝሓዘ እንትኸውን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣንቲቦዲ ድማ ዝሓዘ እዩ፣ ንቅልጡፍ ኣድማዒነት ድማ ክጠቅም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Hemorrhage of convulsed serum contains a fluid component of blood taken from people recovering from the disease and contains the antibody of the virus and can be useful for rapid effectiveness.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ሕማም፣ ብቐረባ ዝተተሓሓዙ ሲንድሮማት ጉጅለ
en-mt: Coronavirus disease, a group of closely related syndromes

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: ሊ ወንሊያንግ፣ ናይ ውሃን ማእኸላይ ሆስፒታል ዶክተር፣ብዛዕባ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ግንዛበ ፈጢሩ፣ ድሕሪ ግዘ ድማ በቲ ቫይረስ ተታሒዙ ዝሞተ እዩ።
en-mt: Lee Welliang, a doctor at Water and Central Hospital, has raised awareness of the COVID-19 virus and died of contracting the virus.
